verse_text: Azezi n de Adavidi yɩɩŋa, la Abraham yɩɩŋa yaabdõma n wãna:
Abraham n dↄgɛ A'izakɩ, tɩ A'izakɩ dↄgɛ Azakↄbɩ, tɩ Azakↄbɩ dↄgɛ Azuda, la a kẽendõma, la a yɩbsɩ.
Tɩ Azuda la a pↄga Atamaarɩ dↄgɛ Afarɛsɩ la Azara, tɩ Afarɛsɩ dↄgɛ A'ɛsrↄm, tɩ A'ɛsrↄm dↄgɛ Aram,
tɩ Aram dↄgɛ Aminadabɩ, tɩ Aminadabɩ dↄgɛ Anaasõ, tɩ Anaasõ dↄgɛ Asalmõ.
Tɩ Asalmõ la a pↄga Arahabɩ dↄgɛ Aboozɩ, tɩ Aboozɩ la a pↄga Aruti dↄgɛ A'obɛɛdɩ, tɩ A'obɛɛdɩ dↄgɛ Azese.
Tɩ Azese dↄgɛ naba Adavidi. Tɩ Adavidi daan di A'uuri pↄkõorɛ, tɩ ba dↄgɛ Asalomõ.
Tɩ Asalomõ dↄgɛ Aroboam, tɩ Aroboam dↄgɛ Abiya, tɩ Abiya dↄgɛ Aza.
Tɩ Aza dↄgɛ Azozafatɩ, tɩ Azozafatɩ dↄgɛ Azoram, tɩ Azoram dↄgɛ A'oziasɩ.
Tɩ A'oziasɩ dↄgɛ Azↄtam, tɩ Azↄtam dↄgɛ Akaazɩ, tɩ Akaazɩ dↄgɛ A'ezekiasɩ.
Tɩ A'ezekiasɩ dↄgɛ Amanase, tɩ Amanase dↄgɛ Amõ, tɩ Amõ dↄgɛ Azoziasɩ.
Tɩ Azoziasɩ dↄgɛ Azekoniyasɩ la a yɩbsɩ. Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yõgɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma tarɩ sẽŋɛ Babilↄnɩ.
La ban paagɛ Babilↄnɩ na poorʋm, tɩ Azekoniyasɩ dↄgɛ Asalatɩyɛlɩ, tɩ Asalatɩyɛlɩ dↄgɛ Azorobabɛlɩ.
Tɩ Azorobabɛlɩ dↄgɛ Abiyuudɩ, tɩ Abiyuudɩ dↄgɛ A'eliakim, tɩ A'eliakim dↄgɛ Azↄↄrɩ.
Tɩ Azↄↄrɩ dↄgɛ Asadↄkɩ, tɩ Asadↄkɩ dↄgɛ Akim, tɩ Akim dↄgɛ A'eliyuudɩ.
Tɩ A'eliyuudɩ dↄgɛ A'eleazaarɩ, tɩ A'eleazaarɩ dↄgɛ Amatã, tɩ Amatã dↄgɛ Azakↄbɩ.
Tɩ Azakↄbɩ dↄgɛ Azozɛfʋ n de Amaari sɩra la. Amaari ẽŋa n dↄgɛ Azezi tɩ ba wi'iri Krisi la.

Lan pı̃'ilum na Abraham wa paagɛ Adavidi, de la zamãana pia la anaasɩ. Lan sẽŋɛ la Adavidi wa paagɛ ban yõgɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma sẽŋɛ Babilↄnɩ na, de la zamãana pia la anaasɩ. Ban yõgɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma sẽŋɛ Babilↄnɩ wa paagɛ Krisi la, de la zamãana pia la anaasɩ.
Azezi-krisi dↄka daan ẽŋɛ la wãna: A ma Amaari daan yetɩ a ele la Azozɛfʋ, la ba daan nãn ka gã'arɛ la taaba, dee tɩ a tara pʋʋrɛ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n botɩ a tara pʋʋrɛ la.
La Azozɛfʋ n daan yetɩ a di ẽ na de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, a ka boorɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ ẽ yãnnɛ nẽrba nifum, a daan tẽ'esɛ mɛ tɩ a basɛ ẽ sı̃m.

La ẽn daan tẽ'esrɩ bɛla la, tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ malɛka wa'am wa puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ ẽ zãasŋↄ pʋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azozɛfʋ, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, da zoe dabeem, di Amaari tɩ a dɛna fʋ pↄga, pʋʋrɛ la tɩ a tarɩ la de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n bↄ ẽ.
A wʋn dↄgɛ la budibla, tɩ fʋ sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi, la de ẽŋa n wʋn fãagɛ a nẽrba la ba tõon-be'ero pʋam basɛ."
Bõn-bãma wuu ẽŋɛ mɛ tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsa la yele se'em na n ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ:
"Bɩsɛ-ya, pugla n nãn ka mi bʋraaga wʋn yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ dↄgɛ budibla, tɩ ba wi'ira a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ A'emanuwɛlɩ." A võorɛ de la Nawẽnnɛ boe la tɩ lɛ.
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ nẽegɛ, ẽŋɛ wʋ Zuudãana malɛka la n yele ẽ se'em na, di a pↄga la.
La a daan ka gã'arɛ la ẽ, halɩ tɩ a wa dↄgɛ budibla la, tɩ a sɩ bia la yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi.
Ba daan dↄgɛ Azezi la Bɛtelɛm n boe Zude so'olʋm, se'emwẽnnɛ tɩ A'erↄdɩ de naba la. Tɩ bãŋrɩba ze'ele dapↄa bↄba wa'am Zerizalɛm,
wa soke yetɩ: "Bia la tɩ ba dↄgɛ la boe la bɛ, sɛka n wʋn dɛna Zifdõma naba la? Tõma yẽ la a wõrbiire dapↄa bↄba, bɛla ı̃yã tɩ tõma wa'am tɩ tɩ nã'asɛ ẽ."
La naba A'erↄdɩ n daan wõm bɛla la, ẽŋa la Zerizalɛm dõma wuu yɛm n yↄↄrɩ.
Tɩ A'erↄdɩ daan lagsɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la wuu, soke ba yetɩ: "Tẽn-kãna tɩ ba wʋn dↄgɛ Krisi la?"
Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bɛtelɛm n boe Zude so'olʋm na, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa la yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yele la wãna:
'Bɛtelɛm n de tẽn-pɩka, fʋ ka pↄ'ↄgɛ Zude so'olʋm tẽn-kãra la pʋam, se'ere n soe la, nẽra n wʋn yese fõn pʋam dɛna nẽŋadãana bɩsra Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n de mam nẽrba la yelle.' "
La A'erↄdɩ sʋgɛ mɛ wi bãŋrɩba la soke ba bãŋɛ wẽnse'ere tɩ wõrbiire la yese,
dee tõm ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya Bɛtelɛm ka ɛ soke bãŋɛ bia la yelle sõŋa sõŋa, la ya sãn yẽ ẽ, ya leme wa'am wa yele mam tɩ mam mẽ sẽŋɛ ka nã'asɛ ẽ."
La ban wõm naba la yetↄga la, ba sẽnnɩ mɛ wɛ'ɛsa, darɛ le yẽ wõrbiire la tɩ ba daan yẽ dapↄa bↄba la n tole ba nẽŋa, tarɩ ba halɩ ka paagɛ bia la n boe zẽ'e-sɛka la ze'ele.
La ban daan yẽ wõrbiire la, ba sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm mɛ halɩ zozo'e.

Tɩ ba kẽ yire la pʋam yẽ bia la, la a ma Amaari, ka dũma tẽŋa bia la nẽŋam nã'asɛ ẽ, dee lorge ba lↄgrↄ loose ban tarɩ sɛla la bↄ ẽ. Ba daan de la sãlma, la tɩdarɛ, la miiri n tarɩ yũuŋ-yẽlga.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ daan kã'an ba zãasŋↄ pʋam yetɩ, ba da le doose naba A'erↄdɩ zẽ'am, bɛla tɩ ba daan doose sore ayẽma lebe kule ba tẽŋa.

Bãŋrɩba la n fõrgɛ la, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ Azozɛfʋ zãasŋↄ pʋam, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Isge tarɩ bia la, la a ma la zoe sẽŋɛ Ezipti ka bↄna bilam halɩ tɩ m le wa yele fʋ se'ere. Se'ere n soe la, naba A'erↄdɩ wʋn ɛɛra bia la mɛ tɩ a kʋ."
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ isge yʋ'ʋŋↄ tarɩ bia la, la a ma la sẽŋɛ Ezipti,
ka bↄna bilam halɩ tɩ A'erↄdɩ wa ki. La ẽŋɛ la bɛla, tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsa yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Mam wi m Dayʋa la n boe Ezipti la tɩ a wa'am."

La A'erↄdɩ n daan bãŋɛ tɩ bãŋrɩba la pã'asɛ ẽŋa mɛ na, a sũure n yı̃ige halɩ, tɩ a tõm nẽrba yetɩ ba sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm, la tẽn-sɛba n boe a kẽnkɛrsɩ la wuu ka kʋ budim-sɛba wuu n masɛ wʋ yʋʋma ayi, la sɛba n ka paagɛ bɛla la, wʋ ẽŋa n daan soke bãŋrɩba la bãŋɛ se'emwẽnnɛ tɩ wõrbiire la yese la.
Bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azeremi n yʋʋn yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ:
"Ba wõm tagursi Rama tẽŋa, kʋʋnↄ la fablɩgↄ zozo'e. La de la Arasɛlɩ n kellɩ a kↄma yelle, tɩ ba pã'asra ẽ tɩ a ka sakra tɩ a go'oge. Se'ere n soe la, a kↄma la ka le bↄna."
La naba A'erↄdɩ daan wa ki mɛ, tɩ Zuudãana malɛka puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ Azozɛfʋ zãasŋↄ pʋam Ezipti, yele ẽ yetɩ:
"Isge tarɩ bia la, la a ma la lebe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, sɛka n daan eerɩ bia la tɩ a kʋ la ki mɛ."
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ isge tarɩ bia la, la a ma la kule Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋa.
La a daan wõm mɛ tɩ Arkelawusi n sↄↄgɛ a sↄ A'erↄdɩ zẽ'am di Zude na'am. Tɩ a daan zoe dabeem ka sẽŋɛ Zude so'olʋm. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kã'an ẽ zãasŋↄ pʋam, tɩ a sẽŋɛ Galile so'olʋm.
A daan sẽŋɛ ka kẽ'era la tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nazarɛtɩ. Bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la n daan yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. Ba daan yetɩ: "Ba wʋn wi'ira Krisi la tɩ Nazarɛtɩ nẽra."
Bɛla wẽnnɛ tɩ Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, wa sẽŋɛ Zude weem ka mõola
yetɩ: "Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm lɛm mɛ."
La de la Azã yelle tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Nẽra ayɩla n boe weem mõola ke'enke'em yetɩ: 'Malgɛ-ya sore sõŋa gu'ura Zuudãana. Malgɛ-ya sↄa la tɩ ba tↄ tẽntẽesɩ bↄ ẽ.' "
Azã daan yɛ la fuugo n de yʋgnɛ kõbrↄ, dɩkɛ sagãnnɛ lʋ a sɩa. A dia daan de la saniiro la seero.
Tɩ nẽrba daan ze'ele Zerizalɛm, la Zude so'olʋm wuu, la tẽn-sɛba n lɛm kʋlaaga yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Zʋrdẽ la wuu sẽnna a zẽ'am,
tↄgra ba tõon-be'ero pa'ala ẽ, tɩ a misra ba Zʋrdẽ ko'om na pʋam.

La Azã yẽ la Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma zozo'e n sẽm a zẽ'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma ãn wʋ kãmpẽesɩ buuri, ãne n pa'alɛ ya tɩ ya tã wʋn zoe põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ n sẽm na?
Tõm-ya tõon-sɛba n pa'alɩ tɩ ya teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.
La ya da tẽ'esra tɩ Abraham n de ya yaaba la, ya wʋn põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ la mɛ. Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn dɩkɛ kuga wã botɩ ba lebge Abraham yɩɩsɩ mɛ.
Nẽra n põn tara lɩa a nu'usum tɩ a lʋbɛ tɩɩsɩ. Tɩ-sɛka woo n ka wↄnnɩ biɛ sõma, a wʋn lʋbɛ ẽ mɛ, lobge bugum pʋam, tɩ bugum di ẽ.

Mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ya teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero. La sɛka n boe mam poorʋm sẽna la pãŋa gãnnɩ mam mɛ. La mam põn ka masɛ tɩ m pirge a tagra. Ẽŋa n wʋn mise ya Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, la bugum pʋam.
Ẽŋa wʋn welge nẽrba wʋ nẽra n zãlɩ pɩ'ɩgↄ a nu'usum tɩ a vaagɛ a si zɛɛŋa yeele, ẽŋɛ a bãarɛ pʋam dee yõ urgo la, la bugum n ka kı̃ŋri."
Azezi daan ze'ele la Galile wa'am Zʋrdẽ Azã zẽ'am tɩ a mise ẽ ko'om pʋam.
Tɩ Azã daan zagsɛ, dee yetɩ: "La de nɩ na mam n wʋn wa'am fõn zẽ'am tɩ fõn mise mam, tɩ fõn sẽna mam zẽ'am?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ la ẽŋɛ bɛla lɛɛlɛ wã, tɩ la de la bɛla tɩ tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ lan masɛ Nawẽnnɛ n boorɩ se'em na wuu." Azezi n yele bɛla la, tɩ Azã sakɛ
mise ẽ, tɩ a dↄↄra. Haya, tɩ saazuum yo'oge, tɩ a yẽ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n signi a zuo wʋ na'adawenne.
Tɩ kõa ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire yetɩ: "Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu, a paagɛ la mam yɛm."
Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la weem tɩ Asũtãana makɛ ẽ.
Azezi daan lʋ la nõorɛ dabsa pinaasɩ, wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ. Tɩ a kↄm dõnna.
Tɩ Asũtãana lɛm ẽ, yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ botɩ kuga wã lebge dia."
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Nẽrsaala kãn vↄa dia mã'a ı̃yã, la de la yetↄg-sɛba wuu n yesrɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõorʋm ı̃yã.' "
Tɩ Asũtãana tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm, ka zom Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zuo ze'ele,

dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ ẽkɛ bisge tẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ a malɛkadõma kↄkɛ fʋ la ba nu'usi, tɩ fʋ kãn wẽ fʋ nã'arɛ la kugre.' "
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "La ken gʋlsɛ yetɩ: 'Da makɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ bɩsɛ.' "
Tɩ Asũtãana le tarɩ Azezi zom tãŋa n ba wↄgɛ zuo, ka pa'alɛ ẽ dũnia so'olʋm wuu la a na'am pãŋa,
yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn ka dũma tẽŋa nã'asɛ mam, mam wʋn bↄ fʋ bãna wã wuu."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ fõrgɛ, Asũtãana! La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Nã'asra Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ, dee sakra ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.' "
Tɩ Asũtãana basɛ Azezi dee fõrgɛ. Tɩ malɛkadõma wa'am wa sõŋra ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi wõm tɩ ba yõkɛ Azã yʋ yʋ'a deego pʋam, tɩ a lebe Galile so'olʋm.
La a daan basɛ Nazarɛtɩ tẽŋa, dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ'era la Kapɛrnaʋm n lɛm Galile mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, Zabulõ la Nɛftali so'olʋm pʋam,
tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ:
"Zabulõ la Nɛftali tẽnsɩ n tↄglɛ ko-kãtɛ bↄba, Zʋrdẽ doone ke bↄba, Galile tẽnsɩ tɩ bu-zãŋsɩ boe a pʋam na,
nẽr-sɛba n boe lika pʋam na yẽ peelem zozo'e. La nẽr-sɛba n zı̃ kũm mã'asʋm pʋam na, peelem nẽegɛ mɛ bↄ ba."
Bɛla wẽnnɛ tɩ Azezi daan pↄsɛ mõola yetɩ: "Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm lɛm mɛ."
Azezi daan eerɩ la Galile mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, yẽ bʋraasɩ bayi, Asimõ tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la a yɩbga A'ãndre, tɩ ba lobrɩ yʋka mõgrɛ la pʋam, ba daan de la zũn-yõgrɩba.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Dↄla-ya mam, tɩ mam wʋn basɛ tɩ ya ɛɛra nẽrba tɩ ba dↄla mam wʋ yãma n yõgrɩ zũma se'em na."
Tɩ ba basɛ ba yʋgsɩ la bilam mẽŋa, dee dↄla ẽ.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ nẽŋa le yẽ bʋraasɩ bayi n de Azebede kↄma, Azakɩ la a yɩbga Azã. Tɩ bãma, la ba sↄ Azebede bↄna õorŋↄ pʋam malgra ba yʋgsɩ. Tɩ Azezi wi ba,
tɩ ba basɛ õorŋↄ la, la ba sↄ la tↄtↄ, dee dↄla ẽ.
Azezi daan kaarɩ la Galile so'olʋm wuu zãsna nẽrba Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, mõola Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga dee botɩ bã'adõma, la kobro wuu n boe nẽrba la pʋam yẽta ı̃mã'asʋm.

Tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ daan yese Siiri so'olʋm wuu, tɩ ba tara bã'adõma wuu tɩ bã'asɩ buuri to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, nẽrba ı̃isi n dõnnɩ tɩ ba nãmsra, la kʋlkã'arsɩ n dolɩ sɛba, la nẽrba n luti kinki'ire, la kↄↄrnↄ wa'am a zẽ'am, tɩ a botɩ ba wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e ze'ele Galile, la Dekapↄlɩ, la Zerizalɛm, la Zude, la tẽnsɩ n boe Zʋrdẽ doone ke bↄba doose ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, zom tãŋa zuo zı̃'ire. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lagsɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ a yãŋa zãsʋm ba yetɩ:
"Nẽr-sɛba n mi tɩ ba ka masɛ Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la ba bõnↄ.
Sũ-sã'aŋↄ dõma tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ ba sũure mã'agɛ.
Sũ-bʋgsʋm dõma tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ba dũnia tɩ ba sↄna.
Sɛba n boorɩ sɛla n masɛ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm la ba sũure wuu tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ba sɛla tɩ ba boorɩ la tɩ la seke.
Ninbãal-zↄtba tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zoe ba ninbãalga.
Pʋpeelem dõma tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ba wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ.
Sɛba n botɩ sũ-mã'asʋm bↄna nẽrba tẽŋasʋka tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn wi'ira ba tɩ a kↄma.
Sɛba n ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ, tɩ ba nãmsra ba tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la ba bõnↄ.
Yãma sɛba tɩ ba tʋʋrɩ ya, nãmsra ya, tↄgra ya tↄg-be'ero dee parna bↄ'ↄra ya, yan dolɩ mam na ı̃yã, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Ẽŋɛ-ya sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, ya yↄↄrↄ n wʋn zo'oge Nawẽnnɛ yire la ı̃yã. Ba mẽ daan nãmsɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n dẽŋɛ yãma la bɛla."

Azezi daan le yetɩ: "Wʋ yaarʋm n botɩ dia zã'asʋm na, yãma mẽ masɛ tɩ ya ãna wʋ yaarʋm dũnia wã pʋam. La yaarʋm sãn sabgɛ, bẽm n wʋn basɛ tɩ a le zã'asʋm? A lebge la zãŋa, a ka le tara yõorↄ, a de la ba lobe ẽ basɛ yẽŋa, tɩ nẽrba nẽ ẽ la nãma.
Yãma de la dũnia wã peelem. Tẽŋa n boe tãŋa zuo ka tã wʋn sʋgɛ.
La ba ka yõ'orɩ fɩtla vugra la pɩ'ɩgↄ, ba wʋn zoole ẽ na fɩtla zoolgo zẽ'a, tɩ a nẽegɛ peelem bↄ'ↄra nẽr-sɛba wuu n boe yire la pʋam na.
Bɛla, basɛ-ya tɩ ya peelem nẽegɛ nẽrba tẽŋasʋka, tɩ ba yẽ ya tõon-sõma nã'asɛ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum."
"Da tẽ'esɛ-ya tɩ mam wa'am tɩ m sã'am na Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ, bɩɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba yetↄga la. Mam ka wa'am tɩ m sã'am ba, mam wa'am tɩ m pa'alɛ la ba võorɛ ba'asɛ, dee ẽŋɛ ban yele se'em na.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ saazuum la tẽŋa n wʋn yuuge se'em, sɛla sɛla kãn yese Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ la pʋam baa fẽfẽe, halɩ tɩ sɛla woo wa ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ.

Bɛla, nẽr-sɛka n ka sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ ayɩla, baa a sãn ãna pɩka gãnna wuu, dee zãsna nẽrba basɛba tɩ ba da sakɛ, a wʋn dɛna nẽr-pɩka Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam. La sɛka n sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ, dee zãsna nẽrba tɩ ba ɩta bɛla, a wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ ya sãn ka ɩta Nawẽnnɛ n boorɩ se'em na gãnna lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, ya kãn tã'agɛ kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
"Yãma wõm tɩ ba daan yele kʋrʋm dõma yetɩ: 'Da kʋ nẽra, la nẽra sãn kʋ nẽra, ba di a sarɩya.'

La mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo sũure n isge la a sↄbia, la masɛ tɩ ba di a sarɩya. La sɛka n yele a sↄbia yetɩ: 'Yalma', la masɛ tɩ sarɩyaditba nẽŋadõma di a sarɩya. La sɛka n yele a sↄbia yetɩ: 'Fʋ ka tarɩ võorɛ', ẽŋa dãana masɛ mɛ tɩ a kẽ bug-tẽŋa.
Bɛla, fʋ sãn tarɩ fʋ bↄ'a wa'am kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne zẽ'a tɩ fʋ bↄ Nawẽnnɛ, sãn tẽegɛ tɩ fõn tarɩ la yelle la fʋ sↄbia,
fʋ basɛ fʋ bↄ'a la kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne la nẽŋam, dee dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka malgɛ fʋ yelle la, la fʋ sↄbia la, dee yãŋa leme wa'am wa dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ'a la bↄ Nawẽnnɛ.

Fʋ sãn tara yelle la nẽra, tɩ a tara fʋ wɛ'ɛsa sarɩyadia zẽ'am, malgɛ fʋ yelle la tↄtↄ, yãma n nãn boe sore la, tɩ a da dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ sarɩyadita, tɩ a tↄgɛ fʋ yetↄga la dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ gu'ura, tɩ a kẽ'esɛ fↄ yʋ'a deem.
Mam yetɩ fʋ la asɩra, tɩ fʋ kãn yẽ sore yese yʋ'a deem na, halɩ tɩ fʋ wʋn wa yↄ fʋ sãnnɛ na wuu ba'asɛ."
"Yãma wõm tɩ ba daan yetɩ: 'Da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pↄga.'
La mam yetɩ ya tɩ, sɛka n bɩsɛ pↄka tɩ a yɛm bↄↄra ẽ, a põn gã'arɛ la ẽ mɛ a sũure pʋam.
Fʋ zʋʋgↄ nifo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ kɩrgɛ ẽ lobe basɛ zãazãarɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ ı̃yã sɛla ayɩla sãn ka bↄna mı̃ sõɩ ba wʋn lobe fʋ ı̃yã wuu bug-tẽŋa.
La fʋ zʋʋgↄ nu'ugo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ lobe basɛ zãazãarɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ ı̃yã sɛla ayɩla sãn ka bↄna mı̃ sõɩ ban wʋn lobe fʋ ı̃yã wuu bug-tẽŋa."
"Ba yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Nẽr-sɛka n lebse a pↄga, a bↄ ẽ gõŋↄ n pa'alɛ tɩ a lebse ẽ mɛ.'

La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, nẽr-sɛka woo n lebse a pↄga, tɩ la sãn dagna tɩ a gã la bʋraasɩ, a wʋn botɩ pↄka la sã'am mɛ, a sãn ele sɩra ayẽma. La nẽr-sɛka n di pↄg-sɛka tɩ ba lebse la, ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɛ la a tadãana pↄga."
"Ya ken wõm tɩ ba yʋʋn yele kʋrʋm dõma yetɩ: 'Da viige ya pↄrɛ. Fʋ sãn bı̃ŋe nõorɛ pↄɩ tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ, dẽnɩ tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ bɛla.'
La mam yetɩ ya tɩ, ya põn da pↄɩ. Da pↄɩ saazuum, bẽm ı̃yã, a de la Nawẽnnɛ na'am bı̃mbı̃nne.
Da pↄɩ tẽŋa, bẽm ı̃yã, a de la a nãma dↄglgↄ zẽ'a. Da pↄɩ Zerizalɛm, bẽm ı̃yã, a de la Nawẽnnɛ n de na-kãtɛ la tẽŋa.
Da pↄɩ fʋ zuugo, bẽm ı̃yã, fʋ ka tã wʋn basɛ tɩ fʋ zomto baa ayɩla lebge pɛɛlga bɩɩ sabga.
Basɛ-ya tɩ ya 'ẽe' dɛna 'ẽe', tɩ ya 'ayɛɩ' dɛna 'ayɛɩ'. La sãn gãŋɛ bɛla, sɛla n pa'asɛ la de la be'em dãana bõnↄ."
"Ya wõm tɩ ba daan yetɩ: 'Nẽra sãn pusge a tadãana nifo, ba mẽ pusge a nifo, nẽra sãn vike a tadãana yẽnnɛ, ba mẽ vike a yẽnnɛ.'
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, nẽra sãn ẽŋɛ ya be'em, ya da ẽŋɛ be'em lebse. La nẽra sãn wẽ fʋ zʋʋgↄ pɛka, fʋ basɛ tɩ a wẽ fʋ gↄbga pɛka pa'asɛ.
La nẽra sãn sãm fↄ tɩ a to'oge fʋ fu-pɩka, fʋ basɛ tɩ a to'oge fʋ fu-kãtɛ pa'asɛ.
La nẽra sãn pẽrgɛ fↄ tɩ fʋ kↄlgɛ ẽ kilomẽtrɩ ayɩla, fʋ kↄlgɛ ẽ kilomẽtrɩ bayi.
Nẽra sãn sose fʋ sɛla, fʋ bↄ ẽ. La nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a peŋe sɛla fʋ zẽ'am, da mõŋɛ ẽ."
"Ya wõm tɩ ba daan yetɩ: 'Fʋ nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana, dee sise fʋ bɛ.'
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, ya nõŋɛ ya bɛ'ɛba, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ bↄ'ↄra sɛba n nãmsrɩ ya la.

Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya wʋn dɛna ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum na kↄma, se'ere n soe la, ẽŋa n botɩ wʋntɛɛŋa yẽkra bↄ'ↄra nẽr-sõma la nẽr-be'ero, dee botɩ saaga niira bↄ'ↄra sɛba ɩrgↄ n masɛ, la sɛba ɩrgↄ n ka masɛ.
Yãma sãn nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ya la mã'a, bẽm yↄↄrↄ tɩ ya wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am? Lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba mẽ ɩtɩ la bɛla.
La yãma sãn pʋ'ʋsra la ya sↄbiisi mã'a, bẽm tɩ yãma ɩtɩ gãnna ya taaba la? Nẽr-sɛba n ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ na mẽ ɩtɩ la bɛla.
Bɛla, dɛna-ya nẽrba tɩ ya ɩrgↄ wuu wʋn masɛ, wʋ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum ɩrgↄ wuu n masɛ se'em na."
"Guuse-ya, da ɩta-ya ɩr-sõma nẽrba nẽŋam tɩ ba yẽta ya. Ya sãn ɩta bɛla, ya kãn to'oge yↄↄrↄ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum zẽ'am.

Bɛla, fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ sõŋɛ nasa, da kãn mõolɛ nẽrba zẽ'am wʋ pʋlibsum dõma n ɩtɩ se'em ba wẽndeto pʋam, la sorↄↄrↄ zuto tɩ nẽrba pẽgɛ ba la. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bãma põn to'oge ba yↄↄrↄ mɛ.
Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ sõŋɛ nasdõma, da basɛ tɩ fʋ gↄbga nu'ugo bãŋɛ fʋ zʋʋgↄ nu'ugo n ɩtɩ sɛla.
Bɛla nẽra nẽra kãn bãŋɛ tɩ fʋ sõŋɛ nasdõma, la fʋ Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n yẽ fõn sʋgɛ ẽŋɛ la, a wʋn lebse fo.

Ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, da ɩta-ya wʋ pʋlibsum dõma n ɩtɩ se'em na, bãma nõŋɛ la ba zɛ ba wẽndeto pʋam, la sorↄ-puursi zuto pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ tɩ nẽrba yẽta ba. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ba põn to'oge ba yↄↄrↄ mɛ.
Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, fʋ kẽ fʋ deem yʋ kʋlɩŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ fʋ Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe zẽ'a n sʋgɛ la. La fʋ Sↄ la n yẽ tɩ fʋ sʋgɛ mɛ pʋ'ʋsɛ la, a wʋn yↄ fↄ.
Ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, ya da tↄgra yetↄga n ka tarɩ võorɛ kaana wʋ nẽr-sɛba n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ n ɩtɩ se'em na, ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ bãma n tↄgrɩ zↄ'ↄra la ı̃yã, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn lerge bãma pʋ'ʋsgↄ mɛ.
Bɛla, da ãna-ya wʋ bãma n ãn se'em na, se'ere n soe la, lan dẽŋɛ ya wʋn sose ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ, a põn mina yãma n boorɩ sɛla mɛ.
Bɛla, pʋ'ʋsra-ya wãna: 'Tõma Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum, botɩ fʋ yʋ'ʋrɛ yẽta pẽka,
wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka, botɩ fõn boorɩ se'em ẽŋɛ tẽŋa zuo, wʋ lan ɩtɩ fõn yire se'em na.
Bↄ tↄ tɩ zı̃na dia.
Basɛ tɩ tõon-be'ero taalɛ, wʋ tõma n mẽ basɛ sɛba n ẽŋɛ tõma be'em taalɛ se'em na.
Da basɛ tɩ yelle paagɛ tↄ tɩ tɩ lui. Fãagɛ tↄ be'em dãana nu'usum basɛ. ((Tɩ fõn soe so'olʋm, la pãŋa, la nã'asgↄ wakatɛ n ka ba'asrɩ. Amina!))'
Ya sãn basɛ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ ya be'em na taalɛ, ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
La ya sãn ka basɛ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ ya be'em na taalɛ, ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn basɛ ya taalɛ.
Ya sãn lʋ nõorɛ, da zũŋe-ya nẽŋa wʋ pʋlibsum dõma n zũŋri ba nẽnsɩ se'em, tɩ ba pa'alɛ nẽrba tɩ bãma lʋ la nõorɛ la. Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ ba põn to'oge ba yↄↄrↄ mɛ.
Fʋ sãn lʋ nõorɛ, wire fʋ nẽŋa dee sãasɛ fʋ zuugo,
tɩ nẽrba da bãŋɛ tɩ fʋ lʋ la nõorɛ. La fʋ Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe zẽ'a n sʋgɛ la wʋn bãŋɛ. La fʋ Sↄ la n yẽ fõn sʋgɛ lʋ nõorɛ la, a wʋn yↄ fↄ."
"Da lagsrɩ-ya bõntarsõm bı̃ŋra dũnia wã zuo, zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ bõn-mõgla la tẽŋanzẽem wʋn sã'am ba, tɩ nayigba mẽ kẽ'era zũura.
Lagsra-ya bõntarsõm bı̃ŋra Nawẽnnɛ yire, bilam tɩ mõka la tẽŋanzẽem kãn sã'am ba, tɩ nayigba mẽ kãn kẽ zũ.
Se'ere n soe la, ya bõntarsõm n boe zẽ'a na, ya pʋtẽ'era mẽ boe la bilam.
Nini n nẽerɩ peelem bↄ'ↄra ı̃yã wʋ fɩtla la. Bɛla, fʋ nini sãn ãna sõŋa, fʋ ı̃yã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ.
La fʋ nini sãn ka ãna sõŋa, fʋ ı̃yã wuu boe la lika pʋam. Peelem sɛka n wʋn nẽegɛ fʋ pʋam na sãn dɛna lika, la de la lika mẽŋa mẽŋa.

Nẽra ka boe n tã wʋn sakɛ zuudãandõma bayi, a wʋn sise ayɩla mɛ, dee nõŋɛ ayɩla, bɩɩ a wʋn nanna ayɩla la mɛ, dee pↄ'ↄra ayɩla la. Bɛla, yãma ka tã wʋn sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Zuudãana, dee botɩ bõntarsõm mẽ dɛna ya zuudãana.
Bɛla n soe tɩ mam yele ya yetɩ, ya da fabla ya vↄm yelle, yãma n wʋn di sɛla, ((bɩɩ ya wʋn yũ sɛla,)) la ya da fabla ya ı̃yã yelle, ya wʋn yɛ sɛla. Vↄm ka gãnnɩ dia? Bɩɩ ı̃yã ka gãnnɩ futo?
Bɩsɛ-ya bõn-ẽgla, ba ka bʋtɩ, ba mẽ ka lagsrɩ bõnkↄↄla ɩta bã pʋam. La ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ'ↄrɩ ba dia mɛ. Yãma ka tarɩ yõorↄ gãnna bõn-ẽgla halɩ zozo'e?
Ãne n boe yãma pʋam n tã wʋn pa'asɛ a vↄm woglʋm fẽfẽe ẽn fablɩ la ı̃yã?
La bẽm tɩ ya fabla futo yelle? Bɩsɛ-ya mõ-puuro n ãn sõŋa se'em, ba ka tõnnɩ, ba mẽ ka wʋgrɩ futo.
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa naba Asalomõ na'am n yʋʋn tarɩ pãŋa la, a yʋʋn ka tã'agɛ yɛ fuugo n ãn sõŋa wʋ mõ-puugo ayɩla.
La Nawẽnnɛ sãn botɩ mõorↄ n boe zı̃na dee tɩ ba wʋn yõ ba bugum beere ãna sõŋa bɛla, a kãn bɩsɛ yãma yelle gãnna bɛla? Bẽm tɩ yãma ka bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra zo'oge?
Da fabla-ya yɛta tɩ: 'Bẽm tɩ wʋn di?' bɩɩ 'tɩ wʋn yũ la bẽm?' bɩɩ 'tɩ wʋn yɛ la bẽm?'
La de la nẽr-sɛba n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ n eerɩ bõn-bãma wuu. La yãma Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mi tɩ yãma boorɩ bõn-bãma wuu mɛ.
Dẽŋɛ-ya ɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm, la sɛla n masɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, tɩ a wʋn bↄ ya bõn-bãma wuu pa'asɛ.
Da fabla-ya beere yelle, tɩ beere ya wʋn bãŋɛ ya wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em, daarɛ woo n bɩsrɩ a mẽŋa yelle."
"Da zɛrgra-ya taaba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ da zɛrgɛ ya.
Se'ere n soe la, yan wʋn zɛrgɛ nẽrba se'em na, Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn zɛrgɛ ya la bɛla. La sɛla tɩ ya dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ nẽrba la, ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ ya.
Bẽm tɩ fʋ bɩsra sↄkↄ n boe fʋ sↄbia nifum, dee ka bɩsra dↄↄgↄ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum na?
Fõn ẽŋɛ la wãne yɛta fʋ sↄbia yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ fʋ yese sↄkↄ a nifum, dee tɩ dↄↄgↄ bↄna fõn mẽŋa nifum?
Pʋlibsum dãana, dẽŋɛ yese dↄↄgↄ la fʋ mẽŋa nifum, dee yãŋa tã'agɛ yẽ sõŋa yese sↄkↄ la n boe fʋ sↄbia nifum na.
Da dɩkɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ bõn-sõma bↄ baasɩ, la ya da dɩkɛ sɛla n tarɩ yõorↄ zozo'e lobge kurkurdõma nẽŋam, tɩ ba wʋn nẽ ba mɛ la ba nãma, dee tɩ baasɩ la wẽrgɛ dõn ya zõrzõrʋm."
"Sose-ya Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a wʋn bↄ ya. Ɛ-ya, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ. Wẽ-ya kʋlɩŋa, tɩ a wʋn yo'oge bↄ ya.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n sosrɩ Nawẽnnɛ, a wʋn bↄ ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka woo n eerɩ, wʋn yẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n wẽ'erɩ kʋlɩŋa, ba wʋn yo'oge bↄ ẽ.
Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a bia wʋn sose ẽ borborɩ, tɩ a bↄ ẽ kugre?
Bɩɩ a sãn sose zũfo, tɩ a bↄ ẽ bõnsɛla?
Yãma nẽrsaalba n de tõon-be'ero dõma la sãn mina tɩ ya bↄ ya kↄma bõn-sõma, ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum kãn bↄ yãma sɛba n sosrɩ ẽ na bõn-sõma n gãnnɩ bɛla?
Yãma n boorɩ tɩ nẽrba ɩta se'em bↄ'ↄra ya la, yãma mẽ ɩta bɛla bↄ'ↄra ba. Ẽna de la Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ, la a nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n gʋlsɛ se'em n bɛla."
"Doose-ya zanõrɛ n ãn mika kẽ, se'ere n soe la, zanõ-yalŋa, la so-kãtɛ la we'esɩ la sã'aŋↄ zẽ'am, la nẽrba zozo'e dolɩ la bilam.
La zanõ-mika, la so-bãalga we'esɩ la vↄm zẽ'am. La de la nẽrba fẽe n dolɩ ẽ."

"Guuse ya mẽŋa la nẽr-sɛba n parnɩ tɩ bãma de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la. Ba wʋn ẽŋɛ ba mẽŋa wʋ saasaadõma n dɩkɛ piisi gãna fʋrɛ ba mẽŋa wa'am ya zẽ'am wʋ ba de la piisi la, dee tɩ ba pʋam ba sã'ana wʋ saasaadõma la.
Ba tõoma pʋam tɩ ya wʋn bãŋɛ ba. Bẽm ı̃yã, zãaŋa ka tã wʋn wↄm tã'ama, la kẽkↄ ka tã wʋn wↄm kẽnkãma.
Tɩ-sõŋↄ woo wↄnnɩ na biɛ sõma, la tɩ-be'ego woo wↄnnɩ na biɛ be'ero.
Tɩ-sõŋↄ ka tã wʋn wↄm biɛ be'ero, la tɩ-be'ego mẽ ka tã wʋn wↄm biɛ sõma.
Tɩ-sɛka woo n ka wↄnnɩ biɛ sõma, ba wʋn lʋbɛ ẽ mɛ yõ la bugum.
Bɛla, la de la nẽrba la tõoma pʋam tɩ yãma wʋn bãŋɛ ban de nẽr-sɛba."

Azezi daan le yele yetɩ: "Dagɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n wi'iri mam tɩ 'Zuudãana, Zuudãana' la n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam. La de la nẽr-sɛka n ɩtɩ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum n boorɩ se'em na n wʋn kẽ.

Sarɩyadia daarɛ, nẽrba zozo'e wʋn yele mam yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, Zuudãana, tõma daan dɩkɛ la fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga tↄgɛ bↄ nẽrba. La fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ tõma daan dɩkɛ dige kʋlkã'arsɩ, dee daan tõm tõon-yãlma zozo'e la fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ.'
La mam wʋn yele ba yetɩ: 'Mam põn ka mina ya, sẽŋɛ-ya fõrgɛ, tõon-be'ero dõma wã.' "
"Nẽr-sɛka woo n wõm mam yetↄga wã, dee ẽŋɛ wʋ yetↄga la n yele se'em na, a dãana ãn wʋ yɛm dãana n mẽ a yire tãmpı̃a zuo.
Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wẽ ẽ, tɩ kʋsebgo vuge wẽ ẽ, tɩ a ka lui, se'ere n soe la, a mẽ la tãmpı̃a zuo.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n wõm mam yetↄga wã, dee ka sakɛ ɩta yetↄga la n yele se'em na, a ãn wʋ yalma n mẽ a yire tẽntõnbı̃'isgo zuo.
Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wẽ ẽ, tɩ kʋsebgo vuge wẽ ẽ, tɩ a wuu lui saam saam."
La Azezi n tↄgɛ yetↄga la kɩ'ɩlɩm na, zãsŋↄ la di'ige nẽrba la zozo'e mɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, a zãsŋↄ la tarɩ la pãŋa, la ka ãn wʋ ba lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n zãsnɩ se'em na.
Azezi daan ze'ele la tãŋa la zuo sige, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e dↄla ẽ.
Tɩ kõnkonne wa'am a zẽ'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fʋ sãn bↄↄra, fʋ tã wʋn basɛ tɩ m yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ le ãna sõŋa."
Tɩ Azezi tẽegɛ a nu'ugo kalʋm ẽ, dee yetɩ: "Mam bↄↄra, yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa." Bilam mẽŋa tɩ kõnkↄm na basɛ ẽ, tɩ a le ãna sõŋa.

Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Da yele nẽra nẽra. La sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽema zẽ'am ka pa'alɛ ẽ fↄ mẽŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ, dee bↄ bõn-sɛba tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ ba bↄ la, tɩ la pa'alɛ ba tɩ fʋ sɩrɩ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ kẽ'era la Kapɛrnaʋm tẽŋa pʋam, tɩ Rom dõma sʋda-kɛ'ɛma wa'am a zẽ'am wa sose ẽ
yetɩ: "Zuudãana, mam tõntõnna n bẽ'erɩ kↄↄrʋm gã yire, a ba nãmsra mɛ zozo'e."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam wʋn wa'am wa botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la lebse yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam ka narɩ tɩ fõn wa'am mam yire. Wen tↄgɛ yetↄga mã'a, tɩ mam tõntõnna la wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.

Se'ere n soe la, nẽrba n soe mam, la mam mẽ soe la sʋdaasɩ basɛba. Mam sãn yele sʋda-sɛka yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ', a we'esɩ mɛ. La mam sãn yele ayẽma yetɩ: 'Wa'am', a sẽm mɛ. Mam sãn yele m tõntõnna yetɩ: 'Ẽŋɛ wãna', a ɩtɩ mɛ."
Azezi n wõm bɛla la, la di'ige ẽ mɛ. Tɩ a yele nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ ẽ na yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ mam nãn ka yẽ nẽra n bↄ mam sɩra wʋ bʋra-ẽna wã, baa Ɩsrayɛlɩ buuri la pʋam mam ka yẽ.
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ, nẽrba zozo'e wʋn ze'ele zanõ-bↄba, la dapↄ-bↄba wa'am wa zı̃'ire la Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ di Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
La ba wʋn lobge Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n wʋn soe nɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na basɛ la yẽŋa lika pʋam, bilam ba wʋn kaasra, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm."
A yele bɛla, dee yele sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la yetɩ: "Kule, tɩ la wʋn ẽŋɛ wʋ fõn bↄ mam sɩra se'em na." La wakat-ẽŋa mẽŋa tɩ a tõntõnna la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la Apɩyɛɛrɩ yire ka yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ dɛɛm-pↄka n bẽ'erɩ gã, tɩ a ı̃yã tʋlgɛ.
Tɩ Azezi kalʋm pↄka la nu'ugo, tɩ bã'aga la basɛ ẽ. Tɩ a isge ẽŋɛ Azezi sãanɛ.
Tɩ zaanõorɛ paagɛ, tɩ ba tarɩ nẽrba zozo'e tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ tarɩ ba wa'am Azezi zẽ'am. Tɩ a tↄgɛ yetↄga dige kʋlkã'arsɩ la, dee botɩ sɛba wuu n de bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
La de la bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Ẽŋa n to'oge tõma tooro, la tɩ bã'asɩ basɛ."
Azezi n yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n kaagɛ ẽ na, tɩ a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Tɩ dooge-ya mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba."
Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama ayɩla wa'am a zẽ'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam wʋn dↄla fʋ sẽnna zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ fʋ wʋn sẽnna."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pɩɩna tarɩ yogro mɛ, tɩ niinto tara tʋgrↄ, la Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka tarɩ zẽ'a wʋn gã'arɛ vo'ose."
Tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, basɛ tɩ m dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ m sↄ dee wa'am wa dↄla fↄ."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Dↄla mam dee basɛ sɛba n ka tarɩ vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am tɩ ba laagɛ ba kũm."
Azezi daan kẽ la õorŋↄ, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la doose ẽ.
Tɩ kʋseb-kãtɛ wa'am wa vugra mõgrɛ la zuo. Tɩ ko-mı̃'isi botɩ õorŋↄ la zɩgra la a mise. La Azezi daan gı̃sri mɛ.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la paagɛ nẽegɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fãagɛ tↄ, tõma yetɩ ki mɛ."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya zↄta dabeem, ya ka bↄ mam sɩra zo'oge." Azezi yele bɛla, dee isge tãsɛ kʋsebgo, la ko'om na mɛ, tɩ ba ãna sı̃m.
Tɩ ba wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba yetɩ: "Bẽm nẽra n de ẽna tɩ kʋsebgo, la ko'om sakra a nõorɛ?"

Ba daan dooge mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba paagɛ la Gadara dõma tẽŋa pʋam, tɩ bʋraasɩ bayi tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ba ze'ele yↄↄrↄ zẽ'a sẽnna tʋ'ʋsra ẽ. Ba daan de la zↄl-wẽensɩ, tɩ nẽrba zↄta ka sakra dↄla bilam tↄlla.
Tɩ ba kaasra tagursi yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, bẽm boe tõma la fõn tẽŋasʋka? Fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ nãmsɛ tõma mɛ dee tɩ wakatɛ la nãn ka paagɛ?"
La kurkurdõma n daan zo'oge lɛm bilam ↄbra.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la sose Azezi yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ dige to tɩ tɩ yese, fʋ basɛ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya." Tɩ ba yese sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ kurkurdõma la ze'ele tãŋa zuo zoe sige ka lui mõgrɛ la pʋam ki.
Tɩ sɛba n gu'uri kurkurdõma la zoe sẽŋɛ tẽŋa pʋam ka yele lan ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu, la bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ sɛba tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la daan dolɩ la.
Tɩ tẽŋa la dõma wuu yese tʋ'ʋsra Azezi, la ban yẽ ẽ na, ba sose ẽ yetɩ, a fõrgɛ dee basɛ ba tẽŋa.
Azezi daan kẽ õorŋↄ lebe dooge la mõgrɛ la ke bↄba kule Kapɛrnaʋm, ẽn kẽ'erɩ zẽ'a la.

Tɩ nẽrba basɛba zɛ bʋraa ayɩla n de kↄↄrŋↄ n gã a bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am a zẽ'am. Tɩ Azezi yẽ ban bↄ ẽ sɩra la, yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "M bia, keŋe fʋ sũure, fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna fʋ zuo."
Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma basɛba tẽ'esra ba sũure pʋam yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna pↄ'ↄrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ."
La Azezi mi ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na mɛ, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma tẽ'esra pʋtẽ'e-be'ero ya sũure pʋam?
Bẽm n de nãana gãnna? Mam sãn yele bʋraa la yetɩ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna a zuo, bɩɩ mam sãn yele ẽ yetɩ, a isge sẽnna n de nãana gãnna?
Mam wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa tarɩ nõorɛ dũnia zuo wʋn basɛ tõon-be'ero taalɛ." Azezi yele bɛla, dee yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "Isge, dɩkɛ fʋ bõn-gã'ala la kule."
Tɩ a isge kule.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yẽ bɛla, tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ba, tɩ ba nã'asra Nawẽnnɛ ẽn bↄ nẽrsaalba nõor-ẽŋa la ı̃yã.
Azezi daan ze'ele la bilam sẽnna tↄlla, yẽ bʋraa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Amatie n zı̃ tↄ'ↄsra lampo. Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Isge dↄla mam." Tɩ Amatie isge dↄla ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka zẽa Amatie yire dita, tɩ lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma zozo'e wa'am wa lagɩm na Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la zẽa dita.
Tɩ Farisi dõma yẽ bɛla, soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma karẽnsãama la lagɩm na lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma dita."
Tɩ Azezi wõm bɛla, yele ba yetɩ: "Sɛba n tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm ka eerɩ tɩba, la de bã'adõma n eerɩ tɩba.

Sẽŋɛ-ya ka zãsʋm Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yele se'em na võorɛ, Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Mam boorɩ tɩ nẽrsaalba zↄta la taaba ninbãalga, dee dagɩ tɩ ba dɩkɛ ba bõnↄ kãabra bↄ'ↄra mam.' Bɛla, mam ka wa'am tɩ m wi sɛba dõma n yetɩ bãma masɛ mɛ na, mam wa'am na tõon-be'ero dõma ı̃yã."
Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ tõma la Farisi dõma lʋta nõorɛ, dee tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka lʋta?"

Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn di pↄka ẽŋɛ kibsa wi a tadãandõma tɩ ba wa'am naagɛ la ẽ dita, ba tã wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-sã'aŋↄ wakat-sɛka tɩ pↄgdita la ken bↄna la ba lɛ mɛ bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ. La dabsa sẽm mɛ, tɩ ba wʋn yese pↄgdita la ba zẽ'am. Bɛla tɩ ba yãŋa wʋn lʋ nõorɛ.
Nẽra kãn dɩkɛ tãn-paalga lige fu-kɛka. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, tãn-paalga la wʋn botɩ fu-kɛka la ãagɛ mɛ gãŋɛ bɛla.

La nẽra kãn dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm wↄ-kɛgsɩ pʋam. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, dã-paalga la sãn kɛlla, ba wʋn botɩ wↄↄsɩ la tãsɛ mɛ, tɩ dãam na ka'agɛ, tɩ wↄↄsɩ la mẽ sã'am. La masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm na wↄ-paalsɩ pʋam, bɛla tɩ ba wuu kãn sã'am."
Azezi n ken tↄgra la ba bɛla la, tɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadãana ayɩla wa'am a zẽ'am, wa ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam yele yetɩ: "Mam pↄyʋa n ki lɛɛlɛ wã, wa'am wa dɩkɛ fʋ nu'ugo paglɛ a zuo, tɩ a vo'oge."
Tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan isge dↄla ẽ wɛ'ɛsa.
Ban daan we'esɩ la, tɩ pↄka ayɩla n luti sɩkẽŋa yʋʋma pia la ayi tɩ la ka gↄ'ↄra, wa'am Azezi poorʋm wa kalʋm a fuugo nõorɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, a daan tẽ'esrɩ a sũurum yetɩ: "Mam sãn kalʋm a fuugo mã'a, mam wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
Tɩ Azezi gelge yẽ ẽ, yele ẽ yetɩ: "M bia, keŋe fʋ sũure! Fõn bↄ mam sɩra la n basɛ tɩ fʋ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm." Tɩ pↄka la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm bilam mẽŋa.
Tɩ Azezi paagɛ Zifdõma nẽŋadãana la yire yẽ wɩ-pɛɛbrɩba la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n bↄgrɩ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yese-ya, tɩ pugla la ka ki, a gı̃sri mɛ." Tɩ nẽrba la la'ara ẽ.
La ẽn botɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yese la, a kẽ la deem gʋrɛ pugla la nu'ugo, tɩ a isge.
Tɩ yel-ẽna saagɛ tẽŋa la wuu.
Azezi daan yese zẽ'e-ẽŋa mɛ fõrgra, tɩ fↄↄsɩ bayi dↄla ẽ tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe tɩ ninbãalga!"
Tɩ Azezi paagɛ kẽ yire, tɩ fↄↄsɩ la paagɛ a zẽ'am, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma bↄ sɩra tɩ mam wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ yan boorɩ se'em na?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Ẽe! Zuudãana."
Tɩ a kalʋm ba nini dee yetɩ: "La wʋn ẽŋɛ wʋ yan bↄ sɩra se'em na."
Tɩ ba nini na pike yẽta. Tɩ a kã'an ba yetɩ: "Da basɛ-ya tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ."
La ban fõrgɛ la, ba mõolɛ bõn-ẽŋa mɛ tẽŋa la zẽ'a woo.
Ban daan yesrɩ la, tɩ ba tarɩ nẽra tɩ kʋlkã'arga dolɩ ẽ, tɩ a dɛna muko, wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi dige kʋlkã'arga la, tɩ a yese. Tɩ muko la tↄgra. Tɩ la di'ige nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba yetɩ: "Nẽra nẽra nãn ka yẽ wãna buuri Ɩsrayɛlɩ pʋam."
La Farisi dõma daan yetɩ: "La de la kʋlkã'arsɩ naba n bↄ ẽ pãŋa, tɩ a tara digra kʋlkã'arsɩ la."
Azezi daan kaarɩ la tẽn-kãra la tẽn-pɩgsɩ wuu, zãsna nẽrba Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, mõola Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga, dee botɩ bã'adõma, la kobro buuri wuu yẽta ı̃mã'asʋm.
La Azezi n yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, ba ninbãalga n yõkɛ ẽ. Se'ere n soe la, ba targɛ mɛ bãlɛ, ãna wʋ piisi n ka tarɩ dũnsı̃ina.
Tɩ a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Va'am na bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ zo'oge mɛ, la tõntõnɩba n wʋn lagsɛ bõnkↄↄla la pↄ'ↄrɩ mɛ.
Bɛla ı̃yã, sose-ya va'am na dãana tɩ a tõm tõntõnɩba pa'asɛ tɩ ba lagsɛ bõnkↄↄla la."
Azezi daan wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la mɛ bↄ ba pãŋa tɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arsɩ, dee botɩ bã'adõma buuri wuu, la kobro buuri wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la tɩ a looge tɩ a tõm na yʋ'ʋra n wãna: Pↄspↄsɩ dãana de la Asimõ tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la a yɩbga A'ãndre, la Azebede dayↄↄsɩ Azakɩ la a yɩbga Azã,
la Afilipi, la Abatelemi, la Atoma, la Amatie n de lampo-tↄ'ↄsa la, la Azakɩ n de Alfe dayʋa, la Atade,
la Asimõ n daan de Zelↄtɩ nẽra ayɩla la, la Azudaasɩ Iskariyo, sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la.
La de la bãna pia la ayi tɩ Azezi daan tõm, yele ba yetɩ: "Da sẽŋɛ-ya bu-zãŋsɩ la zẽ'am, la da kẽ-ya Samaari dõma tẽnsɩ pʋam.
Sẽŋɛ-ya Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n ãn wʋ piisi n bↄɩ la zẽ'am,
ka mõola yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na lɛm mɛ.'
La ya botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, dee botɩ kũm vo'oge, dee botɩ kõnkↄma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa, dee dige kʋlkã'arsɩ. Yãma to'oge la zãŋa, bɛla bↄ-ya zãŋa.
Da dɩkɛ-ya sãlma bɩɩ ligri sũm sẽŋɛ.
La ya da dɩkɛ tãmpↄkↄ sore la sẽnnɛ ı̃yã, da dɩkɛ-ya futo bayi, bɩɩ tagra, bɩɩ doore. Ba wʋn bↄ tõntõnna ẽn boorɩ sɛla.
Ya sãn paagɛ tẽn-kãtɛ bɩɩ tẽn-pɩka pʋam, soke-ya bãŋɛ nẽr-sõŋↄ sãn bↄna mı̃ wʋn to'oge ya tɩ ya kẽ'era a yire, bↄna-ya bilam ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn fõrgɛ tẽŋa la.
Ya sãn paagɛ kẽ yire pʋam, ya pʋ'ʋsɛ ba yetɩ: 'Sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bↄna la ya.'
La yire la dõma sãn to'oge ya, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bↄna la ba. La ba sãn zagsɛ ka to'oge ya, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn weege ya zẽ'am.
La yi-sɛka, bɩɩ tẽn-sɛka nẽrba sãn ka to'oge ya, bɩɩ ka selse ya yetↄga, ya yese zẽ'e-ẽŋa dee pɩɩsɛ ya nãma tẽntõnnↄ basɛ mı̃.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ tẽn-ẽŋa dõma wʋn yẽ toogo gãnna Sodom la Gomõorɩ tẽnsɩ nẽrba."
Azezi le yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ-ya, mam tõm ya wʋ piisi saasaadõma tẽŋasʋka. Bɛla ı̃yã, dɛna-ya yɛm dõma wʋ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, la ya ãna wʋ na'adawɛma n ka tarɩ yelle se'em na.
Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa la nẽrba la. Se'ere n soe la, ba wʋn wa yõgɛ ya mɛ tarɩ sẽŋɛ sarɩyadia zẽ'esʋm, dee wẽ ya ba wẽndeto pʋam.
La ba wʋn yõgɛ ya sẽŋɛ gↄmnadõma, la na'adõma nẽŋam, yãma n dolɩ mam na ı̃yã, tɩ ya wʋn dɛna kaset-dõma tↄgɛ bↄ bãma la bu-zãŋsɩ.
La ba sãn tarɩ ya sẽŋɛ, da fabla-ya yãma n wʋn tↄgɛ se'em, bɩɩ yãma n wʋn tↄgɛ sɛla yelle. Se'ere n soe la, wakat-ẽŋa mẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wʋn bↄ ya bõn-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn tↄgɛ.
La dagɩ yãma mẽŋa n wʋn tↄgɛ, la de la ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la n boe ya pʋam na n wʋn tↄgɛ.
Sↄbia wʋn botɩ ba yõkɛ a sↄbia kʋ. La sↄdõma mẽ wʋn ẽŋɛ ba kↄma bɛla. La kↄma mẽ wʋn zɛbɛ la ba dↄgrɩba, botɩ ba kʋ ba.
Nẽrba wuu wʋn sise ya mam yʋ'ʋrɛ la ı̃yã. La sɛka n ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ ka paagɛ ba'asgↄ, a wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.
Ba sãn nãmsɛ ya tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam, ya zoe sẽŋɛ tẽŋa ayẽma. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ya kãn yãŋɛ kaagɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽnsɩ ba'asɛ dee tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la leme wa'am.
Karẽnbia ka gãnnɩ a karẽnsãama, la tõntõnna mẽ ka gãnnɩ a zuudãana.

La karẽnbia sãn wa ãna wʋ a karẽnsãama la, la tõntõnna sãn wa ãna wʋ a zuudãana la, la seke mɛ. Ban wi'iri yidãana la tɩ Abelzebuli n de Asũtãana la, ba wʋn tʋʋra a yire la dõma gãnna la bɛla."
"Bɛla, da zↄta-ya nẽrsaalba, tɩ bõn-sɛka woo n lile, wʋn lilge. La bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ, wʋn puke.
Mam n yele ya se'em lika pʋam wã, tↄgɛ-ya ẽ peelem pʋam. La sɛla tɩ mam waasʋm ya la, zom-ya deto zuto mõolɛ ẽ.
Da zↄta-ya sɛba n kʋʋrɩ ı̃yã, dee ka tãna wʋn kʋ sɩa la. Zↄta-ya Nawẽnnɛ n tã wʋn botɩ ya ı̃yã, la ya sɩa sã'am bug-tẽŋa la.
Ba ka koosrɩ mõom niinto bayi la lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla mã'a? La baa niila ayɩla kãn ki, tɩ la sãn dagna ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n sakɛ.
La baa yãma zuugo zomto, Nawẽnnɛ mi ba wuu kãllɛ mɛ.
Bɛla ı̃yã, da zↄta-ya dabeem, yãma tarɩ yõorↄ gãnna niinto zozo'e mɛ.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n wʋn ze'ele nẽrba nẽŋam yetɩ ẽŋa de la mam nẽra, mam mẽ wʋn ze'ele mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum nẽŋam yetɩ a de la mam nẽra.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n sɩ'ɩsɛ nẽrba nẽŋam yetɩ ẽŋa ka mi mam, mam mẽ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum nẽŋam tɩ mam ka mi ẽ."
"Da tẽ'esɛ-ya tɩ mam tarɩ la nõ-yẽnnɛ wa'am dũnia zuo. Mam ka wa'am tɩ m botɩ nẽrba dɛna nõorɛ ayɩla dũnia zuo, la de la welgre tɩ mam tarɩ wa'am.
Se'ere n soe la, mam wa'am tɩ m welge la dayↄↄsɩ la ba sↄdõma, la pugunto la ba madõma, la dayↄↄsɩ pↄgba la ba sɩrba madõma.
Tɩ nẽra mẽŋa yir-dõma wʋn dɛna a bɛ'ɛba.
Nẽr-sɛka n nõŋɛ a sↄ bɩɩ a ma gãnna mam, a ka masɛ tɩ a dɛna mam nẽra. La nẽr-sɛka woo n nõŋɛ a dayʋa bɩɩ a pↄyʋa gãnna mam, a ka masɛ tɩ a dɛna mam nẽra.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n ka sakɛ nãmsgↄ wʋ nẽra n zɛɛrɩ a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam, a ka masɛ tɩ a dɛna mam nẽra.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n basɛ a vↄm mam ı̃yã, a wʋn yẽ ẽ."
"Nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge ya, a to'oge la mam. La nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge mam, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na.

La nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ẽn de Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa la ı̃yã, a wʋn to'oge Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa yↄↄrↄ. La nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge sɩra dãana ẽn de sɩra dãana la ı̃yã, a wʋn to'oge sɩra dãana yↄↄrↄ.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n bↄ mam nẽrba wã ayɩla ko-mã'asga tɩ a yũ, ẽn de mam karẽnbia la ı̃yã, mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ a kãn koŋe yↄↄrↄ."
Azezi n daan pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a yese bilam sẽŋɛ la so'olʋm na tẽnsɩ la wuu pʋam ka zãsna nẽrba, dee mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga.
Tɩ Azã daan bↄna yʋ'a deem, wõm Krisi tõoma la yelle, tõm a karẽnbiisi a zẽ'am,
tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Azã yãma n wõnnɩ se'em, la yãma n yẽtɩ se'em na:
Fↄↄsɩ nini yẽtɩ mɛ, tɩ kↄↄrnↄ sẽnna, tɩ kõnkↄma yẽta ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa, tɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ kũm vↄ'ↄra, tɩ nasdõma wõnna Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga.
La nẽr-sɛka n ka lebrɩ poorʋm mam ı̃yã la tarɩ zu-yẽlga."
Azã karẽnbiisi la n fõrgɛ la, tɩ Azezi yãŋa tↄgra Azã yelle bↄ'ↄra nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma daan sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ weem? Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la mõorↄ tɩ kʋsebgo mı̃ini bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ.
La bẽm tɩ yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ? Nẽra n yɛ fu-sõma? Ayɛɩ. Nẽr-sɛba n yɛ fu-sõma la boe na'adõma yiɛ.
La yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la bẽm? Ya sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa bɩɩ? Ẽe. La mam yetɩ ya tɩ a de la nẽra n gãnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Mam tõntõnna n wãna tɩ mam tõm tɩ a dẽŋɛ fʋ nẽŋa malgɛ sore bↄ fↄ.'
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽrsaalba tɩ ba dↄgɛ la wuu pʋam, nẽra ka boe n gãnnɩ Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na. La nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na pʋam gãnnɩ Azã mɛ.
Lan pↄsɛ Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na wa paam lɛɛlɛ wã, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm sẽnnɩ nẽŋa la pãŋa, la pãnsɩ dõma n mõrgrɩ tɩ ba fãagɛ ẽ.
Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la wuu, la lↄↄ gõnnↄ la wuu dẽŋɛ tↄgɛ so'olʋm na yelle mɛ halɩ wa paagɛ Azã wakatɛ.
La ya sãn bↄↄra tɩ ya bãŋɛ a võorɛ, Azã n de A'eli tɩ ba yʋʋn yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na.
Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.
Mam wʋn dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba? Ba ãn wʋ kↄma n zı̃ da'am wi'ira taaba yetɩ:
'Tõma peebe wɩɩsɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma zagsɛ ka wa. Tɩ tõma yõom kʋʋrɛ yõoma, tɩ yãma zagsɛ ka yõom.'
Se'ere n soe la, Azã wa'am mɛ wa lʋta nõorɛ dee ka yũura dãam, tɩ ba yetɩ kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
Tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am wa dita dee yũura, tɩ ba yetɩ, a de la dita, la dã-yũura, la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma sɩrɛ. Yɛm dãana tõoma n pa'alɩ tɩ a tarɩ yɛm."
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi zɛrgɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ a tõm tõon-yãlma zozo'e ba tẽnsɩ pʋam, dee tɩ ba ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero la yetɩ:

"Korazẽ dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Betisayida dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Se'ere n soe la, tõon-yãlma sɛba n tõm ya tẽnsɩ pʋam na, daan sãn tõm nɩ na Tiiri, la Sidõ tẽnsɩ pʋam, ba wʋn teege nɩ yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero halɩ kʋrʋm kʋrʋm, yɛ bↄra futo ẽŋɛ tãmpɛglʋm ẽŋɛ ba zuto tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam yɛta ya tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, la wʋn dɛna toogo bↄ yãma gãnna Tiiri, la Sidõ dõma.

La yãma Kapɛrnaʋm dõma, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ ya wʋn zẽkɛ mɛ ka paagɛ saazuum bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, ya wʋn sige mɛ halɩ ka paagɛ kɩ'ɩn-tẽŋa. Se'ere n soe la, tõon-yãlma sɛba tɩ mam tõm ya zẽ'am na daan sãn tõm nɩ na Sodom tẽŋam, a wʋn ken boe nɩ mɛ zı̃na.
La mam yetɩ ya tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, Sodom dõma kãn yẽ toogo paagɛ yãma."

Wakat-ẽŋa Azezi tↄgɛ mɛ yetɩ: "Mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n de saazuum la tẽŋa wã Zuudãana, mam pẽgrɩ fↄ, se'ere n soe la, fõn sʋgɛ bõn-bãna wã mɛ tɩ yɛm dõma la bãŋrɩba ka mina, dee pa'alɛ nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄm-pɩgsɩ la.
Ẽe, mam Sↄ, la de la fõn boorɩ bɛla la ı̃yã."

"Mam Sↄ dɩkɛ sɛla woo ẽŋɛ la mam nu'usum. La nẽra ka mi mam n de Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la n de sɛka, sãn dagna mam Sↄ la, la nẽra mẽ ka mi mam Sↄ la n de se'em, sãn dagna mam n de a Dayʋa la, la sɛba tɩ mam wʋn botɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ na."
"Wa'am-ya mam zẽ'am, yãma sɛba wuu n tʋ ze-tɩbsa targɛ la, tɩ mam wʋn bↄ ya vo'osgo.
Dɩkɛ-ya mam sↄgrɩga sↄgɛ ya mẽŋa, zãsʋm sɛla tɩ mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya la, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ vo'osgo. Se'ere n soe la, mam de la sũ-bʋgsʋm dãana, la sik-m-mẽŋa dãana.
Mam sↄgrɩga la fakɛ mɛ, la mam zeero la ka tɩbgɛ."
Wakat-ẽŋa, Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan dolɩ la vatↄ pʋam, Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ tↄlla. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi kↄm dõnna, tɩ ba kↄ si wẽena ↄbra.
Tɩ Farisi dõma yẽ, yele Azezi yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ, fʋ karẽnbiisi la ɩtɩ la sɛla n sisri vo'osgo daarɛ."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Yãma ka karẽŋɛ Adavidi la a nẽrba la kↄm n yʋʋn dõnnɩ tɩ ba ẽŋɛ se'em na?
A yʋʋn kẽ la Nawẽnnɛ deego la pʋam dɩkɛ borborɩ sɛba tɩ ba bı̃ŋe bↄ Nawẽnnɛ na obe, dee bↄ a nẽrba la. La sisri mɛ, nẽra nẽra ka obrɩ ba, sãn dagna kãabgↄ kẽma la mã'a.
Bɩɩ yãma ka karẽŋɛ lↄↄ gõŋↄ la pʋam n yetɩ, vo'osgo daarɛ, kãabgↄ kẽma la n tõnnɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam na sã'anɩ vo'osgo daarɛ sisgo la mɛ tɩ taalɛ ka bↄna?
Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ nẽra n gãnnɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la n boe kalam.

La gʋlsɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Mam boorɩ tɩ nẽrsaalba zↄta la taaba ninbãalga, dee dagɩ tɩ ba dɩkɛ ba bõnↄ kãabra bↄ'ↄra mam.' Yãma sãn bãŋɛ nɩ yetↄg-ẽna wã võorɛ, ya kãn yele nɩ sɛba n ka tõm be'em tɩ ba tuuge ya.
Se'ere n soe la, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n soe vo'osgo daarɛ."
Azezi fõrgɛ bilam sẽŋɛ la ba wẽndeem.
Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla daan bↄna mı̃, tɩ a nu'ugo ki. Tɩ Farisi dõma bↄↄra tɩ ba dõrɛ Azezi, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Sore boe tɩ ba botɩ nẽra yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-kãna n boe yãma pʋam wʋn tara pesgo, tɩ a lui boko pʋam vo'osgo daarɛ, tɩ a kãn yõkɛ ẽ tɩ a dooge?
Nẽrsaala tarɩ yõorↄ mɛ gãnna pesgo zozo'e. Bɛla, sore boe mɛ tɩ nẽra ẽŋɛ sõŋa vo'osgo daarɛ."
La Azezi yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo la." Tɩ a tẽegɛ, tɩ a nu'ugo la ãna sõŋa wʋ nu'ugo ayẽma la.
Tɩ Farisi dõma la yese yẽŋa ka bãm bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ Azezi.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ bɛla, fõrgɛ bilam. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e doose ẽ. Tɩ a botɩ bã'adõma wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Dee kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da botɩ nẽra bãŋɛ.
A ẽŋɛ la bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi yele se'em na ẽŋɛ.
A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Mam tõntõnna tɩ mam looge n wãna: Nẽr-sɛka tɩ mam nõŋɛ, a paagɛ la mam yɛm. Mam wʋn basɛ tɩ m Sɩa pãŋa bↄna la ẽ, tɩ a mõolɛ sɩra, la sɛla n masɛ mam yɛm bↄ buuri wuu.
A kãn wẽ'era nõke'ene, la a kãn zɛbra. La nẽra kãn wõm a kõa sorↄↄrↄ zuto.
A kãn kↄ'ↄgɛ mõ-sɛka n kↄ'ↄgɛ la ba'asɛ. La a kãn kı̃ŋe fɩtla gõngõŋↄ la n diti fẽfẽ la ba'asɛ, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ a wʋn botɩ sɩra, la sɛla n masɛ to'oge zẽ'a wuu.
Tɩ buuri la wuu wʋn te'ege ẽ."
Tɩ ba tarɩ nẽra ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arga dolɩ ẽ, tɩ a dɛna fʋa la muko wa'am Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ Azezi botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, tↄgra dee yẽta.
Tɩ la di'ige nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu, tɩ ba yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna wã kãn dɛna naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa la?"
Tɩ Farisi dõma wõm bɛla, yele yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna tarɩ la Abelzebuli n de kʋlkã'arsɩ naba la pãŋa digra kʋlkã'arsɩ la."

Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yele ba yetɩ: "So'olʋm sɛka woo nẽrba n welge wẽrgɛ zɛbra la taaba, so'olʋm na wʋn sã'am mɛ. La tẽn-sɛka woo, bɩɩ yi-sɛka woo nẽrba n welge zɛbra la taaba, a wʋn wõrgɛ mɛ.
La Asũtãana sãn digra Asũtãana, a welge mɛ zɛbra la a mẽŋa. Bɛla, a so'olʋm na kãn tã'agɛ ze'ele.
Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la, yãma nẽrba tarɩ la ãne pãŋa digra kʋlkã'arsɩ? Bɛla, ya nẽrba la mẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka tarɩ bʋʋrↄ.
La de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa pãŋa tɩ mam tarɩ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, bɛla pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n wa'am wa dita na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.
Nẽra ka tã wʋn kẽ pãŋa dãana yire vaagɛ a lↄgrↄ, sãn dagna tɩ a dẽŋɛ lʋ pãŋa dãana la mɛ dee yãŋa vaagɛ a lↄgrↄ la.
Sɛka n ka boe la mam, sisri mam mɛ. La sɛka n ka lagɩm na mam lagsra, a wɩrgrɩ mɛ.
Bɛla n soe tɩ mam yele ya yetɩ, tõon-be'ero wuu, la pↄ'ↄrɛ yetↄga wuu tɩ nẽrsaalba ɩtɩ la, Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn basɛ ba taalɛ. La sɛka n tↄgɛ pↄ'ↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, a kãn basɛ ẽ taalɛ.

La nẽr-sɛka n tↄgrɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tↄg-be'ero, a wʋn basɛ ẽ taalɛ. La sɛka n tↄgrɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la tↄg-be'ero, Nawẽnnɛ kãn malɩn basɛ ẽ taalɛ dũnia ẽna wã pʋam, la dũni-sɛka n sẽm na pʋam.
Ya sãn yetɩ, tɩa ãn sõŋa, ya yetɩ a biɛ ãn sõŋa. Bɩɩ ya sãn yetɩ, tɩa de tɩ-be'ego, ya yetɩ a biɛ mẽ de la biɛ be'ero. Se'ere n soe la, tɩa biɛ n botɩ ba bãŋra ẽn de tɩ-sɛka.
Yãma ãn wʋ kãmpẽesɩ buuri, yãma n de nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ wãna wã, ya wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tↄgɛ tↄg-sõma? Se'ere n soe la, sɛla n zo'oge sũure pʋam na tɩ nõorɛ tↄgrɩ.
Nẽr-sõŋↄ tↄgrɩ la bõn-sõma tɩ a tarɩ a sũure pʋam. La nẽr-be'ego tↄgrɩ la bõn-be'ero tɩ a tarɩ a sũure pʋam.
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, nẽrsaalba wʋn ka tↄgɛ yetↄg-yaalsɩ tɩ ba tↄgɛ la wuu yelle Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam.
La de la fʋ yetↄga pʋam tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bʋʋrↄ, la, la de la fʋ yetↄga pʋam tɩ fʋ wʋn koŋe bʋʋrↄ."
Azezi n tↄgɛ bɛla la, tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma boorɩ tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ la bõn-yãlma n pa'alɛ tɩ fõn ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am tɩ tɩ yẽ."

Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba n de nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ, dee ka dↄla Nawẽnnɛ la sɩra la, boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ la bõn-yãlma n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, la ba kãn yẽ bõn-yãlma, sãn dagna bõn-yãlm-sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azonaasɩ la.
Wʋ Azonaasɩ n yʋʋn boe zũn-kãtɛ la pʋʋrʋm dabsa atã wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ la, bɛla Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn bↄna yↄↄgↄ pʋam na dabsa atã, wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ.

Sarɩyadia daarɛ, Niniivi dõma wʋn isge zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma mɛ ba tõon-be'ero la ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, Azonaasɩ n yʋʋn mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga bↄ ba la, ba yʋʋn teege yɛm mɛ basɛ tõon-be'ero. La nẽra n gãnnɩ Azonaasɩ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka teege yɛm.

La sarɩyadia daarɛ, na-pↄka la n yʋʋn yese wẽntulle gↄbga bↄba la, wʋn isge mɛ zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba ba tõon-be'ero la ı̃yã, se'ere n soe la, a daan ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am wa selse naba Asalomõ yɛm yetↄga. La nẽra n gãnnɩ Asalomõ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka sɛlsra ẽ."
Azezi le yetɩ: "Kʋlkã'arga sãn yese dee basɛ nẽra, a sẽŋɛ la pↄgẽntɩɩsɩ pʋam ka ɛɛra zẽ'a tɩ a vo'ose, la a sãn ka yẽ,
a yetɩ mɛ tɩ: 'Mam wʋn lebe la m yi-sɛka tɩ m yese dee basɛ la pʋam.' La a sãn lebe ka paagɛ yẽ tɩ deego la de la voore, pɩɩsɛ malgɛ ãna sõŋa,
a wʋn lebe mɛ ka tarɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopↄɩ n de wẽensɩ gãnna ẽŋa, wa'am wa kẽ bↄna mı̃. La nẽra la toogo wʋn gãnna kʋrʋm toogo la. La mẽ wʋn dɛna la bɛla bↄ zamãan-ẽna wã nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ la."
Azezi daan ken tↄgra la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ a ma, la a yɩbsɩ daan zɛ yẽŋa bↄↄra tɩ ba tↄgɛ la ẽ.
Tɩ nẽra ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ ma, la fʋ yɩbsɩ n wãna n ze yẽŋa bↄↄra tɩ ba tↄgɛ la fↄ."
Tɩ Azezi yele sɛka n tↄgrɩ la ẽ na yetɩ: "Ãne n de mam ma, la ãndõma n de mam yɩbsɩ?"
Dee tẽegɛ a nu'ugo pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Mam ma, la mam yɩbsɩ n wãna.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n ɩtɩ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum n boorɩ se'em, ẽŋa n de mam yɩbga, la mam tã, la mam ma."
Daar-ẽŋa, Azezi yese yire sẽŋɛ ka zẽa la mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e lagsɛ a zẽ'am, tɩ a kẽ õorŋↄ la pʋam zı̃'ire, dee tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la zɛ mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
Tɩ a makɛ magsa tↄgɛ yɛla zozo'e bↄ ba yetɩ: "Kaara n daan yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri.
La ẽn lobgrɩ bõnbuuri la, basɛba lui la sore nõorʋm, tɩ niinto wa'am wa di ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui tãmpı̃a zuo, zẽ'a tɩ tẽntõnnↄ ka zo'oge. Tẽntõnnↄ n ka zo'oge la ı̃yã, ba yese la tↄtↄ.
Tɩ wʋntɛɛŋa yẽkɛ wẽ ba, tɩ ba ki, ba yẽga n ka kẽ tẽŋa la ı̃yã.
Tɩ basɛba lui gõ'osɩ zẽ'a, tɩ gõ'osɩ la yese fʋrɛ ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui zẽ'e-sõŋↄ zẽ'a, wↄm biɛ. Basɛba wↄm na biɛ kↄbga kↄbga, tɩ basɛba wↄm pisyoob-yoobɩ, basɛba pitã-tã.
Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lɛm ẽ soke yetɩ: "Bẽm ı̃yã tɩ fõn makra magsa tↄgra bↄ'ↄra ba?"
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ botɩ yãma bãŋɛ a so'olʋm yelle n sʋgɛ la mɛ. La a ka botɩ bãma bãŋɛ.
Sɛka n tarɩ wʋn to'oge pa'asɛ, tɩ la zo'oge. La sɛka n ka tarɩ, baa sɛla tɩ a tarɩ fẽe la, ba wʋn to'oge ẽ.
Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam magsra magsa tↄgra bↄ'ↄra ba, se'ere n soe la, ba bɩsrɩ mɛ, dee ka yẽta, wõnna, dee ka bãŋra a võorɛ.
Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn yele se'em na ɩtɩ la bãma lɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Ya wʋn wõm, la ya kãn bãŋɛ a võorɛ, ya wʋn bɩsɛ, la ya kãn yẽ.

Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-bãna pʋtẽ'era ka like, ba lɩ ba tʋba mɛ, dee mũm ba nini, tɩ ba nini da yẽ, tɩ ba tʋba da wõm, tɩ ba da wõm a võorɛ. Sãn dagɩ nɩ bɛla, ba wʋn teege nɩ yɛm leme wa'am mam zẽ'am, tɩ m bↄ ba laafɛ.'
La, la sãn dɛna yãma, ya tarɩ zu-yẽlga, yãma tarɩ la nini n yẽtɩ, dee tara tʋba n wõnnɩ.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, la nẽr-sõma zozo'e yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ yãma n yẽ sɛla la mɛ, la ba ka yẽ, ba yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba wõm sɛla tɩ yãma wõm na mɛ, la ba ka wõm."
"Bɛla, selse-ya sɛka n lobge bõnbuuri la makrɛ la võorɛ.
Sore la nõorʋm tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛka n wõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga la, dee ka bãŋɛ a võorɛ. Tɩ Asũtãana n de tõon-be'ero dãana la wa'am wa yese yetↄga la a sũure pʋam.
Tãmpı̃a zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛka n wõm kõ-yẽlga la, to'oge ẽ bilam mẽŋa la sũ-yẽlga.
La ban ka kẽ a sũure pʋam na ı̃yã, a sakɛ la wakatɛ fẽe. La toogo bɩɩ nãmsgↄ sãn paagɛ ẽ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la ı̃yã, a basrɩ mɛ tↄtↄ.

La gõ'osɩ la zẽ'a tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛka n wõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga la, tɩ a yɛm yↄↄra la dũnia wã yɛla, tɩ bõntarsõm yɛla pã'asra ẽ, botɩ yetↄga la ka tãna wʋn wↄm biɛ a sũure pʋam.
La zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛka n wõm Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la, wõm a võorɛ, wↄnna biɛ. Tɩ basɛba wↄm kↄbga kↄbga, tɩ basɛba pisyoob-yoobɩ, tɩ basɛba pitã-tã."
Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ayɩla bↄ ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ bʋraa n bʋrɛ si sõma a va'am.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ, tɩ nẽrba gã gı̃sra, tɩ a bɛ tarɩ kanarsɩ sẽŋɛ ka bʋrɛ lagɩm mı̃.
Tɩ si la yese bɩ waagɛ. Tɩ kanarsɩ la mẽ waagɛ, tɩ ba yẽ tɩ ba dagɩ si.
Tɩ tõntõnɩba la sẽŋɛ va'am na dãana zẽ'am ka soke ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, dagɩ si sõma tɩ fõn daan bʋrɛ fʋ va'am na? La bẽm tɩ kanarsɩ bↄna mı̃ zozo'e?'
Tɩ a yele yetɩ: 'La de la mam bɛ n ẽŋɛ bɛla.' Tɩ tõntõnɩba la soke ẽ yetɩ: 'Fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka võ kanarsɩ la mɛ bɩɩ?'
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: 'Ayɛɩ, ya sãn võ kanarsɩ la, ya wʋn po võ la si.
Basɛ-ya tɩ ba wuu bɩ ka paagɛ bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ wakatɛ, tɩ mam wʋn yele sɛba n lagsrɩ bõnkↄↄla la tɩ ba dẽŋɛ võ kanarsɩ la, bobe ba yõ bugum, dee yãŋa lagsɛ si la dɩgɛ m bãarɛ pʋam.' "
Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ayɩla bↄ ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire tɩ bʋraa bʋrɛ a va'am.
A ãna pɩka pɩka gãnna bõnbuuri la wuu biɛ, la ba sãn bʋrɛ ẽ, a bɩtɩ mɛ gãnna zẽvõorↄ buuri wuu, ãna wʋ tɩa la, tɩ niinto sẽna tɛ'ɛra ba tʋgrↄ a wila zuo."
La a le makɛ la makrɛ ayɩla bↄ ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ tɩ pↄka dɩkɛ ẽŋɛ borborɩ zom la-kãra batã pʋam wẽ, tɩ dãbɩllɛ la botɩ ba wuu uke."
Bɛla wuu Azezi magsrɩ la magsa tↄgra bↄ'ↄra nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, a ka tↄgɛ yetↄga bↄ ba, tɩ la sãn dagna magsa.
A ẽŋɛ bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa n yʋʋn gʋlsɛ se'em na n ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Mam wʋn makɛ la magsa tↄgɛ bↄ ba, mam wʋn pa'alɛ yel-sɛba n sʋgɛ halɩ dũnia pı̃'iluŋo wakatɛ wa paam lɛɛlɛ wã."
Azezi daan basɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la mɛ, dee kule yire. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pa'alɛ tↄ kanarsɩ la makrɛ võorɛ."
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Sɛka n bʋrɛ si sõma la, de la mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la.
La va'am na de la dũnia, tɩ si sõma la dɛna Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm nẽrba. Tɩ kanarsɩ la dɛna Asũtãana nẽrba.
Tɩ bɛ la n bʋrɛ kanarsɩ la dɛna Asũtãana. Tɩ bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ wakatɛ la dɛna dũnia ba'asgↄ. Tɩ sɛba n lagsrɩ bõnkↄↄla la dɛna Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma.
Ban lagsɛ kanarsɩ la lobe basɛ bugum pʋam se'em na, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la bɛla mẽ dũnia ba'asgↄ.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn tõm na a malɛkadõma tɩ ba lagsɛ sɛba n pã'asɛ nẽrba tɩ ba basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, la tõon-be'ero dõma wuu, yese ba Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam,
lobe ba basɛ bugum pʋam. Zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba wʋn kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.
La nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ wʋn yẽgra ba Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa la. Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."

Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ tʋʋlʋm bõnↄ tɩ ba dɩkɛ sʋgɛ va'am pʋam, tɩ nẽra yẽ ẽ. Tɩ a sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a le sʋgɛ ẽ pa'asɛ, dee sẽŋɛ ka koose ẽn tarɩ sɛla wuu, sẽŋɛ ka da va'am na.
Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm le ãna wʋ lɛɛba n eerɩ kug-sõma n de tʋʋlʋm bõnↄ tɩ a da.
La a yẽ la ayɩla n ba ãna sõŋa tɩ a ligri zo'oge, tɩ a lebe kule ka koose ẽn tarɩ sɛla wuu, sẽŋɛ ka da ẽ."
"Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ken ãna wʋ yʋka tɩ ba lobge ko-kãtɛ pʋam yõgɛ zũma buuri wuu,
tɩ yʋka la pɩrɛ. Tɩ ba ve'ege ẽ dooge doone, gãsɛ zũn-sɛba n ãn sõŋa ẽŋɛ pɩtↄ pʋam, dee lobe sɛba n ka ãn sõŋa la basɛ.
La wʋn ãna la bɛla dũnia ba'asgↄ wakatɛ. Malɛkadõma n wʋn wa'am wa gãsɛ nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ, nẽr-sõma la pʋam,
lobe ba basɛ bugum pʋam, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba wʋn kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm."
Azezi tↄgɛ bɛla, dee soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma wõm bɛla wuu võorɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽe."
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛka woo n de lↄↄ karẽnsãama dee zãsʋm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle pa'asɛ, ãn wʋ yidãana n loorɩ bõn-kɛgsɩ, la bõn-paalsɩ a bõntarsõm pʋam bↄ'ↄra nẽrba."
Azezi daan magsɛ magsa la kɩ'ɩlɩm, dee fõrgɛ bilam sẽŋɛ la a mẽŋa tẽŋa.
La ẽn paagɛ a mẽŋa tẽŋa la, a kẽ la ba wẽndeego pʋam zãsna nẽrba, tɩ a zãsŋↄ la di'ige nẽrba la, tɩ ba yetɩ: "A yẽ yɛm ẽna la bɛ? A ẽŋɛ la wãne tõnna tõon-yãlma wã?
Dagɩ ẽna n de dↄ-wãta la dayʋa la? Dagɩ ẽna ma yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Amaari la, tɩ a yɩbsɩ dɛna Azakɩ, la Azozɛfʋ, la Asimõ, la Azudi la?
Dagɩ a tãpa wuu n boe tɩ zẽ'am wã? A yẽ bõn-bãma wuu la bɛ?"
Bɛla tɩ ba daan ka bↄ ẽ sɩra. Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa yẽtɩ pẽka mɛ, sãn dagna a mẽŋa tẽŋa, la a yir-dõma tẽŋasʋka mã'a tɩ a ka yẽtɩ pẽka."
A daan ka tõm tõon-yãlma zozo'e bilam, ban ka bↄ ẽ sɩra la ı̃yã.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Galile naba A'erↄdɩ daan wõm ban tↄgrɩ Azezi yelle,
tɩ a yele a tõntõnɩba yetɩ: "Ẽna de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n vo'oge. La de la bɛla n soe tɩ a tara pãŋa tõnna tõon-yãlma."
Se'ere n soe tɩ a yele bɛla la, A'erↄdɩ mẽŋa n daan botɩ ba yõkɛ Azã lʋ tarɩ ka kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem a kẽema Afilipi pↄga A'erodɩadɩ ı̃yã.
Se'ere n soe la, A'erↄdɩ daan fãagɛ la Afilipi pↄga di, tɩ Azã daan yele ẽ yetɩ: "La ka masɛ tɩ fʋ fãagɛ ẽ di."
A'erↄdɩ daan boorɩ tɩ a kʋ Azã mɛ, dee zↄta tẽŋa la nẽrba, se'ere n soe la, ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ Azã de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
La A'erↄdɩ daan wa ɩta la a dↄka daarɛ kibsa, tɩ A'erodɩadɩ pↄyʋa wa nẽrba nẽŋam, tɩ A'erↄdɩ sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm halɩ zozo'e,
tɩ a pↄɩ yele pugla la yetɩ, bõn-sɛka wuu tɩ a wʋn sose, ẽŋa wʋn bↄ ẽ.
Tɩ a ma botɩ a yele naba A'erↄdɩ yetɩ: "Dɩkɛ Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na zuugo ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam bↄ mam kalam."
Tɩ naba la sũure sã'am, la ẽn pↄɩ la ı̃yã, la sãama la ı̃yã, tɩ a bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ ba bↄ pugla la ẽn boorɩ sɛla la.
Dee tõm nẽra tɩ a sẽŋɛ yʋ'a deem ka wike Azã zuugo.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka wike zuugo la ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam tarɩ ka bↄ pugla la, tɩ a to'oge ka bↄ a ma.
Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi wa'am wa dɩkɛ kũm na ka laagɛ, dee sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi.
Azezi n daan wõm bɛla la, a kẽ la õorŋↄ fõrgɛ wɛ'ɛsa kẽnkɛrŋa, zẽ'a tɩ nẽrba ka boe. Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la bãŋɛ, ze'ele tẽnsɩ pʋam babsɛ ẽ la nãma.
Tɩ Azezi paagɛ ze'ele õorŋↄ la zuo sige, yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a botɩ ba bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Tɩ zaanõorɛ paagɛ, tɩ karẽnbiisi la lɛm Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zẽ'a wã de la mõom, dee tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ'era, bɛla botɩ nẽrba la sẽŋɛ tẽnsɩ la pʋam ka da dia di."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "La ka de pẽrgrɛ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ, ya mẽŋa bↄ ba dia."
Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma tarɩ la borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi mã'a."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Tarɩ-ya ba wa'am wa bↄ ma."

Dee botɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la zı̃'ire mõorↄ zuo. Tɩ a dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la, gorge bɩsɛ saazuum pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise borborɩ la bↄ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba to'oge pʋɩ ba.
Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ, dee tɩ karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ bõn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ pia la ayi.
Sɛba n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ daan de wʋ tʋsanuu, tɩ pↄgsɩ la kↄma kãllɛ ka pa'asɛ.
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi basɛ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba kẽ õorŋↄ dẽŋɛ ẽ dↄↄra mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba, dee tɩ a mẽŋa weege tɩ a keese nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la.
Ẽn daan keese nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a sẽŋɛ la kẽnkɛrŋa ka zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ. Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ, tɩ ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a bↄna mı̃.
La õorŋↄ la daan boe la mõgrɛ la pʋam zãazãarɛ, tɩ ko-mı̃'isi wẽ'era ẽ, tɩ ba nãmsra, se'ere n soe la, kʋsebgo n vugri tʋ'ʋsra ba.
Tɩ beere yↄna wiire, tɩ Azezi sẽnna ko'om na zuo wɛ'ɛsa a karẽnbiisi la bↄba.
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la yẽ tɩ a sẽnnɩ ko'om na zuo, tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba yetɩ: "A de la ki-isgne." Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ba, tɩ ba kaasra tagursi.
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Keŋe-ya ya sũure, la de la mam, da zoe-ya dabeem."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele yetɩ: "Zuudãana, la sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la fõn, bↄ mam nõorɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ko'om na zuo wa'am fʋ zẽ'am."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Wa'am." Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yese õorŋↄ la pʋam sẽnna ko'om na zuo wɛ'ɛsa Azezi zẽ'am.
La Apɩyɛɛrɩ bɩsɛ la kʋsebgo la n vugri zo'oge la, tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ẽ. Tɩ a bↄna mı̃ tɩ a mise, kaasɛ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fãagɛ ma."
Tɩ Azezi darɛ tẽegɛ nu'ugo gʋrɛ ẽ dee yetɩ: "Fʋ ka bↄ mam sɩra zo'oge, bẽm tɩ fʋ yɛm yↄↄra?"
Tɩ ba kẽ õorŋↄ la pʋam, tɩ kʋsebgo la go'oge.
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la n boe õorŋↄ la pʋam na ka dũma Azezi nẽŋam yetɩ: "Fõn sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la."
Tɩ ba pãrgɛ mõgrɛ la dooge paagɛ Zenezarɛtɩ tẽŋa.
Tɩ zẽ'e-ẽŋa nẽrba bãŋɛ Azezi, tõm nẽrba tẽn-sɛba n lɛm na wuu, tɩ ba tarɩ bã'adõma wuu wa'am a zẽ'am.
Ba daan sose ẽ yetɩ a basɛ tɩ bã'adõma la kalʋm a fuugo nõorɛ mã'a. La sɛba wuu n daan kalʋm a fuugo la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ.
Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n ze'ele Zerizalɛm wa'am wa soke Azezi yetɩ:
"Bẽm tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka sakra tɩ yaabdõma malŋↄ la? Ba sãn yetɩ ba di, ba ka peerɩ nu'usi wʋ tɩ yaabdõma n ɩtɩ se'em na."
Tɩ a lebe soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm ẽŋɛ tɩ yãma mẽ sɩ'ɩsra Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ la, ya mẽŋa malŋↄ ı̃yã?
Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Nanna fʋ sↄ, la fʋ ma.' Dee le yetɩ: 'Sɛka n tↄgɛ a sↄ bɩɩ a ma be'em, dẽnɩ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.'
La yãma yetɩ, nẽra sãn yele a sↄ bɩɩ a ma yetɩ: 'Mam n tarɩ nɩ bõn-sɛka tɩ m sõŋɛ fↄ la, de la Nawẽnnɛ bõnↄ', la ka le dɛna tɩ a ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ a sↄ.
Bɛla, ya basrɩ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la lebge la zãŋa, dee dↄla ya mẽŋa malŋↄ.
Pʋlibsum dõma wã, A'ezayi yʋʋn sɩrɩ to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga tↄgɛ ya yelle, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
'Nẽr-bãna wã pẽgrɩ mam na ba nõorɛ yetↄga, la ba sũure zãagɛ la mam mɛ.
Ban nã'asrɩ mam na, la de la zãŋa. Se'ere n soe la, ba zãsnɩ na zãsŋↄ n de nẽrsaalba lↄↄ.' "
La Azezi wi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba wa'am na a zẽ'am, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Selse-ya sõŋa sõŋa wõm a võorɛ:
La dagɩ sɛla n kẽ'erɩ nẽrsaala nõorʋm n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ, la de la sɛla n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala nõorʋm yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ."
Bɛla tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lɛm ẽ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn mi tɩ Farisi dõma la n wõm fõn tↄgɛ bɛla la, la dõn ba sũure mɛ?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Sɛla woo tɩ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ ka bʋrɛ, ba wʋn võogɛ ẽ basɛ.
Basɛ-ya ba, tɩ ba ãn wʋ fↄↄsɩ n ve'erɩ fↄↄsɩ. Fʋa sãn vɛ'ɛra fʋa, bãma bayi wuu wʋn lui la boko pʋam."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pa'alɛ tↄ makrɛ la võorɛ."
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma yɛm mẽ ka like?
Yãma ka mi tɩ bõn-sɛka woo n kẽ'erɩ nẽrsaala nõorʋm tollɩ la a pʋʋrʋm, tɩ a yẽ'era ba basra?
La sɛla n yesrɩ nẽrsaala nõorʋm ze'ele la a sũure pʋam, la de la bõn-bãma n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ.
Se'ere n soe la, pʋtẽ'e-yooro ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a bↄↄra tɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em: Nẽr-kʋa, la yalsɩ, la taaba pↄgba la taaba sɩrba gã'a, la nayigum, la põmpↄrŋↄ, la pↄ'ↄrɛ yetↄga.
La de la bãna wã n dẽgrɩ nẽrsaala. La nẽra sãn di dee ka peege nu'usi, bɛla ka dẽgrɩ nẽra."
Azezi daan fõrgɛ bilam sẽŋɛ la Tiiri, la Sidõ so'olʋm.
Tɩ Kanaan pↄka ze'ele tẽn-bãma wa'am a zẽ'am wa tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Zuudãana, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga, mam pↄyʋa tɩ kʋlkã'arga nãmsra ẽ halɩ zozo'e."
Tɩ Azezi ka lerge ẽ se'ere. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la paagɛ a zẽ'am yele ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽŋɛ bↄ ẽ tɩ a fõrgɛ, tɩ a kaasrɩ dↄla tↄ."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ tõm mam na Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n ãn wʋ piisi n bↄɩ la mã'a zẽ'am."
Tɩ pↄka la paagɛ ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, sõŋɛ ma."
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "La ka masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ kↄma dia bↄ baasɩ."
Tɩ pↄka la lerge yetɩ: "Zuudãana, la de la sɩra. La baasɩ diti la di-zõra n luti ba dãana taablɩ tilum."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Pↄka, fʋ bↄ mam sɩra zo'oge mɛ. La wʋn ẽŋɛ wʋ fõn boorɩ se'em na bↄ fↄ." La wakat-ẽŋa mẽŋa tɩ a pↄyʋa la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Azezi daan ze'ele bilam sẽŋɛ la Galile mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, ka zom tãŋa zuo zẽa.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e tarɩ kↄↄrnↄ, la fↄↄsɩ, la kobro, la mugro, la bã'adõma basɛba zozo'e wa'am Azezi nẽŋam. Tɩ Azezi botɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
La nẽrba la n daan yẽ mugro la n tↄgrɩ, tɩ kobro la yeege, tɩ kↄↄrnↄ na sẽnna, tɩ fↄↄsɩ la yẽta la, la daan di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ n de Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma Zuudãana la.

Azezi daan wi a karẽnbiisi la mɛ yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ wã ninbãalga n tarɩ mam, se'ere n soe la, la de la dabsa atã n wãna tɩ ba boe mam zẽ'am, dee ka tara dia wʋn di. La mam ka boorɩ tɩ m basɛ ba tɩ ba kule la kↄm, ba tã wʋn ka vibe sore mɛ."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn yẽ dia la bɛ, zẽ'e-ẽna n de mõom wã, bↄ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ wã wuu tɩ la seke ba?"
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ la borborɩ balɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Bayopↄɩ, la zũn-pɩgsɩ fẽe."
Tɩ Azezi yele nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ, ba zı̃'ire tẽŋa.
Dee dɩkɛ borborɩ bayopↄɩ la, la zũma la pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ a karẽnbiisi la, tɩ ba to'oge pʋɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la.
Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ, dee tɩ ba vaagɛ bõn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ bayopↄɩ.
Sɛba n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de la tʋsa anaasɩ, tɩ pↄgsɩ la kↄma kãllɛ ka pa'asɛ.
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi basɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tɩ ba kule mɛ, dee kẽ õorŋↄ sẽŋɛ Magdala.
Tɩ Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma basɛba wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa bↄↄra tɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ bõn-yãlma pa'alɛ tɩ ẽŋa ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ yire.
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Zaanõorɛ, sawara sãn mõ'ogɛ, yãma yetɩ saaga kãn ni.
La bulika, sawara sãn mõ'ogɛ sobge, yãma yetɩ saaga n wʋn ni. Yãma bɩsrɩ la sawara mina la ãn se'em, dee ka tãna wʋn bãŋɛ bõn-sɛba n ɩtɩ lɛɛlɛ wã n pa'alɩ sɛla.

Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba n de nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ, dee ka dↄla Nawẽnnɛ la sɩra la, boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ la bõn-yãlma, la ba kãn yẽ bõn-yãlma, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azonaasɩ bõn-yãlma la." La a basɛ ba mɛ dee fõrgɛ.
Tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la dↄↄra mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yı̃m ka dɩkɛ borborɩ.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma dãbɩllɛ la."
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la tẽ'esra yetɩ: "Tõma n ka dɩkɛ borborɩ la ı̃yã tɩ a yele bɛla."
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yele ba yetɩ: "Ya ka bↄ mam sɩra zo'oge. Bẽm tɩ yãma tẽ'esra yetɩ, la de la yãma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ı̃yã?
Yãma nãn ka bãŋɛ a võorɛ? Yãma ka tẽrɩ, borborɩ banuu la tɩ bʋraasɩ tʋsanuu daan di tɩgɛ deege la, yãma daan vaagɛ di-sɛba n daan deege la pɩrɛ la pɩtↄ balɛ?
La borborɩ bayopↄɩ la, tɩ bʋraasɩ tʋsanaasɩ la daan di tɩgɛ deege la, yãma vaagɛ di-sɛba n deege la pɩrɛ la pɩtↄ balɛ?
Bẽm tɩ ya ka bãŋɛ tɩ la dagɩ borborɩ yelle tɩ mam tↄgrɩ la ya? Guuse ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma dãbɩllɛ la yelle."
Tɩ ba yãŋa bãŋɛ tɩ a ka yele ba tɩ ba guuse ba mẽŋa la dãbɩllɛ sɛba tɩ ba tarɩ gaana borborɩ zom na, la de la Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma zãsŋↄ la tɩ a tↄgrɩ.
Azezi daan paagɛ la tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Filipi Sezaare, soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Nẽrba yetɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la de la ãne?"

Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na. Tɩ sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli. Tɩ basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azeremi, bɩɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la nẽra ayɩla."
Tɩ a lebe soke ba yetɩ: "La yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?"
Tɩ Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la Krisi, Nawẽnnɛ n de vↄm dãana la Dayʋa."
Tɩ Azezi lebe yele ẽ yetɩ: "Asimõ, Azã dayʋa, fʋ tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ nẽrsaala n pa'alɛ fʋ wãna, la de la mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum na.
Mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ de la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, a võorɛ de la tãmpı̃a, la tãmpı̃-ẽna zuo tɩ mam wʋn vigle m nẽrba lagsgↄ zẽ'a. La kũm pãŋa kãn tã'agɛ ẽ.
Mam wʋn bↄ fↄ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kʋlɩnbiɛ. La bõn-sɛka woo tɩ fʋ wʋn lʋ dũnia wã zuo, bõn-ẽŋa wʋn lʋ Nawẽnnɛ yire. La bõn-sɛka woo tɩ fʋ wʋn lorge dũnia wã zuo, bõn-ẽŋa wʋn lorge Nawẽnnɛ yire."
Azezi yele bɛla dee kã'an a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra tɩ ẽŋa de la Krisi.

Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi daan pↄsɛ zãsna a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Dẽnɩ tɩ mam sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm, tɩ tẽŋa la kẽma, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma ka nãmsɛ mam halɩ zozo'e, la ba wʋn kʋ mam mɛ. La dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tarɩ ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, da le tↄgɛ bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn gu fo, la kãn ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛla."
Tɩ Azezi gelge yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Lebe mam poorʋm, Asũtãana wã. Fõn boorɩ tɩ fʋ botɩ mam lebe la poorʋm. Fʋ tẽ'esgↄ la dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ tẽ'esgↄ, la de la nẽrsaala tẽ'esgↄ."
Dee yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a dↄla mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgↄ wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka woo n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vↄm mam ı̃yã, a wʋn yẽ vↄm.
La nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia wã sɛla woo, dee koŋe vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorↄ de la bẽm? Sɛla ka boe tɩ nẽra wʋn dɩkɛ teege vↄm.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am mɛ la a Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa, la a malɛkadõma. La wakat-ẽŋa a wʋn yↄ nẽra woo masɛ la a tõonɛ.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n ze kalam wã basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n sẽm, la a na'am."
Dabsa ayoobɩ n daan tole, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la a yɩbga Azã doose ẽ sẽŋɛ kẽnkɛrŋa ka zom tãn-kãtɛ zuo.
Tɩ a nẽŋa teege ba nẽŋam, yẽgra wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa la. Tɩ a futo pelge halɩ wʋ peelem na.
Tɩ Amoyisi la A'eli puke ba zẽ'am tↄgra la Azezi.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ. Fʋ sãn bↄↄra, mam wʋn tı̃ põnsɩ batã, bↄ fõn ayɩla, bↄ Amoyisi ayɩla, bↄ A'eli ayɩla."
La ẽn nãn ken bↄna mı̃ tↄgra la, tɩ sawatɛ n yẽgrɩ wa'am wa lile ba. Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: "Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu, a paagɛ la mam yɛm. Selse-ya a yetↄga."
La a karẽnbiisi la n wõm bɛla la, tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ba zozo'e, tɩ ba lui dɩkɛ nẽnsɩ võglɛ tẽŋa.
Tɩ Azezi lɛm kalʋm ba yetɩ: "Isge-ya, da zoe-ya dabeem."
Tɩ ba gorge bɩsɛ, ka le yẽ nẽra, sãn dagna Azezi mã'a.
La ban daan ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sigra la, Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: "Da yele-ya nẽra sɛla tɩ ya yẽ wã, sãn dagna tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa ki mɛ dee vo'oge."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Wãne tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ A'eli wʋn dẽŋɛ Krisi wa'am?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "La de la sɩra tɩ A'eli n wʋn dẽŋɛ wa'am wa le malgɛ sɛla woo.
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ A'eli põn wa'am mɛ, tɩ ba ka bãŋɛ ẽ, dee ẽŋɛ ẽ ban boorɩ se'em. Ba mẽ wʋn nãmsɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la bɛla."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yãŋa bãŋɛ tɩ la de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na yelle tɩ a tↄgɛ.
Ban daan lebe ka paara nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la zẽ'am na, tɩ bʋraa wa'am wa yigle Azezi nẽŋam,
yele ẽ yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, zoe m dayʋa ninbãalga, a luti la kinki'ire tɩ la nãmsra ẽ zozo'e. La sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a luti la bugum pʋam, bɩɩ ko'om pʋam.
Bɛla tɩ mam tarɩ ẽ wa'am fʋ karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am, la ba ka yãŋɛ botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bↄ'ↄrɩ mam sɩra, la ya ka ɩtɩ sõŋa. Mam wʋn bↄna la yãma, mã'agɛ m mẽŋa halɩ ka paagɛ la wakat-kãna? Tarɩ-ya bia la wa'am."
La Azezi daan tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la mɛ, tɩ a yese dee basɛ bia la, tɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm bilam mẽŋa.
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am bãma mã'a, ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ tõma ka yãŋɛ dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese?"

Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Yan ka bↄ sɩra zo'oge la ı̃yã. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ yãma n bↄ mam sɩra la, sãn ãna baa pɩka wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire la, ya tã wʋn yele tãn-ẽna yetɩ: 'Vurge sẽŋɛ ke', la a wʋn ẽŋɛ la bɛla. La sɛla ka boe tɩ ya kãn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ. ((
La de la pʋ'ʋsgↄ, la nõorlʋa mã'a tɩ ya wʋn yãŋɛ dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽŋa buuri.))"
Daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la lagɩm bↄna Galile, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ la nẽrba nu'usum,
tɩ ba kʋ ẽ. La dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge mɛ." Ẽn yele bɛla la, tɩ ba sũure sã'am zozo'e.
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan paagɛ la Kapɛrnaʋm tẽŋa, tɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba sẽŋɛ ka soke Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Ya karẽnsãama la yↄↄrɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la lampo mɛ bɩɩ?"

Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Ẽe, a yↄↄra." Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ kule yire, tɩ Azezi dẽŋɛ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Asimõ, fõn tẽ'esrɩ tɩ dũnia wã na'adõma to'osrɩ ba lampo la ãndõma zẽ'am? Tẽŋa dõma zẽ'am bɩɩ, sɛba n de sãama la zẽ'am?"
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Sãama zẽ'am." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bɛla, tẽŋa la dõma nẽŋa ka boe mı̃.
La tõma n ka boorɩ tɩ tɩ sã'am ba sũure la ı̃yã, sẽŋɛ ka lobge zũmbãŋa mõgrɛ pʋam, fõn yõkɛ zũn-sɛka yiɛn na, fʋ ya'agɛ a nõorɛ, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ lag-kõbrɛ, dɩkɛ sẽŋɛ ka yↄ mam, la fõn ı̃yã."
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ karẽnbiisi la daan lɛm Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Ãne n de nẽr-kãtɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam?"
Tɩ Azezi wi bi-pɩka ze'ele ba tẽŋasʋka,
dee yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ ya sãn ka teege yɛm ãna wʋ kↄma la, ya kãn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
Bɛla, sɛka woo n sike a mẽŋa ãna wʋ bi-pɩka la, a wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
La sɛka n to'oge bi-pɩka n ãn wʋ ẽna, mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, a to'oge la mam mẽŋa.
La nẽra sãn botɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ bãna wã n bↄ mam sɩra la ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, sɩbgrɛ sɛka tɩ a wʋn yẽ la, ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam n sõɩ.
Toogo boe dũnia zuo, nẽrba n pã'asrɩ nẽrba tɩ ba basrɩ Nawẽnnɛ sore la ı̃yã. Dẽnɩ tɩ pã'asgↄ wa'am, la nẽr-sɛka n pã'asrɩ la wʋn yẽ toogo.

Fʋ nu'ugo bɩɩ fʋ nã'arɛ sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, wige ba basɛ. Fʋ sãn tara nu'u-yẽŋↄ bɩɩ nã'a-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄa, n sõɩ fõn tarɩ nu'usi bayi, la nãma bayi, dee tɩ ba lobe fʋ basɛ bugum n ka kı̃ŋri pʋam.
La fʋ nifo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, kɩrgɛ ẽ basɛ. Fʋ sãn tara nin-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄa, n sõɩ fõn tarɩ nini bayi, dee tɩ ba lobe fʋ basɛ bug-tẽŋa."
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse-ya da pↄ'ↄra kↄm-bãna wã baa ayɩla. Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ba malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire, boe mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam mɛ wakatɛ woo. ((
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am tɩ a fãagɛ la nẽr-sɛba n bↄɩ la.))
Yãma tẽ'esrɩ la bẽm? Nẽra sãn tara piisi kↄbga, tɩ ayɩla bↄɩ, a kãn basɛ piswɛɩ la awɛɩ la kũnkũnne zuo tɩ ba ↄbra, dee sẽŋɛ ka ɛ ayɩla n bↄɩ la?
La mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ a sãn yẽ ẽ, a sũure wʋn ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm mɛ la ayɩla la gãnna piswɛɩ la awɛɩ n ka bↄɩ la.
Ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ ãn na bɛla, a ka boorɩ tɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ bãna ayɩla bↄɩ."
Tɩ Azezi le yetɩ: "Fʋ sↄbia sãn ẽŋɛ be'em, sẽŋɛ ka yẽ ẽ fõn na ẽŋa mã'a, pa'alɛ ẽ a tuure la. A sãn sakɛ fʋ nõorɛ, fʋ to'oge ẽ basɛ.
La a sãn zagsɛ fʋ nõorɛ la, fʋ doose nẽra ayɩla bɩɩ bayi sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am. Tɩ nẽrba bayi bɩɩ batã dɛna kaset-dõma yelle la mãalgↄ ı̃yã, wʋ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yele se'em na.
La a sãn zagsɛ ka selse ba, fʋ yele wẽndeego la nẽrba. La a sãn zagsɛ ka selse wẽndeego la nẽrba, ya bɩsra ẽ wʋ nẽra n ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ, bɩɩ tõon-be'ero dãana.
La mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ bõn-sɛka woo tɩ ya wʋn lʋ dũnia wã zuo, wʋn lʋ Nawẽnnɛ yire. La sɛla tɩ ya wʋn lorge dũnia wã zuo, wʋn lorge Nawẽnnɛ yire.
Mam ken yɛta ya tɩ nẽrba bayi sãn naagɛ nõorɛ dũnia wã zuo sose mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɛla, a wʋn ẽŋɛ bↄ ba.
La nẽrba bayi bɩɩ batã sãn lagsɛ taaba mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, mam boe la ba lɛ mɛ."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lɛm Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, mam sↄbia sãn ẽŋɛ mam be'em, nõorɛ wãne tɩ mam wʋn basɛ ẽ taalɛ? Nõorɛ ayopↄɩ bɩɩ?"
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam ka yetɩ nõorɛ ayopↄɩ mã'a, mam yetɩ nõorɛ pisyopↄɩ nõorɛ bʋyopↄɩ.
La de la bɛla, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãna wʋ naba n boorɩ tɩ a tõntõnɩba geele a tõoma pa'alɛ ẽ.
La ẽn pↄsɛ bↄna mı̃ gɛɛla la, tɩ ba tarɩ nẽra ayɩla n di a sãnnɛ lig-kõba yʋ'ʋrɛ n de talã tʋspia wa'am.
La a daan ka tarɩ sɛla wʋn yↄ, tɩ a zuudãana la bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ, ba koose ẽ, la a pↄga la a kↄma, la a lↄgrↄ wuu yↄ sãnnɛ na.
Tɩ tõntõnna la ka dũma tẽŋa a zuudãana la nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ sugri tɩ ẽŋa wʋn yↄ sãnnɛ na wuu.
Tɩ a zuudãana la zoe a ninbãalga, basɛ sãnnɛ na, dee basɛ ẽ tɩ a fõrgɛ.
La tõntõn-ẽŋa n yesrɩ la, a tʋ'ʋsɛ la a tõntõn-tadãana n di a sãnnɛ lig-kõba yʋ'ʋrɛ n de deniye kↄbga, yõkɛ ẽ kẽkɛ a kõnkↄa, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Yↄ ma m sãnnɛ na.'
Tɩ a tõntõn-tadãana la ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ sugri tɩ ẽŋa wʋn yↄ a sãnnɛ na.
Tɩ a zagsɛ, dee tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem yetɩ, a sãn ka yↄ ẽŋa a sãnnɛ na, a kãn yese.
La a tõntõn-taaba la n yẽ bɛla la, tɩ ba sũure sã'am zozo'e. Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ba zuudãana la zẽ'am ka yele ẽ sɛla n ẽŋɛ la wuu.
Tɩ zuudãana la botɩ ba wi ẽ, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Tõntõn-be'ego wã, sãn-sɛka wuu tɩ fõn di la, mam basɛ mɛ tɩ la ba'asɛ, fõn sose mam na ı̃yã.
La masɛ nɩ mɛ tɩ fʋ mẽ zoe fʋ tadãana la ninbãalga, wʋ mam n zoe fõn ninbãalga se'em na.'
La a zuudãana la sũure yı̃ige mɛ, tɩ a basɛ tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem tɩ ba nãmsɛ ẽ halɩ tɩ a yↄ sãnnɛ na wuu.
Mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn ẽŋɛ ya la bɛla, ya sãn ka basɛ ya sↄbiisi tõon-be'ero taalɛ la ya sũure wuu."
Azezi n daan tↄgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a yese Galile sẽŋɛ la Zude so'olʋm Zʋrdẽ doone ke bↄba.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e doose ẽ, tɩ a botɩ ba bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba wa'am a zẽ'am tɩ ba di a yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Sore boe tɩ bʋraa lebse a pↄga n wen ẽŋɛ bõn-sɛka woo mɛ bɩɩ?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Yãma ka karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ la? Pı̃'iluŋo wakatɛ, Nawẽnnɛ n nãam nẽrsaalba la, a nãam na bʋraa la pↄka.
Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ a yetɩ, bʋraaga basɛ a sↄ, la a ma, dee lagɩm na a pↄga, tɩ bãma bayi lebge ayɩla.
Bɛla, ba ka le dɛna nẽrba bayi, ba yãŋa lebge la ayɩla. Bɛla, sɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lagɩm na taaba, nẽrsaala da welge ba."
Tɩ Farisi dõma la soke ẽ yetɩ: "La bẽm ı̃yã tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ, bʋraa sãn yetɩ a lebse a pↄga, a bↄ ẽ pↄgdire lebsgo gõŋↄ, dee tarɩ ẽ ka lebse?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "La de la ya sũure n kɛ tɩ ya ka sakɛ pa'algↄ la ı̃yã, tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn sakɛ tɩ ya lebse ya pↄgba. Pı̃'iluŋo wakatɛ, la yʋʋn ka ãn wãna.
La mam yetɩ ya tɩ, bʋraaga sãn lebse a pↄga tɩ la sãn dagna tɩ a gã la bʋraasɩ, a sãn le di pↄka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɛ la a tadãana pↄga."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋraaga la a pↄga yelle sãn dɛna bɛla, bʋraaga sãn ka di pↄka n sõɩ."
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "La dagɩ nẽrba wuu n wʋn yãŋɛ to'oge yetↄg-ẽna, sãn dagna sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ sõŋɛ ba tɩ ba to'oge.

Nẽrba basɛba n boe tɩ ba dↄgɛ ba tɩ ba ãna wʋ ba fↄ ba mɛ na, ka dita pↄgsɩ. Tɩ nẽrba mẽ fↄ bʋraasɩ basɛba. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ı̃yã, tɩ sɛba mẽ ka dita pↄgsɩ. Sɛka n tã wʋn yãŋɛ to'oge yetↄg-ẽna, a to'oge."
Tɩ nẽrba tarɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ ba. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la zɛbɛ nẽrba la.
Tɩ Azezi yele yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya kↄm-pɩgsɩ la tɩ ba wa'am mam zẽ'am, da gu'ura-ya ba. Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄma wã bõnↄ."
La a dɩkɛ la a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ ba, dee fõrgɛ.
Tɩ bʋraaga wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam wʋn tõm na tõon-sõŋↄ kãna yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ?"
Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fʋ sↄkra ma sɛla n ãn sõŋa yelle? Nawẽnnɛ mã'a n ãn sõŋa. Fʋ sãn bↄↄra tɩ fʋ yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ, fʋ sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ a nõorɛ se'em na."
Tɩ a soke yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ yetↄg-bãna?" Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Da kʋ nẽra, da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pↄga, da zũ, da tↄgɛ põmpↄrŋↄ kaseto,
nanna fʋ sↄ, la fʋ ma, la fʋ nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fʋ mẽŋa."
Tɩ budib-polle la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam põn sakra bõn-bãna wuu mɛ, bẽm n deege?"
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn bↄↄra tɩ fʋ masɛ sɛla woo pʋam, sẽŋɛ ka koose fõn tarɩ sɛla la wuu dɩkɛ bↄ nasdõma, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bõntarsõm Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee wa'am wa dↄla mam."
Budib-polle la n wõm bɛla la, a fõrgɛ mɛ la sũ-sã'aŋↄ, se'ere n soe la, a tarɩ la bõntarsõm zo'oge.
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ la tↄ mɛ bↄ bõntarsa tɩ a kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
La mam le yɛta ya tɩ, la de la nãana tɩ yʋgnɛ doose fupı̃im yoko pʋam yese, gãnna bõntarsa n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
La a karẽnbiisi la n wõm bɛla la, tɩ la di'ige ba halɩ zozo'e, tɩ ba yetɩ: "La sãn dɛna bɛla, ãne n wʋn tã'agɛ yẽ fãarɛ?"
Tɩ Azezi bɩsra ba, dee yetɩ: "Nẽrsaala ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, la Nawẽnnɛ tã sɛla woo ɩta mɛ."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: "Tõma basɛ sɛla woo mɛ, dee dↄla fõn. Bẽm tɩ tõma wʋn yẽ?"

Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ wakat-sɛka tɩ sɛla woo wʋn lebge paalsɩ la, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n wʋn zı̃'ire a na'am bı̃mbı̃nne zuo la, yãma sɛba n dolɩ mam na mẽ wʋn zı̃'ire na'am bı̃mbı̃na pia la ayi zuto, di Ɩsrayɛlɩ buuri pia la ayi la sarɩya.
