La sɛba wuu n basɛ ba yiɛ, bɩɩ ba kẽendõma, la ba yɩbsɩ, bɩɩ ba sↄdõma, bɩɩ ba madõma, bɩɩ ba kↄma, bɩɩ ba vatↄ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, ba wʋn to'oge bãma n basɛ sɛla la nõorɛ kↄbga, dee yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ.
La nẽŋam dõma zozo'e wʋn lebge poorʋm dõma, tɩ poorʋm dõma zozo'e lebge nẽŋam dõma."
Azezi le yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ yidãana n yese bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ, sẽŋɛ ka dɩkɛ tõntõnɩba tɩ ba tõm a va'am.
La a tↄgɛ kʋ la tõntõnɩba la tɩ ẽŋa wʋn yↄ ba lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla daarɛ pʋam, dee tõm ba a va'am na tɩ ba ka tõm.
Tɩ wʋntɛɛŋa bɩ fẽe, tɩ a le yese yẽ nẽrba basɛba n ze da'am ka tõnna,
tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: 'Ya mẽ sẽŋɛ mam va'am na ka tõm, tɩ mam wʋn yↄ ya lan masɛ se'em.'
Tɩ ba isge sẽŋɛ va'am na. Tɩ a le yese wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka, la wẽngɛlŋa le ẽŋɛ bɛla.
Tɩ a le yese wẽnnɛ n we'esɩ lua, le yẽ nẽrba basɛba n ze, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: 'Bẽm ı̃yã tɩ yãma zɛ kalam daarɛ la wuu pʋam ka ɩta sɛla sɛla?'
Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: 'Nẽra nẽra ka dɩkɛ tõma tõoma.' Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: 'Ya mẽ sẽŋɛ m va'am na ka tõm.'
Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ, tɩ va'am na dãana yele sɛka n bɩsrɩ a tõoma la yelle yetɩ: 'Wi tõntõnɩba la tɩ ba wa'am tɩ fʋ yↄ ba. Dẽŋɛ yↄ sɛba n sẽŋɛ poorʋm na ka paagɛ sɛba n dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ la.'
Tɩ sɛba n sẽŋɛ wẽnnɛ n we'esɩ lua la wuu to'ose lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla ayɩla.
Tɩ sɛba n dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ la tẽ'esra tɩ bãma wʋn to'ose gãnna sɛba n wa'am poorʋm na. La ba wuu to'ose la lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla ayɩla wʋ sɛba n sẽŋɛ poorʋm na n to'ose se'em na.
La sɛba n dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ la n to'ose lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla ayɩla la, ba yõnnɩ yidãana la mɛ,
yetɩ: 'Sɛba n wa'am poorʋm na tõm na karf-ayɩla mã'a, la fõn basɛ tɩ ba to'ose zõna la tõma sɛba n tõm halɩ daarɛ la wuu pʋam nãmsɛ la wʋntɛɛŋa la.'
Tɩ a lebe yele ba nẽra ayɩla yetɩ: 'M sɩrɛ, mam ka ẽŋɛ fʋ sɛla n ka masɛ. Tɩ tↄgɛ kʋ, tɩ fʋ sakɛ tɩ fõn wʋn to'oge la lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla.
To'oge fʋ yↄↄrↄ sẽŋɛ fõrgɛ. La de la mam n boorɩ tɩ m yↄ sɛba n wa'am poorʋm na zõna la fõn.
Mam ka tarɩ nõorɛ tɩ m dɩkɛ m bõnↄ ẽŋɛ sɛla tɩ mam boorɩ? Bɩɩ mam n ẽŋɛ sõŋa la ı̃yã tɩ fõn ɩta sũure?'
Bɛla, nẽŋam dõma wʋn lebge poorʋm dõma, tɩ poorʋm dõma lebge nẽŋam dõma."
Azezi daan we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm welge a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la mã'a, yele ba yetɩ:
"Ya yẽ ya, tɩ we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm, bilam ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mɛ ka ẽŋɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nu'usum, tɩ ba wʋn tↄgɛ a yelle kʋ yetɩ, a masɛ la kũm.
La ba wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la bu-zãŋsɩ nu'usum, tɩ ba la ẽ, wẽ ẽ na ka'asa, dee ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ. La dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge."
Tɩ Azebede pↄga daan doose la a dayↄↄsɩ paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam tɩ a sose ẽ tɩ a ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bↄ fↄ?" Tɩ pↄka la lerge yetɩ: "Bↄ nõorɛ tɩ fʋ sãn wa dita fʋ na'am na, tɩ m dayↄↄsɩ bayi wã ayɩla zı̃'ire fʋ zʋʋgↄ, tɩ ayɩla zı̃'ire fʋ gↄbga."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Ya ka mi yãma n sosrɩ sɛla. Ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ nãmsgↄ sɛka tɩ mam wʋn nãmsɛ wã?" Tɩ ba yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ bɛla."

Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Ya wʋn sɩrɩ nãmsɛ nãmsgↄ sɛka tɩ mam wʋn nãmsɛ la. La, la dagɩ mam n wʋn looge sɛka n wʋn zı̃'ire mam zʋʋgↄ bɩɩ mam gↄbga. Mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mãasʋm zẽ'e-bãma tɩ a bↄ la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a yetɩ a bↄ la."
La karẽnbiisi pia la n wõm bɛla la, ba sũure n isge la ba tadãandõma bayi la.
Tɩ Azezi wi ba wuu yetɩ: "Ya mi tɩ dũnia wã na'adõma soe ba nẽrba la pãŋa, dee tɩ kɛ'ɛndõma pẽrgra nẽrba tɩ ba ɩta bãma n boorɩ se'em.
La yãma pʋam, la kãn dɛna bɛla. Nẽr-sɛka n boorɩ tɩ a lebge nẽr-keko ya pʋam, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya tõntõnna.
La nẽr-sɛka n mẽ boorɩ tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana ya pʋam, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya yamŋa wʋ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ nẽrba tõm bↄ ẽ, a wa'am tɩ a tõm mɛ bↄ, dee dɩkɛ a vↄm bↄ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yẽ fãarɛ."
Azezi daan ze'ele la Zeriko tẽŋa pʋam yɛsra, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e dↄla ẽ.
Tɩ fↄↄsɩ bayi zẽa sore nõorʋm wõm tɩ Azezi n tollɩ, tɩ ba tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Zuudãana, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe tɩ ninbãalga."
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tãsɛ ba yetɩ, ba sı̃na. Tɩ ba malɩn tı̃i tↄgra gãnna bɛla yetɩ: "Zuudãana, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe tɩ ninbãalga."
Tɩ Azezi ze'ele dee wi ba, soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bↄ ya?"
Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Zuudãana, tõma boorɩ la tɩ nini yẽta."
Tɩ Azezi zoe ba ninbãalga, kalʋm ba nini, tɩ ba nini na yẽta bilam mẽŋa, tɩ ba dↄla ẽ.
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka lɛm na Zerizalɛm, paagɛ tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Betɩfaazɩ, Oliivi tãŋa sɩa. Tɩ Azezi tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi
yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽŋa la n boe ya nẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ bõŋ-yã'aŋa n lʋ zɛ la a biire, lorge-ya ẽ tarɩ ba wa'am wa bↄ ma.
Nẽra sãn yele ya se'ere, ya yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana la n boorɩ ba', tɩ a wʋn basɛ tɩ ya tarɩ ẽ wa'am tↄtↄ."
La ẽŋɛ la bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa la n yʋʋn tↄgɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ.
A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Yele-ya Siyõ tẽŋa nẽrba yetɩ: 'Ya naba la n wãna n sẽm. A sike a mẽŋa bã la bõŋa, la a biire sẽna.' "
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ Azezi n yele ba se'em na,
tarɩ bõŋ-yã'aŋa la a biire wa'am, wa dɩkɛ ba futo paglɛ ba zuto tɩ Azezi bã.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e yɛrgɛ ba futo sore zuo, tɩ sɛba kↄ tɩɩsɩ võorↄ yɛrgɛ sore zuo.

Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan boe a nẽŋa, la sɛba n boe a poorʋm na wuu tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Ozaana, naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa. Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la. Ozaana! Nã'asɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum."
Ban daan sẽnnɩ kẽ'era Zerizalɛm na, tẽŋa la wuu dãm mɛ, tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Ãne n de ẽna?"
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la lerge ba yetɩ: "La de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm na."
Azezi daan kẽ la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam digra sɛba wuu n koosrɩ, la sɛba n da'arɩ la, tɩ ba yɛsra, dee zã'agɛ sɛba n teerɩ ligri taablɩdõma, la sɛba n koosrɩ na'adawɛma kʋgsɩ lʋbɛ.
Dee yele ba yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Ba wʋn wi'ira mam deego la tɩ pʋ'ʋsgↄ deego.' La yãma dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la nayigba lagsgↄ zẽ'a."
Tɩ fↄↄsɩ, la wↄbsɩ wa'am a zẽ'am Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, tɩ a botɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.

La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n yẽ tõon-yãlma la tɩ Azezi tõnnɩ, la kↄma n malɩn tı̃i tↄgra Wẽnde-kãtʋm na yɛta tɩ: "Ozaana! Pẽgɛ-ya naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa" la, ba sũure n daan yı̃ige.
Tɩ ba yele Azezi yetɩ: "Fõn wõm ban yetɩ se'em na?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Ẽe, mam wõm ya. Yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ la yetↄg-ẽna n yetɩ: 'Fõn botɩ kↄma, la bilɛɛsɩ n nã'asra fõn.' "
La Azezi basɛ ba bilam, dee sẽŋɛ la Betani ka gã'arɛ.
Beere n daan wiige bulika, tɩ Azezi lɛbra Zerizalɛm, tɩ a kↄm dõnna.
Tɩ a yẽ kẽnkãŋa n ze sore nõorʋm, sẽŋɛ tɩ a ka bɩsɛ, la a paagɛ yẽ la võorↄ mã'a. Tɩ a yele kẽnkãŋa la yetɩ: "Fʋ kãn le malɩn wↄm biɛ." La bilam mẽŋa tɩ kẽnkãŋa la kʋɩ.
La a karẽnbiisi la n yẽ bɛla la, la di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba yetɩ: "La ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ kẽnkãŋa wã darɛ kʋɩ wãna?"

Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ ya sãn bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra dee ka sẽ'ena, ya mẽ wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ wʋ mam n ẽŋɛ tɩ-ẽna se'em wã, la, la dagɩ bɛla mã'a, ya wʋn tã'agɛ yele tãn-ẽna yetɩ: 'Võogɛ ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam', la a wʋn ẽŋɛ bɛla.
La ya sãn sose Nawẽnnɛ sɛla dee bↄ ẽ sɩra, ya wʋn to'oge."
Azezi daan kẽ la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na zãsna nẽrba, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma wa'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ nõorɛ la bɛ ɩta bõn-bãna? La ãne n bↄ fõn nõorɛ tɩ fõn ɩta?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam wʋn soke ya sokre ayɩla, tɩ ya sãn lerge mam, mam mẽ wʋn yele ya nõor-sɛka tɩ mam tarɩ ɩta bõn-bãna.

Yele-ya ma, Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ bɩɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba?" Tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: "Tɩ sãn yetɩ la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ, a wʋn yetɩ, bẽm ı̃yã tɩ tõma ka sakɛ ẽ?
Tɩ mẽ ka tã wʋn yetɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba n tõm ẽ, dẽnɩ tɩ zↄta nẽrba la, se'ere n soe la, ba wuu sakɛ tɩ Azã de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa."
Tɩ ba koŋe lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma ka mi." Tɩ a mẽ yele ba yetɩ: "Mam mẽ kãn yele ya mam n yẽ nõorɛ zẽ'e-sɛka ɩta bõn-bãna."
Azezi daan le yele ba yetɩ: "Pa'alɛ-ya ma yãma n tẽ'esrɩ se'em: Bʋraa n daan boe tarɩ a dayↄↄsɩ bayi, yele pↄspↄsɩ dãana la yetɩ: 'M dayʋa, sẽŋɛ ka tõm m va'am na zı̃na.'
Tɩ a dayʋa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Mam kãn sẽŋɛ.' Tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ a teege yɛm sẽŋɛ.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ a dayʋa bʋyi dãana la zẽ'am ka yele ẽŋa mẽ yetɩ, a sẽŋɛ ka tõm a va'am na. Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M sↄ, mam wʋn sẽŋɛ.' La a yele bɛla dee ka sẽŋɛ.

Bãma bayi, ãne n ẽŋɛ a sↄ la n boorɩ se'em na?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Pↄspↄsɩ dãana la." Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la pↄg-yalsɩ dõma wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.

Se'ere n soe la, Azã wa'am wa pa'alɛ ya la sore tɩ ya wʋn doose masɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, la ya ka bↄ ẽ sɩra. La lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la pↄg-yalsɩ dõma n bↄ ẽ sɩra. La baa yãma n yẽ bɛla la, ya ken ka teege yɛm bↄ ẽ sɩra."

Azezi daan le yele ba yetɩ: "Selse-ya makrɛ ayɩla. Yidãana ayɩla n daan kↄ a va'am sele tɩɩsɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ n de viinye, mẽ lalga kaagɛ ẽ, tũ boko tɩ ba wẽkra viinye la biɛ, dee mẽ de-woko tɩ ba zↄnna bɩsra a va'am na, yãŋa dɩkɛ nẽrba tɩ ba bɩsra va'am na, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
Tɩ viinye la biɛ go'osgo wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnɩba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am, ka to'oge a viinye la biɛ wa bↄ ẽ.
Tɩ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na yõgɛ tõntõnɩba la wẽ ayɩla, kʋ ayɩla, dee lobe ayẽma la kuga kʋ.
Tɩ a le tõm tõntõnɩba basɛba n zo'oge gãnna pↄspↄsɩ dõma la. Tɩ ba le ẽŋɛ bãma mẽ bɛla.
Tɩ a yãŋa tõm a mẽŋa dayʋa sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am, dee tẽ'esra yetɩ: 'Ẽna n de mam mẽŋa dayʋa la, ba wʋn nan ẽ.'
La sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na n yẽ ẽ na, ba yele taaba yetɩ: 'Ẽna n wʋn wa sↄↄgɛ sↄna a sↄ bõntarsõm na. Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ kʋ ẽ, dee tɩ bõntarsõm na lebge tõma bõnↄ.'
Tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ ve'ege yese va'am na kẽnkɛrŋa ka kʋ ẽ.
Bɛla, va'am na dãana sãn wa'am, a wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na la wãne?"
Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "A wʋn nãmsɛ nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ bãna mɛ halɩ kʋ ba, dee dɩkɛ va'am na bↄ nẽr-sɛba n wʋn bↄ ẽ a viinye la biɛ ba go'osgo wakatɛ, tɩ ba bɩsra."

Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ la n yetɩ: 'Kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la n lebge kugre n botɩ deego la tara pãŋa. La de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, tɩ la dɛna yel-di'iŋa bↄ tõma.'
Bɛla, mam yetɩ ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn to'oge a so'olʋm ya zẽ'am dɩkɛ bↄ buur-sɛba n wʋn tõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm tõoma. ((
La kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la, nẽr-sɛka woo n lui kug-ẽŋa zuo, a wʋn kↄ kↄ mɛ. La kugre la sãn lui sɛka zuo, a wʋn mẽrgɛ ẽ.))"
La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la Farisi dõma n wõm makrɛ la, ba bãŋɛ tɩ a tↄgrɩ la bãma yelle.
Tɩ ba bↄↄra tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ, dee zↄta nẽrba la, se'ere n soe la, ba sakɛ tɩ Azezi de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
Azezi daan le makɛ la makrɛ yele ba yetɩ:
"Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ naba n ẽŋɛ a dayʋa pↄgdire kibsa,
tõm a tõntõnɩba yetɩ, ba sẽŋɛ ka wi nẽr-sɛba tɩ ẽŋa daan wi la. Tɩ nẽrba la ka bↄↄra tɩ ba wa'am.
Tɩ a le tõm tõntõnɩba basɛba yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele sɛba tɩ mam daan wi la yetɩ, mam mãasʋm sɛla woo mɛ, mam kʋ la lↄlsɩ, la dũnsi n nõbɛ, mãasʋm sɛla woo ze'ele, ba wa'am kibsa la.'
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka wi ba, tɩ ba zagsɛ, dee sẽŋɛ ba sẽnnɛ. Tɩ ayɩla sẽŋɛ a va'am, tɩ ayẽma sẽŋɛ a koosgo zẽ'am.
Tɩ basɛba la yõgɛ tõntõnɩba la nãmsɛ ba dee kʋ ba.
Tɩ naba la sũure yı̃ige, tɩ a tõm a zɛbzɛbrɩba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka kʋ nẽr-kʋʋrba la, dee yõ ba tẽŋa la.
La a yele a tõntõnɩba la yetɩ: 'Kibsa la sɛla woo mãasʋm ba'asɛ mɛ, la mam n daan wi sɛba la ka masɛ tɩ ba di kibsa la.
Bɛla, sẽŋɛ-ya sorↄ-puursi zuto ka wi nẽr-sɛba wuu tɩ ya wʋn yẽ tɩ ba wa'am pↄgdire kibsa la zẽ'am.'
Tɩ tõntõnɩba la sẽŋɛ sorↄ-puursi zuto ka wi nẽr-sɛba wuu tɩ ba yẽ, nẽr-sõma la nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ. Tɩ nẽrba wa'am wa pɩrɛ kibsa la zẽ'am.
Tɩ naba la sẽŋɛ tɩ a bɩsɛ nẽrba la, yẽ tɩ nẽra n boe mı̃ ka yɛ pↄgdire kibsa la fuugo.
Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M sɩrɛ, la ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ fõn wa'am kibsa la, dee ka yɛ a fuugo?' Tɩ a ka yãŋɛ lerge se'ere.
Tɩ naba la yele a tõntõnɩba yetɩ, ba lʋ a nu'usi, la a nãma lobe ẽ basɛ yẽŋa lika pʋam. Bilam tɩ nẽrba wʋn ka kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.
La de la nẽrba pãɩ tɩ ba wi, la fẽe tɩ ba tũ'use."
Tɩ Farisi dõma sẽŋɛ ka bãm bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em botɩ Azezi tↄgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yẽ sore yõkɛ ẽ.

Bɛla tɩ ba daan tõm ba karẽnbiisi, la naba A'erↄdɩ nẽrba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ fõn de la sɩra dãana, dee zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ sore yɛla la sɩra. Fõn ka fablɩ nẽrba n tↄgrɩ fõn yelle se'em na, la fõn ka tũ'usri nẽrba.
Yele to fõn tẽ'esrɩ se'em. Sore boe tɩ tɩ yↄ lampo bↄ Rom na-keko bɩɩ, sore ka boe?"
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ba pʋtẽ'e-be'ero la, yele ba yetɩ: "Pʋlibsum dõma wã, bẽm tɩ ya bẽta mam?
Pa'alɛ-ya ma lag-sɛka tɩ ba tarɩ yↄↄra lampo la." Tɩ ba dɩkɛ lag-kõbrɛ pa'alɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne yinyisŋa, la ãne yʋ'ʋrɛ n gʋlsɛ a zuo?"
Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "La de la Rom na-keko la." Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "La sãn dɛna bɛla, bↄ-ya na-keko la ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka, dee bↄ Nawẽnnɛ ẽn soe bõn-sɛka."
Ban wõm bɛla la, tɩ la di'ige ba, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
Daar-ẽŋa tɩ Saduse dõma n yetɩ nẽra sãn ki a kãn vo'oge la, bãma nẽrba basɛba n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ:
"Karẽnsãama, Amoyisi daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ, bʋraaga sãn ki dee ka tara bia, a sↄbia di pↄkõorɛ la dↄgɛ kↄma bↄ sɛka n ki la.
Bʋraasɩ bayopↄɩ n daan boe tõma pʋam dɛna sↄbiisi, tɩ pↄspↄsɩ dãana la di pↄka ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia.
Tɩ bʋyi dãana la di pↄkõorɛ la mẽ ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia. Tɩ bʋtã dãana la mẽ ẽŋɛ bɛla, la bãma bayopↄɩ la wuu ẽŋɛ la bɛla.
Tɩ pↄka la mẽ yãŋa ki.
Bɛla, ba sãn wa vo'oge kũm vo'ore daarɛ, bãma bayopↄɩ la pʋam, ãne n wʋn sↄna pↄka la, bãma wuu n lagɩm di ẽ na?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Ya tuuge mɛ, yãma n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yele se'em võorɛ, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa n ãn se'em na ı̃yã.
Kũm vo'ore daarɛ, bʋraasɩ ka diti pↄgsɩ, la pↄgsɩ mẽ ka ellɩ sɩrba. Ba wʋn ãna wʋ malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire la.
La sãn dɛna kũm vo'ore yelle, yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ n yele ya a gõŋↄ la pʋam se'em yetɩ:
'Mam de la Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ Nawẽnnɛ' na? La pa'alɛ tɩ bãma wuu vↄa mɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am. Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ dagɩ sɛba n ki Nawẽnnɛ, a de la nẽr-sɛba n vↄa Nawẽnnɛ."
Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n daan wõm a zãsŋↄ la, la di'ige ba mɛ.
Farisi dõma n daan wõm tɩ Azezi lerge Saduse dõma, tɩ ba ka le tã'agɛ ya'agɛ nõorɛ la, tɩ ba lagsɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ ba nẽra ayɩla n de lↄↄ karẽnsãama bↄↄra tɩ a di a yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ:
"Karẽnsãama, Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em na, bõn-kãna n gãnnɩ wuu?"
Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: " 'Nõŋɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu.'
Ẽna n de Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ la pↄspↄsɩ dãana, ẽŋa n gãnnɩ wuu.
La bʋyi dãana n ãn wʋ ẽŋa n wãna n yetɩ: 'Nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na.'
Amoyisi lↄↄ la wuu, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n gʋlsɛ sɛla la wuu boe la nõ-bãma bayi pʋam."
Farisi dõma n lagsɛ taaba la, tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ:
"Yãma tẽ'esrɩ la bẽm la Krisi yelle: Ãne yɩɩŋa n de ẽ?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "A de la naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa."
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "La ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa daan botɩ Adavidi wi ẽ tɩ Zuudãana yetɩ:
'Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele mam Zuudãana yetɩ, zı̃'ire m zʋʋgↄ bↄba halɩ tɩ m wa ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛ'ɛba tɩ ba bↄna fʋ nãma tẽŋa.'
Adavidi sãn wi ẽ yetɩ, Zuudãana, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ a dɛna Adavidi yɩɩŋa?"
Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka yãŋɛ lerge ẽ se'ere. Lan pↄsɛ daar-ẽŋa, nẽra ka le saagɛ soke ẽ sokre.
Tɩ Azezi yele nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ, la a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ:
"Lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma n sↄↄgɛ Amoyisi zẽ'a.
Bɛla, ban zãsnɩ ya se'em na, ya ɩta bɛla, dee da ɩta bãma n ɩtɩ se'em na. Se'ere n soe la, bãma n zãsnɩ se'em na, ba ka ɩtɩ bɛla.
Ba zãsŋↄ la ãn wʋ ze-tɩbsa tɩ ba lʋ zelge nẽrba, la ba mẽŋa ka boorɩ tɩ ba kalʋm ba la ba nu'ubiire.
Ba tõnnɩ ba tõoma la wuu tɩ nẽrba n bɩsra ba, bɛla tɩ ba dɩkɛ gãna gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga ba pʋam dɩkɛ lʋ ba dı̃a bɩɩ ba kẽnkãnsɩ. Dee pɛ fu-wogro ẽŋɛ bisa tɩ ba wↄgɛ tɩ nẽrba nã'asra ba.
Ba nõŋɛ la nã'asgↄ zẽ'esɩ dia zẽ'esʋm, la ba wẽndeto pʋam.
Ba nõŋɛ tɩ nẽrba n pʋ'ʋsra ba da'asɩ pʋam, dee bↄↄra tɩ ba wi'ira ba yetɩ: 'Karẽnsãama.'
La yãma da basɛ tɩ ba wi'ira ya tɩ karẽnsãama. Se'ere n soe la, yãma tarɩ la karẽnsãama ayɩla mã'a, la ya wuu de la sↄbiisi la taaba.
Da wi'ira-ya nẽra tɩ sↄ dũnia wã zuo Nawẽnnɛ sore la doosgo ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, ya tarɩ la Sↄ ayɩla mã'a n boe saazuum.
La ya da basɛ tɩ nẽra wi'ira ya tɩ nẽŋadãana. Se'ere n soe la, ya tarɩ la nẽŋadãana ayɩla mã'a n de Krisi.
Sɛka n de nẽr-keko ya pʋam, a dɛna ya tõntõnna.
Sɛka n zẽkɛ a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sike ẽ. La sɛka n sike a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zẽkɛ ẽ.

Yãma Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma gu'uri la nẽrba tɩ ba da kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam. Ya ka kẽ'erɩ ya mẽŋa, dee mẽ ka basra nẽr-sɛba n boorɩ tɩ ba kẽ la sore tɩ ba kẽ. ((

Yãma Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya to'osrɩ la pↄkõpa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ pʋ'ʋs-wogro tɩ nẽrba bɩsra ya. Ya wʋn yẽ sɩbgrɛ gãnna wuu.))

Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya kaarɩ la dũnia zẽ'esɩ wuu ɛɛra tɩ ya yẽ nẽra ayɩla tɩ a sakɛ dↄla ya sore la. La ya sãn yẽ nẽra ayɩla, ya basɛ tɩ a lebge la tõon-be'ero dãana gãnna ya mẽŋa nõorɛ ayi, wʋn sẽŋɛ bug-tẽŋa.

Yãma sɛba n de nẽŋadõma de la fↄↄsɩ, ya wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, yãma yetɩ, nẽra sãn pↄɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la, la de la zãŋa. La sɛka sãn pↄɩ sãlma la n boe Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam na, dẽnɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ ẽn pↄɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em na.
Yãma ka wõnnɩ sɛla võorɛ, dee ãna wʋ fↄↄsɩ la. Bẽm n gãnnɩ? Sãlma la bɩɩ, Wẽnde-kãtɛ la n botɩ sãlma la dɛna Nawẽnnɛ tʋʋlʋm bõnↄ na n gãnnɩ?
Ya ken yetɩ, nẽra sãn pↄɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne na, la de la zãŋa. La nẽra sãn pↄɩ sɛla tɩ ba dɩkɛ kãabɛ bı̃ŋe bı̃mbı̃nne na zuo la, dẽnɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ ẽn pↄɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em na.
Fↄↄsɩ, bẽm n gãnnɩ? Sɛla tɩ ba dɩkɛ kãabɛ la bɩɩ, kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne na n botɩ sɛla tɩ ba dɩkɛ kãabɛ la dɛna Nawẽnnɛ tʋʋlʋm bõnↄ na n gãnnɩ?
Bɛla, sɛka n pↄɩ kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne na, a po pↄɩ la sɛla n boe a zuo la wuu.
La sɛka n pↄɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la, a po pↄɩ la Nawẽnnɛ n boe mı̃ na.
La sɛka n pↄɩ Nawẽnnɛ yire, a pↄɩ la Nawẽnnɛ na'am bı̃mbı̃nne na, la sɛka n zı̃ a zuo la.

Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma bↄ'ↄrɩ Nawẽnnɛ zẽvõorↄ buuri wuu pia pʋrɛ mɛ, baa ba sãn ãna pɩka pɩka, dee basra yel-sɛba n de kãŋkãŋɛ lↄↄ la pʋam na, ka ɩta. La de la sɛla n masɛ, la ninbãal-zʋa, la sakrɛ. La de la bõn-bãna tɩ ya wʋn dẽŋɛ ɩta, dee yãŋa ɩta sɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ la pa'asɛ.
Yãma nẽŋadõma de la fↄↄsɩ, yãma yoorɩ ya bõn-yũula mɛ yɛsra lislima basra, dee vↄlla yʋgma.
Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Yãma peerɩ ya laasɩ, la ya wama pↄa mɛ tɩ ba ãna sõŋa, dee tɩ ba pʋam pɩrɛ la nayigum, la be'ero bõnↄ.
Yãma Farisi dõma, ya de la fↄↄsɩ! Peege-ya ya laasɩ la pʋam pↄspↄsɩ, tɩ ba poore la mẽ wʋn ãna sõŋa.
Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, yãma ãn wʋ yↄↄrↄ tɩ ba takɛ tɩ ba zuum pelge ãna sõŋa sõŋa, dee tɩ ba pʋam pɩrɛ la kõba, la põ'osgↄ wuu.
Yãma mẽ ãn na bɛla. Yãma botɩ nẽrba bɩsra ya tɩ ya ãna wʋ nẽrba n ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ, dee tɩ ya pʋam pɩrɛ la pʋlibsum, la tõon-be'ero.
Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Ya mẽtɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba yↄↄrↄ, dee malgra nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ yↄↄrↄ tɩ ba ãna sõŋa.
Dee yetɩ, yãma daan sãn boe nɩ yãma yaabdõma wakatɛ la, yãma daan kãn po lagɩm na ba kʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la.
Ya mẽŋa n bↄ'ↄrɩ ya mẽŋa kaseto tɩ yãma de la sɛba n yʋʋn kʋ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la yɩɩsɩ.
Tↄ. Ken sẽŋɛ-ya nẽŋa ẽŋɛ ya yaabdõma la n daan ẽŋɛ sɛla la ba'asɛ.
Bõnsɛ'ɛdõma wã! Kãmpẽesɩ buuri! Yãma wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne põsɛ sarɩyadia tɩ ba kãn kẽ'esɛ ya bug-tẽŋa?

Bɛla tɩ mam yɛta ya tɩ mam wʋn tõm m nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, la yɛm dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma. La ya wʋn kʋ sɛba, dee ka basɛba dↄ-puursi zuto kʋ, wẽ sɛba la ka'asa ya wẽndeto pʋam, dee dↄla ba nãma tẽŋa tẽŋa nãmsra ba.

Bɛla tɩ pʋpeelem dõma la wuu tɩ ba kʋ dũnia zuo la taalɛ wʋn bↄna ya zuto, lan pↄsɛ la Abɛlɩ kʋa halɩ wa paagɛ Abarakɩ dayʋa Azakari tɩ ya kʋ Wẽnde-kãtɛ zẽ'e-sõŋↄ, la kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne na tẽŋasʋka la.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna taalɛ wʋn bↄna zamãan-ẽna nẽrba wuu zuto."

Azezi daan yetɩ: "Zerizalɛm nẽrba, Zerizalɛm nẽrba, yãma kʋʋrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, dee lↄbra sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm ba ya zẽ'am na kuga kʋʋra. Nõorɛ faa tɩ mam boorɩ tɩ m lagsɛ ya wʋ nõ-yã'aŋa n lagsrɩ a kↄma ũna a kempagsɩ pʋam se'em na, tɩ ya ka bↄↄra.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ ya tẽŋa la tɩ a lebge la daboto.
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya kãn le malɩn yẽ mam, halɩ tɩ ya wʋn wa yetɩ: 'Pẽgɛ-ya sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.' "
Azezi daan ze'ele la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam yese fõrgra. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lɛm ẽ pa'alɛ ẽ tɩ a bɩsɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la n mẽ sõŋa se'em.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma yẽ bõn-bãna wã wuu? Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ba wʋn lʋbɛ ba wuu mɛ saam saam, tɩ kugre baa ayɩla kãn weege a tadãana zuo."

La a daan sẽŋɛ ka zẽa la Oliivi tãŋa zuo, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la mã'a sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Yele to wakat-sɛka tɩ bõn-bãma wuu wʋn ẽŋɛ, la sɛla n wʋn pa'alɛ fõn lemŋo, la dũnia ba'asgↄ wakatɛ."
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse ya mẽŋa tɩ nẽra da pã'asɛ ya tɩ ya tuuge.
Nẽrba zozo'e n wʋn dɩkɛ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ wa'am wa pã'asra ya, tɩ ba nẽra woo yetɩ: 'Mam n de Krisi la.' La ba wʋn botɩ nẽrba zozo'e tuuge mɛ.
Ya wʋn wa wõm zɛbrɛ yelle, la zɛbrɛ dãmnɛ. La da basɛ-ya tɩ dabeem tarɩ ya. Dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-bãma ẽŋɛ, la, la nãn dagɩ dũnia ba'asgↄ.
Buuri ayɩla nẽrba wʋn isge zɛbra la buuri ayẽma nẽrba, tɩ so'olʋm ayɩla isge zɛbra la so'olʋm ayẽma, la kↄm, la tẽn-mı̃iŋo wʋn bↄna zẽ'esɩ zozo'e.
La bõn-bãma nãn de la toogo la sẽŋrɛ, la ãn wʋ pↄka virgre toogo n nãn sẽŋrɩ la.
Ba wʋn yõgɛ ya mɛ tarɩ ka bↄ tɩ ba nãmsɛ ya, kʋ ya, la buuri wuu wʋn sisra ya mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã.
Nẽrba zozo'e wʋn basɛ sɩra sore, dee ɩta taaba zãmↄ, dee sisra taaba.
La nẽrba zozo'e wʋn isge parɩm yetɩ bãma de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba pã'asɛ nẽrba zozo'e tɩ ba tuuge.
Tõon-be'ero wʋn wa pa'asɛ mɛ halɩ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e nõŋrɛ ba'asɛ.
La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn mõrgɛ ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ ka paagɛ ba'asgↄ wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.
Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga wʋn mõolɛ dũnia wuu mɛ, tɩ buuri wuu wõm, dee tɩ dũnia ba'asgↄ yãŋa paagɛ.
Ya wʋn wa yẽ sɛka n de bõn-be'ego n sã'anɩ sɛla woo la, sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Adanɩyɛlɩ yʋʋn tↄgɛ a yelle la, tɩ a boe Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la." Sɛka n karẽŋrɩ mõrgɛ wõm a võorɛ.
"Ya sãn wa yẽ bɛla, nẽr-sɛba n boe Zude zoe zom tãnsɩ zuto.
La nẽr-sɛka n boe gↄsgↄ da sige bↄↄra tɩ a kẽ deem dɩkɛ sɛla.
La nẽr-sɛka n boe va'am da kãn lebe kule yire tɩ a dɩkɛ a fuugo.
Dabs-bãma, la wʋn dɛna la toogo bↄ pↄg-sɛba n tarɩ pʋa, la sɛba n tarɩ kↄma tɩ ba mõgra la.
Sose-ya Nawẽnnɛ tɩ ya zʋa la wakatɛ da dɛna ↄↄrↄ wakatɛ, bɩɩ vo'osgo daarɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, wakat-ẽŋa, la wʋn dɛna la toogo halɩ zozo'e tɩ ba nãn ka yẽ halɩ dũnia n pı̃'ilum wa paam wakat-ẽŋa, la toog-ẽŋa buuri kãn le malɩn wa'am.
Nawẽnnɛ sãn ka bo'oge nɩ dabs-bãma sõorɛ, nẽra nẽra ka boe n wʋn põsɛ. La nẽr-sɛba tɩ a looge la ı̃yã tɩ a bo'oge dabs-bãma sõorɛ.
La nẽr-sɛka sãn yele ya yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, Krisi la boe la kalam', bɩɩ 'bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke', ya da sakɛ.

Nẽrba wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Krisi, la nẽrba wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba tõnna tõon-yãlma, la yel-kɩrsɩ, bↄↄra tɩ ba sãn tã'agɛ, ba botɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la tuuge.
Mam dẽŋɛ yele ya mɛ tɩ la nãn ka paam.
Bɛla, ba sãn yele ya yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la weem', da sẽŋɛ-ya. Bɩɩ, ba sãn yetɩ: 'A boe la deem', ya da sakɛ.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo wʋn ãna wʋ saaga n ẽn yãkɛ dapoore bↄba nẽegɛ ka paagɛ zanõa bↄba la.
Bõn-kɩ'ɩsɩ n boe zẽ'e-sɛka la, zõa lagsrɩ taaba la bilam."
"Toogo dabsa la poorʋm, wẽntulle wʋn sobge mɛ, tɩ wõrga kãn le nẽera a peelem, tɩ wõrbiɛ wʋn ze'ele saazuum lui. La bõn-sɛba n boe saazuum wʋn mı̃im mɛ.

La sɛla n pa'alɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo la wʋn puke saazuum. Tɩ dũnia nẽrba buuri wuu wʋn kaasra fabla. La ba wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n boe sawara pʋam sẽna la pãŋa, tɩ a na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ zozo'e.
La a wʋn tõm na a malɛkadõma, tɩ benkonne peebe, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ dũnia zʋʋgↄ, la gↄbga, la dapoore, la zanõrɛ ka lagsɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la, halɩ ka paagɛ dũnia tɛka wuu.
Dɩkɛ-ya makrɛ la kẽnkãŋa bãŋɛ zãsŋↄ la võorɛ. Kẽnkãŋa wila sãn wa pusra võ-paala, ya mi tɩ sigre lɛm mɛ.
Bɛla, ya mẽ sãn wa yẽ tɩ bõn-bãna wuu ɩtɩ, ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lɛm mɛ, a boe la zanõrʋm.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna wuu wʋn ɩta mɛ, dee tɩ zamãan-ẽna yãŋa tole.
Saazuum la tẽŋa wʋn tole mɛ, la mam yetↄga la kãn malɩn tole.
Nẽra nẽra ka mi daar-sɛka la wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am, baa malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire, bɩɩ Dayʋa la mẽŋa ka mi, sãn dagna Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo, la wʋn ãna wʋ Anoe wakatɛ n yʋʋn ãn se'em na.

Se'ere n soe la, lan dẽŋɛ sã'aŋↄ sa-kãtɛ la, nẽrba yʋʋn diti mɛ dee yũura, tɩ bʋraasɩ dita pↄgsɩ, tɩ pↄgsɩ ɛlla sɩrba, dee tara ba pↄyↄↄsɩ sɩɩra, halɩ wa paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ Anoe kẽ õorŋ-kãtɛ la pʋam na.
Ba yʋʋn ka bãŋɛ tɩ yelle boe, halɩ tɩ saaga wa ni, tɩ ko'om pe'ege nẽrba la wuu. La mẽ wʋn ãna la bɛla Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo wakatɛ.
Daar-ẽŋa bʋraasɩ bayi wʋn bↄna va'am, tɩ ba dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
Tɩ pↄgsɩ bayi wʋn bↄna nẽerʋm, tɩ ba dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
Bɛla, guuse ya mẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi daar-sɛka tɩ ya Zuudãana la wʋn leme wa'am.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ yidãana sãn mina nayiga n wʋn wa'am yʋ'ʋŋↄ wakat-sɛka wa zũ ẽ, a wʋn gu'ura a yire mɛ, a kãn basɛ tɩ nayiga la kẽ zũ ẽ.
Bɛla, mãasʋm-ya gu'ura, tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽm na wakat-sɛka tɩ ya ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am na."
Azezi le yetɩ: "Ãne n de tõntõn-sõŋↄ n tarɩ yɛm? La de la ẽŋa tɩ a zuudãana wʋn yetɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle, bↄ'ↄra a tõntõnɩba dia wʋ lan masɛ, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
Zuudãana la sãn leme wa yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tõm wʋ ẽŋa n yele ẽ se'em na, tõntõnna la tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ a zuudãana la wʋn dɩkɛ ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu bↄ ẽ mɛ tɩ a bɩsra.
La a sãn dɛna tõntõn-be'ego, tẽ'esɛ yetɩ ẽŋa zuudãana la yuuri mɛ ka kulna,
yãŋa wẽ'era a tõntõn-taaba la, dita dee yũura la dã-yũuriba,
a zuudãana la wʋn kulum na daar-sɛka tɩ a ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am, la wakat-sɛka tɩ a ka mi, wa di'ige ẽ.
La a wʋn dige ẽ mɛ botɩ a lagɩm na pʋlibsum dõma yẽ sɩbgrɛ. Zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba wʋn kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm."
Azezi ken yetɩ: "Wakat-ẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm wʋn ãna wʋ pug-sarsɩ pia n dɩkɛ ba fɩtladõma yese sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka tʋ'ʋsɛ pↄgdita.
Banuu ka tarɩ yɛm, dee tɩ banuu dɛna yɛm dõma.
Tɩ sɛba n ka tarɩ yɛm na dɩkɛ ba fɩtladõma, dee ka dɩkɛ kaam pa'asɛ.
La sɛba n tarɩ yɛm na dɩkɛ ba fɩtladõma mɛ, dee dɩkɛ kaam pa'asɛ.
Tɩ pↄgdita la yuuge ka sẽna, tɩ gẽem yõkɛ ba, tɩ ba wuu gı̃se.
Tɩ sõnsʋa, tɩ ba kaasɛ tagurga yetɩ: 'Pↄgdita la sẽm mɛ, isge-ya yese tʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.'
Tɩ pug-sarsɩ la wuu nẽegɛ malgɛ ba fɩtladõma.
Tɩ sɛba n ka tarɩ yɛm na, yele yɛm dõma la yetɩ: 'Pʋrgɛ-ya ya kaam na bↄ tↄ, tɩ tõma fɩtladõma la kı̃ŋri mɛ.'
Tɩ yɛm dõma la lerge yetɩ: 'Ayɛɩ, tõma sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, kaam na kãn seke tõma, la yãma. Sẽŋɛ-ya ka-kↄↄsrɩba la zẽ'am ka da ya mẽŋa bõnↄ.'
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka da, dee tɩ pↄgdita la paam, tɩ banuu la n mãasʋm kɩ'ɩlɩm na doose pↄgdita la kẽ pↄgdire la zẽ'am, dee tɩ ba yʋ zanõrɛ.
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ pug-sarsɩ banuu la n weege la wa'am wa wi'ira yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, zuudãana, yo'oge bↄ tↄ.'
Tɩ pↄgdita la lerge yetɩ: 'Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ mam ka mi ya.'
Bɛla, guuse ya mẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi daar-sɛka bɩɩ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am."
"Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ken ãna wʋ bʋraaga n boorɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ sore, wi a tõntõnɩba dɩkɛ a bõntarsõm pʋɩ ba tɩ ba bɩsra.
A bↄ tõntõnna ayɩla la talã banuu, bↄ ayɩla talã bayi, dee bↄ ayɩla talã ayɩla. A bↄ nẽra woo masɛ la ẽn wʋn tã'agɛ se'em tõm, dee sẽŋɛ.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛka n to'oge talã banuu la darɛ tõm yẽ yõorↄ talã banuu pa'asɛ.
Tɩ sɛka n to'oge talã bayi la mẽ tõm yẽ talã bayi pa'asɛ.
La sɛka n to'oge talã ayɩla la sẽŋɛ ka tũ la boko pı̃ a zuudãana ligri la.
Tɩ la yuuge, tɩ tõntõnɩba la zuudãana la leme kulum, wa yele ba tɩ ba geele bãma n tõm se'em.
Tɩ sɛka n daan to'oge talã banuu la, tarɩ talã banuu la tɩ a yẽ pa'asɛ la wa'am wa yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, fõn daan bↄ mam na talã banuu, mam tõm yẽ la talã banuu pa'asɛ, ban wãna.'

Tɩ a zuudãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'La ãn sõŋa. Fʋ de la tõntõn-sõŋↄ n de sɩra dãana. Fõn ẽŋɛ sɩra la sɛla fẽe tɩ mam bↄ fʋ la ı̃yã, mam wʋn basɛ tɩ fʋ sↄna bõnↄ zozo'e bɩsra. Wa'am wa naagɛ la mam ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.'
Tɩ sɛka n to'oge talã bayi la mẽ wa'am wa yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, fõn daan bↄ mam na talã bayi, mam tõm yẽ la talã bayi pa'asɛ, ban wãna.'

Tɩ a zuudãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'La ãn sõŋa. Fʋ de la tõntõn-sõŋↄ n de sɩra dãana. Fõn ẽŋɛ sɩra la sɛla fẽe tɩ mam bↄ fʋ la ı̃yã, mam wʋn basɛ tɩ fʋ sↄna bõnↄ zozo'e bɩsra. Wa'am wa naagɛ la mam ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.'
Tɩ sɛka n to'oge talã ayɩla la wa'am wa yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, mam mi tɩ fõn de la nẽra yelle n tↄɩ. Fõn lagsrɩ la bõnkↄↄla sɛba tɩ fõn ka bʋrɛ, dee vaara bõn-sɛba tɩ fõn ka yɛrgɛ.
Bɛla tɩ mam zoe dabeem dɩkɛ fʋ ligri la sẽŋɛ ka tũ boko pı̃. Fʋ bõnↄ n wãna, to'oge.'
Tɩ a zuudãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Tõntõn-be'ego wã, fʋ de la zẽyãka. Fõn mi tɩ mam lagsrɩ la bõnkↄↄla sɛba tɩ mam ka bʋrɛ, dee vaara bõn-sɛba tɩ mam ka yɛrgɛ la,
bɛla, la de nɩ na fʋ dɩkɛ m ligri la bı̃ŋe bãnkɩ pʋam, tɩ mam sãn leme wa'am, m to'oge m ligri la, la yõorↄ.'
A yele bɛla dee yetɩ: 'To'oge-ya a talã la bↄ sɛka n tarɩ talã pia la.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka n tarɩ, a wʋn to'oge pa'asɛ tɩ la zo'oge. La sɛka n ka tarɩ, baa sɛla fẽe tɩ a tarɩ la, ba wʋn to'oge ẽ.
La tõntõn-sɛka n ka tarɩ yõorↄ la, lobe-ya ẽ basɛ yẽŋa lika pʋam. Zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba wʋn kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.' "
"Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sãn leme wa'am la a na'am pãŋa, la a malɛkadõma wuu, a wʋn zı̃'ire la a na'am bı̃mbı̃nne zuo.
Tɩ dũnia so'olʋm wuu nẽrba wʋn lagsɛ a nẽŋam, tɩ a welge nẽrba la yẽma yẽma wʋ dũnsı̃ina n welgrɩ a piisi, la a bʋʋsɩ se'em na.
La a wʋn ze'ele piisi la a zʋʋgↄ bↄba, dee ze'ele bʋʋsɩ a gↄbga bↄba.

Tɩ naba la wʋn yele sɛba n boe a zʋʋgↄ la yetɩ: 'Wa'am-ya, yãma sɛba n tarɩ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ na. To'oge-ya so'olʋm na tɩ Nawẽnnɛ daan põn mãasʋm tɩ a bↄ ya halɩ lan dẽŋɛ dũnia pı̃'iluŋo la.
Se'ere n soe la, mam kↄm daan dõnnɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma bↄ mam dia. Koyũuro daan tarɩ mam mɛ, tɩ yãma bↄ mam ko'om tɩ mam yũ. Mam daan de la sãana, tɩ yãma to'oge mam.
Mam daan de la beele, tɩ yãma bↄ mam futo tɩ mam yɛ. Mam daan bẽ'erɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma wa'am wa bɩsɛ mam, la mam daan boe la yʋ'a deem, tɩ yãma wa'am mam zẽ'am.'
La nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ la wʋn lerge yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, la de la wakat-kãna tɩ tõma yẽ fõn, tɩ fõn kↄm dõnnɩ, tɩ tõma bↄ fõn dia? Bɩɩ koyũuro tarɩ fõn, tɩ tõma bↄ fõn ko'om?
La wakat-kãna tɩ tõma yẽ fõn, tɩ fõn dɛna sãana, tɩ tõma to'oge fõn? Bɩɩ fõn de beele, tɩ tõma bↄ fõn futo tɩ fõn yɛ?
La wakat-kãna tɩ fõn bẽ'erɩ, tɩ tõma wa'am wa bɩsɛ fõn, bɩɩ fõn boe yʋ'a deem, tɩ tõma wa'am fõn zẽ'am?'
Tɩ naba la wʋn lerge ba yetɩ: 'Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ yãma n daan ẽŋɛ sɛla wuu bↄ mam nẽrba la, baa la sãn dɛna la nẽr-pɩka ayɩla tɩ ya ẽŋɛ bↄ, la de la mam tɩ ya bↄ.'

La a wʋn yele sɛba n boe a gↄbga bↄba la yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ-ya fõrgɛ, Nawẽnnɛ kã'a-be'ego boe ya zuo. Sẽŋɛ-ya ka kẽ bugum n ka kı̃ŋri tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mãasʋm tɩ a kẽ'esɛ Asũtãana, la a malɛkadõma la pʋam.
Se'ere n soe la, mam kↄm daan dõnnɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma ka bↄ mam dia. Tɩ koyũuro daan tara mam, tɩ yãma ka bↄ mam ko'om tɩ mam yũ.

Mam daan de la sãana, tɩ yãma ka to'oge mam. Mam daan de la beele, tɩ yãma ka bↄ mam futo tɩ mam yɛ. Mam daan bẽ'erɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma ka wa'am wa bɩsɛ mam. Mam daan boe la yʋ'a deem, tɩ yãma ka wa'am mam zẽ'am.'

La ba wʋn lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, la de la wakat-kãna tɩ tõma daan yẽ fõn, tɩ fõn kↄm dõnnɩ, bɩɩ koyũuro tarɩ fõn, bɩɩ fõn de sãana, bɩɩ beele, bɩɩ fõn bẽ'erɩ, bɩɩ fõn boe yʋ'a deem, dee tɩ tõma ka sõŋɛ fõn?'
Tɩ a wʋn lerge ba yetɩ: 'Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ yãma n daan ka ɩtɩ bɛla bↄ'ↄra mam nẽrba la, baa la sãn dɛna la nẽr-pɩka ayɩla tɩ ya ka ẽŋɛ bↄ ẽ, la de la mam tɩ ya ka ẽŋɛ bↄ.'
La bãma wʋn sẽŋɛ ka kẽ nãmsgↄ n ka ba'asrɩ pʋam. La sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ la wʋn yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ."
Azezi n daan tↄgɛ yetↄg-bãma wuu kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ:
"Yãma mi tɩ la deege la dabsa ayi tɩ Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa paagɛ, tɩ ba wʋn yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka bↄ tɩ ba ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ."
Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma daan sẽŋɛ ka lagsɛ la taaba Akayifu yire. Akayifu daan de la Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la nẽŋadãana.
Ba daan tↄgɛ la taaba kʋ yetɩ, ba ẽŋɛ yɛm yõkɛ Azezi kʋ.
La ba yetɩ: "Tɩ da kãn ẽŋɛ-ya bɛla kibsa la pʋam, tɩ nẽrba la wʋn gire mɛ."
Azezi daan boe la Betani tẽŋa, Asimõ n wa dɛna kõnkonne na yire.
Tɩ ba daan bↄna mı̃ dita, tɩ pↄka tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ ka-sõma ligri n zo'oge, wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa ka'agɛ kaam na ẽŋɛ Azezi zuugo.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yẽ bɛla, tɩ ba sũure sã'am. Tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ a sã'am kaam na wãna?
Ba tã nɩ wʋn koose kaam wã ligri zo'oge mɛ, dɩkɛ bↄ nasdõma."
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ba tẽ'esgↄ la, yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm ẽŋɛ tɩ ya tↄgra pↄka la tɩ a sũure sã'am? Ẽn ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ mam na de la tõon-sõŋↄ.
Nasdõma boe la ya lɛ mɛ wakatɛ wuu, la mam kãn bↄna la ya wakatɛ wuu.
Ẽŋa n ka'agɛ kaam na ẽŋɛ mam zuo la, a ẽŋɛ la ba wʋn ẽŋɛ mam se'em mam laarɛ daarɛ.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ dũnia wã zẽ'e-sɛka wuu tɩ ba wʋn mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la, ba mẽ wʋn tↄgɛ pↄka wã n ẽŋɛ mam se'em wã, tɩ ba tẽra a yelle."
Tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azudaasɩ Iskariyo, daan sẽŋɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma zẽ'am
ka yele ba yetɩ: "Ya wʋn bↄ mam na bẽm, tɩ m pa'alɛ ya sore tɩ ya yõkɛ Azezi?" Tɩ ba bↄ ẽ lig-kõba pitã.
La pↄsɛ la wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a ɛɛra sore tɩ a pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi.
Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa la pↄspↄsɩ daarɛ, tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ la bɛ ka mãasʋm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la tɩ fʋ di?"
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽŋa la pʋam Abõnↄ yire ka yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Karẽnsãama la yetɩ, ẽŋa wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ, la de la fõn yire tɩ ẽŋa wʋn di Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la, la a karẽnbiisi.' "
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la ẽŋɛ Azezi n yele ba se'em na, mãasʋm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la sẽŋɛ yire la pʋam ka zẽa dita.
Ban daan dita la, tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ ya nẽra ayɩla n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la sũure sã'am halɩ, tɩ ba sↄkra ẽ ayɩla ayɩla yetɩ: "Zuudãana, la de la mam bɩɩ?"
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Sɛka n wʋn yɛglɛ la mam tũm a nu'ugo laaga pʋam na, la de la ẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn ki wʋ la yʋʋn põn gʋlsɛ a yelle se'em Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam na. La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn yẽ toogo. Nẽr-ẽŋa ma daan sãn ka dↄgɛ nɩ ẽ n sõɩ."
Tɩ Azudaasɩ n de nẽr-sɛka n daan wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, la de la mam bɩɩ?" Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yele la bɛla."
Ban daan boe mı̃ dita la, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "To'oge-ya di. Ẽna de la mam ı̃yã."
Dee dɩkɛ bõn-yũula pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee bↄ ba yetɩ: "To'oge-ya ya wuu yũ.
Bãna wã de la mam zɩɩm n wʋn yese saagɛ nẽrba zozo'e ı̃yã, pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bı̃ŋe nõorɛ la ba tɩ a basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ, mam kãn le yũ viinye biɛ bõn-yũula wã, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn le naagɛ la ya yũ ba mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
Tɩ ba daan yõom yõoma pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee yese wɛ'ɛsa Oliivi tãŋam.
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Yãma wuu wʋn lebe la poorʋm dee basɛ mam zı̃na yʋ'ʋŋↄ, se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn kʋ dũnsı̃ina, dee tɩ piisi la wɩrgɛ.' "
La Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "La mam sãn wa vo'oge, mam wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa sẽŋɛ Galile."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele yetɩ: "Baa bãna wuu sãn lebe poorʋm dee basɛ fõn, mam kãn malɩn basɛ fõn."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ zı̃na yʋ'ʋŋↄ wã, lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rↄↄgↄ n wʋn kaasɛ, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele yetɩ: "Baa la sãn dɛna tɩ mam lagɩm na fõn ki, mam kãn malɩn sɩ'ɩsɛ fõn." Tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la wuu lagɩm yele bɛla.
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Getsemane, tɩ a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Zı̃'ire-ya kalam, dee tɩ m sẽŋɛ nẽŋa ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ."
La Azezi tarɩ la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azebede dayↄↄsɩ bayi la sẽŋɛ. Tɩ a sũure sã'am halɩ zozo'e, tɩ a palẽŋa ẽgra.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Sũ-sã'aŋↄ n tarɩ mam zozo'e tɩ la ãna wʋ mam yetɩ m ki mɛ na. Weege-ya kalam gu'ura mam, da gı̃se-ya."
La a sẽŋɛ la nẽŋa fẽe ka võglɛ a nẽŋa tẽŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "M Sↄ, la sãn tãna, fʋ basɛ tɩ nãmsgↄ ẽna tole dee basɛ ma. La, la da kãn dɛna mam n boorɩ se'em, la dɛna fõn boorɩ se'em."
La a lebe a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am ka yẽ tɩ ba gı̃sri mɛ. Tɩ a soke Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Yãma ka tã'agɛ naagɛ la mam gu karf-ayɩla mã'a ka gı̃se?
Basɛ-ya gẽem dee pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui. Ya sɩa boorɩ mɛ, la ya ı̃yã la ka tarɩ pãŋa."
La a daan le lebe mɛ ka pʋ'ʋsɛ yetɩ: "M Sↄ, nãmsgↄ wã sãn ka tãna wʋn tole dee basɛ mam, la sãn dɛna tɩ mam nãmsɛ, basɛ tɩ fõn boorɩ se'em ẽŋɛ."
La a le lebe a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am ka yẽ tɩ ba le gı̃sra mɛ, se'ere n soe la, gẽem n daan ba tara ba.
Tɩ a basɛ ba, dee le lebe nõorɛ atã pʋam ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tↄgɛ yetↄg-bãma mẽŋa.
Dee leme wa'am a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am wa soke ba yetɩ: "Ya gı̃sri mɛ dee vↄ'ↄsra? Wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ, tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ tõon-be'ero dõma nu'usum.
Isge-ya tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ. Sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam na n wãna n sẽm."

Azezi n daan ken tↄgra la, tɩ Azudaasɩ n de a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla doose la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e sẽŋɛ paam. Ba daan tarɩ la sʋkↄbrↄ la dↄa. La de la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma n daan tõm ba.
La Azudaasɩ n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na, põn pa'alɛ ba mɛ yetɩ: "Sɛka tɩ mam wʋn kↄkɛ ẽ na, la de la ẽŋa, yõkɛ-ya ẽ."
La ẽn paam na, a sẽŋɛ mɛ tↄtↄ lɛm Azezi, pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, zaanõorɛ", dee kↄkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "M sɩrɛ, ẽŋɛ fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ se'em na." Tɩ nẽrba la paagɛ yõkɛ Azezi.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan boe la Azezi la, nẽra ayɩla fooge a sʋkↄbgↄ sɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõnna tʋbrɛ fiige.
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Lebse sũm fʋ sʋ'a la a fʋʋgↄ pʋam, se'ere n soe la, sɛba n zɛbrɩ la sʋ'ʋsɩ, sʋ'ʋsɩ n wʋn kʋ ba.
Fõn ka mi tɩ mam tã wʋn sose m Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a tõm malɛkadõma n gãnnɩ tʋsa tʋsa pia la ayi?
La mam sãn ẽŋɛ nɩ bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yetɩ la wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em na, wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne ẽŋɛ?"

A tↄgɛ bɛla, dee soke nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Yãma sẽm na sʋkↄbrↄ, la dↄa tɩ ya yõkɛ mam wʋ mam de la fãara la? Mam daan boe la yãma mɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo zãsna nẽrba, tɩ yãma ka yõkɛ mam.
La bõn-bãna wuu ẽŋɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n yʋʋn yele se'em Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam na n ẽŋɛ." Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wuu zoe dee basɛ ẽ.
Sɛba n daan yõkɛ Azezi la, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana Akayifu yire. Bilam tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma daan lagsɛ.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan bↄna poorʋm zãazãarɛ dↄla ka paagɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire, kẽ naagɛ la tõntõnɩba zẽa tɩ a bɩsɛ yelle la n wʋn ba'asɛ se'em.
Kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la sarɩyaditba la wuu daan eerɩ la yelle tɩ ba parɩm bↄ Azezi botɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
La ba ka yẽ, baa la nẽrba zozo'e n parɩm põmpↄrŋↄ kaseto bↄ ẽ na. Tɩ nẽrba bayi yãŋa isge
yetɩ: "Bʋraa wã daan yetɩ, ẽŋa tã wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la, dee le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam."
Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la isge soke Azezi yetɩ: "Ban tↄgɛ fõn se'em na, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?"
Tɩ Azezi ka lerge se'ere. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pↄɩ la Nawẽnnɛ n de vↄm dãana la yʋ'ʋrɛ, fʋ sãn dɛna la Krisi, Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la, yele to."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La de la fõn yele se'em na. La mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la, tɩ a zı̃ Nawẽnnɛ n de pãŋa dãana la zʋʋgↄ bↄba, ya wʋn yẽ tɩ a boe sawara pʋam sẽna."
Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la ãasʋm a mẽŋa futo, dee yetɩ: "A tʋʋrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ. Tɩ ka le ɛɛra tɩ nẽra le bↄ kaseto. Ya wõm ẽn tʋʋrɩ Nawẽnnɛ se'em.
Yãma tẽ'esɛ la bẽm?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "A masɛ la kũm."
Tɩ ba tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mı̃ a nẽŋa, dee wẽ ẽ na kũnkũra. Tɩ basɛba wẽ a pɛgsɩ,
dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Krisi, bãŋɛ sɛka n wẽ fõn tↄgɛ pa'alɛ tↄ."
Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan zı̃ la yire la zẽnzakam, tɩ tõntõn-pↄka lɛm ẽ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn mẽ daan boe la Azezi n de Galile nẽra la lɛ."
Tɩ a sɩ'ɩsɛ ba wuu nẽŋam yetɩ: "Mam ka bãŋɛ fõn boorɩ tɩ fʋ yele se'em."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yese yaŋa nõorʋm, tɩ tõntõn-pↄka ayẽma yẽ ẽ, yele sɛba n boe mı̃ na yetɩ: "Ẽna mẽ daan boe la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ la lɛ."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le sɩ'ɩsɛ pↄɩ yetɩ: "Mam ka mi bʋraaga wã."
Tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ sɛba n ze mı̃ na, lɛm Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asɩra, fõn de la ba nẽra ayɩla, se'ere n soe la, fʋ yetↄga n pa'alɛ fõn ze'ele zẽ'a."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ pↄɩ yetɩ: "Mam ka mi bʋraaga wã, mam sãn parɩm mɛ, Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgɛ ma." Wakat-ẽŋa mẽŋa tɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ kaasɛ.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yãŋa tẽegɛ Azezi n daan yele ẽ yetɩ: "Lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rↄↄgↄ n wʋn kaasɛ, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam" na. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yese yẽŋa ka kɛlla la sũ-sã'aŋↄ zozo'e.
Beere n daan wiige bulika, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma la wuu lagsɛ tↄgɛ kʋ yetɩ ba kʋ Azezi.
Tɩ ba lʋ ẽ tarɩ sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ n de gↄmna zẽ'am ka bↄ ẽ.

Azudaasɩ n de sɛka n daan pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la, n yẽ tɩ ba tↄgɛ Azezi yelle kʋ yetɩ ba kʋ ẽ na, a sũure sã'am mɛ. Tɩ a tarɩ lig-kõba pitã la sẽŋɛ tɩ a ka lebse kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma la,
dee yetɩ: "Mam ẽŋɛ la be'em, mam n pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ sɛka n ka ẽŋɛ be'em tɩ ba kʋ ẽ na." Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "La ka pakɛ tõma. La de la fõn yelle."
Tɩ Azudaasɩ dɩkɛ ligri la lobge Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam, dee sẽŋɛ ka pire mı̃'isi ki.
Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma la dɩkɛ ligri la yetɩ: "Ba de la zɩɩm ligri, la ka masɛ tɩ tɩ dɩkɛ ba naagɛ la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la ligri."
Tɩ ba bãm, dɩkɛ ligri la da yagba va'am tɩ a dɛna sãama laarɛ zẽ'am.
Bɛla n soe tɩ ba ken wi'ira zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zɩɩm va'am, halɩ wa paam zı̃na.
La de la bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azeremi n yʋʋn gʋlsɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Ba dɩkɛ la lig-kõba pitã, lig-sɛba tɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma sakɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ da ẽ na,
ba dɩkɛ la bãma da yagba va'am wʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n yele mam se'em na."
Ban daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ gↄmna la zẽ'am na, tɩ a soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la Zifdõma naba?" Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La de la fõn yele se'em na."
La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma daan dõrɛ ẽ mɛ, tɩ a ka lerge se'ere.
Tɩ Apilatɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn ka wõm ban tↄgrɩ se'em wuu dõta fↄ?"
Tɩ Azezi ka lerge yetↄga la baa ayɩla, tɩ la di'ige gↄmna la halɩ zozo'e.
La Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa wakatɛ woo gↄmna la ẽn yese la nẽra ayɩla yʋ'a deem basɛ, nẽr-sɛka tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la boorɩ.
La wakat-ẽŋa bibɛ'a ayɩla n daan boe yʋ'a deem, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Abarabasɩ, tɩ nẽrba wuu mina a yelle.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n lagsɛ la, tɩ Apilatɩ soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne tɩ yãma boorɩ tɩ m yese basɛ bↄ ya, Abarabasɩ bɩɩ Azezi tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Krisi la?"
Apilatɩ daan mi tɩ la de la sũure ı̃yã tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi wa bↄ ẽŋa.

La Apilatɩ n daan zı̃ sarɩyadia zẽ'am na, tɩ a pↄga tõm tɩ ba wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Yese fʋ nu'ugo pʋpeelem dãana la yelle pʋam, se'ere n soe la, mam zãasʋm mɛ a yelle yʋ'ʋŋↄ, tɩ la nãmsɛ mam zozo'e."
La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma daan yele nẽrba la mɛ tɩ ba sose Apilatɩ tɩ a basɛ Abarabasɩ bↄ ba, dee kʋ Azezi.
Tɩ gↄmna la le soke ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-bãna bayi wã, yãma boorɩ tɩ m basɛ la ãne bↄ ya?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Abarabasɩ."
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Bɛla, yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ Azezi tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Krisi la, la wãne?" Tɩ ba wuu lerge yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo."
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "A ẽŋɛ la bẽm n de be'em?" Tɩ ba malɩn tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo."

La Apilatɩ n yẽ tɩ ẽŋa kãn yãŋɛ ẽŋɛ sɛla, dee tɩ nẽrba la gita pa'asra la, tɩ a dɩkɛ ko'om peege a nu'usi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu nẽŋam, dee yele yetɩ: "Mam nẽŋa ka boe ẽna wã kʋa pʋam. La de la yãma yelle."
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu lerge yetɩ: "A kʋa la taalɛ bↄna tõma la tɩ kↄma zuto."
Tɩ Apilatɩ basɛ Abarabasɩ bↄ ba, dee botɩ ba wẽ Azezi la ka'asa, dee dɩkɛ ẽ bↄ tɩ ba ka ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo.
Tɩ gↄmna la sʋdaasɩ tarɩ Azezi kẽ gↄmna la yire, tɩ sʋdaasɩ wuu lagsɛ kaagɛ ẽ.
Tɩ ba yɛɛsɛ Azezi futo, dee yɛ ẽ fuugo n de gomusga,
dɩkɛ gõ'osɩ wʋgɛ mũŋa vuge ẽ, dɩkɛ dasaarɛ zãntɛ a zʋʋgↄ nu'ugo, yãŋa ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam la'ara ẽ yetɩ: "Zifdõma naba, naa!"
La ba daan tʋbsrɩ la nõtõorʋm ɩta ẽ, dee tↄ'ↄsra dasaarɛ la wẽ'era a zuugo.
La ban la ẽ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, ba yɛɛgɛ gomusga fuugo la mɛ, dee dɩkɛ a mẽŋa fuugo la lebe yɛ ẽ, tara ẽ wɛ'ɛsa tɩ ba ka ka dↄ-puurŋa zuo.
Ban daan ze'ele tẽŋa pʋam yɛsra la, ba tʋ'ʋsɛ la bʋraaga ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n ze'ele Sirɛnɩ, tɩ ba pẽrgɛ ẽ tɩ a to'oge Azezi kũm dↄ-puurŋa la buke.
Tɩ ba paagɛ zẽ'a tɩ ba wi'iri a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Golgota, a võorɛ de la zuwaŋrɛ zẽ'a,
dɩkɛ dãam n gaam na tɩɩm n ãn toogo bↄ Azezi tɩ a yũ. Tɩ a leme ba, zagsɛ ka yũ.
Tɩ ba daan ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo, dee dɩkɛ a futo tɩ ba pʋɩ la taaba, pↄsɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽra woo n wʋn to'oge sɛka.
Dee yãŋa zẽa gu'ura ẽ.
Ba daan gʋlsɛ la gʋlsgↄ pa'alɛ se'ere n soe tɩ ba kʋ ẽ, lablɛ a zuum dↄ-puurŋa la zuo. Ba daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Ẽna de la Azezi n de Zifdõma naba la."
Ba daan tarɩ la fãarba bayi wa po ka dↄ-puursi zuto, ayɩla Azezi zʋʋgↄ bↄba, ayẽma a gↄbga bↄba.
Tɩ sɛba n dolɩ bilam tↄlla la, lↄbra ba zuto dee tʋʋra ẽ
yetɩ: "Dagɩ fõn daan yetɩ fõn wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la, dee le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam? Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa ze'ele dↄ-puurŋa la zuo sige."
Kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma mẽ daan tʋʋrɩ ẽ mɛ yetɩ:
"A daan fãagrɩ nẽrba basɛba mɛ, dee ka tãna wʋn fãagɛ a mẽŋa. A sãn dɛna Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma naba, a ze'ele dↄ-puurŋa la zuo sige nãnannɛ wã, tɩ tõma wʋn bↄ ẽ sɩra.
A te'ege Nawẽnnɛ mɛ yetɩ ẽŋa de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, Nawẽnnɛ sãn nõŋɛ ẽ, a fãagɛ ẽ lɛɛlɛ wã."
Tɩ fãarba la tɩ ba ka dↄ-puursi zuto lɛm ẽ na mẽ tↄgra ẽ be'em.
La daan pↄsɛ la wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka, tɩ tẽŋa la wuu lebge lika tarɩ ka paagɛ zaanõorɛ karf-atã.
Karf-atã la wakatɛ tɩ Azezi tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani." La võorɛ de la: "Mam Wẽnnaam, mam Wẽnnaam, bẽm tɩ fõn basɛ mam?"
Tɩ sɛba n ze lɛm bilam na basɛba wõm bɛla, yetɩ: "A wi'iri la A'eli."
Tɩ ba nẽra ayɩla zoe sẽŋɛ ka dɩkɛ nẽtɩŋa lʋsɛ dã-mı̃'isgo pʋam zẽkɛ la dↄↄgↄ bↄ ẽ tɩ a yũ.
Tɩ sɛba yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ gu bɩsɛ A'eli la sãn wʋn wa'am wa fãagɛ ẽ."
Tɩ Azezi le kaasɛ ke'enke'em, dee ki.
Tɩ fuugo la n yuli Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam beŋe zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la ãagɛ pʋsʋka saazuum halɩ ka paagɛ tẽŋa. Tɩ tẽŋa mı̃im, tɩ tãmpı̃isi wõrɛ.
Tɩ yↄↄrↄ be'ese, tɩ pʋpeelem dõma zozo'e n yʋʋn ki vo'oge.
Tɩ Azezi n wa vo'oge la, tɩ ba ze'ele yↄↄrↄ pʋam yese kẽ Zerizalɛm, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yẽ ba.
La Rom sʋdaasɩ kɛ'ɛma, la sʋdaasɩ la n ze gu'ura Azezi la n yẽ tẽŋa la n mı̃im, la bõn-sɛba n ẽŋɛ la, dabeem n yõkɛ ba zozo'e, tɩ ba yetɩ: "A sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa."
La pↄgsɩ zozo'e n daan ze zãazãarɛ dee bɩsra, ba daan ze'ele la Galile doose Azezi tɩ ba sõŋra ẽ.
Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari n de Azakɩ la Azozɛfʋ ma, la Azebede dayↄↄsɩ la ma n daan boe pↄg-bãma pʋam.
Bʋraaga ayɩla n daan de bõntarsa, n ze'ele Arimate, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azozɛfʋ. A de la Azezi karẽnbia.
Wẽnnɛ n daan mã'agɛ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose ẽ tɩ a basɛ tɩ a dɩkɛ Azezi kũm na sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ. Tɩ Apilatɩ bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba bↄ ẽ.
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ dɩkɛ kũm na, dɩkɛ tãn-paalɛ n ãn sõŋa vile ẽ,
tarɩ ẽ ka laagɛ yↄ-paalɛ pʋam tɩ a botɩ ba tũ tãmpı̃a ı̃yã, a mẽŋa ı̃yã. Tɩ ba bilge kug-kãtɛ lige yↄↄgↄ la nõorɛ dee fõrgɛ.
Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari ayẽma la daan zı̃ mɛ tɩ ba nẽŋa tↄ yↄↄgↄ la.
Daar-sɛka tɩ Zifdõma mãasnɩ ba vo'osgo daarɛ la n tole tɩ beere wiige, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la Farisi dõma lagsɛ taaba sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am,
ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, tõma tẽrɩ tɩ põmpã'asʋm dãana wã, ẽn daan nãn vↄa la, a daan yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn vo'oge dabsa atã daarɛ.'

Bɛla, bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba gu'ura yↄↄgↄ la sõŋa sõŋa ka paagɛ dabsa atã daarɛ, la sãn dagna bɛla, a karẽnbiisi la wʋn wa zũ kũm na mɛ dee yele nẽrba tɩ a vo'oge mɛ. Pã'asgↄ ẽna wã yãŋa wʋn dɛna be'em gãnna pↄspↄsɩ la."
Tɩ Apilatɩ yele ba yetɩ: "Tarɩ-ya gu'urba sẽŋɛ ka basɛ tɩ ba gu'ura yↄↄgↄ la wʋ yãma n boorɩ se'em na."
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka bɩ yↄↄgↄ la nõorɛ dee basɛ tɩ gu'urba gu'ura ẽ.
Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ n daan tole, tɩ beere wiige Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ, tɩ Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari ayẽma isge sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ yↄↄgↄ la.
Tɩ tẽŋa daan mı̃im zozo'e, tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ malɛka ze'ele saazuum sigum wa bilge kugre la bı̃ŋe kẽnkɛrŋa zẽa a zuo.
A nẽŋa daan yẽgrɩ wʋ sa-yãka. Tɩ a futo pelge ãna yɩlɩ yɩlɩ.
Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ sɛba n gu'uri yↄↄgↄ la. Tɩ ba gõgra dee ãna wʋ ba ki mɛ na.
Tɩ malɛka la yele pↄgsɩ la yetɩ: "Da zoe-ya dabeem, mam mi tɩ ya eerɩ la Azezi tɩ ba ka dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ la.
A ka boe kalam. A vo'oge mɛ wʋ ẽn daan yele se'em na. Wa'am-ya wa bɩsɛ ban daan bı̃ŋe ẽ zẽ'e-sɛka la,
dee sẽŋɛ-ya tↄtↄ ka yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, a vo'oge mɛ. La a wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa sẽŋɛ Galile. Bilam tɩ ya wʋn ka yẽ ẽ. Sɛla tɩ mam tarɩ tɩ m yele ya n bɛla."
Tɩ pↄgsɩ la fõrgɛ yↄↄm na tↄtↄ la dabeem, dee tara sũ-yẽlga zozo'e, zↄta wɛ'ɛsa tɩ ba ka yele Azezi karẽnbiisi la sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.
Tɩ Azezi darɛ tʋ'ʋsɛ pʋ'ʋsɛ ba. Tɩ ba lɛm ẽ ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam gʋrɛ a nãma nã'asɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Da zoe-ya dabeem, sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele m sↄbiisi la yetɩ, ba sẽŋɛ Galile, tɩ la de la bilam tɩ ba wʋn yẽ mam."
Pↄgsɩ la n daan boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ sɛba n gu'uri yↄↄgↄ la nẽrba basɛba sẽŋɛ tẽŋa pʋam ka tↄgɛ pa'alɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma bõn-sɛba wuu n ẽŋɛ la.
Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma la lagsɛ kʋ nõorɛ ayɩla, bↄ sʋdaasɩ la ligri zozo'e,
dee yele ba yetɩ: "Yele-ya nẽrba la yetɩ, yʋ'ʋŋↄ tɩ yãma gã gı̃sra dee tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la wa'am wa zũ kũm na.
La gↄmna la sãn wõm bɛla, tõma wʋn tↄgɛ la ẽ lɛ, yese ya yelle la pʋam."
Tɩ sʋdaasɩ la to'oge ligri la, dee ẽŋɛ wʋ ban yele ba se'em na. Tɩ yetↄg-ẽŋa saagɛ Zifdõma la tẽŋasʋka halɩ wa paam zı̃na.
Karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la daan sẽŋɛ la Galile, ka zom tãn-sɛka tɩ Azezi bↄ ba nõorɛ yetɩ ba sẽŋɛ la zuo.
La ba yẽ ẽ mɛ, ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam nã'asɛ ẽ, la basɛba daan sẽ'enɩ mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi lɛm ba, yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ bↄ mam pãŋa wuu n boe saazuum, la tẽŋa wã zuo mɛ.
Bɛla, sẽŋɛ-ya dũnia wuu ka botɩ nẽrba buuri wuu lebge mam karẽnbiisi. Mise-ya ba ko'om pʋam, la Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ, la a Dayʋa, la a Sɩa yʋ'ʋrɛ.
La ya zãsʋm ba tɩ ba sakɛ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ mam bↄ ya nõorɛ tɩ ya ɩta la. La bãŋɛ-ya tɩ mam boe la ya mɛ wakatɛ wuu, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ dũnia ba'asgↄ."
Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa Azezi-krisi kõ-yẽlga n pↄsɛ se'em n wãna:
La ẽŋɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn põn gʋlsɛ se'em, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ, mam wʋn tõm m tõntõnna tɩ a dẽŋɛ fʋ nẽŋa ka malgɛ sore bↄ fↄ.
La de la sɛka n mõolɩ weem tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: 'Malgɛ-ya sore sõŋa gu'ura Zuudãana. Malgɛ-ya sↄa la tɩ ba tↄ tẽntẽesɩ bↄ ẽ.' "
Bɛla tɩ Azã daan bↄna weem misra nẽrba ko'om pʋam, dee mõola yetɩ: "Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, dee botɩ ba mise ya ko'om pʋam, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ."
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e ze'ele Zude so'olʋm wuu, la Zerizalɛm wuu sẽnna Azã zẽ'am tↄgra ba tõon-be'ero pa'ala ẽ. Tɩ Azã misra ba kʋlaa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Zʋrdẽ pʋam.
Azã daan yɛ la fuugo n de yʋgma kõbrↄ, dee dɩkɛ sagãnnɛ lʋ a sɩa. A daan diti la seero la saniiro.
A daan mõolɩ yetɩ: "Nẽra n boe mam poorʋm sẽna, ẽŋa tarɩ pãŋa gãnna mam mɛ. Mam ka masɛ tɩ m dõbrɛ a nẽŋam pirge a tagra.
Mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam, la ẽŋa wʋn mise ya la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa."
Wakat-ẽŋa Azezi ze'ele la Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm wa'am Azã zẽ'am, tɩ a mise ẽ Zʋrdẽ ko'om na pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi ze'ele ko'om na pʋam dↄↄra, yẽ tɩ saazuum darɛ yo'oge, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa ãna wʋ na'adawenne na sige a zuo,
tɩ kõa ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire yetɩ: "Fõn de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu, fʋ paagɛ la mam yɛm."
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa botɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ weem.
A daan boe weem na dabsa pinaasɩ, tɩ Asũtãana wa'am wa makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ. A daan boe la we-dũnsi lɛ, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma sõŋra ẽ.
Ba daan yõkɛ Azã yʋ la yʋ'a deego pʋam. Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Galile ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga yetɩ:
"Wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm lɛm mɛ. Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero dee sakɛ kõ-yẽlga la."
Azezi daan dolɩ la Galile mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, yẽ Asimõ la a yɩbga A'ãndre n boe mı̃ lↄbra yʋka mõgrɛ la pʋam, ba daan de la zũn-yõgrɩba.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Dↄla-ya mam, tɩ mam wʋn botɩ ya ɛɛra nẽrba tɩ ba dↄla mam wʋ yãma n yõgrɩ zũma se'em na."
Tɩ ba basɛ ba yʋgsɩ la bilam mẽŋa, dee dↄla ẽ.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ fẽe yẽ Azebede dayↄↄsɩ Azakɩ la a yɩbga Azã n boe õorŋↄ pʋam malgra ba yʋgsɩ.
Tɩ a darɛ wi ba, tɩ ba basɛ ba sↄ Azebede la a tõntõnɩba õorŋↄ la pʋam, dee dↄla ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi sẽŋɛ Kapɛrnaʋm. Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ paagɛ, tɩ Azezi kẽ ba wẽndeem zãsna nẽrba.
La zãsŋↄ la di'ige nẽrba la mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a zãsŋↄ la daan tarɩ la pãŋa, la ka ãn wʋ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n zãsnɩ se'em na.
Tɩ bʋraa daan bↄna wẽndeem na tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ, tɩ bʋraa la kaasɛ yetɩ:
"Azezi n de Nazarɛtɩ nẽra, fõn bẽm yelle n boe la tõma? Fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ sã'am na tõma? Mam mi fõn de sɛka. Fõn de la pʋpeelem dãana n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am."
Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: "Go'oge, yese dee basɛ ẽ."
Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la bigse bʋraa la tɩ a gõgra, dee kaasɛ tagurga yese dee basɛ ẽ.
Tɩ ba wuu zɛ yɛrɩ, sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Wãna de la bẽm? La de la zãsŋↄ paalga n tarɩ pãŋa. A tↄgrɩ la kʋlkã'arsɩ, tɩ ba sakra a nõorɛ."
Tɩ Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ darɛ saagɛ Galile so'olʋm zẽ'a woo.
Tɩ Azezi la a nẽrba daan yese Zifdõma wẽndeem na, tɩ Azakɩ la Azã doose ba, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka kẽ Asimõ la A'ãndre dõma yire.
Tɩ Asimõ dɛɛm-pↄka ı̃yã ba tʋlgɛ, tɩ a gã. Tɩ Azezi paagɛ, tɩ ba darɛ tↄgɛ pↄka la yelle bↄ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ lɛm ẽ, gʋrɛ a nu'ugo botɩ a isge. Tɩ bã'a la basɛ ẽ, tɩ a ẽŋɛ ba sãanↄ.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ wa lui sobe, tɩ ba tarɩ bã'adõma wuu, la sɛba tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ tarɩ ba wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba wuu lagsɛ taaba yire la zanõrʋm.
Tɩ Azezi botɩ nẽrba zozo'e tɩ bã'asɩ to'oto'ore tarɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, dee dige kʋlkã'arsɩ zozo'e, tɩ ba yese. La a ka sakɛ tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la tↄgɛ, se'ere n soe la, ba põn mina ẽ mɛ.
Azezi daan isge la bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ zẽ'a tɩ nẽrba ka boe, tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ.
Tɩ Asimõ la nẽr-sɛba n daan boe la ẽ na yese ɛɛra ẽ.
La ba daan yẽ ẽ mɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽrba wuu eerɩ fʋ mɛ."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba n lɛm na tɩ m ka mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la bilam mẽ, tɩ la de la bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam wa'am."
Tɩ a kaagɛ Galile so'olʋm wuu mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, dee dige kʋlkã'arsɩ tɩ ba yese dee basɛ nẽrba.
Bʋraa ayɩla n de kõnkonne n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn bↄↄra, fʋ tã wʋn basɛ tɩ m yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ le ãna sõŋa."
Tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ Azezi, tɩ a tẽegɛ a nu'ugo kalʋm ẽ yetɩ: "Mam bↄↄra, yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa."
Tɩ bã'a la basɛ ẽ bilam mẽŋa, tɩ a le ãna sõŋa.
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ a fõrgɛ, dee kã'an ẽ yetɩ:
"Da kãn yele nẽra nẽra, la sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽema zẽ'am ka pa'alɛ ẽ fↄ mẽŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ, dee bↄ ẽ bõn-sɛba tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ ba bↄ la, tɩ la pa'alɛ ba tɩ fʋ sɩrɩ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."

La bʋraa la fõrgɛ mɛ ka dɩkɛ yelle la mõolɛ pa'alɛ la ẽŋɛ se'em. Bɛla tɩ Azezi daan ka le tãna wʋn kẽ tẽŋa pʋam, sãn dagna tɩ a li'ise mɛ kẽ. A daan boe la zẽ'e-sɛba tɩ nẽrba ka boe mı̃ na, tɩ nẽrba daan zɛ'ɛta zẽ'a woo sẽnna a zẽ'am.
Bɛla poorʋm, dabsa fẽe n tole, tɩ Azezi lebe Kapɛrnaʋm. Tɩ nẽrba wõm tɩ a boe yire,
lagsɛ halɩ zozo'e tɩ zẽ'a ka bↄna, baa deego la nõorʋm. Tɩ a tↄgra Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga bↄ'ↄra ba.
Tɩ nẽrba banaasɩ zɛ kↄↄrŋↄ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
La nẽrba la n zo'oge la, ba ka tã wʋn zɛ ẽ paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ ba zom gↄsgↄ ka lakɛ gↄsgↄ la bↄbrɛ ayɩla, doose bilam sike kↄↄrŋↄ la, la a bõn-gã'ala deego la pʋam Azezi nẽŋam.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ ban bↄ ẽŋa sɩra se'em na, yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "M bia, fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna fʋ zuo."
La lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma basɛba n daan boe mı̃, daan zẽa tẽ'esra ba sũurum yetɩ:
"Bẽm tɩ ẽna tↄgra bɛla? A tↄgrɩ pↄ'ↄra la Nawẽnnɛ. Ãn tã wʋn basɛ tõon-be'ero taalɛ, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a?"
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ a pʋtẽ'erʋm ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em ba sũurum na, yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya tẽ'esra wãna ya sũurum?
Bẽm n de nãana gãnna, mam sãn yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna a zuo, bɩɩ mam sãn yele ẽ yetɩ, a isge dɩkɛ a bõn-gã'ala sẽnna n de nãana?
Bɛla m wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tarɩ pãŋa dũnia wã zuo mɛ, wʋn basɛ tõon-be'ero taalɛ." Azezi yele bɛla, dee yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ:
"Isge dɩkɛ fʋ bõn-gã'ala kule."
Tɩ kↄↄrŋↄ la isge kalam dɩkɛ a bõn-gã'ala la ba wuu nifum yese. Tɩ ba wuu zɛ yɛrɩ, pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Tõma nãn ka yẽ wãna."
Azezi le sẽŋɛ la mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e sẽna a zẽ'am, tɩ a zãsna ba.
La Azezi sẽnnɩ tↄlla mɛ yẽ Alfe dayʋa Alevi tɩ a zı̃ lampo to'osgo deem tↄ'ↄsra lampo, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Dↄla mam." Tɩ a isge dↄla ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka zẽa Alevi yire dita, tɩ lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba la tõon-be'ero dõma zozo'e lagɩm na Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la dita, se'ere n soe la, nẽr-bãma buuri n daan zo'oge dↄla ẽ.

Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n de Farisi dõma la yẽ Azezi n diti la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma la, tɩ ba soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ a lagɩm na lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma dita?"
Tɩ Azezi wõm bɛla, yele ba yetɩ: "Sɛba n tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm ka eerɩ tɩba, sɛba n bẽ'erɩ n eerɩ tɩba. Mam ka wa'am tɩ m wi sɛba dõma n yetɩ bãma masɛ mɛ na, mam wa'am na tõon-be'ero dõma ı̃yã."
Azã karẽnbiisi, la Farisi dõma daan lʋtɩ la nõorɛ. Tɩ ba wa'am wa soke Azezi yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi, la Farisi dõma karẽnbiisi la lʋta nõorɛ dee tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka lʋta nõorɛ?"

Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn ẽŋɛ pↄgdire kibsa wi a sɩrdõma tɩ ba wa'am, ba tã wʋn lʋ nõorɛ mɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ pↄgdita la ken bↄna ba zẽ'am na bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, pↄgdita la sãn ken bↄna ba zẽ'am, ba kãn tã'agɛ lʋ nõorɛ.
Wakatɛ sẽm mɛ tɩ ba wʋn yese pↄgdita la ba zẽ'am, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yãŋa wʋn lʋ nõorɛ.
Nẽra kãn dɩkɛ tãn-paalɛ lige fu-kɛka. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, tãn-paalga la wʋn botɩ fu-kɛka la ãagɛ mɛ gãnna kʋrʋm na.

La nẽra mẽ kãn dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm wↄ-kɛgsɩ pʋam. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, dã-paalga la sãn kɛlla, ba wʋn botɩ wↄↄsɩ la tãsɛ mɛ, tɩ dãam na, la wↄↄsɩ la wuu sã'am. La masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm na wↄ-paalsɩ pʋam."
Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi daan dↄla vatↄ pʋam tↄlla, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la kↄ si wẽena ↄbra.
Tɩ Farisi dõma yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ, bẽm tɩ ba ɩta sɛla n sisri vo'osgo daarɛ?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Adavidi la a nẽrba la kↄm n yʋʋn dõnnɩ tɩ ba bↄↄra dia tɩ ba di, tɩ Adavidi yʋʋn ẽŋɛ se'em,

wakat-sɛka tɩ Abiata de Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la? A yʋʋn kẽ la Nawẽnnɛ deego la pʋam dɩkɛ borborɩ sɛba tɩ ba bı̃ŋe bↄ Nawẽnnɛ na obe. La sisri mɛ, nẽra nẽra ka obrɩ ba, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma mã'a. La Adavidi yʋʋn obe ba mɛ, dee bↄ nẽr-sɛba n boe a zẽ'am na."
Azezi yele bɛla dee le yele ba yetɩ: "La de la nẽrsaala ı̃yã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ vo'osgo daarɛ, a ka ẽŋɛ nẽrsaala vo'osgo daarɛ ı̃yã.
Bɛla, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n soe sɛla woo, baa la vo'osgo daarɛ."
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi le kẽ la Zifdõma wẽndeem. Tɩ bʋraa bↄna mı̃ tɩ a nu'ugo ki.
Tɩ ba bɩsra Azezi wʋn botɩ bʋraa la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kãn botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Ba daan eerɩ la ba doose bilam dõrɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi yele bʋraa la nu'ugo n ki la yetɩ: "Isge ze'ele tẽŋasʋka."
Dee soke sɛba n bɩsrɩ ẽ na yetɩ: "Sore boe tɩ nẽra ẽŋɛ sõŋa vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a ẽŋɛ be'em? Sore boe tɩ a fãagɛ nẽra vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kʋ ẽ?" Tɩ ba sı̃na.
Tɩ Azezi sũure yı̃ige, tɩ a bɩsɛ nẽrba la kaagɛ, tɩ a sũure sã'am, ba sũure n kɛ la ı̃yã. La a yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo la." Tɩ a tẽegɛ, tɩ nu'ugo la yãŋa tẽegɛ ãna sõŋa.
Tɩ Farisi dõma yese tↄtↄ ka bãm la naba A'erↄdɩ nẽrba bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ Azezi.
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la yese sẽŋɛ la Galile mõgrʋm bↄba. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e ze'ele Galile, la Zude,
la Zerizalɛm, la Idume, la Zʋrdẽ kʋlaa doone, la tẽn-sɛba n lɛm Tiiri la Sidõ doose ẽ. Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la daan wõm na ẽn ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ba vuta õorŋↄ lɛm na tɩ nẽrba la da wa mike ẽ.
A daan botɩ bã'adõma zozo'e n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, bɛla tɩ bã'adõma wuu daan mikra taaba bↄↄra tɩ ba paagɛ kalʋm ẽ.
La kʋlkã'arsɩ n dolɩ nẽr-sɛba la sãn ẽn yẽ ẽ, ba luti la a nẽŋam kaasra tagursi yɛta tɩ: "Fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa."
Tɩ Azezi daan zɛbɛ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yetɩ, ba da botɩ nẽra bãŋɛ ẽŋa n de nẽr-sɛka.
La bɛla poorʋm Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zom na tãŋa zuo, dee wi nẽr-sɛba tɩ a boorɩ la tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am.
Tɩ a looge nẽrba pia la ayi tɩ ba bↄna la ẽ, tɩ a tõnna ba tɩ ba sẽnna mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga,
dee bↄ ba pãŋa tɩ ba digra kʋlkã'arsɩ tɩ ba yɛsra.
Sɛba tɩ a looge la daan de la Asimõ tɩ Azezi sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ,
la Azebede dayↄↄsɩ Azakɩ la a yɩbga Azã, tɩ a sɩ ba yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Bʋanɛrgɛsɩ. A võorɛ de la nẽrba n ãn wʋ sa-dãmŋↄ.
La A'ãndre, la Afilipi, la Abatelemi, la Amatie, la Atoma, la Alfe dayʋa Azakɩ, la Atade, la Asimõ sɛka n de Zelↄtɩ nẽra ayɩla la,
la Azudaasɩ Iskariyo, sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la.
La Azezi daan kule la yire, tɩ nẽrba le lagsɛ zozo'e. Tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ka yẽ folle wʋn di.
Tɩ ba daan yetɩ Azezi yirsri mɛ, tɩ a yir-dõma wõm bɛla sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka yõkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n ze'ele Zerizalɛm wa'am wa yetɩ: "Abelzebuli n dolɩ ẽ, la de la ẽŋa n de kʋlkã'arsɩ naba la pãŋa tɩ a tarɩ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ tɩ ba yɛsra."
Tɩ Azezi wi ba, makɛ makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Asũtãana wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne dige Asũtãana?
So'olʋm ayɩla nẽrba sãn welge zɛbra taaba, so'olʋm ẽŋa wʋn wõrgɛ mɛ.
La yire ayɩla dõma sãn welge zɛbra taaba, yi-ẽŋa wʋn wõrgɛ mɛ.
La Asũtãana sãn isge zɛbɛ la a mẽŋa welge, a pãŋa la ba'asɛ mɛ, a kãn tã'agɛ ze'ele.
La nẽra ka tã wʋn kẽ pãŋa dãana yire ka vaagɛ a lↄgrↄ, sãn dagna tɩ a dẽŋɛ lʋ pãŋa dãana la mɛ, dee vaagɛ a lↄgrↄ la.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn basɛ nẽrsaalba tõon-be'ero la wuu tɩ ba ɩtɩ la, la ba pↄ'ↄrɛ yetↄga la wuu taalɛ.
La nẽra sãn pↄ'ↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, Nawẽnnɛ kãn malɩn basɛ ẽ taalɛ. Tõon-be'e-ẽna taalɛ boe la a dãana zuo wakatɛ wuu."
Ban yetɩ kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ na ı̃yã, tɩ a yele bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi ma, la a yɩbsɩ wa'am wa zɛ yẽŋa dee tõm yetɩ, ba wi ẽ tɩ a wa'am.
La nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n daan zı̃ kaagɛ ẽ, tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ ma, la fʋ yɩbsɩ n wãna n boe yẽŋa ɛɛra fↄ."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Ãne n de mam ma, la ãndõma n de mam yɩbsɩ?"
Dee bɩsɛ nẽr-sɛba n zı̃ kaagɛ ẽ na, yetɩ: "Mam ma, la mam yɩbsɩ n wãna.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n ɩtɩ Nawẽnnɛ n boorɩ se'em na n de mam yɩbga, la mam tã, la mam ma."
Azezi le bↄna la mõgrɛ la nõorʋm zãsna nẽrba. Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e lagsɛ a zẽ'am. Bɛla tɩ a kẽ õorŋↄ la n boe mõgrɛ la pʋam na zı̃'ire, dee tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu bↄna mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
Tɩ a makɛ magsa zãsʋm ba yɛla zozo'e. A zãsŋↄ la pʋam a yele ba yetɩ:
"Selse-ya, kaara n daan yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri.
La ẽn sẽŋɛ ka lↄbgra bõnbuuri la, basɛba lui la sore zuo, tɩ niinto wa'am wa di ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui zẽ'a n de tãmpı̃isi tɩ tẽntõnnↄ ka zo'oge mı̃. Tẽntõnnↄ n ka zo'oge mı̃ na ı̃yã, tɩ ba bule tↄtↄ yese,
tɩ wʋntɛɛŋa yẽkɛ wẽ ba tɩ ba ki, ba yẽga n ka kẽ tẽŋa la ı̃yã.
Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui gõ'osɩ zẽ'a. Tɩ gõ'osɩ la yese fʋrɛ ba, tɩ ba ka wↄm biɛ.
Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui zẽ'e-sõŋↄ pʋam bule yese, bɩ wↄm biɛ. Basɛba wↄm na biɛ pitã-tã, tɩ basɛba wↄm pisyoob-yoobɩ, tɩ basɛba wↄm kↄbga kↄbga."
A yele bɛla dee yetɩ: "Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
La Azezi yese la kẽnkɛrŋa tɩ sɛba n kaagɛ ẽ na, la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la soke ẽ magsa la võorɛ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ botɩ yãma bãŋɛ a so'olʋm yelle n sʋgɛ la mɛ. La sɛba n ka boe tõma pʋam na, yɛla wuu de la magsa bↄ ba.
'Bɛla tɩ ba wʋn bɩsɛ yẽ dee kãn bãŋɛ. Ba wʋn wõm dee kãn bãŋɛ a võorɛ. Sãn dagɩ nɩ bɛla, ba wʋn leme wa'am Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, tɩ a basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.' "
La Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma sãn ka bãŋɛ makrɛ ẽna wã võorɛ, yãma wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne bãŋɛ magsa la wuu võorɛ?
Bõnbuuri la tɩ kaara la lobge la, de la Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga.
Sore la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la, tɩ Asũtãana wa'am tↄtↄ wa yese yetↄga la ba sũure pʋam.
La tãmpı̃a la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la dee sakɛ to'oge ba tↄtↄ la sũ-yẽlga.
La yetↄga la n ka kẽ ba sũure pʋam na ı̃yã, ba sakɛ la wakatɛ fẽe, la toogo bɩɩ nãmsgↄ sãn paagɛ ba yetↄga la ı̃yã, ba basrɩ mɛ tↄtↄ.
La gõ'osɩ la zẽ'a tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la,
tɩ ba yɛm yↄↄra la dũnia wã yɛla, tɩ bõntarsõm yɛla pã'asra ba, tɩ yɛla basɛba yɛmleego tara ba, botɩ yetↄga la ka tãna wʋn wↄm biɛ ba sũure pʋam.
La zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõnnɩ kõ-yẽlga la sakra, wↄm biɛ. Tɩ basɛba wↄm pitã-tã, tɩ basɛba pisyoob-yoobɩ, tɩ basɛba kↄbga kↄbga."
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Ba yõ'orɩ fɩtla dɩkɛ pɩ'ɩgↄ vuge ẽ, bɩɩ ba dɩkɛ ẽ ze'ele gↄrgↄ tilum? Ayɛɩ, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo.
Bɛla, bõn-sɛka n sʋgɛ, dẽnɩ tɩ a puke. La bõn-sɛka wuu n lile wʋn lilge.
Nẽr-sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
A le yele ba yetɩ: "Mõrgɛ-ya wõm yãma n selsrɩ se'em na võorɛ. Bõn-sɛka tɩ ya dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ nẽrba la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn makɛ la bɛla lebse ya, le makɛ pa'asɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, sɛka n tarɩ, a wʋn bↄ ẽ pa'asɛ. La sɛka n ka tarɩ, bõn-sɛka tɩ a tarɩ la, a wʋn to'oge ẽ."
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ nẽra n bʋrɛ a bõnbuuri va'am pʋam.
A sãn gı̃sra mɛ bɩɩ a sãn piga mɛ, wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ, bõnbuuri la bulli mɛ yɛsra bɩta, tɩ a ka mina lan ɩtɩ se'em.
Tẽntõnnↄ n botɩ bõnbuuri la yɛsra ba mẽŋa, dẽŋɛ puse võorↄ, yãŋa yõgɛ pʋa, wↄm biɛ, tɩ ba bɩ.
La biɛ la sãn bɩ, kaara la sɛ'ɛrɩ ba mɛ, se'ere n soe la, bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ paagɛ mɛ."
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm, bɩɩ tɩ wʋn yetɩ a wõn na bẽm?
A ãn wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire n ãn pɩka pɩka gãnna bõnbuuri wuu n boe dũnia zuo.
La ba sãn bʋrɛ ẽ, a bɩtɩ mɛ puse wil-kãra gãnna zẽvõorↄ buuri wuu. Tɩ niinto tãna wʋn tɛ ba tʋgrↄ a zuo a mã'asʋm pʋam."
Azezi daan dɩkɛ la magsa zozo'e n ãn wʋ bãna tↄgɛ bↄ ba, masɛ wʋ ban wʋn tã'agɛ wõm se'em na.
A ka tↄgɛ bↄ ba tɩ la sãn dagna magsa. La a sãn yese la a karẽnbiisi la mã'a kẽnkɛrŋa, tɩ a pa'alɩ ba yɛla la wuu võorɛ.
Daar-ẽŋa mẽŋa zaanõorɛ, tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Tɩ dooge-ya mõgrɛ la ke bↄba."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la basɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ õorŋↄ la tɩ Azezi boe mı̃ na pʋam, dɩkɛ ẽ tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa. La õornↄ basɛba n daan mẽ boe ba zẽ'am.
Tɩ kʋseb-kãtɛ wa vugra ke'enke'em, tɩ ko-mı̃'isi wẽ'era kẽ'era õorŋↄ la pʋam deege la ba pɩrɛ ẽ.
La Azezi gã la õorŋↄ la poorʋm kʋkɛ dafeere gı̃sra. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la nẽegɛ ẽ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma n yetɩ ki wã, la ka pakɛ fõn?"
Tɩ a isge tãsɛ kʋsebgo la, dee yele ko-mı̃'isi la yetɩ: "Go'oge-ya, ãna-ya sı̃m." Tɩ kʋsebgo, la ko-mı̃'isi la go'oge ãna sı̃m.
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya zↄta dabeem bɛla? Bẽm tɩ ya ka bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra?"
Tɩ dabeem ba kẽ ba. Tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Ãne n de ẽna tɩ kʋsebgo la ko'om sakra a nõorɛ?"
La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la dooge paagɛ la mõgrɛ la doone Geraza dõma tẽŋa pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi ze'ele õorŋↄ la pʋam sige. Tɩ bʋraa tɩ kʋlkã'arga dolɩ ẽ darɛ ze'ele yↄↄrʋm sẽnna tʋ'ʋsra ẽ.
Bʋraa la daan kẽ'erɩ la yↄↄrↄ la tẽŋasʋka. Tɩ ba daan ka le tãna wʋn ba ẽ na bãnsɩ.
Se'ere n soe la, ba daan ẽn ba la a nãma la a nu'usi la bãnsɩ, tɩ a ẽn kↄ ba basɛ. Tɩ nẽra nẽra daan ka tãna wʋn yãŋɛ ẽ.
Wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ a ẽn ɛɛra la yↄↄrʋm, la tãnsɩ tẽŋasʋka kaasra tagursi, dee wẽ'era a mẽŋa la kuga pↄgna.
Tɩ a yẽ Azezi zãazãarɛ, zoe sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam,
dee tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Azezi, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Dayʋa, bẽm n boe mam na fõn tẽŋasʋka? Mam sosrɩ fʋ mɛ Nawẽnnɛ ı̃yã, da nãmsɛ ma."
Azezi dẽŋɛ yele kʋlkã'arga la mɛ yetɩ a yese dee basɛ ẽ. Bɛla n soe tɩ kʋlkã'arga la yele bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Atʋsa, se'ere n soe la, tõma zo'oge mɛ."
Tɩ a belem Azezi yetɩ, a da dige bãma tɩ ba yese tẽŋa la pʋam.
La kurkurdõma zozo'e n daan boe tãŋa zuo ↄbra.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la belem Azezi yetɩ: "Bↄ tɩ nõorɛ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la."
Tɩ a sakɛ ban yele se'em na. Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la basɛ bʋraa la dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ ba wuu zoe sige ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam ki. Ba kãllɛ daan de wʋ tʋsayi.
Tɩ sɛba n daan gu'uri kurkurdõma la zoe sẽŋɛ tẽŋa pʋam, la kẽnkɛrsɩ la wuu ka yele sɛla n ẽŋɛ la. Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em.
La ban paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am na, ba yẽ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la daan dolɩ ẽ na n zı̃ mı̃, yɛ futo, tɩ a yɛm bↄna sõŋa sõŋa. Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba.
Tɩ sɛba n yẽ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, tↄgɛ pa'alɛ ba bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ bʋraa la, la bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ kurkurdõma la.
Tɩ ba belem Azezi yetɩ a fõrgɛ bãma tẽŋa.
Tɩ Azezi daan kẽ'era õorŋↄ la pʋam, tɩ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ daan dolɩ ẽ na belem Azezi yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ a dↄla ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi ka sakɛ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Kule ya yire ka yele fʋ yir-dõma Zuudãana n zoe fʋ ninbãalga se'em, la ẽn ẽŋɛ sɛla wuu bↄ fʋ la."
Tɩ bʋraa la sẽŋɛ Dekapↄlɩ so'olʋm ka mõola Azezi n ẽŋɛ bõn-sɛba wuu bↄ ẽŋa. Tɩ la daan di'ige ba wuu.
Azezi daan lebe dooge la mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba la õorŋↄ la, daan bↄna mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e lagsɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadõma nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azayirusi wa'am mı̃ wa yẽ Azezi, ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam,
belem ẽ na a sũure wuu yetɩ: "Mam pↄyʋa n bẽ'erɩ deege la a ki, wa'am wa dɩkɛ fʋ nu'usi paglɛ a zuo tɩ a põsɛ da ki."
Tɩ Azezi dↄla ẽ wɛ'ɛsa, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ dↄla ẽ mikra ẽ.
La pↄka n daan boe nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka luta sɩkẽŋa yʋʋma pia la ayi, tɩ la ka gↄ'ↄra.
A daan nãmsɛ mɛ zozo'e tɩbdõma zẽ'am, dɩkɛ ẽn tarɩ sɛla wuu sã'am, dee tɩ la ka sõna, la malɩn gãnna la bɛla.
Tɩ pↄka la daan wõm Azezi yelle, wa'am wa fɩrgɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tẽŋasʋka paagɛ Azezi poorʋm kalʋm a fuugo.
A daan yele a pʋtẽ'erʋm yetɩ: "Mam sãn kalʋm a fuugo mã'a, mam wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
La ẽn kalʋm fuugo la, a zɩɩm na n yesrɩ la ze'ele mɛ ka le yɛsra, tɩ a bãŋɛ a ı̃yã pʋam tɩ ẽŋa yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
La bilam mẽŋa tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ tɩ pãŋa n yese ẽŋa pʋam ẽŋɛ sɛla, tɩ a gelge soke nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Ãn kalʋm mam fuugo?"
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n mikri fõn wãna, dee sↄkra tɩ ãn kalʋm fõn."
Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ kaagɛ tɩ a bãŋɛ nẽr-sɛka n ẽŋɛ bɛla.
Tɩ dabeem tara pↄka la, tɩ a gõgra. La ẽn bãŋɛ sɛla n ẽŋɛ ẽ na, a wa'am mɛ wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam tↄgɛ ẽ a sɩra wuu.
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "M bia, fõn bↄ mam sɩra la n botɩ fʋ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm, fʋ bã'a la basɛ ya."
La Azezi n ken bↄna mı̃ tↄgra la, tɩ nẽrba ze'ele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yire wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ pↄyʋa la ki mɛ. Da le nãmsɛ karẽnsãama."
Tɩ Azezi wõm ban yele se'em na, dee yele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yetɩ: "Da zoe dabeem, wen bↄ mam sɩra."
La Azezi daan ka basɛ tɩ nẽra nẽra kↄlgɛ ẽ, sãn dagna Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la a yɩbga Azã mã'a.
La ban sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana yire la, tɩ Azezi yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n voolɩ, kaasra dee fabla zozo'e.
Tɩ a kẽ yire la yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya vↄↄla dee kɛlla? Bia la ka ki, a gı̃sri mɛ."
Tɩ ba la'ara ẽ. Tɩ a botɩ nẽrba la wuu yese yẽŋa, dee doose bia la sↄ, la a ma, la a karẽnbiisi batã la kẽ bia la n boe zẽ'a na,
gʋrɛ a nu'ugo dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Talita kumi." A võorɛ de la: "Pugla, mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge."
Tɩ pugla la daan darɛ isge sẽnna. Tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la, tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ. Pugla la daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pia la ayi.
Tɩ Azezi daan kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da kãn botɩ nẽra nẽra bãŋɛ bõn-ẽŋa. Dee yetɩ, ba bↄ pugla la dia tɩ a di.
Azezi daan basɛ tẽn-ẽŋa dee sẽŋɛ la a mẽŋa tẽŋam, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la doose ẽ.

Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kẽ ba wẽndeem zãsna nẽrba. Tɩ nẽrba pãɩ wõm a zãsŋↄ la, tɩ la di'ige ba, tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna yẽ zãsŋↄ ẽna la bɛ? Ãne bↄ ẽ yɛm ẽna? A ẽŋɛ la wãne ɩta bõn-yãlma bɛla?
Dagɩ ẽna n de dↄ-wãta la? Dagɩ ẽna n de Amaari dayʋa, tɩ a yɩbsɩ dɛna Azakɩ, la Azoze, la Azudi, la Asimõ la? Dagɩ a tãpa n boe tõma zẽ'am kalam wã?" Bɛla tɩ ba zagsɛ ka bↄ Azezi sɩra.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa yẽtɩ pẽka mɛ, sãn dagna a mẽŋa tẽŋa, la a buuri, la a yir-dõma tẽŋasʋka mã'a tɩ a ka yẽtɩ pẽka."
La a daan ka yãŋɛ tõm tõon-yãlma bilam, sãn dagna bã'adõma fẽe tɩ a daan dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
La ban daan ka bↄ ẽ sɩra la, la di'ige ẽ mɛ. Azezi daan kaarɩ la tẽnsɩ la n boe bilam na zãsna nẽrba,
daan wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am tɩ a tõm ba bayi bayi, dee bↄ ba pãŋa tɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arsɩ.
Dee daan yele ba yetɩ: "Da dɩkɛ-ya sɛla sɛla sore la sẽnnɛ ı̃yã, dɩkɛ-ya dasaarɛ mã'a, da tara-ya dia, bɩɩ tãmpↄkↄ, bɩɩ ligri sũm sẽŋɛ.
La pire-ya tagra, dee da yɛ-ya futo bayi bayi."
A le yele ba yetɩ: "Yan sẽŋɛ ka sige yi-sɛka, kẽ'era-ya bilam ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn yese fõrgɛ tẽŋa la.
La tẽn-sɛka nẽrba n ka to'oge ya, bɩɩ ka selse ya yetↄga, ya yese zẽ'e-ẽŋa dee pɩɩsɛ ya nãma tẽntõnnↄ basɛ mı̃. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, la wʋn pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa."
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka mõola yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.
Dee dige kʋlkã'arsɩ zozo'e tɩ ba yese, dee ẽŋɛ kaam ẽŋɛ bã'adõma zozo'e zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.

Tɩ naba A'erↄdɩ wõm Azezi yelle, se'ere n soe la, Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ daan yese la zẽ'a woo. Tɩ nẽrba basɛba daan yɛta tɩ: "A de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n vo'oge, bɛla n soe tɩ a tara pãŋa tõnna tõon-yãlma."
Tɩ basɛba yetɩ: "A de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli n leme wa'am." Tɩ sɛba yetɩ: "A de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ayẽma wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba basɛba n daan boe la."
Tɩ naba A'erↄdɩ daan wõm bɛla, yetɩ: "A de la Azã sɛka tɩ mam daan botɩ ba wike a zuugo la n vo'oge."
Se'ere n soe la, A'erↄdɩ mẽŋa n daan botɩ ba yõkɛ Azã lʋ tarɩ ka kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem, a kẽema Afilipi pↄga A'erodɩadɩ ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, a daan fãagɛ la a kẽema pↄga di.
Tɩ Azã daan yele ẽ yetɩ, la ka masɛ tɩ a fãagɛ a kẽema pↄga di.
Tɩ A'erodɩadɩ sũure yı̃ige la Azã, tɩ a zɩgra tɩ a kʋ ẽ, la A'erↄdɩ ı̃yã a ka tã'agɛ kʋ ẽ.

A'erↄdɩ daan zotɩ Azã mɛ, a daan mi tɩ a de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, dee dɛna pʋpeelem dãana, bɛla ı̃yã tɩ a gu'ura ẽ tɩ sɛla da ẽŋɛ ẽ. A daan sãn ẽn sɛlsra Azã yetↄga, la dãanɩ ẽ mɛ zozo'e, la baa bɛla, a ẽn sɛlsra ẽ mɛ la sũ-yẽlga.
La daarɛ ayɩla tɩ A'erↄdɩ ẽŋɛ a dↄka daarɛ kibsa, wi a tẽŋa nẽrzuto, la sʋda-kɛ'ɛndõma, la Galile nẽŋadõma. Tɩ A'erodɩadɩ yẽ sore ẽŋɛ ẽŋa n boorɩ se'em na.
A'erodɩadɩ pↄyʋa n daan kẽ ka wa, tɩ A'erↄdɩ, la sãama la sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm. Tɩ naba la yele pugla la yetɩ: "Sose mam fõn boorɩ sɛla tɩ m bↄ fↄ."
Dee pↄɩ yetɩ: "Bõn-sɛka wuu tɩ fʋ wʋn sose mam, baa la sãn dɛna mam so'olʋm pʋsʋka, mam wʋn bↄ fↄ."
Tɩ pugla la yese ka soke a ma yetɩ: "M sose bẽm?" Tɩ a ma lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Sose Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na zuugo."
Tɩ pugla la lebe naba la zẽ'am tↄtↄ ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam boorɩ tɩ fʋ dɩkɛ la Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na zuugo ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam bↄ ma lɛɛlɛ wã."
Tɩ naba la sũure sã'am halɩ, la ẽn pↄɩ nẽrba la zẽ'am na ı̃yã, a ka boorɩ tɩ a mõŋɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a tõm a sʋdaaga tↄtↄ yetɩ, a sẽŋɛ ka wike Azã zuugo tarɩ wa'am. Tɩ a yese sẽŋɛ yʋ'a deem na ka wike Azã zuugo,
dɩkɛ ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam tarɩ wa'am wa bↄ pugla la. Tɩ pugla la dɩkɛ zuugo la bↄ a ma.
Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi wõm, sẽŋɛ ka dɩkɛ kũm na laagɛ.
Azezi n tõm sɛba la leme mɛ wa lagsɛ taaba a zẽ'am tↄgɛ pa'alɛ ẽ bãma n ẽŋɛ sɛla, la bãma n zãsʋm se'em wuu.

La nẽrba zozo'e n daan sẽnnɩ mı̃ dee fõrgra, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan ka yẽ folle wʋn di. Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Wa'am-ya tɩ tɩ yese kẽnkɛrŋa zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe mı̃ na, tɩ ya ka vo'ose fẽe."
Tɩ ba kẽ õorŋↄ wɛ'ɛsa kẽnkɛrŋa zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e daan yẽ ban we'esɩ la bãŋɛ ba, daan yese tẽnsɩ la wuu pʋam lagɩm sẽŋɛ tↄtↄ dẽŋɛ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba we'esɩ la.
Tɩ Azezi paagɛ ze'ele õorŋↄ la zuo sige, yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, se'ere n soe la, ba ãn wʋ piisi n ka tarɩ dũnsı̃ina. Tɩ a daan zãsna ba yɛla zozo'e.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan kẽ'era, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Kalam zẽ'a de la mõom dee tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ'era,
basɛ nẽrba la tɩ ba sẽŋɛ yiɛ, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ la ka da dia di."
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Yãma mẽŋa bↄ ba dia tɩ ba di." Tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn sẽŋɛ ka da borborɩ lig-kõba kↄbsyi tarɩ wa'am wa bↄ ba tɩ ba di?"
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ la borborɩ balɛ? Sẽŋɛ-ya ka bɩsɛ." Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ, dee leme wa yetɩ: "Tõma tarɩ la borborɩ banuu la zũma bayi."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ, ba basɛ tɩ nẽrba la welse sill-sille zı̃'ire mõ-mã'asa la zuo.
Tɩ ba daan zı̃'ire kↄbga kↄbga, tɩ basɛba zı̃'ire pinu-nu.
Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la gorge bɩsɛ saazuo pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise borborɩ la bↄ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ba pʋɩ nẽrba la, dee dɩkɛ zũma bayi la fiise bↄ ba wuu.
Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ borbor-gito, la zũn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ pia la ayi.
Nẽrba la n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de la tʋsanuu.
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi darɛ basɛ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la kẽ õorŋↄ dẽŋɛ ẽ dↄↄra mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba, Betisayida tẽŋa bↄba. Dee tɩ a mẽŋa weege tɩ a keese nẽrba la.
La ẽn keese ba la, a sẽŋɛ la tãŋa zuo tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ tɩ õorŋↄ la bↄna ko-kãtɛ la tẽŋasʋka, dee tɩ Azezi bↄna doone ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.

Tɩ Azezi yẽ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la n mõnnɩ õorŋↄ la nãmsrɩ mɛ zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, kʋsebgo n vugri tʋ'ʋsra ba. Tɩ beere yↄna wiire, tɩ a sẽnna ko'om na zuo wɛ'ɛsa ba bↄba, bↄↄra tɩ a gãŋɛ ba tole.
La ban yẽ ẽn sẽnnɩ ko'om na zuo la, ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ a de la ki-isgne, tɩ ba kaasɛ tagursi.
Ba wuu yẽ ẽ mɛ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ba. Tɩ a darɛ yele ba yetɩ: "La de la mam, keŋe-ya ya sũure, da zoe-ya dabeem!"
Dee zom ba zẽ'am õorŋↄ la pʋam, tɩ kʋsebgo la go'oge. Tɩ karẽnbiisi la palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ, se'ere n soe la,
ba ka bãŋɛ borborɩ bõn-yãlma la võorɛ, ba pʋtẽ'era ka like.
Ba pãrgɛ mõgrɛ la dooge paagɛ la Zenezarɛtɩ, ze'ele mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
La ban daan ze'ele õorŋↄ la pʋam dooge la, tɩ nẽrba la bãŋɛ Azezi tↄtↄ.
Tɩ ba zoe kẽ so'olʋm na wuu, tɩ ba zɛ bã'adõma ba bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am, bãma n wõm tɩ Azezi boe zẽ'e-sɛka la.

La Azezi daan sãn ẽn sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka woo, tẽn-kãra, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ, la yiɛ n boe kẽnkɛrsɩ la, ba tarɩ la bã'adõma sẽnna gã'ata da'asɩ pʋam, dee bɛlna ẽ yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ bã'adõma la kalʋm a fuugo nõorɛ mã'a. La sɛba wuu n daan kalʋm a fuugo la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ.
Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma basɛba n ze'ele Zerizalɛm daan wa'am wa lagsɛ Azezi zẽ'am,
