yẽ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la basɛba diti la nu'usi n ka ãn sõŋa, la boorɩ tɩ la yetɩ ba ka peege nu'usi wʋ Zifdõma sisgo n yetɩ ba ɩta se'em na.
Farisi dõma, la Zifdõma wuu sãn ka wobse nu'usi wʋ ba yaabdõma malŋↄ la, ba ka diti.
Ba sãn ze'ele da'am wa'am, ba wʋn peege ba mẽŋa mɛ dee di. La malŋↄ basɛba zozo'e tɩ ba ɩtɩ, la de la wama, la yↄa, la kuto laasɩ peere.
Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la soke Azezi yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka sakra tɩ yaabdõma malŋↄ la, dita dia la nu'usi n ka ãn sõŋa?"

Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "A'ezayi n yʋʋn to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la tↄgɛ ya yelle la, a tarɩ bʋʋrↄ, yãma de la pʋlibsum dõma wʋ lan gʋlsɛ se'em na. La gʋlsɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Nẽr-bãna pẽgrɩ mam na nõorɛ yetↄga, la ba sũure la zãagɛ la mam mɛ.
Ban nã'asrɩ mam na, la de la zãŋa. Se'ere n soe la, ba zãsnɩ la zãsŋↄ n de nẽrsaalba nõorɛ.'
Ya basɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ mɛ dee dↄla nẽrsaalba malŋↄ."
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Ya sɩrɩ zagsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ mɛ, dee tɩ ya dↄla ya mẽŋa malŋↄ.
Amoyisi yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Nanna fʋ sↄ, la fʋ ma.' Dee le yetɩ: 'Nẽr-sɛka sãn tↄgɛ a sↄ bɩɩ a ma be'em, dẽnɩ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.'
La yãma yetɩ: 'Nẽra sãn yele a sↄ, bɩɩ a ma yetɩ: "Mam n tarɩ bõn-sɛba tɩ m sõŋɛ fʋ la de la 'Kↄrbã', (a võorɛ de la 'Nawẽnnɛ bõnↄ')",
la ka le masɛ tɩ a ɩta sɛla bↄ'ↄra a sↄ, la a ma.'
Yãma mẽŋa malŋↄ la tɩ ya zãsnɩ nẽrba la, botɩ ya basɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la dɛna la zãŋa. La bõnↄ zozo'e n wõm na bɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ."
La Azezi le wi la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma wuu, selse-ya mam sõŋa wõm a võorɛ.
Sɛla n ze'etɩ yẽŋa kẽ'erɩ nẽrsaala pʋʋrʋm ka tã wʋn botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ. Bõn-sɛka n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala pʋam yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ. ((
Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.))"
La a daan ze'ele nẽrba la zẽ'am kẽ la deem. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ makrɛ la võorɛ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma yɛm mẽ ka like? Yãma ka bãŋɛ tɩ sɛla n ze'etɩ yẽŋa kẽ'era nẽrsaala pʋʋrʋm ka tã wʋn botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ?
Se'ere n soe la, bõn-bãma ka kẽ'erɩ sũure pʋam, ba kẽ'erɩ la pʋʋrɛ pʋam tɩ ba yẽ'era ba basra." (Azezi n daan yele bɛla la, a boorɩ tɩ a yetɩ dia ka bↄ'ↄrɩ dẽgrↄ, nẽra tã wʋn di dia wuu mɛ.)
Dee daan le yetɩ: "La de la bõn-sɛka n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala pʋam yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ.
Se'ere n soe la, pʋtẽ'e-yooro ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a bↄↄra tɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em: yalsɩ, la nayigum, la nẽr-kʋa,
la taaba pↄgba la taaba sɩrba gã'a, la nẽra n nõŋɛ bõnↄ, la pʋtʋʋlgↄ, la yɛmkẽgsɩga, la tõon-dẽgrↄ, la nẽra n ɩtɩ sũure la a tadãana bõnↄ, la pↄ'ↄrɛ yetↄga, la pa'al-m-mẽŋa, la yalm-tõoma.
Bõn-be'ero bãna wuu ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ."
Azezi daan ze'ele zẽ'e-ẽŋa sẽŋɛ la Tiiri so'olʋm ka kẽ yire pʋam, dee ka bↄↄra tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ tɩ ẽŋa boe bilam. La a daan ka tã'agɛ sʋgɛ.
Tɩ pↄka ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arga daan dolɩ a pↄyʋa, wõm Azezi yelle, sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam,
sose ẽ yetɩ, a dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese dee basɛ a pↄyʋa la. Pↄka la daan de la Grɛkɩ, ba dↄgɛ ẽ na Fenisi tẽŋa n boe Siiri so'olʋm pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ kↄma dẽŋɛ di tɩgɛ, se'ere n soe la, la ka masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ kↄma dia bↄ baasɩ."
Tɩ pↄka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, la de la sɩra, la baasɩ n boe ba dãana taablɩ tilum diti la kↄma di-zõra n luti la."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn lerge se'em wã ı̃yã, kule, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la basɛ fʋ pↄyʋa la."
Tɩ pↄka la daan lebe kule, la ẽn paagɛ yire la, a yẽ tɩ a pↄyʋa la gã la bõn-gã'ala pʋam, la kʋlkã'arga la sɩrɩ yese dee basɛ ẽ mɛ.
Azezi le ze'ele Tiiri so'olʋm doose la Sidõ, doose Dekapↄlɩ tẽnsɩ pʋam lebe Galile mõgrɛ la bↄba.
Tɩ ba tarɩ bʋraa n de waŋa, dee ka tãna tↄgra sõŋa wa'am a zẽ'am, wa belem ẽ yetɩ, a dɩkɛ a nu'ugo paglɛ waŋa la zuo.
Tɩ Azezi tarɩ ẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la pʋam yese kẽnkɛrŋa dɩkɛ a nu'ubiɛ tũm a tʋba pʋam, dee tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm kalʋm bʋraa la zɩlɩŋa.
Dee gorge saazuo sı̃'im vo'ose fõo, dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Efata", a võorɛ de la "yo'oge!"
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ bʋraa la tʋba yo'oge, tɩ a zɩlɩŋa lakɛ, tɩ a tↄgra sõŋa sõŋa.
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tↄgɛ bↄ nẽra nẽra. La ẽn daan kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tↄgɛ bↄ nẽra nẽra la, ba daan tõn tↄgra mɛ zozo'e.
Tɩ la di'ige ba zozo'e halɩ tɩ ba yɛta tɩ: "A ẽŋɛ sɛla woo la sõŋa, botɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ mugro tↄgra."
Dabs-bãma pʋam nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n daan le lagsɛ, tɩ dia ka bↄna tɩ ba wʋn di. Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la yele ba yetɩ:
"Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ wã ninbãalga n tarɩ mam, se'ere n soe la, dabsa atã tɩ ba boe mam zẽ'am dee ka tara dia wʋn di.
Mam sãn basɛ ba tɩ ba kule ba yiɛ la kↄm, ba wʋn ka vibe mɛ sore, se'ere n soe la, basɛba ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tã'agɛ yẽ dia tɩ la seke nẽr-bãna wuu, zẽ'e-ẽna n de mõom wã?"
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ la borborɩ balɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Bayopↄɩ."
Tɩ a botɩ nẽrba la zı̃'ire tẽŋa. Dee dɩkɛ borborɩ bayopↄɩ la pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽrba la. Tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la.
La ba daan tarɩ la zũn-pɩgsɩ mẽ fẽe. Tɩ Azezi pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ zũma la ı̃yã, dee botɩ a karẽnbiisi la dɩkɛ pʋɩ nẽrba la.
Tɩ nẽrba la daan di tɩgɛ. Dee tɩ a karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ dia n weege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ bayopↄɩ.
Nẽrba la n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de wʋ tʋsanaasɩ. Tɩ Azezi daan botɩ ba kule,
dee tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la kẽ õorŋↄ sẽŋɛ Dalmanuta so'olʋm.
Tɩ Farisi dõma daan wa'am wa wẽ'era nõke'ene la Azezi, yetɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a botɩ bõn-yãlma ze'ele saazuo ẽŋɛ n pa'alɩ tɩ ẽŋa ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ yire.
Tɩ Azezi sı̃'im vo'ose fõo, dee soke yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ zamãana ẽna nẽrba ɛɛra bõn-yãlma? Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ mam kãn botɩ bõn-yãlma n pa'alɛ bɛla ẽŋɛ tɩ zamãana ẽna yẽ."
La Azezi basɛ ba mɛ dee le kẽ õorŋↄ dↄↄra mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la daan yı̃m ka dɩkɛ borborɩ, sãn dagna borborɩ ayɩla mã'a tɩ ba tarɩ õorŋↄ la pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: "Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma, la naba A'erↄdɩ dãbɩllɛ la."
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la tↄgra la taaba yetɩ: "Tõma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ı̃yã tɩ a yele bɛla."
Tɩ Azezi daan bãŋɛ, soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya tↄgra la taaba tɩ la de la yãma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ı̃yã? Yãma ka wõm a võorɛ? Yãma yɛm ka like?
Yãma tarɩ la nini dee ka yẽta? Ya tarɩ la tʋba dee ka wõnna? Yãma ka tẽrɩ?
Mam n daan fiise borborɩ banuu la bↄ bʋraasɩ tʋsanuu tɩ ba di la, borborɩ gito n deege la, pɩtↄ balɛ tɩ yãma daan vaagɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Pɩtↄ pia la ayi." Tɩ a le soke ba yetɩ:
"La mam n daan fiise borborɩ bayopↄɩ la pʋɩ bʋraasɩ tʋsanaasɩ la, yãma daan vaagɛ sɛba n deege la pɩtↄ balɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Pɩtↄ bayopↄɩ."
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma nãn ka wõm a võorɛ?"
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ la Betisayida. Tɩ ba tarɩ fʋa wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa belem ẽ yetɩ a kalʋm ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ fʋa la nu'ugo ve'ege ẽ tẽŋa la pʋam yese kẽnkɛrŋa, ka tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm ẽŋɛ a nini, dee dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ a zuo, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽtɩ sɛla mɛ bɩɩ?"
Tɩ bʋraa la dↄ'ↄgɛ zuugo bɩsɛ, yetɩ: "Mam yẽtɩ nẽrba tɩ ba ãna wʋ tɩɩsɩ la, la ba sẽnnɩ mɛ."
Tɩ Azezi le dɩkɛ a nu'usi kalʋm fʋa la nini. Tɩ a nini pike yɩlɩŋɛ, tɩ a yẽta sɛla woo sõŋa sõŋa.
Tɩ Azezi basɛ ẽ yetɩ a kule, a da le kẽ tẽŋa la pʋam.
La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan we'esɩ la tẽnsɩ n lɛm tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Filipi Sezaare. La ban boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Nẽrba yetɩ mam de la ãne?"

Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na. Tɩ basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli. Tɩ sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n yʋʋn boe la nẽra ayɩla."
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "La yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?" Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge yetɩ: "Fõn de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na."
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tↄgɛ ẽŋa yelle bↄ nẽra nẽra.

Tɩ Azezi yãŋa zãsna a karẽnbiisi la, yele ba yetɩ: "Dẽnɩ tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nãmsɛ zozo'e. Tẽŋa wã kẽma, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nifo wʋn kẽ mam mɛ, tɩ ba kʋ mam, la dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge mɛ."
A daan tↄgɛ ba la vẽelga vẽelga. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ wi ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka yele ẽ yetɩ, a da le tↄgɛ bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi gelge bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la, dee tãsɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asũtãana, sẽŋɛ lebe mam poorʋm, se'ere n soe la, fʋ tẽ'esgↄ la dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ tẽ'esgↄ, la de la nẽrsaala tẽ'esgↄ."

Dee wi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, la a karẽnbiisi la a zẽ'am, yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a doose mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgↄ daarɛ woo wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka woo n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vↄm mam ı̃yã, la kõ-yẽlga la ı̃yã, a wʋn yẽ vↄm.
Nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia sɛla woo dee koŋe vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorↄ de la bẽm?
Bẽm tɩ nẽrsaala wʋn dɩkɛ teege vↄm? Sɛla kaɩ.

Nẽr-sɛka n zoe yãnnɛ mam ı̃yã, la mam yetↄga la ı̃yã, zamãana ẽna wã n ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ la sɩra, dee dɛna tõon-be'ero dõma wã tẽŋasʋka, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn zoe yãnnɛ na ẽ, wakat-sɛka tɩ a wʋn leme wa'am la a Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa, la a malɛkadõma la."
La a le yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ yãma nẽr-sɛba n boe kalam wã, basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm n sẽm na pãŋa."
Tɩ dabsa ayoobɩ daan tole, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã mã'a doose ẽ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kẽnkɛrŋa ka zom tãn-kãtɛ zuo. Tɩ a nẽŋa teege ba nẽŋam.
Tɩ a futo pelge yɩlɩ yɩlɩ yẽgra halɩ, tɩ nẽra ka bↄna dũnia wã zuo tãna wʋn peege tɩ ba pelge bɛla.
Tɩ A'eli, la Amoyisi puke ba zẽ'am tↄgra la Azezi.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ. Basɛ tɩ tɩ tı̃ põnsɩ batã, bↄ fõn ayɩla, bↄ Amoyisi ayɩla, bↄ A'eli ayɩla."
A daan ka mi ẽŋa n tↄgɛ se'em, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n daan kẽ ba.
Tɩ sawatɛ wa'am wa lile ba la a mã'asʋm. Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: "Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ. Selse-ya a yetↄga."
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ ba bɩsɛ kaagɛ ka le yẽ nẽra, sãn dagna Azezi mã'a n boe ba zẽ'am.
Tɩ ba ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sigra, tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: "Da tↄgɛ-ya pa'alɛ nẽra nẽra yãma n yẽ sɛla la, sãn dagna tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa ki mɛ, dee vo'oge."
Tɩ ba to'oge ẽn yele se'em na, dee sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Kũm vo'ore võorɛ de la bẽm?"
Tɩ ba soke Azezi yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ A'eli dẽŋɛ wa'am, tɩ Krisi yãŋa wa'am poorʋm?"
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Asɩra, A'eli n wʋn dẽŋɛ wa'am wa malgɛ sɛla woo. La bẽm tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la yelle yetɩ, a wʋn nãmsɛ mɛ zozo'e dee yẽ pↄ'ↄrɛ?
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ A'eli põn wa'am mɛ, tɩ nẽrba ẽŋɛ ẽ ban boorɩ se'em, wʋ lan gʋlsɛ a yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam se'em na."
Ban lebe ka lɛm karẽnbiisi basɛba la zẽ'am na, ba yẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e n kaagɛ ba, tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma basɛba wẽ'era nõkɛ'ɛma la ba.
La nẽrba la n daan yẽ Azezi la, la di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba zoe ka pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma wẽ'era nõke'ene la ba?"
Tɩ nẽra ayɩla ze'ele nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tẽŋasʋka yele yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam tarɩ la m dayʋa wa'am fõn zẽ'am, kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ botɩ a dɛna muko.

La kʋlkã'arga la sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a lʋbrɩ ẽ mɛ tɩ nõtõn-fulunfuka yɛsra, tɩ a ↄbra yẽna dee gorŋe. Bɛla tɩ mam tarɩ ẽ wa'am wa sose fʋ karẽnbiisi la yetɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese, tɩ ba ka yãŋɛ."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bↄ'ↄrɩ mam sɩra, mam wʋn bↄna la yãma mã'agɛ m mẽŋa halɩ ka paagɛ la wakat-kãna? Tarɩ-ya bia la wa'am."
Tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ wa'am a zẽ'am. La kʋlkã'arga la n yẽ Azezi la, bilam mẽŋa a dãan bia la mɛ, tɩ a lui tẽŋa bilna, tɩ nõtõn-fulunfuka yɛsra a nõorʋm.
Tɩ Azezi soke bia la sↄ yetɩ: "Wakat-kãna tɩ bõn-ẽna ẽŋɛ ẽ?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "A bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm.
La kʋlkã'arga la ẽn lʋbɛ ẽ na bugum, bɩɩ ko'om pʋam, bↄↄra tɩ a kʋ ẽ. Fʋ sãn tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla, zoe tɩ ninbãalga sõŋɛ tↄ."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fʋ yetɩ, fõn sãn tãna? Nẽr-sɛka woo n bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra, a tã wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla woo bↄ ẽ mɛ."
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ bia la sↄ tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Mam bↄ sɩra, la sõŋɛ mam tɩ m bↄ sɩra pa'asɛ."
La Azezi daan yẽ tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n zotɩ sẽna a zẽ'am, tɩ a tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: "Kʋlkã'arga n botɩ nẽra dɛna muko la waŋa, mam yetɩ fʋ yese dee basɛ ẽ, da le doose ẽ."
Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la kaasɛ tagurga, dee bigse bia la ke'enke'em, dee yese. Tɩ bia la ãna wʋ kũm na. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yetɩ a ki mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ a nu'ugo zẽkɛ ẽ, tɩ a isge ze'ele saazuo.
La Azezi daan kẽ la deem, ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la mã'a, tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ tõma ka tã'agɛ dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽna?"
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Sãn dagna pʋ'ʋsgↄ, sɛla sɛla ka boe n tã wʋn dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽna buuri."
La ba daan yese bilam doose la Galile tẽŋa tole. La Azezi daan ka boorɩ tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ ẽŋa n boe zẽ'a.
A daan zãsʋm a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ la nẽrba nu'usum, tɩ ba kʋ ẽ. La ba sãn kʋ ẽ, dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge mɛ."
Tɩ ba daan ka bãŋɛ yetↄga la võorɛ, dee zↄta ka soke ẽ.
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Kapɛrnaʋm kẽ deem. Tɩ Azezi soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma wẽ'erɩ nɩ nõke'ene sore zuo la?"
Tɩ ba sı̃na, se'ere n soe la, ba wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene la taaba bↄↄra tɩ ba bãŋɛ sɛka n de nẽr-kãtɛ gãnna.
Tɩ Azezi zı̃'ire, wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana, dẽnɩ tɩ a dɛna poorʋm dãana, la nẽrba wuu tõntõnna."
Azezi yele bɛla dee tarɩ la bi-pɩka wa ze'ele ba tẽŋasʋka, dɩkɛ a nu'usi kↄkɛ bia la, dee yele ba yetɩ:
"Nẽra sãn to'oge bi-pɩka ẽna tadãana mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, a to'oge la mam mẽŋa, la nẽra sãn to'oge mam mẽŋa, la dagɩ mam tɩ a to'oge, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na."
Tɩ Azã yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma daan yẽ la bʋraa n tarɩ fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, la ẽŋa n ka po dɛna tõma nẽra la ı̃yã tɩ tõma gu ẽ."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Da gu-ya ẽ, se'ere n soe la, nẽra ka boe wʋn tõm tõon-yãlma la mam yʋ'ʋrɛ, dee tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe tɩ a le tã'agɛ tↄgɛ mam be'em.
Nẽr-sɛka n ka sisri tõma, a de la tõma nẽra.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn bↄ ya ko'om tɩ ya yũ, yãma n de mam n de Krisi nẽrba la ı̃yã, ẽŋa dãana kãn koŋe a yↄↄrↄ.
La nẽra sãn botɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ bãna wã n bↄ mam sɩra la ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, sɩbgrɛ sɛka tɩ a wʋn yẽ la, ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam n sõɩ.
La fʋ nu'ugo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nu'u-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄa, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nu'usi bayi dee kẽ bug-tẽŋa, ((
zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mı̃ dita nẽrba ı̃yã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kı̃ŋra.))

La fʋ nã'arɛ sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nã'a-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄa, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nãma bayi dee tɩ ba dɩkɛ fʋ lobe basɛ bug-tẽŋa, ((
zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mı̃ dita nẽrba ı̃yã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kı̃ŋra.))
La fʋ nifo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ kɩrgɛ ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nin-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nini bayi dee tɩ ba lobe fʋ basɛ bug-tẽŋa,
zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mı̃ dita nẽrba ı̃yã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kı̃ŋra.
Ba wʋn dɩkɛ la bugum makɛ nẽrba wuu wʋ ban dɩkɛ yaarʋm yugse sɛla.
Yaarʋm ãn sõŋa mɛ, la yaarʋm sãn sabgɛ, ba wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne botɩ a le ãna yẽlʋm? Ãna-ya wʋ yaarʋm n tarɩ yẽlʋm se'em na, dee tara sũ-mã'asʋm la taaba."
La Azezi daan ze'ele zẽ'e-ẽŋa sẽŋɛ la Zude so'olʋm, Zʋrdẽ doone ke bↄba. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e le lagsɛ a zẽ'am, tɩ a zãsna ba wʋ ẽŋa n ẽn ɩta se'em na.
Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba wa'am tɩ ba di a yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋraa tarɩ nõorɛ tɩ a lebse a pↄga mɛ bɩɩ?"
Tɩ a lebe soke ba yetɩ: "Amoyisi yʋʋn bↄ ya nõorɛ yetɩ bẽm?"
Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Amoyisi yʋʋn sakɛ tɩ tɩ gʋlsɛ la pↄgdire lebsgo gõŋↄ, dee tarɩ ẽ ka lebse."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "La de la ya sũure n kɛ tɩ ya ka sakɛ pa'algↄ la ı̃yã tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ nõor-ẽŋa bↄ ya.
La halɩ dũnia pı̃'iluŋo, Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn nãam nẽrsaalba la, a nãam la bʋraa la pↄka.
Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ bʋraa wʋn basɛ a sↄ, la a ma, dee lagɩm na a pↄga.
La ba ka le dɛna bayi, ba lebge la ayɩla.
Bɛla, sɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lagɩm na taaba, nẽrsaala da welge ba."
La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la kẽ la deem, tɩ ba le soke ẽ yelle ẽŋa võorɛ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Bʋraa sãn lebse a pↄga dee di pↄka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɩ la a tadãana pↄga.
La pↄka mẽ sãn basɛ a sɩra dee ele bʋraa ayẽma, a mẽ ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ a gã'arɛ la bʋraa n dagɩ a sɩra."
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e tarɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la zɛbɛ nẽrba la.

La Azezi n yẽ bɛla la, la ka ẽŋɛ a sũure yẽlʋm, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya kↄm-pɩgsɩ la tɩ ba wa'am mam zẽ'am, da gu'ura-ya ba, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄma wã bõnↄ.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n ka sakɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ sↄna ẽ wʋ bia la, a kãn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
A yele bɛla, dee to'ose kↄma la mɛ, dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto kã kã'a-sõma bↄ ba.
Azezi daan basɛ bilam dee le dɩkɛ la sore sẽnna. Tɩ bʋraa zoe wa'am a zẽ'am, wa ka dũma a nẽŋam soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fõn de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ?"
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fõn wi'ira mam tɩ nẽr-sõŋↄ? Nẽra ka boe n ãn sõŋa sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
Fõn mi Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em: 'Da kʋ nẽra, da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pↄga, da zũ, da tↄgɛ põmpↄrŋↄ kaseto, da wẽgɛ nẽra, nanna fʋ sↄ, la fʋ ma.' "
Tɩ bʋraa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, halɩ mam bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm tɩ mam põn sakra bõn-bãma wuu."

Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ ẽ nõŋɛ ẽ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sɛla ayɩla n deege dɛna fʋ ẽŋɛ: Sẽŋɛ ka koose fõn tarɩ sɛla la wuu dɩkɛ ligri la bↄ nasdõma, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bõntarsõm Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee wa'am wa dↄla mam."
La ẽn wõm wãna la, tɩ a nẽŋa zũŋe tɩ a fõrgɛ la sũ-sã'aŋↄ, se'ere n soe la, a tarɩ la bõntarsõm zo'oge.
Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la kaagɛ, dee yele ba yetɩ: "La tↄ mɛ bↄ bõntatba tɩ ba kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
Tɩ a yetↄga la di'ige a karẽnbiisi la. Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "M kↄma, la tↄ mɛ tɩ nẽra kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
La de la nãana tɩ yʋgnɛ doose fupı̃im yoko pʋam yese, gãnna bõntarsa n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
Tɩ la di'ige ba halɩ zozo'e, tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "La sãn dɛna bɛla, ãne n wʋn tã'agɛ yẽ fãarɛ?"
Tɩ Azezi bɩsra ba dee yetɩ: "Nẽrsaala ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, la Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn ẽŋɛ mɛ. Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ tã sɛla woo ɩta mɛ."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma basɛ sɛla woo mɛ dee dↄla fõn."
Tɩ Azezi yele yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n basɛ a yire, bɩɩ a kẽendõma, la a yɩbsɩ, bɩɩ a ma, bɩɩ a sↄ, bɩɩ a kↄma, bɩɩ a vatↄ mam ı̃yã, la Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la ı̃yã,
dũnia wã zuo a wʋn to'oge yiɛ, la kẽendõma, la yɩbsɩ, la madõma, la kↄma, la vatↄ nõor-kↄbga, la a wʋn yẽ nãmsgↄ. La wakatɛ n sẽm, a wʋn yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ.
La nẽŋam dõma zozo'e wʋn lebge poorʋm dõma, tɩ poorʋm dõma lebge nẽŋam dõma."

Ba daan boe la sore wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi bↄna ba nẽŋa. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la palẽŋa ẽgra, dee tɩ dabeem tara nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ ba la. Tɩ Azezi le tarɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la sẽŋɛ ka tↄgra pa'ala ba bõn-sɛba n wʋn wa ẽŋɛ ẽŋa,

yetɩ: "Ya yẽ ya, tɩ we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm, bilam tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nu'usum. Tɩ ba wʋn tↄgɛ a yelle kʋ yetɩ a masɛ la kũm, dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ bu-zãŋsɩ nu'usum,
tɩ ba la ẽ, dee tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mı̃ ẽ, wẽ ẽ na ka'asa dee kʋ ẽ. La a wʋn vo'oge dabsa atã daarɛ."
Tɩ Azebede kↄma Azakɩ la Azã sẽŋɛ lɛm Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma boorɩ la tõma n wʋn sose fõn bõn-sɛka la, fʋ ẽŋɛ bↄ tↄ."
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bↄ ya?"
Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn wa dita fʋ na'am na, botɩ tõma nẽra ayɩla zı̃'ire fʋ zʋʋgↄ, tɩ ayɩla zı̃'ire fʋ gↄbga."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Ya ka mi yãma n sosrɩ sɛla. Ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ nãmsgↄ sɛka tɩ mam nãmsrɩ wã, bɩɩ ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ wʋ mam n sakɛ tɩ m nãmsɛ se'em na halɩ ka ki?"
Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ bɛla." Tɩ Azezi lebe yele ba yetɩ: "Asɩra, ya wʋn nãmsɛ nãmsgↄ sɛka tɩ mam nãmsrɩ wã halɩ ka ki.
La, la dagɩ mam n wʋn looge sɛka n wʋn zı̃'ire mam zʋʋgↄ bɩɩ mam gↄbga. Nawẽnnɛ mãasʋm zẽ'e-bãma tɩ a bↄ la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a yetɩ a bↄ la."
La karẽnbiisi pia la n wõm bɛla la, ba sũure n isge la Azakɩ la Azã.
Tɩ Azezi wi ba wuu, yele ba yetɩ: "Ya mi tɩ dũnia wã na'adõma soe ba nẽrba la pãŋa, dee tɩ kɛ'ɛndõma pẽrgra nẽrba tɩ ba ɩta bãma n boorɩ se'em.
La yãma pʋam, la kãn dɛna bɛla. Nẽr-sɛka n boe ya pʋam bↄↄra tɩ a lebge nẽr-keko, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya tõntõnna.
La nẽr-sɛka n boorɩ tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana ya pʋam, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya wuu yamŋa.
Se'ere n soe la, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ nẽrba tõm bↄ ẽ, a wa'am tɩ a tõm mɛ bↄ, dee dɩkɛ a vↄm bↄ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yẽ fãarɛ."

Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ dↄla la Zeriko tẽŋa pʋam tↄlla, la ban daan ze'ele tẽŋa la pʋam yɛsra la, nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n dolɩ ba. Tɩ fʋa zẽa sore nõorʋm sↄsra, a yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Abartime, a de la Atime dayʋa.
La ẽn wõm tɩ ba tↄgrɩ tɩ la de la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ la, tɩ a tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Azezi, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga."
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e tãsɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Go'oge fʋ yetↄga la." Tɩ a malɩn tı̃i tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga."
Tɩ Azezi ze'ele dee yetɩ: "Wi-ya ẽ tɩ a wa'am." Tɩ ba wi ẽ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Keŋe fʋ sũure, isge tɩ a wi'iri fo."
Tɩ a lobe a fugↄbga basɛ, dee vaa isge sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bↄ fↄ?" Tɩ a yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, mam boorɩ tɩ m le yẽta mɛ."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ, fõn bↄ mam sɩra la ı̃yã tɩ fʋ yẽ laafɛ." Tɩ fʋa la yẽta bilam mẽŋa, dↄla Azezi sore la zuo.
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka yↄna la Zerizalɛm, lɛm Betɩfaazɩ la Betani, Oliivi tãŋa la zẽ'am. Tɩ a tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi,
yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽn-sɛka n boe ya nẽŋa la pʋam. Ya sãn paagɛ mı̃, ya wʋn yẽ bõn-biire tɩ ba lʋ ze'ele, tɩ nẽra nãn ka bã ẽ. Ya lorge ẽ tarɩ wa'am.
La nẽra sãn soke ya yetɩ: 'Wãne tɩ ya lↄrgra ẽ?', ya lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana la n boorɩ ẽ', tɩ a wʋn basɛ tɩ ya tarɩ ẽ leme wa'am tↄtↄ."
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka yẽ bõn-biire la n lʋ zanõrʋm sore nõorʋm, tɩ ba lorge ẽ.
La nẽrba basɛba n daan ze bilam soke ba yetɩ: "Wãne tɩ yãma lↄrgra bõn-biire la?"
Tɩ ba lerge wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na, tɩ nẽrba la basɛ ba.
Tɩ ba tarɩ bõn-biire la sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am, ka dɩkɛ ba futo paglɛ a zuo, tɩ Azezi bã.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yɛrgɛ ba futo sore zuo, tɩ basɛba sẽŋɛ va'am ka kↄ võorↄ wa yɛrgɛ sore zuo.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n boe a nẽŋa, la sɛba n boe a poorʋm na daan tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Ozaana! Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.
Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm tɩ a di tɩ yaaba Adavidi na'am na. Ozaana! Nã'asɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum."
Tɩ Azezi paagɛ Zerizalɛm kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na bɩsɛ sɛla woo kaagɛ. Tɩ wẽnnɛ mã'agɛ, tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yese sẽŋɛ Betani.
Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ ba ze'ele Betani lɛbra Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kↄm dõnna.

Tɩ a yẽ kẽnkãŋa n ze zãazãarɛ tara võorↄ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ tɩ a ka bɩsɛ a na'an wʋn yẽ sɛla kẽnkãŋa la zuo. La ẽn paagɛ la, a ka yẽ sɛla a zuo, a yẽ la võorↄ mã'a. Se'ere n soe la, kẽnkãma wakatɛ daan nãn ka paagɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yele kẽnkãŋa la yetɩ: "Nẽra kãn le malɩn di fʋ biɛ." Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wõm.

Tɩ ba paagɛ Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam digra nẽr-sɛba n koosrɩ, la sɛba n da'arɩ Wẽndeem na tɩ ba yɛsra. Dee zã'agɛ lig-tɛɛrba taablɩdõma, la sɛba n koosrɩ na'adawɛma la kʋgsɩ lʋbɛ.
La a daan ka sakɛ tɩ nẽra zɛɛra sɛla dↄla Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam.
Dee daan zãsna nẽrba la yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Ba wʋn wi'ira mam deego la tɩ pʋ'ʋsgↄ deego buuri wuu ı̃yã.' La yãma dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la nayigba lagsgↄ zẽ'a."
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma wõm bɛla, ɛɛra bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ ẽ, la ba zotɩ ẽ mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a zãsŋↄ la daan kẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la sũure mɛ zozo'e.
Tɩ zaanõorɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi yese tẽŋa la pʋam.
Tɩ bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ tɩ ba dↄla sore la, yẽ kẽnkãŋa la n kʋɩ la yẽga wuu.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, yele Azezi yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, bɩsɛ, kẽnkãŋa la tɩ fʋ kã be'em bↄ ẽ na kʋɩ mɛ."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bↄ-ya Nawẽnnɛ sɩra.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn yele tãn-ẽna yetɩ: 'Võogɛ ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam', dee bↄ sɩra a sũure pʋam tɩ ẽŋa n yele se'em na wʋn ẽŋɛ, dee ka sẽ'ena, la wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ.
Bɛla tɩ mam yetɩ, ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ sↄsra sɛla, bↄ-ya Nawẽnnɛ sɩra tɩ ya to'oge ya, tɩ ya wʋn sɩrɩ to'oge.
La ya sãn bↄna mı̃ pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, ya sãn tara yelle la nẽra, basɛ-ya ẽ taalɛ, tɩ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum mẽ basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ. ((
Yãma sãn ka basɛ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ ya be'em na taalɛ, ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum mẽ kãn basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ.))"
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la le sẽŋɛ la Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na ɛɛra. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am,
ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ nõorɛ la bɛ ɩta bõn-bãna? Bɩɩ ãne n bↄ fõn nõorɛ tɩ fõn ɩta bõn-bãna?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam wʋn soke ya sokre ayɩla, tɩ ya sãn lerge mam, mam mẽ wʋn yele ya nõor-sɛka tɩ mam tarɩ ɩta bõn-bãna.
Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ bɩɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba? Lerge-ya ma."
Tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: "Tɩ sãn lerge yetɩ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ, a wʋn yetɩ, bẽm ı̃yã tɩ tõma ka sakɛ ẽ?
Tɩ mẽ kãn tã'agɛ yetɩ la de la nẽrsaalba n tõm ẽ." Ba daan zotɩ la nẽrba la, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba la wuu daan sakɛ tɩ Azã sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
Tɩ ba koŋe lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma ka mi." Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam mẽ kãn yele ya mam n yẽ nõorɛ zẽ'e-sɛka ɩta bõn-bãma."

Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi daan magsrɩ la magsa tↄgra bↄ'ↄra ba yetɩ: "Bʋraa ayɩla n daan kↄ a va'am sele tɩɩsɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ n de viinye, mẽ lalga kaagɛ ẽ, dee tũ boko tɩ ba wẽkra viinye la biɛ, dee mẽ de-woko tɩ ba zↄnna bɩsra a va'am na, yãŋa dɩkɛ va'am na bↄ nẽrba tɩ ba bɩsra, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
Tɩ viinye la biɛ go'osgo wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna tɩ a sẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am ka to'oge a pʋrɛ wa'am wa bↄ ẽ.
Tɩ ba yõkɛ tõntõnna la wẽ, botɩ a lebe kule zãŋa.
Tɩ va'am na dãana le tõm nẽra ayɩla ba zẽ'am, tɩ ba wẽ a zuugo ãagɛ, dee yaalɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a le malɩn tõm nẽra ayɩla, tɩ ba kʋ ẽ. Tɩ a tõm nẽrba zozo'e, tɩ ba wẽ basɛba, dee kʋ basɛba.
La nẽra ayɩla mã'a n daan deege tɩ a tãna wʋn tõm, la de la a bi-nõŋrɛ. Tɩ a daan tõm ẽ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am, dee tẽ'esra yetɩ: 'Ẽna n de mam dayʋa la, ba wʋn nan ẽ.'
Tɩ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na yele taaba yetɩ: 'Ẽna n wʋn wa sↄↄgɛ sↄna a sↄ bõntarsõm na, basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ kʋ ẽ, tɩ bõntarsõm na lebge tõma bõnↄ.'
Tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ kʋ, tarɩ ẽ yese va'am na kẽnkɛrŋa ka basɛ.
Bɛla, va'am na dãana yãŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne? A wʋn wa'am wa kʋ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na mɛ, dee to'oge va'am na bↄ basɛba.
Yãma põn karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ zẽ'e-sɛka n gʋlsɛ yetɩ: 'Kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la n lebge kugre n botɩ deego la tara pãŋa.
La de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, tɩ la dɛna yel-di'iŋa bↄ tõma.' "
Tɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadõma la daan ɛɛra tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi, se'ere n soe la, ba mi tɩ la de la bãma ı̃yã tɩ a makɛ makrɛ ẽŋa, la ba daan zotɩ la nẽrba la, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
Tɩ ba tõm Farisi dõma basɛba, la naba A'erↄdɩ nẽrba basɛba, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka soke Azezi sokre tɩ a tↄgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yẽ sore yõkɛ ẽ.

Tɩ ba wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ fõn de la sɩra dãana, dee ka fabla nẽrba n tↄgrɩ fõn yelle se'em na, fõn ka tũ'usri nẽrba, la fõn zãsnɩ nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ sore yɛla la sɩra. Tõma yetɩ tɩ soke bɩsɛ, sore boe tɩ tɩ yↄ lampo bↄ Rom na-keko bɩɩ, sore ka boe? Tɩ yↄ bɩɩ tɩ da yↄ?"
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ tɩ ba boorɩ tɩ ba bẽrɛ ẽŋa mɛ, soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya bẽta ma? Tarɩ-ya lagfↄ wa'am tɩ m bɩsɛ."
Tɩ ba tarɩ lagfↄ la wa'am wa bↄ ẽ. Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne yinyisŋa, la ãne yʋ'ʋrɛ n gʋlsɛ a zuo?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "La de la Rom na-keko la."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bↄ-ya na-keko la ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka, dee bↄ Nawẽnnɛ ẽn soe bõn-sɛka." Tɩ Azezi yetↄga la di'ige ba.
Saduse dõma n yetɩ nẽra sãn ki a kãn vo'oge la, bãma nẽrba basɛba n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ:
"Karẽnsãama, Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ bↄ tõma yetɩ: 'Nẽra sↄbia sãn ki deege a pↄga dee ka tara bia, a di pↄkõorɛ la dↄgɛ kↄma bↄ sɛka n ki la.'
La bʋraasɩ bayopↄɩ n daan boe dɛna sↄbiisi. Tɩ pↄspↄsɩ dãana la di pↄga, ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia.
Tɩ bʋyi dãana la di pↄkõorɛ la, mẽ ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia. Tɩ bʋtã dãana la mẽ ẽŋɛ bɛla.
La bãma bayopↄɩ la wuu lagɩm di pↄka la mɛ, ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia. Bɛla poorʋm tɩ pↄka la mẽ ki.
Bãma bayopↄɩ wuu n lagɩm di pↄka la dee ki la, ba sãn wa vo'oge kũm vo'ore daarɛ, ãne n wʋn sↄna pↄka la?"
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Ya tuuge mɛ, yãma n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yele se'em, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa n ãn se'em na ı̃yã.
Kũm vo'ore daarɛ, bʋraasɩ ka diti pↄgba, la pↄgsɩ mẽ ka ellɩ sɩrba, ba wuu wʋn ãna wʋ malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire la.

La sãn dɛna kũm vo'ore yelle, yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Amoyisi gõŋↄ la pʋam Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn ze'ele tũntuugo la pʋam tↄgɛ la ẽ se'em na? A yʋʋn yele yetɩ: 'Mam de la Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ Nawẽnnɛ.'
La pa'alɛ tɩ bãma wuu vↄa mɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ dagɩ sɛba n ki Nawẽnnɛ, a de la sɛba n vↄa Nawẽnnɛ. Ya tuuge mɛ zozo'e."

Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nẽra ayɩla wõm ban tↄgrɩ la taaba, dee bãŋɛ tɩ Azezi lerge Saduse dõma la sõŋa, tɩ a lɛm ẽ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em na wuu pʋam, bõn-kãna n gãnnɩ?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Sɛka n gãnnɩ wuu n wãna: 'Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma, selse-ya. Zuudãana n de tɩ Nawẽnnɛ na, de la Zuudãana ayɩla.
Nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de fʋ Zuudãana la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu.'
La bʋyi dãana n wãna: 'Nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na.' Nõorɛ ayẽma ka boe n gãnnɩ bãna."
Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fõn yele se'em na ãn sõŋa, la de la sɩra, Nawẽnnɛ de la ayɩla, ayẽma ka boe sãn dagna ẽŋa mã'a.
Fʋ nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu, la fʋ nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na, ãn sõŋa mɛ gãnna kãabgↄ buuri wuu."
Tɩ Azezi yẽ ẽn lerge la yɛm na, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ ka zãagɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm." Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka le saagɛ soke ẽ sokre.
Azezi n daan zãsnɩ nẽrba Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, a soke ba yetɩ: "Wãne tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ Krisi de la naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa?
Dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa yʋʋn botɩ Adavidi mẽŋa tↄgɛ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele mam Zuudãana yetɩ, zı̃'ire m zʋʋgↄ bↄba halɩ tɩ m wa ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛ'ɛba la tɩ ba bↄna fʋ nãma tẽŋa.'
Adavidi mẽŋa sãn wi ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana', la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ a dɛna Adavidi yɩɩŋa?" Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la sɛlsra a yetↄga la sũ-yẽlʋm.
Azezi n zãsnɩ nẽrba la, a yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse ya mẽŋa la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n eerɩ kaara la fu-wogro bↄↄra tɩ nẽrba pʋ'ʋsra nã'asra ba da'asʋm,
dee bↄↄra nã'asgↄ zẽ'esɩ wẽndeto pʋam, la dia zẽ'esʋm tɩ ba zẽa la.
Ba to'osrɩ la pↄkõpa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ pʋ'ʋs-wogro tɩ nẽrba bɩsra ba. Ba wʋn yẽ sɩbgrɛ gãnna wuu."
Azezi daan zı̃ la Wẽnde-kãtʋm ligri daka la zẽ'am dee bɩsra nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n sẽnnɩ ɩta ligri daka la pʋam. Tɩ bõntatba zozo'e ɩta ligri pãɩ.
Tɩ pↄkõorɛ n de nasa wa'am wa dɩkɛ lig-kõb-pɩgsɩ bayi mã'a ẽŋɛ mı̃.
Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la, yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ pↄkõorɛ ẽna n de nasa la ẽŋɛ ligri daka la pʋam zo'oge gãnna ba wuu mɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, bãma wuu looge la bãma n tarɩ sɛla pãɩ la pʋam wa ẽŋɛ mı̃. La ẽŋa n de nasa la, dɩkɛ la a dia ligri wuu wa ẽŋɛ mı̃."
Azezi daan ze'ele la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na yɛsra, tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, bɩsɛ kuga n ba ãna sõŋa tɩ ba dɩkɛ mẽ de-kãra se'em."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ de-kãra wã, ba wʋn lʋbɛ ba wuu mɛ saam saam tɩ kugre baa ayɩla kãn weege a tadãana zuo."
La Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zẽa la Oliivi tãŋa zuo tɩ a nẽŋa bɩsra Wẽnde-kãtɛ la. La Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la A'ãndre mã'a n daan boe a zẽ'am,
soke ẽ yetɩ: "Yele to, wakat-kãna tɩ bõn-ẽŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ, la bẽm n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ wakatɛ la paagɛ mɛ tɩ bõn-bãma wuu wʋn ẽŋɛ?"
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse-ya tɩ nẽra da pã'asɛ ya tɩ ya tuuge.
Nẽrba zozo'e n wʋn dɩkɛ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ wa'am wa pã'asra ya, tɩ ba nẽra woo yetɩ: 'Mam n de Krisi la.' La ba wʋn botɩ nẽrba zozo'e tuuge mɛ.
Ya sãn wa wõm zɛbrɛ dãmnɛ, la zɛbrɛ yelle, da basɛ-ya tɩ dabeem kẽ ya, dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-bãma ẽŋɛ. La, la nãn ka de dũnia ba'asgↄ.

Buuri ayɩla wʋn isge zɛbra la buuri ayẽma, tɩ so'olʋm ayɩla isge zɛbra la so'olʋm ayẽma. La tẽŋa wʋn tı̃i mı̃im mɛ zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, la kↄm wʋn bↄna. Bɛla wuu nãn de la toogo la sẽŋrɛ, la ãn wʋ pↄka virgre toogo n nãn sẽŋrɩ la.

Guuse ya mẽŋa, tɩ nẽrba wʋn tarɩ ya mɛ sẽŋɛ ka sãm ba sarɩyadia zẽ'esʋm, tɩ ba wẽ ya ba wẽndeto pʋam. La ba wʋn tarɩ ya sẽŋɛ gↄmnadõma, la na'adõma nẽŋam mam ı̃yã. La ya wʋn tↄgɛ mam yɛla pa'alɛ ba.
La dẽnɩ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la dẽŋɛ mõolɛ bↄ buuri wuu, dee tɩ dũnia ba'asgↄ paagɛ.

La ba sãn wa yõgɛ ya tarɩ sẽŋɛ ka sãm sarɩyadia zẽ'am, ya da fabla yãma n wʋn tↄgɛ se'em, wakatɛ sãn wa paagɛ, tↄgɛ-ya yetↄg-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya la, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ ya mẽŋa n wʋn tↄgɛ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wʋn sõŋɛ ya.
Sↄbia wʋn botɩ ba yõkɛ sↄbia kʋ, tɩ sↄ mẽ wʋn ẽŋɛ a bia bɛla, la kↄma wʋn zɛbra la ba sↄdõma, la ba madõma botɩ ba kʋ ba.
Nẽrba zozo'e wʋn sise ya mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã. La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn mõrgɛ ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ ka paagɛ ba'asgↄ wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.
Ya wʋn wa yẽ sɛka n de bõn-be'ego n sã'anɩ sɛla woo la, tɩ a boe zẽ'e-sɛka n ka masɛ tɩ a bↄna la." (Sɛka n karẽŋrɩ la mõrgɛ wõm a võorɛ.) "Ya sãn yẽ bɛla, sɛba n boe Zude zoe zom tãnsɩ zuo.
La nẽr-sɛka n boe gↄsgↄ da sige bↄↄra tɩ a kẽ deem dɩkɛ sɛla.
La nẽr-sɛka n boe va'am da kãn lebe kule yire tɩ a dɩkɛ a fuugo.
Dabs-bãma, la wʋn dɛna la toogo bↄ pↄg-sɛba n tarɩ pʋa la, la sɛba n tarɩ kↄma tɩ ba mõgra la.
Sose-ya Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yel-bãma da wa dɛna ↄↄrↄ wakatɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, dabs-bãma wʋn dɛna la toogo zozo'e, tɩ ba nãn ka yẽ halɩ pı̃'iluŋo tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nãam dũnia wa paam zı̃na, la toog-ẽŋa buuri kãn le malɩn wa'am.
Nawẽnnɛ sãn ka bo'oge nɩ dabs-bãma sõorɛ, nẽra ka boe nɩ n wʋn põsɛ. La Nawẽnnɛ mẽŋa nẽrba tɩ a looge la ı̃yã, tɩ a bo'oge dabs-bãma sõorɛ.
La nẽra sãn yele ya yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, Krisi boe la kalam', bɩɩ 'bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke', ya da sakɛ.

Nẽrba n wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Krisi, la nẽrba n wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba tõm tõon-yãlma, la yel-kɩrsɩ, bↄↄra tɩ ba sãn tã'agɛ, ba botɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la tuuge doose ba.
Guuse ya mẽŋa, tɩ mam dẽŋɛ yele ya sɛla woo mɛ."
Azezi le yele yetɩ: "Toogo la dabsa poorʋm, wẽntulle wʋn sobge mɛ, tɩ wõrga kãn le nẽera a peelem.
La wõrbiɛ wʋn ze'ele saazuum lui. La bõn-sɛba n boe saazuum wʋn mı̃im mɛ.
La ba wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n boe sawara pʋam sẽna la pãn-kãtɛ, tɩ a na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ.
La a wʋn tõm a malɛkadõma mɛ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ dũnia gↄbga la zʋʋgↄ, la dapoore la zanõrɛ, ka lagsɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ a looge la halɩ ka paagɛ dũnia tɛka wuu."
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Dɩkɛ-ya makrɛ la kẽnkãŋa bãŋɛ zãsŋↄ la võorɛ. Kẽnkãŋa wila sãn wa pusra võorↄ, ya mi tɩ sigre lɛm mɛ.
Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn wa yẽ tɩ bõn-bãma wuu ɩtɩ, ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lɛm mɛ, a boe la zanõrʋm.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ɩta mɛ dee tɩ zamãan-ẽna yãŋa tole.
Saazuum la tẽŋa wʋn tole mɛ, la mam yetↄga kãn malɩn tole.
Nẽra nẽra ka mi daar-sɛka la wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am. Baa malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire, bɩɩ Dayʋa la mẽŋa ka mi, sãn dagna Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
Guuse ya mẽŋa sõŋa, la ya mãasʋm, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi wakatɛ la.
La wʋn ãna wʋ bʋraa n we'esɩ sore dee dɩkɛ a yire gu'ule a tõntõnɩba, bↄ tõntõnna woo a tõonɛ, dee yele zanõr-gu'ura tɩ a gu'ura.
Bɛla ı̃yã gu'ura-ya, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi wakat-sɛka tɩ yidãana la wʋn leme wa'am. A tã wʋn leme wa'am zaanõorɛ mɛ, bɩɩ sõnsʋa, bɩɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ kaasga wakatɛ, bɩɩ bulika.
Guuse-ya tɩ yidãana la da wa'am wa di'ige ya, tɩ ya gı̃sri mɛ.
Mam n yetɩ ya se'em na, mam yetɩ nẽrba wuu la bɛla, gu'ura-ya."
La daan deege la dabsa ayi tɩ Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa tɩ ba obrɩ borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ dabsa paagɛ. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma ɛɛra sore tɩ ba sʋgɛ yõkɛ Azezi kʋ.
Tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: "Tɩ da kãn ẽŋɛ-ya bɛla kibsa wã pʋam, tɩ nẽrba la wʋn gire mɛ."

Azezi daan boe la Betani, Asimõ n wa dɛna kõnkonne yire, tɩ ba daan bↄna mı̃ dita. Tɩ pↄka tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ ka-sõma ligri n zo'oge tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ naarɩ, wa'am wa vuke dugla la, ka'agɛ kaam na ẽŋɛ Azezi zuugo.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba n boe bilam na sũure sã'am, tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ pↄka la sã'am ka-sõma la wãna?
Ba tã nɩ wʋn koose ba gãŋɛ lig-kõba kↄbstã mɛ, dɩkɛ ligri la bↄ nasdõma." Tɩ ba zɛrgɛ pↄka la.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya pↄka la bãalam, bẽm tɩ ya tↄgra ẽ tɩ a sũure sã'am? Ẽn ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ mam na de la tõon-sõŋↄ.
Nasdõma boe la ya lɛ mɛ wakatɛ wuu, ya tã wʋn ẽŋɛ ba sõŋa mɛ yan boorɩ wakat-sɛka, la mam kãn bↄna la ya lɛ wakatɛ wuu.
Ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la, tɩ a ẽŋɛ. Ẽn ka'agɛ ka-sõma la ẽŋɛ mam ı̃yã la, a dẽŋɛ ẽŋɛ la ban wʋn ẽŋɛ mam se'em mam laarɛ daarɛ.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ dũnia wã zẽ'e-sɛka wuu tɩ ba wʋn wa mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la, ba mẽ wʋn tↄgɛ pↄka wã n ẽŋɛ mam se'em wã, tɩ ba tẽra a yelle."
Tɩ Azudaasɩ Iskariyo n de Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla sẽŋɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma zẽ'am, ka yele ba tɩ ẽŋa wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi.
La ban daan wõm ẽn yele se'em na, tɩ ba sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ ba yetɩ bãma wʋn bↄ ẽ ligri. Tɩ Azudaasɩ yãŋa ɛɛra so-sɛka tɩ a wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yãŋɛ yõkɛ ẽ na.

Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa la pↄspↄsɩ daarɛ tɩ ba kʋʋrɩ pebilsi dita Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la n daan paagɛ. Tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ la bɛ ka mãasʋm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la tɩ fʋ di?"
Tɩ Azezi tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ ya wʋn tʋ'ʋsɛ bʋraaga n tʋ yoore la ko'om, ya doose ẽ
sẽŋɛ yi-sɛka tɩ a wʋn kẽ la, ka yele yidãana la yetɩ: 'Karẽnsãama la yetɩ, deego boe la bɛ, tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi wʋn di Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la?'
A wʋn pa'alɛ ya de-kãtɛ n boe ayẽma zuo, tɩ sɛla woo mãasʋm bↄna mı̃. Bilam tɩ ya wʋn mãasʋm tɩ tɩ di kibsa la."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yese sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la pʋam ka yẽ sɛla woo wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na. Tɩ ba mãasʋm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la bilam.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la wa'am,
wa zẽa dita, tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ ya nẽra ayɩla n diti la mam kalam n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam."
Tɩ la daan sã'am ba sũure. Tɩ ba sↄkra ẽ ayɩla ayɩla yetɩ: "La de la mam?"
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "La de la ya nẽrba pia la ayi la nẽr-sɛka n wʋn yɛglɛ la mam tũm a nu'ugo laaga pʋam na.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn ki wʋ lan põn gʋlsɛ a yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam se'em na. La sɛka n yetɩ a pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn yẽ toogo. Nẽr-ẽŋa ma sãn ka dↄgɛ nɩ ẽ n sõɩ."
La ban daan diti la, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "To'oge-ya di, ẽna wã de la mam ı̃yã."
Dee dɩkɛ bõn-yũula pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee bↄ ba, tɩ ba wuu yũ.
Dee yele ba yetɩ: "Bãna wã de la mam zɩɩm n wʋn yese saagɛ nẽrba zozo'e ı̃yã, pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bı̃ŋe nõorɛ la ba.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ mam kãn le yũ viinye biɛ bõn-yũula wã, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn le yũ ba Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
Tɩ ba yõom yõoma pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee yese wɛ'ɛsa Oliivi tãŋam.
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Yãma wuu wʋn lebe la poorʋm dee basɛ mam, se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn kʋ dũnsı̃ina dee tɩ piisi la wɩrgɛ.' "
La Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "La mam sãn wa vo'oge, mam wʋn dẽŋɛ ya sẽŋɛ Galile."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Baa ba wuu sãn lebe poorʋm dee basɛ fõn, mam kãn basɛ fõn."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ zı̃na, yʋ'ʋŋↄ ẽna wã, lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rↄↄgↄ n wʋn kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Baa la sãn dɛna tɩ mam lagɩm na fõn ki, mam kãn malɩn sɩ'ɩsɛ fõn." Tɩ karẽnbiisi la wuu lagɩm yele bɛla.
Tɩ ba paagɛ zẽ'e-sɛka yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Getsemane la. Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Zı̃'ire-ya kalam dee tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ."
La a tarɩ la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã sẽŋɛ. Tɩ a sũure sã'am zozo'e, tɩ la dãan ẽ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Sũ-sã'aŋↄ n tarɩ mam zozo'e tɩ mam ãna wʋ m yetɩ m ki mɛ na. Weege-ya kalam gu'ura, da gı̃se-ya."
La a sẽŋɛ la nẽŋa fẽe, ka võglɛ tẽŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ, la sãn tãna, toogo la fõrgɛ dee basɛ ẽ.
Dee yetɩ: "M Sↄ, fõn tã sɛla woo ɩta, basɛ tɩ nãmsgↄ ẽna fõrgɛ dee basɛ ma. La, la da kãn dɛna mam n boorɩ se'em, la dɛna fõn boorɩ se'em."
La a leme a karẽnbiisi batã la zẽ'am wa yẽ tɩ ba gı̃sri mɛ, tɩ a soke Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asimõ, fõn gı̃sri mɛ? Fõn ka tã wʋn gu karf-ayɩla ka gı̃se?"
Dee yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya gẽem dee pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui. Ya sɩa la boorɩ mɛ, la ya ı̃yã ka tara pãŋa."
La a daan le lebe ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ wʋ ẽn pʋ'ʋsɛ se'em na.
Dee le leme wa yẽ tɩ ba gı̃sri mɛ, se'ere n soe la, gẽem n ba tarɩ ba. Tɩ ba ka mina ban wʋn yele ẽ se'em.
A daan le sẽŋɛ mɛ, dee leme wa'am nõorɛ atã pʋam wa soke ba yetɩ: "Ya ken vↄ'ↄsra mɛ dee gı̃sra? La ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ mɛ, wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ tõon-be'ero dõma nu'usum.
Isge-ya tɩ sẽŋɛ, tɩ sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam na n wãna sẽm."

Azezi n daan ken tↄgra la, tɩ Azudaasɩ n de a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla, doose la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ sẽŋɛ paam. La nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la daan tarɩ la sʋkↄbrↄ, la dↄa dↄla ẽ. La de la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma n tõm ba.
La Azudaasɩ n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na, põn tↄgɛ mɛ pa'alɛ ba yetɩ: "Sɛka tɩ mam wʋn kↄkɛ ẽ na, ẽŋa n bɛla, yõkɛ-ya ẽ, tarɩ ẽ sõŋa fõrgɛ."
La Azudaasɩ n paam na, a sẽŋɛ lɛm na Azezi, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama." Dee kↄkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ nẽrba la paagɛ yõkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan boe mı̃ na nẽra ayɩla fooge a sʋkↄbgↄ sɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõnna tʋbrɛ fiige.
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ la sʋkↄbrↄ, la dↄa sẽna tɩ ya yõkɛ mam wʋ mam de la fãara la?
Mam daan boe la yãma lɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo zãsna nẽrba, tɩ ya ka yõkɛ mam. La, la de la tɩ bõn-sɛka n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam na ẽŋɛ."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wuu zoe dee basɛ ẽ.
La budib-polle ayɩla n daan lobe fugↄbga mã'a dↄla Azezi. Tɩ ba daan zɛ ẽ tɩ ba yõkɛ,
tɩ a basɛ a fugↄbga la dee zoe beele fõrgɛ.
Ba daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire, bilam tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la wuu tigse.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan bↄna poorʋm zãazãarɛ dↄla, ka paagɛ kẽ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire zẽnzakam, zẽa la tõntõnɩba ↄↄsra bugum.
La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la sarɩyaditba la wuu daan eerɩ la yelle tɩ ba dõrɛ Azezi botɩ ba kʋ ẽ, la ba ka yẽ.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e daan parɩm bↄ Azezi, la ba yetↄga la ka doose taaba.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba daan isge parɩm bↄ ẽ yetɩ:
"Tõma wõm tɩ a yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la tɩ nẽrsaalba mẽ la, dee le mẽ ayẽma dabsa atã pʋam n dagɩ nẽrsaalba mẽa.' "
Baa bõn-ẽŋa pʋam ba yetↄga la ka doose taaba.
Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la isge ze'ele ba wuu nẽŋam soke Azezi yetɩ: "Ban tↄgɛ fõn se'em na, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?"
Tɩ Azezi daan sı̃na ka lerge se'ere. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la le soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la Krisi, Nawẽnnɛ tɩ tõma pẽgrɩ la Dayʋa la?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Ẽe, mam de la ẽŋa. La ya wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tɩ a zı̃ Nawẽnnɛ n de pãŋa dãana la zʋʋgↄ bↄba, ya wʋn yẽ tɩ a boe sawara pʋam sẽna."
Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la ãasʋm a mẽŋa futo, dee yetɩ: "Tɩ le ɛɛra la bẽm kaset-dõma?
Ya wõm ẽn sã'am Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ. Yãma tẽ'esɛ la wãne?" Tɩ ba wuu yetɩ: "A masɛ la kũm."
Tɩ ba nẽrba basɛba daan sẽŋɛ tʋbsra nõtõorʋm ɩta Azezi, dɩkɛ tãnnɛ pı̃ a nini, mũm kũnkũra wẽ ẽ, dee yɛta ẽ tɩ: "Bãŋɛ pa'alɛ tↄ nẽr-sɛka n wẽ fↄ?" Tɩ gu'urba la to'oge ẽ, wẽ a pɛgsɩ.
La Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan ken bↄna la zẽnzakam na, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõn-pↄka wa'am mı̃,
wa yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ n ↄↄsrɩ bugum na, tɩ a bɩsra ẽ, dee yetɩ: "Fõn mẽ daan po bↄna la Nazarɛtɩ bʋraa Azezi lɛ."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ sɩ'ɩsɛ yetɩ: "Mam ka mi, mam ka bãŋɛ fõn yele se'em na võorɛ." Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele bɛla dee yese ka zɛ la zanõrʋm, tɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ kaasɛ.
Tɩ tõntõn-pↄka la le yẽ ẽ, yele sɛba n boe mı̃ na yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna de la Azezi nẽra ayɩla."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le sɩ'ɩsɛ. Tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n ze mı̃ na le yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asɩra, fõn de la ba nẽra ayɩla. Fõn de la Galile nẽra."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ pↄɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Mam ka mi bʋra-sɛka tɩ ya tↄgrɩ a yelle wã."

Bilam mẽŋa tɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ le kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi pʋam. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ Azezi n daan yele ẽ yetɩ: "Lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rↄↄgↄ n wʋn kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam" na. Tɩ a sũure sã'am, tɩ a kɛlla.
Beere n daan wiige bulika, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, bãma wuu n de sarɩyaditba la daan lagsɛ mɛ tↄgɛ kʋ, botɩ ba lʋ Azezi tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am.
Tɩ Apilatɩ soke Azezi yetɩ: "Fõn de la Zifdõma naba?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "La de la fõn yele se'em na."
Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la dõrɛ ẽ yɛla zozo'e.
Tɩ Apilatɩ le soke Azezi yetɩ: "Fõn wõm yetↄg-sɛba wuu tɩ ba tↄgɛ bↄ fʋ wã, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?"
Tɩ Azezi ka le lerge se'ere, tɩ la di'ige Apilatɩ.
Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa woo Apilatɩ daan ẽn botɩ ba yese la nẽr-sɛka tɩ nẽrba la boorɩ la yʋ'a deem basɛ.
La bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Abarabasɩ, ẽŋa la nẽrba basɛba n daan dãmɛ tẽŋa, kʋ nẽra tɩ ba yõgɛ ba yʋ.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ ẽŋa n ɩtɩ se'em na bↄ ba.
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Ya boorɩ tɩ m yese la Zifdõma naba la basɛ bↄ ya?"
Se'ere n soe la, a bãŋɛ tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la ẽŋɛ la sũure botɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi wa bↄ ẽ.
La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la daan sa'asɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la mɛ, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka sose Apilatɩ tɩ a yese Abarabasɩ basɛ bↄ ba.
Tɩ Apilatɩ le soke ba yetɩ: "Bɛla, sɛka tɩ ya wi'iri tɩ Zifdõma naba la, yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ ẽ na wãne?"
Tɩ ba tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo."
Tɩ Apilatɩ soke ba yetɩ: "A ẽŋɛ la bẽm n de be'em?" Tɩ ba malɩn tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo."
La Apilatɩ daan boorɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ tɩ nẽrba la sũure n ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a yese Abarabasɩ basɛ bↄ ba. Dee botɩ ba wẽ Azezi la ka'asa, dee dɩkɛ ẽ bↄ tɩ ba ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo.
Tɩ sʋdaasɩ tarɩ Azezi kẽ gↄmna la yire zẽnzakam, dee wi sʋdaasɩ la wuu, tɩ ba lagsɛ.
Tɩ ba dɩkɛ fuugo n de gomusga yɛ Azezi, dee dɩkɛ gõ'osɩ wʋgɛ mũŋa vuge ẽ.
Dee yãŋa pʋ'ʋsra ẽ yetɩ: "Zifdõma naba, naa!"
Dee dɩkɛ dasaarɛ wẽ a zuugo, tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mı̃ ẽ, dee ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam nã'asra ẽ.
Ban yaalɛ ẽ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, ba yɛɛgɛ gomusga fuugo la mɛ, dee le yɛ ẽ a futo, tarɩ ẽ yese tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka ka dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ.

Ban daan tarɩ Azezi wɛ'ɛsa la, ba daan tʋ'ʋsɛ la bʋraaga ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n ze'ele Sirɛnɩ, a de la Alɛgsãndrɩ la Arufusi sↄ. A daan ze'ele la va'am lɛmna. Tɩ sʋdaasɩ la pẽrgɛ ẽ, tɩ a to'oge Azezi kũm dↄ-puurŋa la buke.
Ba daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la zẽ'a tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Golgota, a võorɛ de la zuwaŋrɛ zẽ'a.
Ba daan dɩkɛ la dãam n gaam na tɩɩm yʋ'ʋrɛ n de miiri bↄ ẽ tɩ a yũ, tɩ a zagsɛ ka yũ.
Tɩ ba daan ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo, dee dɩkɛ a futo tɩ ba pʋɩ taaba, pↄsɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽra woo n wʋn to'oge se'em.
La daan de la bulika karf-awɛɩ wakatɛ tɩ ba ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo.
Ba daan gʋlsɛ la gʋlsgↄ pa'alɛ bõn-sɛka n botɩ ba ka ẽ lablɛ dↄ-puurŋa la zuo. Ba daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Zifdõma naba."
Ba daan tarɩ la fãarba bayi wa po ka dↄ-puursi zuto, ayɩla a zʋʋgↄ bↄba, ayẽma a gↄbga bↄba. ((
La de la bɛla, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n gʋlsɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ. La gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Ba geele ẽ pa'asɛ la tõon-be'ero dõma pʋam."))
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ bilam tↄlla la lↄbra ba zuto, dee tʋʋra ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽhẽe, faa! Dagɩ fõn yetɩ fõn wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la dee le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam?
Fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa dↄ-puurŋa la zuo sige."
Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la mẽ la'ara ẽ yɛta taaba yetɩ: "A daan fãagrɩ nẽrba basɛba mɛ, dee ka tãna wʋn fãagɛ a mẽŋa.
A sãn dɛna Krisi, Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma naba la, a ze'ele dↄ-puurŋa la zuo sige nãnannɛ wã tɩ tɩ yẽ dee sakɛ." Tɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ ba ka dↄ-puursi zuto lɛm ẽ na mẽ tↄgɛ ẽ be'em.
Wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka n daan paagɛ, tɩ tẽŋa la wuu lebge lika halɩ ka paagɛ zaanõorɛ karf-atã.
Karf-atã la wakatɛ tɩ Azezi tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani." La võorɛ de la: "Mam Wẽnnaam, mam Wẽnnaam, bẽm n soe tɩ fõn basɛ mam?"
Tɩ sɛba n ze bilam na basɛba wõm bɛla, yetɩ: "Selse-ya, a wi'iri la A'eli."
Tɩ nẽra ayẽma zoe ka dɩkɛ nẽtɩŋa lʋsɛ dã-mı̃'isgo pʋam zẽkɛ la dↄↄgↄ bↄ ẽ tɩ a yũ, dee yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ gu bɩsɛ A'eli la sãn wʋn wa sike ẽ dↄ-puurŋa la zuo."
Tɩ Azezi le kaasɛ ke'enke'em dee yãŋa ki.
Wakat-ẽŋa, tɩ fuugo la n yuli Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam beŋe zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la ãagɛ pʋsʋka saazuum ka paagɛ tẽŋa.
Tɩ Rom sʋdaasɩ kɛ'ɛma daan zɛ Azezi nẽŋam yẽ ẽn ki se'em, tɩ a yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna wã sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa."
La pↄgsɩ basɛba n mẽ daan boe mı̃ zɛ kẽnkɛrŋa bɩsra. Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari n de Azakɩ pɩka la Azoze ma, la Asalome n daan boe ba pʋam.
Azezi n daan boe Galile la, ba daan dolɩ ẽ mɛ dee sõŋra ẽ. La pↄgsɩ basɛba zozo'e n daan lagɩm doose ẽ wa'am Zerizalɛm n boe mı̃.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan bↄna mı̃ kẽ'era, la daan de la beere n wʋn wiige Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ, tɩ ba daan bↄna mı̃ mãasna.

Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azozɛfʋ, a ze'ele la Arimate, a de la sarɩyaditba la nẽra ayɩla tɩ ba nannɩ. A mẽ daan gu'uri la Nawẽnnɛ n wʋn wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka. Lan daan de beere n wʋn wiige vo'osgo daarɛ la ı̃yã, tɩ a kɛ'ɛm sũure sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose Azezi kũm na.
La Apilatɩ n wõm tɩ Azezi darɛ ki mɛ na, la di'ige ẽ mɛ. Tɩ a botɩ ba wi sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la, tɩ a soke bãŋɛ Azezi ki yuuge mɛ?
La Apilatɩ n wõm sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la lergre la, tɩ a bↄ Azozɛfʋ sore tɩ a sike kũm na.
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ da tãnnɛ sike kũm na dↄ-puurŋa la zuo, dɩkɛ tãnnɛ la vile ẽ, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ yↄↄgↄ tɩ ba daan tũ tãmpı̃a ı̃yã, yãŋa bilge kug-kãtɛ lige yↄↄgↄ la nõorɛ.
Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azoze ma Amaari daan ze mɛ bɩsra zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba bı̃ŋe ẽ na.
Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ n daan tole, tɩ Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azakɩ ma Amaari, la Asalome da tɩdarɛ yũuŋo n ãn sõŋa tɩ ba tarɩ sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ Azezi ı̃yã.
Tɩ Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika wẽnnɛ n doorɩ se'em mã'a la, tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa yↄↄm na,
dee tↄgra la taaba sore yetɩ: "Ãne n wʋn bilge kugre la yↄↄgↄ la nõorʋm bↄ tↄ?"
La ban paagɛ la, ba yẽ tɩ kugre la n ba ãna kãtɛ la põn bilge mɛ gã.
Tɩ ba kẽ yↄↄgↄ la pʋam, yẽ budib-polle n yɛ fu-pɛɛlga zẽa zʋʋgↄ bↄba, tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ.

Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Da basɛ-ya tɩ ya palẽŋa ẽgra, mam mi tɩ ya eerɩ la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ, tɩ ba ka dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ la. A vo'oge mɛ, a ka boe kalam. Bɩsɛ-ya zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba daan bı̃ŋe ẽ na n wãna.
Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la a karẽnbiisi basɛba la yetɩ: 'A wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa sẽŋɛ Galile. Bilam tɩ ya wʋn yẽ ẽ, wʋ ẽn daan yele ya se'em na.' "
Tɩ ba yɛm bↄɩ, tɩ ba ı̃yã gõgra, tɩ ba yese yↄↄgↄ la pʋam zoe, la ba daan ka yele nẽra nẽra sɛla, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n tarɩ ba. ((
Azezi n daan vo'oge Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ la, a dẽŋɛ dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ la Amaari n ze'ele Magdala. La de la ẽŋa tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopↄɩ daan dolɩ ẽ tɩ Azezi dige ba, tɩ ba yese la.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka yele nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ Azezi la. Ba daan zı̃ la sũ-sã'aŋↄ la nintãm.
La ban daan wõm tɩ Azezi vo'oge mɛ tɩ Amaari yẽ ẽ na, ba daan ka sakɛ.
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi le teege nẽŋa ayẽma dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi bayi n daan boe sore wɛ'ɛsa tẽn-pɩka ayɩla.
Tɩ ba lebe ka yele ba taaba la, tɩ ba ka sakɛ.

La bɛla poorʋm, tɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la daan zẽa dita, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ ba. Dee zɛbɛ ba, ban daan ka bↄ sɩra, la ba sũure n kɛ la ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, ba daan ka sakɛ sɛba n daan yẽ ẽ yetɩ a vo'oge mɛ na yetↄga.
A yele bɛla, dee yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya dũnia zẽ'a woo ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la bↄ nẽrba wuu.
Sɛka woo n bↄ sɩra, botɩ ba mise ẽ ko'om pʋam, a wʋn yẽ fãarɛ. La sɛka woo n ka bↄ sɩra, ba wʋn di a sarɩya sɩbgɛ ẽ.
La sɛba n wʋn bↄ mam sɩra la, wʋn ɩta la bõn-yãlma bãna pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa: Ba wʋn dɩkɛ la mam yʋ'ʋrɛ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, dee tↄgra yetↄg-zãŋsɩ.
La ba sãn yõgɛ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, bɩɩ yũ yabga, la kãn ẽŋɛ ba sɛla. La ba wʋn dɩkɛ ba nu'usi paglɛ bã'adõma zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
Zuudãana Azezi n daan tↄgɛ la ba kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a zẽkɛ mɛ zom Nawẽnnɛ yire, ka zı̃'ire Nawẽnnɛ zʋʋgↄ.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la zẽ'esɩ wuu. Tɩ Zuudãana la sõŋɛ ba, botɩ ba tõm tõon-yãlma pa'alɛ tɩ ba kõa la mõolgↄ de la sɩra.))
Mam sɩr-sõŋↄ Ateofili, nẽrba zozo'e n mõrgɛ gʋlsɛ yel-sɛba wuu n ẽŋɛ tõma zẽ'am na.
Ba gʋlsɛ yel-bãma wuu wʋ nẽrba basɛba n daan yẽ yɛla la wuu halɩ ba pı̃'iluŋo, dee mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la tↄgɛ pa'alɛ tɩ tõma wõm se'em na.
Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam mã'agɛ m mẽŋa doose yel-bãma nãma sõŋa sõŋa halɩ ba pı̃'iluŋo pʋam, tɩ mam tẽ'esɛ tɩ la ãn sõŋa tɩ m gʋlsɛ yɛla la n doose taaba se'em na bↄ fↄ.
Mam gʋlsrɩ wãna tɩ fʋ bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ yel-bãna wuu tɩ ba pa'alɛ fʋ la de la sɩra.

Se'emwẽnʋm tɩ A'erↄdɩ daan de Zude tẽŋa naba la, bʋraa n daan boe tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azakari. A daan de la Zifdõma kãabgↄ kẽema, a de la Abiya buuri nẽra. Tɩ a pↄga yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna A'elizabɛtɩ, ẽŋa mẽ daan de la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana Aarõ buuri.
Bãma bayi daan de la nẽrba n ɩtɩ sõŋa Nawẽnnɛ nifum, dee sakra Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ, la a lↄↄ la wuu sõŋa.
La ba daan ka tarɩ bia, se'ere n soe la, A'elizabɛtɩ daan de la kõndↄgrɛ, la bãma bayi la wuu mẽ kʋrgɛ mɛ.
La wakatɛ n daan paagɛ tɩ Abiya buuri kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam tɩ ba tõm. Tɩ Azakari mẽ kẽ tɩ a tõm.
Kãabgↄ kẽma la malŋↄ daan de la ba pↄsɛ looge nẽr-sɛka n wʋn kẽ zẽ'e-sõŋↄ pʋam yõ tɩdarɛ bↄ Nawẽnnɛ. Tɩ ba daan pↄsɛ, tɩ la yõkɛ Azakari. Tɩ Azakari kẽ tɩ a yõ.
La tɩdarɛ la yõ'a wakatɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu boe la yẽŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka darɛ wa'am Azakari zẽ'am wa zɛ tɩdarɛ yõ'a bı̃mbı̃nne na zʋʋgↄ bↄba.
La Azakari n yẽ ẽ na, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ halɩ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ẽ.
Tɩ malɛka la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azakari, da zoe dabeem, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wõm fʋ pʋ'ʋsgↄ mɛ. Fʋ pↄga A'elizabɛtɩ wʋn dↄgɛ la budibla, tɩ fʋ sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azã.
La fʋ wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm. La nẽrba zozo'e wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga bia la dↄka ı̃yã.
A wʋn dɛna la nẽr-keko Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ nifum, la a kãn yũ dãam bɩɩ bõn-yũula n bugri. Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wʋn bↄna la ẽ halɩ lan pↄsɛ ẽn boe a ma pʋʋrʋm, la wakatɛ wuu.
A wʋn botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba zozo'e lebe sakɛ ba Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ.

La a wʋn dẽŋɛ Zuudãana nẽŋam tara Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa pãŋa wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli n daan tarɩ se'em na. La a wʋn naagɛ sↄdõma la ba kↄma yɛla, dee wʋn botɩ nẽr-sɛba n sɩ'ɩsrɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ la tara yɛm ɩta wʋ sɛba n ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ la. A wʋn botɩ nẽrba mãasʋm sõŋa gu'ura tɩ Zuudãana."
Tɩ Azakari soke malɛka la yetɩ: "Bẽm n wʋn botɩ mam bãŋɛ tɩ bõn-ẽna de la sɩra? Se'ere n soe la, mam de la bʋra-yã'aŋa dee tɩ mam pↄga mẽ kʋrgɛ."
Tɩ malɛka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Agabrɩyɛlɩ, mam ze la Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam. Ẽŋa n tõm mam yetɩ, m wa'am yele fʋ yetↄg-yẽlga wã.
La fõn ka sakɛ mam yetↄga la ı̃yã, fʋ nõorɛ n wʋn mãam. La wakatɛ sãn paagɛ, bõn-sɛba tɩ mam yele fʋ la wʋn ẽŋɛ. La fʋ kãn le tãna tↄgra, halɩ tɩ la paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ẽŋɛ la."
Wakat-ẽŋa, nẽrba la daan gu'uri mɛ tɩ Azakari yese. La ẽn daan boe zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la pʋam yuura la, ba palẽŋa n ẽkɛ.
La ẽn yãŋa wa yese la, a ka tã'agɛ tↄgɛ la nẽrba la. A nõorʋm n mãam tɩ a tara nu'usi magra pa'ala ba. Bɛla tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ a yẽ la bõn-yãlma zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la pʋam.
Dabs-sɛba tɩ Azakari daan wʋn tõm Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam n ba'asɛ la, a daan lebe kule la a yire.
Dabs-bãna poorʋm, tɩ a pↄga A'elizabɛtɩ yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ bↄna yire wõr-sɩnuu.
Dee yetɩ: "Wãna de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ tõoma. Wakat-ẽna ẽŋa n yãŋa bɩsɛ mam yelle, dee yese bõn-ẽna n de nɩ yãnnɛ bↄ mam nẽrba tẽŋasʋka."

Pugla ayɩla n daan boe Galile tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nazarɛtɩ, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Amaari. A daan nãn ka mi bʋraa. La bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azozɛfʋ n yetɩ a di ẽ. Azozɛfʋ de la naba Adavidi buuri nẽra. La wakat-sɛka tɩ A'elizabɛtɩ daan tarɩ pʋʋrɛ wõr-sɩyoobɩ pʋam na, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm a malɛka Agabrɩyɛlɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ Amaari zẽ'am.
Tɩ malɛka la sẽŋɛ Amaari zẽ'am ka pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ tõoma. Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ boe la fʋ mɛ, a ẽŋɛ fʋ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ."
La Amaari n daan wõm malɛka yetↄga la, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ, tɩ a tẽ'esra malɛka la n yele se'em na võorɛ n de sɛla.
Tɩ malɛka la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Amaari, da zoe dabeem, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ fʋ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.
Fʋ wʋn yõkɛ la pʋʋrɛ dↄgɛ budibla, sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi.
A wʋn dɛna la nẽr-keko. La ba wʋn wi'ira ẽ tɩ, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Bia. La Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ẽ a yaaba Adavidi na'am,
tɩ a dɛna Azakↄbɩ buuri naba wakatɛ wuu, a na'am na kãn malɩn ba'asɛ."
Tɩ Amaari soke malɛka la yetɩ: "Mam ka mi bʋraa, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ mam yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ?"
Tɩ malɛka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ sɛla wuu Sɩa wʋn sige fʋ zuo, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa wʋn bↄna la fↄ, bɛla bia la tɩ fʋ wʋn dↄgɛ la wʋn welge la to'ore, ba wʋn wi'ira ẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.
Bãŋɛ tɩ fʋ sõogↄ A'elizabɛtɩ tɩ ba yetɩ a de la kõndↄgrɛ la, a tarɩ la pʋʋrɛ wõr-sɩyoobɩ n wãna. Baa la ẽn kʋrgɛ la, a wʋn dↄgɛ la budibla.
Se'ere n soe la, sɛla sɛla ka boe tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ka tã ɩta."
Tɩ Amaari lerge yetɩ: "Mam de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ tõntõn-pↄka. Nawẽnnɛ botɩ la ẽŋɛ wʋ fõn yele se'em na." Tɩ malɛka la fõrgɛ dee basɛ ẽ.
La dabsa bãma pʋam, tɩ Amaari isge sẽŋɛ tↄtↄ paagɛ Zude so'olʋm tẽŋa ayɩla tɩ tãnsɩ boe mı̃.
La ẽn paagɛ la, a kẽ la Azakari yire pʋ'ʋsɛ A'elizabɛtɩ.
La A'elizabɛtɩ n wõm a pʋ'ʋsgↄ la, bia la wẽrgɛ mɛ a pʋʋrʋm. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wa'am A'elizabɛtɩ zẽ'am la pãŋa,
tɩ a tı̃i tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ la fõn yel-sõnnɛ gãnna pↄgsɩ la wuu. La bia la tɩ fʋ wʋn dↄgɛ la, tarɩ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.
Mam de la ãne tɩ mam Zuudãana ma sẽna mam zẽ'am?
Se'ere n soe la, mam wõm fõn pʋ'ʋsgↄ la, bia la n boe mam pʋʋrʋm na wẽrgɛ mɛ la sũ-yẽlga.
Fõn sakɛ tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga tɩ a tↄgɛ bↄ fʋ la wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ la, fʋ yẽ zu-yẽlga."
Tɩ Amaari yele yetɩ: "Mam pẽgrɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la m sũure wuu.
Mam tarɩ sũ-yẽlga mɛ, Nawẽnnɛ n de mam Fãagra la ı̃yã,
se'ere n soe la, a bɩsɛ mam n de a tõntõn-pↄg-tarma la yelle mɛ. Bɛla lan pↄsɛ lɛɛlɛ wã wɛ'ɛsa, zamãana wuu nẽrba wʋn wi'ira mam tɩ zu-yẽlga dãana.
Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ n tã wuu la n ẽŋɛ bõn-kãra bↄ mam. A de la pʋpeelem dãana.
La nẽr-sɛba n zotɩ ẽ na, a zotɩ ba ninbãalga mɛ zamãana wuu.
A dɩkɛ la a nu'ugo tõm tõon-kãra, dee botɩ zẽk-m-mẽŋa dõma la zoe wɩrgɛ la ba zẽk-m-mẽŋa pʋtẽ'era la.
La sãn dɛna pãnsɩ dõma, a sikri ba mɛ ba na'am pʋam, dee zẽkra sik-m-mẽŋa dõma.
La sɛba n ka tarɩ sɛla la, a bↄ'ↄrɩ ba bõntarsõm zↄ'ↄra mɛ, dee botɩ bõntatba lebe fõrgɛ dee ka to'oge sɛla sɛla.
A tẽerɩ zↄta tõma Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba n de a tõntõnɩba la ninbãalga mɛ, dee sõŋra tõma,
wʋ ẽn yʋʋn bı̃ŋe a nõorɛ la tõma yaaba Abraham, la tõma sↄ-yaabdõma, la ba yɩɩsɩ la wuu tɩ a wʋn sõŋra tõma wakatɛ wuu se'em na."
La Amaari daan weege A'elizabɛtɩ zẽ'am ẽŋɛ wʋ wõr-sɩtã, dee yãŋa lebe kule.
A'elizabɛtɩ dↄka wakatɛ n daan paagɛ la, a dↄgɛ la budibla.
Tɩ a sawiiba, la a yir-dõma wõm tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ zoe a ninbãalga zo'oge, tɩ ba wuu lagɩm ɩta sũ-yẽlga la ẽ.
Bia la dↄka dabsa anii daarɛ tɩ ba wa'am tɩ ba wã ẽ, daan bↄↄra tɩ ba sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ a sↄ Azakari yʋ'ʋrɛ.
La a ma ka sakɛ, yetɩ: "Ayɛɩ, a yʋ'ʋrɛ wʋn dɛna la Azã."
Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Ya yir-dõma la pʋam nẽra ka boe mı̃ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azã."
Tɩ ba yɩbsɛ la nu'usi soke bia la sↄ tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽŋa n boorɩ tɩ ba sɩ bia la yʋ'ʋrɛ se'em.
Tɩ a botɩ ba bↄ ẽ dↄ-palaka, tɩ a to'oge gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "A yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azã." Tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la waa wuu.
La ẽn gʋlsɛ yele bɛla la, bilam mẽŋa tɩ a zɩlɩŋa lakɛ, tɩ a tã'agɛ tↄgra pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ sɛba n lɛm bilam na wuu. Tɩ kõ-ẽŋa saagɛ Zude tẽn-sɛba tɩ tãnsɩ boe mı̃ na wuu.
Bãma wuu n daan wõm yɛla la, ba daan tẽ'esrɩ mɛ dee sↄkra yetɩ: "Bi-ẽna yetɩ a wa ãna la wãne?" Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa boe la ẽ mɛ.
Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wa'am bia la sↄ Azakari zẽ'am la pãŋa. Tɩ a to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga tↄgɛ yetɩ:
"Basɛ-ya tɩ pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de Ɩsrayɛlɩ Zuudãana la, se'ere n soe la, a wa'am mɛ wa bɩsɛ a nẽrba yelle, fãagɛ ba basɛ.
A bↄ tõma la Fãagra n tarɩ pãŋa n wʋn yese a tõntõnna Adavidi buuri la pʋam,
wʋ ẽŋa n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba tↄgra kʋrʋm se'em na.
A yetɩ a wʋn fãagɛ tↄ tɩ bɛ'ɛba nu'usum, la nẽr-sɛba n sisri tõma la nu'usum.
Bɛla, a zoe tɩ yaabdõma ninbãalga mɛ, dee tẽegɛ ẽn yʋʋn bı̃ŋe a nõorɛ la ba la yelle.
Se'ere n soe la, a yʋʋn bı̃ŋe nõorɛ mɛ la tɩ yaaba Abraham
tɩ a wʋn fãagɛ tↄ tɩ bɛ'ɛba nu'usum, dee wʋn botɩ tɩ tõm a tõoma, tɩ dabeem kana.
Dee dↄla ẽ la pʋpeelem, dee ɩta tɩ la masra ẽn boorɩ se'em ka paagɛ tɩ vↄm tɛka.
La fõn, m bia, ba wʋn wi'ira fʋ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu nõtↄ'ↄsa. Bɛla ı̃yã, fõn wʋn dẽŋɛ tɩ Zuudãana la nẽŋam malgɛ sore bↄ ẽ,
dee yele Nawẽnnɛ nẽrba la tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ a wʋn fãagɛ ba basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
La de la Nawẽnnɛ n zotɩ tõma ninbãalga la ı̃yã tɩ a wʋn botɩ a peelem n ãn wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa n yẽkɛ bulika la,
nẽegɛ bↄ nẽr-sɛba n boe lika pʋam, la nẽr-sɛba n zotɩ kũm dabeem na, dee pa'alɛ tɩ so-sɛka tɩ tɩ wʋn doose yẽ sũ-mã'asʋm."
Tɩ bia la daan bɩta, tɩ a pʋtẽ'erɛ pa'asra. A daan boe la weem ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ a wa'am Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma la zẽ'am tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ.
Ban daan dↄgɛ Azã la, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ na-keko A'ogisti daan bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ, ba kãalɛ a tẽŋa la wuu nẽrba.
La daan de la pↄspↄsɩ n bɛla tɩ ba kãalɛ nẽrba la, wakat-sɛka tɩ Akirinusi daan de Siiri tẽnsɩ gↄmna la.
Tɩ nẽrba wuu kule ba mẽnsɩ tẽnsʋm tɩ ba kãalɛ ba.
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ mẽ yese Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm n boe Zude so'olʋm pʋam, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba yʋʋn dↄgɛ naba Adavidi. Se'ere n soe tɩ a sẽŋɛ bilam na, a de la naba Adavidi buuri.
Ẽŋa la Amaari n de pↄg-sɛka n yetɩ a ele ẽ na sẽŋɛ mɛ tɩ ba kãalɛ ba, wakat-ẽŋa Amaari tarɩ la pʋʋrɛ.
La ban nãn boe Bɛtelɛm la, tɩ a dↄka daarɛ paagɛ.
Tɩ a dↄgɛ a budib-kẽema, vile ẽ na fuugo gã'arɛ dũnsi yↄnnↄ daka pʋam. Se'ere n soe la, zẽ'a n ka boe sãama yire la pʋam tɩ ba wʋn gã'arɛ.
La tẽn-ẽŋa dũnsı̃ima daan boe la sẽkam gu'ura ba dũnsi yʋ'ʋŋↄ.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka sige ba zẽ'am. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ gilge ba. Tɩ dabeem ba kẽ ba halɩ.
Tɩ malɛka la yele ba yetɩ: "Da zoe-ya dabeem, tɩ mam tarɩ la kõ-yẽlga tɩ m yele ya, n wʋn basɛ tɩ nẽrba wuu sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm.
La de la yʋ'ʋŋ-ẽna tɩ ba dↄgɛ ya Fãagra la Adavidi tẽŋa pʋam, ẽŋa n de Zuudãana Krisi la.
La bõn-ẽna n wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ la de la sɩra, ya wʋn yẽ bilɩa tɩ ba vile ẽ na fuugo gã'arɛ dũnsi yↄnnↄ daka pʋam."
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma kʋʋŋ-kʋʋŋↄ darɛ wa'am wa naagɛ la ayɩla la. Tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
"Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum n soe pẽka, la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a nõŋɛ la tarɩ sũ-mã'asʋm dũnia zuo."
La malɛkadõma la lebe la Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee tɩ dũnsı̃ima la yele taaba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm ka bɩsɛ sɛla n ẽŋɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele tɩ la."
La ba isge mɛ tↄtↄ sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ yẽ Amaari, la Azozɛfʋ, la bilɩa la tɩ a gã dũnsi yↄnnↄ daka pʋam.
La dũnsı̃ima la n yẽ ẽ na, ba tↄgɛ bia la yelle wʋ malɛka la n yele ba se'em na.
Tɩ sɛba wuu n wõm dũnsı̃ima la n yele se'em na, la di'ige ba mɛ.
La Amaari tẽ'esrɩ yɛla wã wuu mɛ a sũure pʋam.
Dee tɩ dũnsı̃ima la daan lɛbra dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, ba wõm dee yẽ malɛka la n yele ba se'em na.

La dabsa anii la daarɛ n daan paagɛ, tɩ ba botɩ ba wã bia la wʋ Amoyisi gõŋↄ n pa'alɛ tɩ ba wã ba budimto se'em na. Tɩ ba sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi, yʋ'ʋr-sɛka tɩ malɛka daan yele ba tɩ ba sɩ ẽ na, wakat-sɛka tɩ Amaari daan nãn ka yõkɛ a pʋʋrɛ la.
La wakatɛ la n paagɛ tɩ Amaari malgɛ a mẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am wʋ Amoyisi lↄↄ gõŋↄ n yele se'em na. Tɩ Azozɛfʋ la Amaari tarɩ bia la sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm Wẽnde-kãtʋm tɩ ba dɩkɛ ẽ bↄ Nawẽnnɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ gõŋↄ la pʋam tɩ budib-kẽema woo wʋn dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ bõnↄ.
Ba daan sẽŋɛ tɩ ba kãabɛ la sɛla bↄ Nawẽnnɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ la n yele se'em na. La yetɩ, ba bↄ mõom dawɛma bayi bɩɩ na'adawen-biɛ bayi.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ bʋraa daan boe Zerizalɛm tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Asimeyõ. A de la nẽr-sõŋↄ dee sakra Nawẽnnɛ sõŋa, dee gu'ura Ɩsrayɛlɩ Fãagra la n sẽm na. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bↄna la ẽ.
La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la daan põn yele ẽ tɩ a kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ a yẽ la Krisi tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn tõm tɩ a wa'am na.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la botɩ a sẽŋɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, la wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi sↄ, la a ma daan tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ n yele se'em na.
Tɩ Asimeyõ to'oge bia la a nu'usum, pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
"Zuudãana, lɛɛlɛ wã, fõn bı̃ŋe nõorɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ mɛ. Fʋ yãŋa tã basɛ mam n de fõn tõntõnna sore tɩ m basɛ dũnia dee wa'am fõn yire la sũ-mã'asʋm.
Se'ere n soe la, m nini yẽ Fãagra la tɩ fʋ tõm na,
ẽŋa tɩ fʋ mãasʋm bↄ tɩ dũnia nẽrba wuu yẽ.
Ẽŋa n de peelem n wʋn botɩ la nẽegɛ bↄ buuri wuu tɩ ba bãŋɛ fõn, dee wʋn botɩ tõma Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n de fõn nẽrba yẽ pẽka."
La Asimeyõ n tↄgɛ bia la yɛla la, la daan di'ige bia la sↄ, la a ma mɛ.

Tɩ Asimeyõ kã kã'a-sõma bↄ ba, dee yele bia la ma Amaari tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge bi-ẽna tɩ a botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma zozo'e lui mɛ, dee tɩ zozo'e mẽ isge. Ẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ tõoma, dee tɩ nẽrba zozo'e wʋn zagsɛ ẽ.
Ẽŋa n wʋn nẽegɛ pa'alɛ sɛla n sʋgɛ ba pʋtẽ'era pʋam na. Dee yetɩ, Amaari mẽŋa wʋn yẽ sũ-sã'aŋↄ wʋ sʋ'a tɩ ba sɩɩsɛ lʋ nẽra sũure la.

Wakat-ẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄs-pↄka n mẽ daan boe tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna A'annɩ. Tɩ a sↄ yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Afanuyɛlɩ, a de la Azɛɛrɩ buuri nẽra. Ẽŋa daan de la pug-sa'arɛ dee ele sɩra paagɛ yʋʋma ayopↄɩ tɩ a sɩra la ki.

La a sɩra la n ki la, a yãŋa de la pↄkõorɛ kʋrgɛ halɩ ka paagɛ yʋʋma pinii la anaasɩ. A daan boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na wakatɛ wuu, tõnna bↄ'ↄra Nawẽnnɛ wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ wuu ka basra, dee lʋta nõorɛ sↄsra Nawẽnnɛ.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a paagɛ ba zẽ'am, pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ a yel-sõnnɛ, dee tↄgra bia la yelle bↄ'ↄra sɛba wuu n gu'uri wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn le fãagɛ Zerizalɛm nẽrba la basɛ.
La ban ẽŋɛ sɛla woo ba'asɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ la n yele se'em na, tɩ Azozɛfʋ la Amaari lebe kule Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm na.
Tɩ bia la bɩta tara pãŋa la yɛm, dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ bↄna la ẽ.
Yʋʋnɛ woo Azezi sↄ, la a ma sẽnnɩ la Zerizalɛm dita Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa.
La Azezi daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pia la ayi, dee tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kibsa la wʋ ban ẽn ɩta se'em na.
La kibsa la dabsa n ba'asɛ la, tɩ ba lebe kulla. Dee tɩ Azezi weege Zerizalɛm, tɩ a sↄ la a ma daan ka bãŋɛ tɩ a weege ya.
Ba daan tẽ'esɛ tɩ a dolɩ la ba tẽŋa dõma, dee sẽŋɛ dabsrɛ mõonɛ sẽnnɛ. La ban ɛ ẽ ba nẽrba la, la ba sɩrdõma zẽ'am dee ka yẽ ẽ na,
ba daan lebe la Zerizalɛm ka ɛɛra ẽ.
La dabsa atã daarɛ tɩ ba yẽ ẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, tɩ a zı̃ la karẽnsãandõma sɛlsra, dee sↄkra ba sokrɩsɩ.
Azezi n daan tarɩ yɛm la ẽn lergrɩ se'em na, di'ige sɛba wuu n daan wõm na mɛ.
La a dↄgrɩba la n yẽ ẽ na, la ba di'ige ba mɛ. Tɩ a ma soke ẽ yetɩ: "M bia, bẽm tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ tɩ wãna? Mam la fʋ sↄ ɛ fʋ mɛ halɩ la sũ-sã'aŋↄ."
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya ɛɛra ma? Yãma ka mi tɩ la masɛ mɛ tɩ mam bↄna m Sↄ yire wã bɩɩ?"
Tɩ ba ka bãŋɛ Azezi yetↄga la võorɛ.
Tɩ Azezi doose ba kule Nazarɛtɩ, dee sakɛ ba nõorɛ. Tɩ a ma tẽ'esra yel-bãma wuu a sũurum.
Tɩ Azezi bɩta, tɩ a yɛm pa'asra, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ la nẽrba nõŋɛ ẽ.

Na-keko Atibɛɛrɩ n daan di na'am na, a yʋʋma pia la anuu yʋʋnɛ, tɩ Apõnsɩ-pilatɩ de Zude gↄmna, dee tɩ A'erↄdɩ dɛna Galile naba, tɩ a sↄbia Afilipi mẽ dɛna Itiire la Trakoniti naba. Tɩ Alisaniyasɩ dɛna Abilɛnɩ naba.
La A'annɩ, la Akayifu de la Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma. Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azakari bia Azã daan boe mõom tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tↄgɛ bↄ ẽ.
Bɛla tɩ Azã sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba n boe Zʋrdẽ kʋlaa nõorʋm la wuu ka mõola yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ ba mise ba ko'om pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.

Azã n mõolɩ se'em na ẽŋɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn gʋlsɛ gõŋↄ pʋam se'em na. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Nẽra n mõolɩ weem tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: Malgɛ-ya sore sõŋa gu'ura Zuudãana, malgɛ-ya sↄa la tɩ ba tↄ tẽntẽesɩ bↄ ẽ.
Palɛ-ya bↄgsɩ la wuu, sirge-ya tãnsɩ la kũnkũma la wuu, mãalɛ-ya so-gↄlma tɩ ba tↄ tẽntẽesɩ, palɛ-ya sorↄↄrↄ bogro tɩ ba naagɛ taaba.
Bɛla nẽrsaalba wuu wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ n ɩtɩ se'em fãagra nẽrba basra."
La nẽrba zozo'e n sẽŋɛ ka lagsɛ Azã zẽ'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam. Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma ãn wʋ kãmpẽesɩ buuri, ãne n yele yãma yetɩ, ya tã wʋn zoe põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ n sẽm na?

Tõm-ya tõon-sɛba n pa'alɩ tɩ ya teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero. Da kãn tẽ'esɛ-ya tɩ Abraham n de yãma yaaba la, ya wʋn põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ mɛ. Mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ, Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn dɩkɛ kuga wã botɩ ba lebge Abraham yɩɩsɩ.
Nẽra n põn tara lɩa a nu'usum tɩ a lʋbɛ tɩɩsɩ. Tɩ-sɛka woo n ka wↄnnɩ biɛ sõma la, a wʋn lʋbɛ ẽ mɛ, lobge bugum pʋam tɩ bugum di ẽ."
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?"
Tɩ Azã lerge ba yetɩ, sɛka n tarɩ futo bayi, a looge bↄ sɛka n ka tarɩ. Tɩ sɛka n tarɩ dia, mẽ ẽŋɛ bↄ sɛka n ka tarɩ.
Tɩ lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba mẽ wa'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?"
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Da to'oge-ya ligri gãŋɛ ban yele ya se'em na."
Tɩ sʋdaasɩ mẽ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Dee tõma, tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?" Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Da to'oge-ya nẽra bõnↄ la pãŋa bɩɩ dõrɛ nẽrba to'oge sɛla. Basɛ-ya tɩ ya yↄↄrↄ la seke ya."
Tɩ nẽrba daan zɛ gu'ura tɩ Nawẽnnɛ fãagɛ ba, la ba wuu daan sokrɩ la ba mẽŋa bↄↄra tɩ ba bãŋɛ, Azã na'an dɛna Krisi tɩ ba gu'ura la bɩɩ?

La ban tẽ'esrɩ bɛla la, tɩ Azã yele ba yetɩ: "Mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam, la nẽra n boe tara pãŋa gãnna mam sẽna, la mam põn ka masɛ tɩ m pirge a tagra bↄ ẽ. Ẽŋa n wʋn mise ya Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, la bugum pʋam.
A wʋn welge nẽrba wʋ nẽra n zãlɩ pɩ'ɩgↄ a nu'usum tɩ a vaagɛ a si zɛɛŋa yeele ẽŋɛ a bãarɛ pʋam, dee yõ urgo la, la bugum n ka kı̃ŋri."
Yetↄg-bãna, la yetↄga basɛba zozo'e tɩ Azã daan dɩkɛ zãsʋm nẽrba la pa'alɛ ba Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la.
La Azã daan zɛrgɛ naba A'erↄdɩ mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a daan fãagɛ la a kẽema pↄga yʋ'ʋrɛ n de A'erodɩadɩ di, dee tõm tõon-be'ero basɛba zozo'e pa'asɛ, tɩ Azã yele ẽ yetɩ la ka ãn sõŋa.
La A'erↄdɩ daan yõkɛ Azã ka pagɛ mɛ, bɛla A'erↄdɩ malɩn tõm la tõon-be'ero pa'asɛ.
Azã n daan misri nẽrba wuu ko'om pʋam na, a daan mẽ mise Azezi mɛ. La Azezi daan pʋ'ʋsrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ saazuum yo'oge,
tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa sige a zuo, tɩ ba yẽ ẽ tɩ a wõn na na'adawenne. Tɩ kõa ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire yetɩ: "Fõn de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu. Fʋ paagɛ la mam yɛm."
La Azezi n daan pı̃'ilum a tõoma la, a daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pitã, tɩ nẽrba daan tẽ'esra tɩ a de la Azozɛfʋ bia. Azozɛfʋ sↄ daan de la Aheli,
tɩ Aheli sↄ dɛna Amata, tɩ Amata sↄ dɛna Alevi, tɩ Alevi sↄ dɛna Amelki, tɩ Amelki sↄ dɛna Azanayi, tɩ Azanayi sↄ dɛna Azozɛfʋ,
tɩ Azozɛfʋ sↄ dɛna Amatatɩasɩ, tɩ Amatatɩasɩ sↄ dɛna Amõsɩ, tɩ Amõsɩ sↄ dɛna Anahum, tɩ Anahum sↄ dɛna A'esli, tɩ A'esli sↄ dɛna Anagayi,
tɩ Anagayi sↄ dɛna Amatɩ, tɩ Amatɩ sↄ dɛna Amatatɩasɩ, tɩ Amatatɩasɩ sↄ dɛna Asemeyẽ, tɩ Asemeyẽ sↄ dɛna Azozɛkɩ, tɩ Azozɛkɩ sↄ dɛna Azoda,
tɩ Azoda sↄ dɛna Azoanã, tɩ Azoanã sↄ dɛna Areza, tɩ Areza sↄ dɛna Azorobabɛlɩ, tɩ Azorobabɛlɩ sↄ dɛna Asalatɩyɛlɩ, tɩ Asalatɩyɛlɩ sↄ dɛna Aneri,
tɩ Aneri sↄ dɛna Amelki, tɩ Amelki sↄ dɛna Adi, tɩ Adi sↄ dɛna Akozam, tɩ Akozam sↄ dɛna A'elmadam, tɩ A'elmadam sↄ dɛna A'eri,
tɩ A'eri sↄ dɛna Azoze, tɩ Azoze sↄ dɛna A'eliezɛɛrɩ, tɩ A'eliezɛɛrɩ sↄ dɛna Azorim, tɩ Azorim sↄ dɛna Amata, tɩ Amata sↄ dɛna Alevi,
tɩ Alevi sↄ dɛna Asimeyõ, tɩ Asimeyõ sↄ dɛna Azuda, tɩ Azuda sↄ dɛna Azozɛfʋ, tɩ Azozɛfʋ sↄ dɛna Azonam, tɩ Azonam sↄ dɛna A'eliakim,
tɩ A'eliakim sↄ dɛna Ameleya, tɩ Ameleya sↄ dɛna Amena, tɩ Amena sↄ dɛna Amatata, tɩ Amatata sↄ dɛna Anatã, tɩ Anatã sↄ dɛna Adavidi,
tɩ Adavidi sↄ dɛna Azese, tɩ Azese sↄ dɛna A'obɛɛdɩ, tɩ A'obɛɛdɩ sↄ dɛna Aboozɩ, tɩ Aboozɩ sↄ dɛna Asala, tɩ Asala sↄ dɛna Anaasõ,
tɩ Anaasõ sↄ dɛna Aminadabɩ, tɩ Aminadabɩ sↄ dɛna Admẽ, tɩ Admẽ sↄ dɛna Arni, tɩ Arni sↄ dɛna A'ɛsrↄm, tɩ A'ɛsrↄm sↄ dɛna Afarɛsɩ, tɩ Afarɛsɩ sↄ dɛna Azuda,
tɩ Azuda sↄ dɛna Azakↄbɩ, tɩ Azakↄbɩ sↄ dɛna A'izakɩ, tɩ A'izakɩ sↄ dɛna Abraham, tɩ Abraham sↄ dɛna Atara, tɩ Atara sↄ dɛna Anakↄↄrɩ,
tɩ Anakↄↄrɩ sↄ dɛna Aseruki, tɩ Aseruki sↄ dɛna Arago, tɩ Arago sↄ dɛna Afalɛkɩ, tɩ Afalɛkɩ sↄ dɛna A'ebɛrɩ, tɩ A'ebɛrɩ sↄ dɛna Asala,
tɩ Asala sↄ dɛna Akayinam, tɩ Akayinam sↄ dɛna Arfasadɩ, tɩ Arfasadɩ sↄ dɛna Asɛm, tɩ Asɛm sↄ dɛna Anoe, tɩ Anoe sↄ dɛna Alemɛkɩ,
tɩ Alemɛkɩ sↄ dɛna Amatusala, tɩ Amatusala sↄ dɛna A'enõkɩ, tɩ A'enõkɩ sↄ dɛna Azarɛdɩ, tɩ Azarɛdɩ sↄ dɛna Amalelɛlɩ, tɩ Amalelɛlɩ sↄ dɛna Akayinam,
tɩ Akayinam sↄ dɛna A'enõsɩ, tɩ A'enõsɩ sↄ dɛna Asetɩ, tɩ Asetɩ sↄ dɛna Adam, la Nawẽnnɛ n nãam Adam.
Azezi daan ze'ele la Zʋrdẽ kʋlaam lebe, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la kↄ'ↄn bↄna la ẽ. La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la weem.
Bilam tɩ Asũtãana makɛ ẽ dabsa pinaasɩ. La dabsa pinaasɩ la pʋam a ka di sɛla sɛla, tɩ a kↄm dõnna.
Bɛla tɩ Asũtãana yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ yele kugre wã tɩ a lebge dia."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Nẽrsaala kãn vↄa dia mã'a ı̃yã.' "
Tɩ Asũtãana tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka zom tãŋa zuo, pa'alɛ ẽ dũnia so'olʋm wuu nif-kabsɩgↄ pʋam.
Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bãna wuu de la mam n soe, bɛla mam tã wʋn bↄ nẽr-sɛka woo tɩ mam boorɩ mɛ. Mam wʋn bↄ fↄ dũnia wã na'am la wuu, la so'olʋm bãma wuu pẽka.
Fʋ sãn ka dũma tẽŋa nã'asɛ mam, ba wuu wʋn dɛna la fõn dẽnnɛ."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga pʋam yetɩ: 'Nã'asra Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ, dee sakra ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.' "
Tɩ Asũtãana le tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm ka zom Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zuo yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ ze'ele kalam ẽkɛ bisge tẽŋa,
tɩ la gʋlsɛ yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ wʋn tõm a malɛkadõma tɩ ba gu fo.
La ba wʋn kↄkɛ fↄ la ba nu'usi tɩ fʋ kãn wẽ fʋ nã'arɛ la kugre.' "
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ yele tɩ: 'Da makɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ bɩsɛ.' "
La Asũtãana n daan makɛ Azezi bɛla wuu zɩgɛ koŋe la, a basɛ ẽ dee gu'ura la a sãn le yẽ folle.
La Azezi daan lebe Galile la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la pãŋa, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ kↄ'ↄn saagɛ zẽ'a wuu.
La a ẽn zãsna la nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, tɩ ba wuu pẽgra ẽ.
La Azezi daan sẽŋɛ la Nazarɛtɩ, ban daan uge ẽ tẽn-sɛka la. Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kẽ ba wẽndeem wʋ ẽŋa ẽn kẽ'era se'em na, yãŋa isge ze'ele tɩ a karẽŋɛ.
Tɩ ba dɩkɛ gõn-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ la bↄ ẽ. Tɩ a lakɛ gõŋↄ la yẽ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ a boorɩ la, yãŋa karẽŋɛ wʋ zẽ'a la n yele se'em na:

"Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n boe la mam, ẽŋa n looge mam bↄ mam pãŋa, ((tɩ m bʋglɛ sũ-sã'aŋↄ dõma sũure,)) tɩ m mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la bↄ nasdõma, dee tõm mam tɩ m tↄgɛ bↄ yamsɩ tɩ ba wʋn yẽ yolsgo, dee tↄgɛ bↄ fↄↄsɩ tɩ ba nini wʋn pike, dee yese sɛba n boe nãmsgↄ pʋam la basɛ,
dee mõolɛ tɩ wakatɛ paagɛ ya, tɩ Zuudãana wʋn ẽŋɛ nẽrba yel-sõnnɛ."
La ẽn karẽŋɛ ba'asɛ la, a lebe laglɛ gõŋↄ la mɛ bↄ sɛka n gu'uri gõnnↄ la, dee zı̃'ire. Tɩ nẽr-sɛba wuu n boe wẽndeem na bɩsra ẽ zı̃i.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Zı̃na, lɛɛlɛ wã, sɛla tɩ ba gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ yãma wõm wã, la ẽŋɛ wʋ lan yele se'em na."
Tɩ ba tↄgɛ pẽgɛ ẽ, la a yetↄg-sõma la tɩ a tↄgɛ la di'ige ba mɛ. Dee tɩ ba sↄkra yetɩ, la ka de Azozɛfʋ dayʋa la n wãna?

Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam põn mina tɩ ya wʋn makɛ makrɛ ẽna bↄ mam yetɩ: 'Tɩɩm dãana, tɩbɛ fʋ mẽŋa.' La ya wʋn ken yele mam yetɩ: 'Bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ daan ẽŋɛ Kapɛrnaʋm tẽŋam tɩ tõma wõm na, ẽŋɛ bɛla nõo fʋ mẽŋa tẽŋam kalam mẽ.' "
Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ba ka nannɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa baa ayɩla a mẽŋa tẽŋam.
La de la sɩra tɩ mam yetɩ ya tɩ: Pↄkõpa zozo'e yʋʋn boe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋam A'eli wakatʋm na mɛ, la saaga ka ni yʋʋma atã la wõr-sɩyoobɩ, tɩ kↄm yʋʋn ba bↄna tẽŋa la wuu pʋam.
La Nawẽnnɛ ka tõm A'eli yetɩ a sẽŋɛ pↄkõ-bãma zẽ'am. A tõm ẽ na pↄkõorɛ n boe Sarɛpɩta n boe Sidõ so'olʋm pʋam na zẽ'am.
La kõnkↄma zozo'e yʋʋn boe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋam A'elize wakatʋm na mɛ, la baa ayɩla ka yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, la Anãamã sɛka n yese Siiri so'olʋm na mã'a n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
La ban wõm bɛla la, sɛba n boe wẽndeego la pʋam wuu sũure daan yı̃ige mɛ.
Tɩ ba isge ve'ege Azezi tẽŋa la pʋam yese. Tẽŋa la boe la tãŋa zuo. Tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka n zãagɛ la tẽŋa la, ba daan boorɩ tɩ ba zã'agɛ ẽ basɛ mɛ tɩ a lui ki.
La Azezi kẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tẽŋasʋka fõrgɛ.
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la Galile tẽŋa ayẽma yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Kapɛrnaʋm, tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ daan paagɛ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ ba wẽndeem ka zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga.
Tɩ a zãsŋↄ la daan di'ige ba, a yetↄga la n tarɩ pãŋa la ı̃yã.
Tɩ bʋraa daan bↄna wẽndeem na tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ, tɩ a tı̃i kaasɛ yetɩ:
"A'a! Azezi n de Nazarɛtɩ nẽra, fõn bẽm yelle n boe la tõma? Fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ sã'am na tõma? Mam mi fõn de sɛka, fõn de la pʋpeelem dãana n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am."
Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: "Go'oge, yese dee basɛ bʋraa la!" Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la lʋbɛ ẽ nẽrba la wuu nẽŋam, dee yese, la a ka pↄglʋm ẽ.
Tɩ ba wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: "Yetↄga ẽna de la bẽm? A tarɩ la pãŋa la ke'eŋo, dee tãsra kʋlkã'arsɩ, tɩ ba yɛsra."
Tɩ Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ saagɛ zẽ'e-bãma wuu.
Tɩ Azezi isge ba wẽndeego la pʋam yese ka kẽ Asimõ yire. Tɩ Asimõ dɛɛm-pↄka bẽ'era, tɩ a ı̃yã ba tʋlgɛ. Tɩ ba tↄgɛ a yelle bↄ Azezi,
tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka suure a zuo, dee tãsɛ bã'a la yetɩ a basɛ ẽ. La ẽn yele la, bã'a la basɛ ẽ mɛ, tɩ a isge tↄtↄ ẽŋɛ ba sãanↄ.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan bↄna mı̃ kẽ'era, tɩ ba tarɩ bã'adõma tɩ bã'asɩ buuri to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am. Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba nẽra woo zuo, tɩ ba wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.

La kʋlkã'arsɩ daan yesrɩ mɛ dee basra nẽrba zozo'e, dee kaasra yetɩ: "Fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa." Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ ba, ka basɛ tɩ ba tↄgɛ sɛla sɛla, se'ere n soe la, ba daan bãŋɛ tɩ a de la Krisi n de Fãagra la.
Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azezi yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽra ka boe mı̃. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e ɛɛra ẽ. La ba daan yẽ ẽ mɛ, bↄↄra tɩ ba gu ẽ tɩ a da le yese ba zẽ'am.
La Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Dẽnɩ tɩ mam mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm n ãn se'em tẽnsɩ basɛba mẽ pʋam, la de la bɛla ı̃yã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm mam."
La a ẽn mõola kõ-yẽlga la Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam mɛ.
Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi ze la Zenezarɛtɩ mõgrɛ nõorʋm, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ kaagɛ ẽ mikra taaba bↄↄra tɩ ba wõm Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga.
Tɩ a yẽ õornↄ bayi n ze mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ zũn-yõgrɩba sige pɛɛra ba yʋgsɩ dee basɛ.

La õorŋↄ ayɩla daan de la Asimõ bõnↄ. Tɩ Azezi kẽ õorŋↄ la pʋam, dee yele Asimõ yetɩ: "Mõm õorŋↄ la tɩ a sẽŋɛ nẽŋa fẽe." La Azezi n yele bɛla la, Asimõ mõm õorŋↄ la mɛ, tɩ a lebe ko'om pʋam fẽe. Tɩ Azezi zı̃'ire õorŋↄ la pʋam pa'alɛ nẽrba la.
La ẽn pa'alɛ ba ba'asɛ la, tɩ a yele Asimõ yetɩ: "Mõm õorŋↄ la tɩ a sẽŋɛ kʋlko'om tɩ ya lobe yʋgsɩ la."
Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, tõma nãmsɛ mɛ yʋ'ʋŋↄ wã wuu dee ka yõkɛ sɛla sɛla. La fõn yele la ı̃yã, tɩ wʋn lobe tɩ yʋgsɩ la."
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kʋlko'om ka lobe ba yʋgsɩ la, yãŋa yõgɛ zũma ba zo'oge, tɩ ba yʋgsɩ la zɩgra la ba ãasʋm.
Tɩ ba yɩbsɛ ba taaba õorŋↄ ayɩla la pʋam yetɩ, ba wa'am sõŋɛ ba. La ba taaba la sẽŋɛ mɛ ka sõŋɛ ba, tɩ ba pɩrɛ õornↄ bayi la wuu la zũma, halɩ tɩ ba zɩgra la ba mise.
La Asimõ yʋ'ʋrɛ ayɩla n de Apɩyɛɛrɩ n yẽ bɛla la, tɩ a ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fõrgɛ mam zẽ'am, se'ere n soe la, mam de la tõon-be'ero dãana."
