Se'ere n soe tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele bɛla la, ẽŋa la a taaba la n daan yẽ zũma la tɩ ba yõgɛ se'em na botɩ ba palẽŋa n ẽkɛ.

La dabeem mẽ n daan kẽ Azebede dayↄↄsɩ Azakɩ la Azã n daan ẽn dↄla la Asimõ tõnna la. Tɩ Azezi yele Asimõ yetɩ: "Da zoe dabeem, tɩ lan sẽŋɛ zı̃na wɛ'ɛsa wuu, fʋ wʋn ɛɛra la nẽrba tɩ ba dↄla mam wʋ yãma n yõgrɩ zũma se'em na."
La Azezi n yele bɛla la, ba tarɩ õornↄ la dooge mɛ yãŋa basɛ sɛla woo dee dↄla Azezi.

La Azezi daan boe la tẽŋa ayẽma pʋam, tɩ bʋraa mẽ bↄna mı̃ dɛna kõnkonne, la bã'a la kẽ a ı̃yã zo'oge mɛ. Tɩ a yẽ Azezi ka ka dũma Azezi nẽŋam dɩkɛ a nẽŋa võglɛ tẽŋa sose ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fʋ sãn bↄↄra, fʋ tã wʋn basɛ tɩ m yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ le ãna sõŋa."
Tɩ Azezi tẽegɛ a nu'ugo kalʋm ẽ dee yetɩ: "Mam bↄↄra, yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa." Tɩ bã'a la basɛ ẽ bilam mẽŋa.

Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Da kãn yele nẽra nẽra, la sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽema zẽ'am ka pa'alɛ ẽ fʋ mẽŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ, dee bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɛla tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ ba bↄ la, tɩ la pa'alɛ ba tɩ fʋ sɩrɩ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
La bɛla wuu, Azezi yelle daan malɩn saagɛ la zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e lagsɛ tɩ ba selse a yetↄga la, dee tɩ a botɩ ba bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
La Azezi ẽn sẽnna la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe la pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.

La daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi bↄna mı̃ pa'ala nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, tɩ Farisi dõma, la Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n ze'ele Galile, la Zude, la Zerizalɛm mẽ zẽa mı̃ sɛlsra. Tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa daan bↄna la Azezi, tɩ a botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Tɩ bʋraasɩ zɛ bʋraa n de kↄↄrŋↄ gã a bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am. La ba boorɩ tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ kẽ la de-sɛka tɩ Azezi boe mı̃ na pʋam, ka bı̃ŋe ẽ Azezi nẽŋam.

La nẽrba la mike mɛ, tɩ ba ka yẽ folle tarɩ ẽ kẽ. Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ ba zɛ kↄↄrŋↄ la zom gↄsgↄ, ka lakɛ gↄsgↄ la bↄbrɛ ayɩla, doose bilam sike ẽ la a bõn-gã'ala la nẽrba la sʋkam bı̃ŋe ẽ Azezi nẽŋam.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ ban bↄ ẽŋa sɩra se'em na, yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "M sɩrɛ, fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna fʋ zuo."
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la tẽ'esra yetɩ: "A tẽ'esɛ tɩ ẽŋa de la ãne tↄgra pↄ'ↄra Nawẽnnɛ. Ãne n tã wʋn basɛ nẽra tõon-be'ero taalɛ, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a?"
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya tẽ'esra wãna wã?
Bẽm n de nãana gãnna, mam sãn yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna a zuo n de nãana, bɩɩ mam sãn yele ẽ yetɩ, a isge sẽnna n de nãana?
Bɛla m wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tarɩ pãŋa dũnia zuo wʋn basɛ nẽrba tõon-be'ero taalɛ." A yele bɛla dee yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge dɩkɛ fʋ bõn-gã'ala la kule."
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ kↄↄrŋↄ la isge ba wuu nẽŋam dɩkɛ a bõn-gã'ala la kulla, dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ nẽrba la wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ba, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Tɩ zı̃na yẽ bõn-yãlma."
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi yese sẽŋɛ ka yẽ lampo-tↄ'ↄsa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Alevi, tɩ a zı̃ lampo to'osgo deem. Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Isge dↄla mam."
Tɩ a isge basɛ sɛla woo dee dↄla ẽ.
Tɩ Alevi dʋgɛ dia zo'oge ẽŋɛ kibsa a yire bↄ Azezi, tɩ ẽŋa la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la nẽrba zozo'e zẽa dita.
Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba, la ba lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma yõnna Azezi karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm ı̃yã tɩ yãma lagɩm na lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma dita?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛba n tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm ka eerɩ tɩba. Sɛba n bẽ'erɩ n eerɩ tɩba.
Mam ka wa'am dũnia zuo sɛba dõma n yetɩ bãma masɛ ya la ı̃yã, mam wa'am tɩ m yele la tõon-be'ero dõma tɩ ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero."
Tɩ nẽrba la yele Azezi yetɩ: "Azã karẽnbiisi, la Farisi dõma karẽnbiisi ẽn lʋta nõorɛ mɛ dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, dee tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi dita dee yũura."
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nẽra n di pↄka ẽŋɛ kibsa, tɩ a tadãandõma bↄna mı̃ tɩ ba naagɛ la ẽ di kibsa la, yãma wʋn sakɛ tɩ ba lʋ nõorɛ mɛ dee tɩ pↄgdita la ken bↄna ba zẽ'am bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ. La wakatɛ wʋn wa'am tɩ ba wʋn yese pↄgdita la ba zẽ'am, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yãŋa wʋn lʋ nõorɛ."
Tɩ Azezi le makɛ makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Nẽra kãn ãagɛ fu-paalɛ dɩkɛ lige fu-kɛka. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, a wʋn sã'am fu-paalɛ la mɛ, la tãn-paalɛ la kãn masɛ la fu-kɛka la.
La nẽra mẽ kãn dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm wↄ-kɛgsɩ pʋam. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, dã-paalga la sãn kɛlla, ba wʋn botɩ wↄↄsɩ la tãsɛ mɛ. Bɛla dãam na wʋn ka'agɛ mɛ sã'am, tɩ wↄↄsɩ la mẽ sã'am.
La masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm na wↄ-paalsɩ pʋam.
La nẽra sãn yũ dã-kɛka n kele la, a ka le bↄↄra dã-paalga. A wʋn yetɩ, dã-kɛka la n ãn sõŋa."
Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi dↄla vatↄ pʋam tↄlla, tɩ a karẽnbiisi kↄ si wẽena ↄbra.
Tɩ Farisi dõma nẽrba basɛba yẽ ban ẽŋɛ bɛla la, yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma ẽŋɛ sɛla n sisri tõma vo'osgo daarɛ?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma ka karẽŋɛ Adavidi la a nẽrba la kↄm n yʋʋn dõnnɩ tɩ Adavidi ẽŋɛ se'em na?

A yʋʋn kẽ la Nawẽnnɛ deego pʋam dɩkɛ borborɩ sɛba tɩ ba bı̃ŋe bↄ Nawẽnnɛ na obe. La sisri mɛ, nẽra nẽra ka obrɩ ba, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma la mã'a. La Adavidi yʋʋn obe borborɩ bãma mɛ, dee bↄ a nẽrba la tɩ ba obe."
La Azezi ken yele ba mɛ yetɩ: "Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n soe vo'osgo daarɛ."
Vo'osgo daarɛ ayẽma tɩ Azezi kẽ Zifdõma wẽndeem zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga. Tɩ bʋraa daan bↄna mı̃, tɩ a zʋʋgↄ nu'ugo ki.

Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la daan bɩsra Azezi wʋn botɩ nẽra la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ la bɩɩ, a kãn botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Se'ere n soe la, ba daan eerɩ la so-sɛka tɩ ba wʋn yetɩ a sã'am bãma sisgo dõrɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ba tẽ'esgↄ la, yele bʋraa la nu'ugo n ki la yetɩ: "Isge ze'ele nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka." Tɩ a isge ze'ele.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ m soke ya mɛ bɩsɛ, sore boe tɩ nẽra ẽŋɛ sõŋa vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a ẽŋɛ be'em? Sore boe tɩ a fãagɛ nẽra vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kʋ ẽ?"
Dee bɩsɛ ba wuu kaagɛ, dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo la." Tɩ a tẽegɛ a nu'ugo la, tɩ a nu'ugo la yãŋa tẽegɛ ãna sõŋa.
Tɩ ba sũnsõa yı̃ige halɩ tɩ ba bãnna ban wʋn ẽŋɛ Azezi se'em.
La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, bↄna bilam pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋŋↄ wuu.
Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ a wi a karẽnbiisi la, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am. Tɩ a looge karẽnbiisi pia la ayi bãma pʋam. Bãma n de nẽr-sɛba tɩ a wʋn tõm na.
Ba daan de la Asimõ tɩ Azezi sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la A'ãndre n de Apɩyɛɛrɩ yɩbga, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la Afilipi, la Abatelemi,
la Amatie, la Atoma, la Azakɩ sɛka n de Alfe bia la, la Asimõ sɛka n daan de Zelↄtɩ nẽra ayɩla la,
la Azudaasɩ n de Azakɩ bia la, la Azudaasɩ Iskariyo sɛka n wʋn zãm Azezi la.

La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ze'ele la tãŋa la zuo sige zẽ'e-sɛka n naagɛ taaba. La a karẽnbiisi basɛba zozo'e, la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e n yese Zude, la Zerizalɛm, la Tiiri la Sidõ so'olʋm n boe ko-kãtɛ nõorʋm na n lagsɛ bilam.
Ba wa'am tɩ ba selse la Azezi yetↄga, dee tɩ a bↄ ba bã'adõma ı̃mã'asʋm. La nẽrba basɛba n daan boe mı̃ tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dↄla ba, tɩ ba daan yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu ɛɛra tɩ ba kalʋm ẽ, se'ere n soe la, pãŋa n yesrɩ a pʋam bↄ'ↄra ba wuu ı̃mã'asʋm.
Tɩ Azezi gorge bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Yãma sɛba n de nasdõma la tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la ya bõnↄ.
Yãma sɛba kↄm n dõnnɩ lɛɛlɛ wã tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka di seke. Yãma sɛba n kaasrɩ lɛɛlɛ wã tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka la'ara.
Yãma sɛba tɩ nẽrba sisri ya, dee bↄkra ya, tʋʋra ya, dee ka nanna ya wʋ ya de la tõon-be'ero dõma, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ı̃yã la, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Wakat-sɛka tɩ ba ɩtɩ yãma bɛla la, ẽŋɛ-ya sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn yẽ yↄↄrↄ zo'oge mɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire. Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ ba yaabdõma yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la bɛla.
La yãma sɛba n de bõntatba la wʋn yẽ toogo, yãma n põn yẽ bõn-sõma la ı̃yã.

La yãma sɛba n tarɩ sɛla woo lɛɛlɛ wã tɩ la seke la, wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka sẽnna la kↄm. La yãma sɛba n la'arɩ lɛɛlɛ wã wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya sũure wʋn ka sã'am tɩ ya kaasɛ.
La yãma sɛba tɩ nẽrba wuu pẽgrɩ ya la, wʋn yẽ toogo. Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ ba yaabdõma mẽ yʋʋn pẽgrɩ nõtↄ'ↄs-sɛba n de põmpↄrndõma la bɛla."
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "La mam yetɩ yãma sɛba n selsrɩ mam wã tɩ, ya nõŋɛ ya bɛ'ɛba, la sɛba n sisri ya la, ya ɩta ba sõŋa.
La ya kã'ara kã'a-sõma bↄ'ↄra sɛba n kã be'em bↄ'ↄra ya la, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ bↄ'ↄra sɛba n ɩtɩ ya be'em na.
Nẽra sãn wẽ fʋ pɛka ayɩla, fʋ basɛ tɩ a wẽ ayẽma la pa'asɛ. La nẽra sãn fãagɛ fʋ fu-kãtɛ, fʋ basɛ tɩ a to'oge fʋ fu-pɩka pa'asɛ.
La nẽra sãn sose fʋ sɛla, fʋ bↄ ẽ. La nẽra sãn dɩkɛ sɛla n de fʋ bõnↄ, fʋ da yetɩ a bↄ fↄ fʋ bõnↄ na.
La yãma n boorɩ tɩ nẽrba ɩta bõn-sɛba bↄ'ↄra ya la, ya mẽ ɩta bɛla bↄ'ↄra ba.
La ya sãn nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ya la mã'a, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ba mɛ.
La ya sãn ɩta sɛba n ɩtɩ ya sõŋa la mã'a sõŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma ɩtɩ la bɛla.
La ya sãn pɛŋra sɛba tɩ ya tẽ'esrɩ tɩ ba wʋn yẽ lebse ya la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma peŋrɩ tõon-be'ero dõma mɛ dee le tↄ'ↄsra bɛla.

La, la sãn dɛna yãma, nõŋɛ-ya ya bɛ'ɛba, dee ẽŋɛ ba sõŋa. Peŋe-ya nẽrba dee da tẽ'esra tɩ ba le bↄ ya. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya yↄↄrↄ wʋn zo'oge mɛ, la ya wʋn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ sɛla wuu kↄma, se'ere n soe la, a ɩtɩ sɛba n ka mi yel-sõnnɛ, la pʋtʋʋl-dõma sõŋa mɛ.
Zↄta-ya nẽrba ninbãalga, wʋ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n zotɩ nẽrba ninbãalga se'em na."

"Da tↄgra-ya nẽra yelle yetɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn tↄgɛ ya yelle yetɩ ya ẽŋɛ be'em. Da zɛrgra-ya nẽrba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn zɛrgɛ ya. Basɛ-ya taaba taalɛ, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn basɛ ya taalɛ.

Bↄ-ya ya taaba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn bↄ ya. Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya zo'oge wʋ ban dɩkɛ wan-kãtɛ makɛ pɩrɛ sõŋa tɩ la saara. Bõn-sɛka tɩ yãma dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ ya taaba la, bõn-ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ ya."
Tɩ Azezi daan makɛ makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Fʋa tã wʋn ve'ege fʋa mɛ tɩ ba wuu kãn lui boko pʋam?
Karẽnbia ka gãnnɩ a karẽnsãama, la karẽnbia sãn zãsʋm sɛla woo ba'asɛ, a ãn wʋ a karẽnsãama la.
Bẽm tɩ fʋ bɩsra sↄkↄ n boe fʋ sↄbia nifum, dee ka bɩsra dↄↄgↄ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum na?

Fõn ẽŋɛ la wãne yɛta fʋ sↄbia yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ fʋ yese sↄkↄ a nifum, dee ka bɩsra dↄↄgↄ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum? Pʋlibsum dãana, dẽŋɛ yese dↄↄgↄ la fʋ mẽŋa nifum, dee yãŋa tã'agɛ yẽ sõŋa yese sↄkↄ la n boe fʋ sↄbia nifum na."
"Tɩ-sõŋↄ ka wↄnnɩ biɛ be'ero. Tɩ-be'ego mẽ ka wↄnnɩ biɛ sõma.
Ba bãŋrɩ tɩɩsɩ wuu la ba biɛ pʋam. Gõ'osɩ kãn wↄm kẽnkãma, la kẽkↄ mẽ kãn wↄm tã'ama.
Nẽr-sõŋↄ sũure n ãn sõŋa botɩ a tↄgra la bõn-sõma, la nẽr-be'ego sũure n ka ãn sõŋa botɩ a tↄgra la bõn-be'ero. Se'ere n soe la, bõn-sɛba n boe nẽrsaala sũurum n yesrɩ a nõorʋm."
"Bẽm ı̃yã tɩ yãma wi'ira mam tɩ 'Zuudãana, Zuudãana', dee ka ɩta mam n yetɩ ya ɩta se'em na?
Nẽr-sɛka woo n sẽm mam zẽ'am, dee sɛlsra mam yetↄga, dee sakra ɩta mam n yele se'em na, mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya ẽŋa dãana n ãn se'em:
A ãn wʋ nẽra n boorɩ tɩ a mẽ a yire, tũ paagɛ tãmpı̃a, ẽebɛ a yire tãmpı̃a la zuo. Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wẽ yire la, tɩ a ka lui, ẽn mẽ sõŋa la ı̃yã.

La nẽr-sɛka n wõnnɩ mam yetↄga, dee ka ɩta mam n yele se'em na, ãn wʋ nẽra n mẽ a yire tẽntõnnↄ zuo, dee ka tũ ẽebɛ. Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wa wẽ yire la, tɩ a kↄ'ↄn lui saam saam."
Azezi tↄgɛ bɛla wuu bↄ nẽrba la ba'asɛ, dee sẽŋɛ la Kapɛrnaʋm.
Tɩ Rom sʋda-kɛ'ɛma bↄna mı̃ tara a tõntõnna tɩ a nõŋɛ. Tɩ tõntõnna la bẽ'era dee la a ki.
Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la wõm Azezi yelle, tõm Zifdõma kẽma basɛba a zẽ'am tɩ ba sose ẽ yetɩ, a wa'am wa botɩ a tõntõnna la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am ka tı̃i belem ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋraa la de la nẽr-sõŋↄ.
A nõŋɛ tõma buuri mɛ, la ẽŋa n mẽ wẽndeego bↄ tõma. Bɛla ı̃yã, mõrgɛ sõŋɛ ẽ."
Tɩ Azezi dↄla ba wɛ'ɛsa ka lɛm yire la, tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la le tõm a sɩrdõma tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, da nãmsɛ fʋ mẽŋa. Mam ka narɩ tɩ fʋ wa'am mam yire,
bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam tẽ'esɛ yetɩ mam mẽŋa ka narɩ tɩ m wa'am fõn zẽ'am. Wen tↄgɛ yetↄga mã'a, tɩ m tõntõnna la wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.

Se'ere n soe la, nẽrba n soe mam, la mam mẽ soe la sʋdaasɩ basɛba. Mam sãn yele sʋda-sɛka yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ', a we'esɩ mɛ. La mam sãn yele ayẽma yetɩ: 'Wa'am', a sẽm mɛ. Mam sãn yele m tõntõnna yetɩ: 'Ẽŋɛ wãna', a ɩtɩ mɛ."

Azezi n wõm bɛla la, la daan di'ige ẽ mɛ, tɩ a wẽrgɛ yele nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ ẽ na yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ mam nãn ka yẽ nẽra n bↄ mam sɩra wʋ bʋra-ẽna wã, baa Ɩsrayɛlɩ buuri la pʋam mam ka yẽ."
Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la n tõm sɛba la lebe a yire ka yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi we'esɩ la tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nayin, tɩ a karẽnbiisi, la nẽrba zozo'e dↄla ẽ.

La Azezi paagɛ tẽŋa la nõorʋm, tʋ'ʋsɛ la nẽrba n zɛɛrɩ budibla n ki wɛ'ɛsa tɩ ba ka laagɛ. Budibla la ma de la pↄkõorɛ. La a bia de la ẽŋa mã'a. Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba zozo'e daan kↄlgɛ ẽ dↄla wɛ'ɛsa.
La Zuudãana Azezi n yẽ pↄkõorɛ la, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Da kɛlla."
A yele bɛla dee sẽŋɛ paagɛ kalʋm na sãŋandɛ la, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n zɛɛrɩ kũm na ze'ele, tɩ a yele kũm na yetɩ: "Budib-polle, mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge."
Tɩ sɛka n ki la vo'oge isge zı̃'ire, yãŋa tↄgra. Tɩ Azezi yele a ma la yetɩ: "Fʋ bia n bɛla."
Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba wuu, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄs-kãtɛ n wa'am tõma zẽ'am." Dee le yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ n wa'am tɩ a sõŋɛ a nẽrba."
Tɩ yetↄga la saagɛ Zude so'olʋm, la tẽn-sɛba n lɛm na wuu, tɩ ba wõm Azezi n ẽŋɛ se'em.
Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi tↄgɛ bõn-bãma wuu pa'alɛ ẽ. Tɩ Azã wi a karẽnbiisi bayi
tõm ba Zuudãana Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ ba ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?"

Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azã sɛka n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n tõm tõma yetɩ, tɩ soke fʋ bɩsɛ, fõn de sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?"
Wakat-ẽŋa Azezi daan botɩ bã'adõma zozo'e tɩ bã'asɩ to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, la sɛba tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ba n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, dee botɩ fↄↄsɩ zozo'e nini yẽta.

Tɩ Azezi lerge sɛba tɩ Azã tõm na yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Azã yãma n yẽ bõn-sɛba, dee wõm se'em na wuu: Fↄↄsɩ nini yẽtɩ mɛ, tɩ kↄↄrnↄ sẽnna, tɩ kõnkↄma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa, tɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ kũm vↄ'ↄra, tɩ nasdõma wõnna Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga.
La nẽr-sɛka n ka lebrɩ poorʋm mam ı̃yã tarɩ zu-yẽlga."
Sɛba tɩ Azã tõm na lebe kule mɛ. Tɩ Azezi yãŋa tↄgɛ nẽrba la Azã yelle yetɩ: "Yãma daan sẽŋɛ mõom tɩ ya ka bɩsɛ la bẽm? Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la mõogↄ tɩ kʋsebgo mı̃ini bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ.
La bẽm tɩ yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ? Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la nẽra n yɛ fu-sõma bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ. Nẽr-sɛba n yɛɛrɩ fu-sõma dee tarɩ bõn-sõma la, kẽ'erɩ la na'adõma yiɛ pʋam.
La yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la bẽm? Ya sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa bɩɩ? Ẽe. La mam yetɩ ya tɩ a de la nẽra n gãnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Mam tõntõnna n wãna tɩ mam tõm tɩ a dẽŋɛ fʋ nẽŋa malgɛ sore bↄ fↄ.'
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽrsaalba tɩ ba dↄgɛ la wuu pʋam, nẽra ka boe n gãnnɩ Azã, la nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na pʋam gãnnɩ Azã mɛ.
La nẽrba la wuu, baa la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba la n wõm Azã yetↄga la, ba basɛ tɩ Azã mise ba ko'om pʋam mɛ. Bɛla pa'alɩ mɛ tɩ ba sakɛ mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tarɩ sɩra.
La Farisi dõma, la Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n zagsɛ tɩ Azã ka mise ba ko'om pʋam na, ba zagsɛ la bõn-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a ẽŋɛ bↄ ba la."
Tɩ Azezi le yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ mam wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ la zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba n ɩtɩ se'em na. Ba ɩrgↄ wõn na bẽm?
Ba ãn wʋ kↄma n zı̃ da'am wi'ira taaba yetɩ: 'Tõma peebe wɩɩsɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma zagsɛ ka wa. Tɩ tõma yõom kʋʋrɛ yõoma, tɩ yãma ka kɛlla.'
Se'ere n soe la, Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na wa'am mɛ wa lʋta nõorɛ, dee ka yũura dãam, tɩ ba yetɩ kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
Tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am wa dita dee yũura, tɩ ba yetɩ, a de la dita, la dã-yũura, la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba la tõon-be'ero dõma sɩrɛ.
Nẽr-sɛba n sakrɩ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm n boorɩ se'em na n mi tɩ a tarɩ yɛm."
Farisi nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n daan wi Azezi tɩ a wa'am ẽŋa yire tɩ ba di. Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ yire la ka zı̃'ire bↄna mı̃ tɩ a di.
La pↄka n boe tẽŋa la pʋam tõnna yalsɩ tõoma. La pↄka la n wõm tɩ Azezi boe Farisi nẽra la yire dita la, tɩ a tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ kaam yũuŋo n ãn sõŋa wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
Yãŋa ze'ele lɛm Azezi nãma bↄba kɛlla. Tɩ a nintãm yɛsra tↄgra Azezi nãma zuo. Tɩ pↄka la suure duuse Azezi nãma la, la a zomto, dee kↄkɛ a nãma la, sõogɛ ba la tɩdarɛ kaam na.
Tɩ Farisi nẽra la n wi Azezi la yẽ bɛla, tẽ'esɛ yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna sãn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa, a wʋn bãŋɛ nɩ pↄg-ẽna n kalʋm ẽ wã n de nẽr-sɛka, a wʋn bãŋɛ nɩ tɩ a tõnnɩ la yalsɩ tõoma."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Asimõ, mam tarɩ la sɛla tɩ m yele fo." Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, yele!"
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽra n daan boe tɩ nẽrba bayi tara a sãnnɛ. Nẽra ayɩla sãnnɛ de la lig-kõba kↄbsnuu. Tɩ ayẽma la mẽ sãnnɛ dɛna lig-kõba pinuu.
Tɩ ba daan ka tãna wʋn yↄ ẽ a ligri la. Tɩ a basɛ ligri la bↄ ba. Bãma bayi la, ãne n wʋn nõŋɛ ligri la dãana gãnna?"
Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Mam tẽ'esɛ tɩ sɛka sãnnɛ n zo'oge la." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn lerge se'em na de la sɩra."
Dee gelge bɩsɛ pↄka la, yele Asimõ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ pↄka wã? Mam n kẽ fõn yire la, fõn ka bↄ mam ko'om tɩ mam peege m nãma. La pↄka la peege mam nãma mɛ la a nintãm, dee duuse ba la a zomto.
Fõn ka kↄkɛ mam tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ fʋ to'oge mam sõŋa. La mam n kẽ'em na, pↄka la kↄkɛ mam nãma mɛ ka basɛ.
La fõn ka nã'asɛ mam ẽŋɛ kaam mam zuugo, la a sõogɛ mam nãma mɛ la tɩdarɛ kaam.

Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam yele fʋ yetɩ, Nawẽnnɛ basɛ a tõon-be'ero n zo'oge la taalɛ mɛ. Bɛla n soe tɩ a nõŋrɛ la zo'oge. La nẽr-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ fẽfẽe la, a nõŋrɛ mẽ de la fẽe."
Azezi yele bɛla, dee yele pↄka la yetɩ: "Fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna fʋ zuo."
Tɩ sɛba n daan diti la ẽ na tↄgra la taaba sↄkra yetɩ: "A tẽ'esɛ tɩ ẽŋa de la ãne basɛ nẽrba tõon-be'ero taalɛ?"
Tɩ Azezi yele pↄka la yetɩ: "Fõn bↄ mam sɩra la ı̃yã n fãagɛ fↄ basɛ. Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm."
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la tẽn-kãra, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ pʋam ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la dↄla ẽ.

La pↄgsɩ basɛba n mẽ daan dolɩ ẽ. La kʋlkã'arsɩ, la bã'asɩ n daan nãmsrɩ pↄg-bãma, tɩ Azezi botɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Pↄgsɩ la ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Amaari n yese Magdala, ẽŋa tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopↄɩ daan yese dee basɛ ẽ na.

La ayẽma yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azanɩ. Ẽŋa de la Asuza n bɩsrɩ naba A'erↄdɩ yire yelle la pↄga. La ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Asuzanɩ. Pↄg-bãna, la pↄgsɩ zozo'e n tarɩ ba mẽŋa lↄgrↄ sõŋra Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la.
La nẽrba n ze'ele tẽnsɩ to'oto'ore sẽnna Azezi zẽ'am. Nẽrba la n daan lagsɛ zo'oge pãɩ la, tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ:
"Kaara n daan yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri. Ẽŋa n boe mı̃ lↄbgra la, tɩ bõnbuuri la basɛba lui sore zuo tɩ nẽrba nẽ ba, dee tɩ niinto mẽ wa'am wa di ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui tãmpı̃a zuo bule, la mã'asrɛ n ka boe mı̃ na ı̃yã tɩ ba zẽkɛ ki.
Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui gõ'osɩ zẽ'a, tɩ bãma la gõ'osɩ la wuu lagɩm yese, tɩ gõ'osɩ la fʋrɛ ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui zẽ'e-sõŋↄ zẽ'a yese, wↄm biɛ zo'oge paagɛ kↄbga kↄbga." Azezi n tↄgɛ bɛla la, dee yetɩ: "Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ makrɛ la võorɛ.

Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ botɩ yãma bãŋɛ a so'olʋm yelle n sʋgɛ la mɛ, la sɛba n ka boe tõma pʋam na, mam makrɩ la magsa bↄ'ↄra ba. 'Bɛla tɩ ba wʋn bɩsra, dee ka yẽta, ba wʋn wõnna, dee ka bãŋra ba võorɛ.'
Makrɛ la võorɛ n wãna: Bõnbuuri la de la Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga.
Sore la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la, tɩ Asũtãana wa'am wa yese yetↄga la ba sũure pʋam, botɩ ba kãn sakɛ yẽ fãarɛ.

La tãmpı̃a la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la, dee sakɛ la sũ-yẽlga, la yetↄga la ka kẽ ba sũure pʋam sõŋa. Ba sakɛ la wakatɛ fẽe, tɩ yelle sãn paagɛ ba, tɩ ba basɛ.

La gõ'osɩ la zẽ'a tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, tɩ ba yɛm yↄↄra la ba vↄm yelle, tɩ bõntarsõm la dũnia yẽlʋm yɛmleego botɩ ba ka tãna wʋn bɩ Nawẽnnɛ sore la pʋam.

La zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la, dee sakra dɩkra yetↄga la ɩta ba sũure pʋam sõŋa sõŋa, mõrgɛ zɛ kãŋkãŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore la pʋam wʋ bõnbuuri la n wↄm biɛ se'em na."
Azezi le yetɩ: "Nẽra ka yõ'orɩ fɩtla dɩkɛ lↄkↄ vuge ẽ, bɩɩ dɩkɛ ẽ sʋgɛ gↄrgↄ tilum. A wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo, tɩ a nẽegɛ peelem tɩ sɛba n kẽ'erɩ la yẽta.
Bõn-sɛka woo n lile la wʋn lilge mɛ, la bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ wʋn wa puke mɛ tɩ nẽrba bãŋɛ.
Mõrgɛ-ya bãŋɛ yãma n selsrɩ se'em na võorɛ. Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka n tarɩ sɛla, ba wʋn bↄ ẽ pa'asɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n ka tarɩ sɛla, bõn-sɛba fẽe tɩ a tẽ'esɛ tɩ a tara la, ba wʋn to'oge ba."
Azezi ma, la a yɩbsɩ n daan wa'am tɩ ba yẽ ẽ. La nẽrba zo'oge mɛ tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ paagɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ ba yele Azezi yetɩ: "Fʋ ma, la fʋ yɩbsɩ n boe yẽŋa bↄↄra tɩ ba yẽ fↄ."
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛba wuu n wõnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, dee sakɛ ɩta lan yele se'em na, n de mam ma, la mam yɩbsɩ."
Daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi kẽ õorŋↄ, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ dooge ya mõgrɛ la ke bↄba doone." Tɩ ba mõnna õorŋↄ la wɛ'ɛsa.
La ban mõnnɩ wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ gẽem yõkɛ Azezi, tɩ a gı̃se. Tɩ kʋseb-kãtɛ isge ko'om na zuo vugra, tɩ ko'om kẽ'era õorŋↄ la pʋam, tɩ la lebge pakrɛ bↄ ba.
Tɩ ba paagɛ nẽegɛ Azezi, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, karẽnsãama, tõma yetɩ tɩ ki mɛ." Tɩ a isge tãsɛ kʋsebgo, la ko-mı̃'isi tɩ ba ãna sı̃m. Tɩ kʋsebgo la ko-mı̃'isi la yõkɛ, tɩ la ãna sı̃m.
Tɩ a soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya ka bↄ mam sɩra?" Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba. Tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Ãne n de ẽna tã'agɛ tãsra kʋsebgo la ko'om, tɩ ba sakra a nõorɛ?"
La ba paagɛ la Geraza dõma tẽŋa. Mõgrɛ la boe la tẽn-ẽŋa la Galile tẽŋasʋka.
Tɩ Azezi ze'ele õorŋↄ pʋam sige. Tɩ tẽŋa la bʋraa ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ẽ sẽnna tʋ'ʋsra ẽ. A ka yɛɛrɩ fuugo, halɩ tɩ la yuuge, la a ka kẽ'erɩ yire, a boe la zẽ'e-sɛba tɩ yↄↄrↄ boe mı̃ na.

Nõor-faa tɩ kʋlkã'arga la ẽn girge ẽ. Tɩ ba gu'ura ẽ, dee ba a nãma, la a nu'usi wuu la bãnsɩ. Tɩ a kↄ'ↄra bãnsɩ la. La kʋlkã'arga la ẽn tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la mõom. La bʋraaga la n yẽ Azezi la, a kaasɛ mɛ ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam, tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Azezi, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Dayʋa, bẽm boe mam la fõn tẽŋasʋka? M sosrɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ fʋ da nãmsɛ mam." Azezi dẽŋɛ yele kʋlkã'arga la mɛ tɩ a yese dee basɛ bʋraa la, bɛla n soe tɩ kʋlkã'arga la yele bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Atʋsa." Se'ere n soe tɩ a yele bɛla la, kʋlkã'arsɩ la n dolɩ ẽ na zo'oge mɛ.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la sose Azezi yetɩ, a da botɩ ba sẽŋɛ bug-tẽŋa bog-ko'ogo la pʋam.
La kurkurdõma n daan zo'oge bↄna tãŋa zuo ↄbra yↄnnↄ. Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la belem Azezi yetɩ, a bↄ ba nõorɛ tɩ ba kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ Azezi sakɛ ban yele se'em na.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la basɛ bʋraa la, dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ ba wuu zoe sige ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam ki.
La sɛba n gu'uri kurkurdõma la n yẽ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la, ba zoe sẽŋɛ la tẽŋa pʋam, la kẽnkɛrsɩ wuu ka yele sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.

Tɩ nẽrba sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na. La ban paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am na, ba yẽ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ ẽ na, tɩ a yɛ la futo zẽa Azezi nẽŋam, dee tarɩ yɛm sõŋa sõŋa. Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba.
Tɩ sɛba n yẽ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la, yele ba lan ẽŋɛ se'em tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ bʋraa la.
Tɩ Geraza tẽŋa nẽrba la wuu belem Azezi yetɩ, a fõrgɛ dee basɛ ba tẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n ba kẽ ba. Tɩ Azezi kẽ'era õorŋↄ la tɩ a fõrgɛ.
Tɩ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ ẽ na, sose Azezi tɩ a basɛ tɩ a doose ẽ. Tɩ Azezi zagsɛ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ:
"Lebe kule ya yire, ka pa'alɛ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ bↄ fʋ la." Tɩ a doose tẽŋa la wuu pʋam, mõola pa'ala Azezi n ẽŋɛ bõn-sɛba wuu bↄ ẽ na.
Azezi daan lebe dooge la mõgrɛ la ke bↄba. La nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n põn lagsɛ bilam zɛ gu'ura ẽ. Azezi n daan paagɛ mı̃ na, ba to'oge ẽ mɛ sõŋa sõŋa.
La bʋraa ayɩla n boe mı̃ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azayirusi, a de la Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana, wa'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ: "Wa'am mam yire,
tɩ mam pↄyʋa n tarɩ yʋʋma pia la ayi n dee la a ki." Bʋraa la bia de la ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a. Tɩ Azezi dↄla ẽ wɛ'ɛsa, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la mikra ẽ.
La pↄka n daan boe mı̃ luta sɩkẽŋa yʋʋma pia la ayi tɩ la ka gↄ'ↄra. Tɩ a daan dɩkɛ ẽn tarɩ sɛla la wuu sã'am tɩbdõma zẽ'am, la baa ayɩla ka yãŋɛ botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Tɩ a paagɛ Azezi poorʋm, kalʋm Azezi fuugo nõorɛ. La bilam mẽŋa tɩ a zɩɩm na ze'ele ka le yɛsra.
Tɩ Azezi soke yetɩ: "Ãne n kalʋm mam?" Tɩ nẽra woo sɩ'ɩsɛ. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, nẽrba wã wuu n lagɩm gilge fõn mikra se'em wã tɩ fõn sↄkra?"
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "Nẽra n kalʋm mam, se'ere n soe la, mam bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ pãŋa n yese mam zẽ'am."

La pↄka la n bãŋɛ tɩ a kãn yãŋɛ sʋgɛ la Azezi la, tɩ a gõgra wa'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam, yele ẽ nẽrba la wuu nẽŋam se'ere n soe tɩ ẽŋa kalʋm ẽ, la ẽŋa n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm bilam mẽŋa se'em.
Tɩ Azezi yele pↄka la yetɩ: "M bia, fõn bↄ mam sɩra la ı̃yã n botɩ fʋ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm."
La Azezi n nãn boe mı̃ tↄgra la, tɩ nẽra ze'ele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yire wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ pↄyʋa la ki mɛ, da le nãmsɛ karẽnsãama la."
La Azezi n wõm bɛla la, tɩ a yele Azayirusi yetɩ: "Da zoe dabeem, wen bↄ mam sɩra, tɩ fʋ pↄyʋa la wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ a yire, la a ka botɩ nẽra nẽra doose ẽ kẽ, sãn dagna Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la bia la sↄ, la a ma mã'a.
La nẽrba la wuu daan kellɩ mɛ fabla bia la ı̃yã. Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Da kaasra-ya, bia la ka ki, a gı̃sri mɛ."
Tɩ ba la'ara Azezi, ban mi tɩ bia la ki mɛ na ı̃yã.
Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ bia la nu'ugo, tı̃i tↄgɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Bia, isge."
Tɩ bia la vↄm leme, tɩ a isge bilam mẽŋa. Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bↄ-ya bia la dia tɩ a di."
Tɩ la daan di'ige bia la sↄ, la a ma. Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.
Azezi daan wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la lagsɛ mɛ, bↄ ba pãŋa, la nõorɛ tɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arsɩ dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
Dee tõm ba yetɩ ba mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
La a yele ba yetɩ: "Da dɩkɛ-ya sɛla sɛla sẽŋɛ. Da dɩkɛ-ya dasaarɛ, bɩɩ tãmpↄkↄ, bɩɩ dia, bɩɩ ligri. Da dɩkɛ ya futo bayi bayi.
La yi-sɛka tɩ ya paagɛ tɩ ba to'oge ya, bↄna-ya yi-ẽŋa pʋam ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn fõrgɛ tẽŋa la.
La zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka to'oge ya, yese-ya tẽn-ẽŋa pʋam, dee pɩɩsɛ ya nãma tẽntõnnↄ basɛ. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, la wʋn pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa."
Azezi n yele bɛla la, karẽnbiisi la yese mɛ sẽŋɛ tẽn-pɩgsɩ wuu pʋam ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽta ı̃mã'asʋm.
Galile Naba A'erↄdɩ n daan wõm bõn-sɛba wuu n ɩtɩ la, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba basɛba n daan yele ẽ tɩ Azezi de la Azã sɛka n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n vo'oge.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli n le wa'am dũnia zuo, tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, kʋrʋm kʋrʋm Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ayẽma n vo'oge.
Tɩ A'erↄdɩ yetɩ: "Mam daan botɩ ba wike Azã zuugo mɛ, dee tɩ ãne n de ẽna wã tɩ mam wõm a yelle wãna wã?" La a daan boorɩ tɩ a yẽ Azezi mɛ.
Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la tɩ a daan tõm na, lebe mɛ ka tↄgɛ pa'alɛ ẽ bãma n ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu. Tɩ Azezi botɩ ba doose la ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka lɛm tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Betisayida.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la bãŋɛ ẽn sẽŋɛ zẽ'am na, babsɛ ẽ. Tɩ a to'oge ba, tↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle bↄ ba, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.

La wẽnnɛ n daan boe mı̃ tɩ a kẽ, tɩ karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la wa'am a zẽ'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Botɩ nẽrba la sẽŋɛ tẽn-pɩgsɩ, la yiɛ n lɛm na ka ɛ dia, la gã'a-zẽ'a, se'ere n soe la, tɩn boe zẽ'e-sɛka wã de la mõom."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma mẽŋa bↄ ba dia tɩ ba di." Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Tõma tarɩ la borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi mã'a, sãn dagna tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka da dia wa'am wa bↄ nẽr-bãna wuu."
La bʋraasɩ n daan boe mı̃ de wʋ tʋsanuu. Tɩ Azezi yele karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ nẽrba la welse zı̃'ire pinu-nu."
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la botɩ nẽrba la wuu zı̃'ire bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la gorge bɩsɛ saazuum pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ dia la ı̃yã, dee fiise borborɩ la zũma la bↄ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba to'oge pʋɩ nẽrba la.
Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ, dee tɩ karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ bõn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ pia la ayi.
Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi daan boe la kẽnkɛrŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la bↄna a zẽ'am, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Nẽrba yetɩ mam de la ãne?"

Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Nẽrba basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã sɛka n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli, tɩ basɛba yetɩ, fõn de la kʋrʋm kʋrʋm Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ayẽma n vo'oge."
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Dee yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?" Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge yetɩ: "Fõn de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na."
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra,

dee yetɩ: "Dẽnɩ tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nãmsɛ zozo'e. Tẽŋa wã kẽma, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nifo wʋn kẽ mam mɛ, tɩ ba kʋ mam, la dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge mɛ."
Azezi yele bɛla dee yele nẽrba la wuu yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a doose mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgↄ daarɛ woo wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vↄm mam ı̃yã, a wʋn yẽ vↄm.
Nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia sɛla woo dee koŋe vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorↄ de la bẽm?

Nẽr-sɛka n zoe yãnnɛ mam ı̃yã, la mam yetↄga la ı̃yã, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn zoe yãnnɛ la ẽ wakat-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn leme wa'am la m na'am pãŋa, la Nawẽnnɛ, la a malɛkadõma na'am pãŋa la.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ yãma nẽr-sɛba n boe kalam wã basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm."
Yetↄg-bãma poorʋm, la daan ẽŋɛ wʋ dabsa anii, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã doose ẽ zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ.
La ẽn boe mı̃ pʋ'ʋsra la, tɩ a nẽŋa teege, tɩ a futo pelge yẽgra.
Tɩ bʋraasɩ bayi darɛ zɛ tↄgra la ẽ. Ba de la Amoyisi, la A'eli
n puke ba mẽŋa nẽegɛ la Nawẽnnɛ na'am peelem tↄgra la Azezi, ẽŋa n wʋn ki Zerizalɛm se'em tɩ bõn-sɛka tɩ a wa'am tɩ a ẽŋɛ la, ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ yelle.
La gẽem n daan tarɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la a taaba la tɩ ba gı̃se, yãŋa nẽegɛ yẽ Azezi n yẽgrɩ, tɩ nẽrba bayi la zɛ a zẽ'am.

Tɩ nẽrba bayi la daan bↄna mı̃ tɩ ba fõrgɛ, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ. Basɛ tɩ tɩ tı̃ põnsɩ batã, ayɩla bↄ fõn, ayɩla bↄ Amoyisi, la ayɩla bↄ A'eli." A daan wen tↄgɛ mɛ, a ka mi ẽn tↄgrɩ se'em na.
La ẽn daan boe mı̃ tↄgra bɛla la, tɩ sawatɛ wa'am wa lile ba la a mã'asʋm. La sawatɛ la n lile ba la, dabeem n yõkɛ karẽnbiisi la.
Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: "Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam looge. Selse-ya ẽ."
La kõa la n tↄgɛ la, ba yẽ la Azezi mã'a n ze. Tɩ ba daan sı̃na wakat-ẽŋa ka yele nẽra nẽra bãma n yẽ sɛla la.
Tɩ beere daan wiige, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sige, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ daan tʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
La bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la pʋam tı̃i tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam belnɩ fʋ mɛ, bɩsɛ m bia wã. A de la mam bi-yẽŋa, la kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
Kʋlkã'arga la sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a botɩ a kaasra mɛ, dee luta kinki'ire, tɩ nõtõorʋm yɛsra a nõorʋm. Kʋlkã'arga la ẽn nãmsɛ ẽ zo'oge mɛ, pↄglʋm ẽ dee basɛ ẽ.
Bɛla tɩ mam belem fʋ karẽnbiisi yetɩ, ba dige ẽ tɩ a yese, tɩ ba ka yãŋɛ."
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bↄ'ↄrɩ mam sɩra, la ya ka ɩtɩ sõŋa. Mam wʋn mã'agɛ m mẽŋa la yãma yuuge paagɛ la wakat-kãna?" A yele bɛla dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Tarɩ bia la wa'am."

La bia la n paarɩ Azezi zẽ'am na, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la lʋbɛ ẽ tɩ a gõgra. Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a basɛ bia la. Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la basɛ bia la, tɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ ẽ lebse a sↄ.
La nẽrba la wuu n yẽ Nawẽnnɛ pãn-kãtɛ la, la di'ige ba mɛ. Nẽrba la wuu daan ken ze la yɛrɩ la bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Azezi ẽŋɛ la. Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ:
"Selse-ya yetↄg-ẽna tɩ mam yetɩ m tↄgɛ wã sõŋa: Ba wʋn yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ la nẽrsaalba nu'usum."
La ba daan ka bãŋɛ a yetↄga la võorɛ. Yetↄga la daan sʋgɛ mɛ tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ bãŋɛ a võorɛ, dee zↄta dabeem ka soke ẽ.
Azezi karẽnbiisi la daan wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene la taaba, bↄↄra tɩ ba bãŋɛ bãma pʋam nẽr-sɛka n wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ gãnna.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yõkɛ bia ze'ele lɛm a mẽŋa,

dee yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge bi-pɩka n ãn wʋ ẽna mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, a to'oge la mam, la sɛka n mẽ to'oge mam, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na. Nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka ya zẽ'am na, ẽŋa n de nẽr-kãtɛ."
Tɩ Azã yele Azezi yetɩ: "Zuudãana, tõma yẽ la bʋraa n digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ ba yɛsra, la ẽŋa n ka po dɛna tõma nẽra la ı̃yã, tɩ tõma gu ẽ yetɩ a basɛ."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Da gu-ya ẽ, nẽr-sɛka n ka sisri yãma, a de la ya nẽra."
Dabs-sɛba tɩ Azezi daan wʋn zẽkɛ sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire la n daan lɛm, tɩ a kↄ'ↄn yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ ẽŋa sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm.
A daan tõm na nẽrba yetɩ ba dẽŋɛ nẽŋam. Tɩ nẽrba la daan dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ Samaari tẽn-pɩka pʋam tɩ ba mãasna sɛla woo dee gu'ura ẽ.
Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba zagsɛ tɩ bãma kãn to'oge ẽ, ẽn we'esɩ Zerizalɛm na ı̃yã.
La a karẽnbiisi Azakɩ la Azã n bãŋɛ bɛla la, tɩ ba soke Azezi yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ wi bugum tɩ ba ze'ele saazuum wa di ba mɛ bɩɩ?"
Tɩ Azezi wẽrgɛ, gi ba ((yetɩ: "Yãma ka mi sɩ-sɛka n tarɩ ya la.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ a sã'am nẽrba vↄm, a wa'am tɩ a fãagɛ ba mɛ.")) Tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa tẽŋa ayẽma.
Ban boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ bʋraaga yele Azezi yetɩ: "Mam wʋn dↄla fↄ sẽnna zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ fʋ wʋn sẽnna."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Pɩɩna tarɩ yogro mɛ, tɩ niinto mẽ tara tʋgrↄ, la Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka tarɩ zẽ'a wʋn gã'arɛ vo'ose."
Dee le yele bʋraa ayẽma mẽ yetɩ: "Doose mam." Tɩ bʋraa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ m sↄ dee wa'am wa dↄla fↄ."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ sɛba n ka tarɩ vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am na laagɛ ba kũm. Dee tɩ fõn sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga la."
Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, mam wʋn doose fo, la basɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka keese m yir-dõma."
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛka n gʋrɛ nii-kũure kↄↄra dee bɩsra poorʋm, ka tã wʋn tõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm tõoma."
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi looge la karẽnbiisi basɛba pisyopↄɩ la ayi tɩ a tõm ba bayi bayi tɩ ba dẽŋɛ nẽŋa sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba, la zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ ẽŋa mẽŋa wʋn sẽŋɛ la.
A yele ba yetɩ: "Va'am na bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ zo'oge mɛ, la tõntõnɩba n wʋn lagsɛ bõnkↄↄla la pↄ'ↄrɩ mɛ. Bɛla ı̃yã sose-ya va'am na dãana tɩ a tõm tõntõnɩba pa'asɛ tɩ ba lagsɛ bõnkↄↄla la."
Dee yãŋa yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya, yãma ãn wʋ piisi tɩ mam tõm saasaadõma tẽŋasʋka.
Da dɩkɛ-ya pʋtmãanɛ, bɩɩ tãmpↄkↄ, la da dɩkɛ-ya tagra pa'asɛ, da ze'ele-ya sore bↄ nẽra gã'a.
La ya sãn yetɩ ya kẽ yire pʋam, ya dẽŋɛ pʋ'ʋsɛ yire la dõma yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya sũ-mã'asʋm.'
Nẽra sãn bↄna mı̃ bↄↄra sũ-mã'asʋm, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bↄna la ẽ. La nẽra sãn ka bↄna mı̃ bↄↄra sũ-mã'asʋm, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn leme ya mẽŋa zẽ'am.
Da lↄsna-ya yiɛ, bↄna-ya yire ayɩla pʋam, yũura dee dita bõn-sɛba tɩ ba bↄ ya la, se'ere n soe la, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tõntõnna to'oge a yↄↄrↄ.
Ya sãn paagɛ tẽn-sɛka woo pʋam tɩ ba to'oge ya, di-ya bõn-sɛba tɩ ba bↄ ya la,
la ya botɩ tẽn-ẽŋa bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, dee yele nẽrba la yetɩ: 'Wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.'
La tẽn-sɛka woo pʋam tɩ ya kẽ tɩ ba ka to'oge ya, ya yese sore dee yele tẽŋa la nẽrba wuu yetɩ:
'Tõma pɩɩsrɩ la ya tẽŋa tẽntõnnↄ n tabɛ tõma nãma la, tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa. La bãŋɛ-ya tɩ wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.'
Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, Sodom nẽrba kãn ba yẽ toogo wʋ tẽn-ẽŋa nẽrba n wʋn yẽ toogo se'em na.

Korazẽ dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Betisayida dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Se'ere n soe la, tõon-yãlma sɛba n tõm ya tẽnsɩ pʋam na, daan sãn tõm nɩ na Tiiri, la Sidõ tẽnsɩ pʋam, ba wʋn teege nɩ yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero halɩ kʋrʋm kʋrʋm, yɛ bↄra futo ẽŋɛ tãmpɛglʋm ẽŋɛ ba zuto tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
La sarɩyadia daarɛ, la wʋn dɛna toogo bↄ yãma gãnna Tiiri, la Sidõ dõma.
La yãma Kapɛrnaʋm dõma, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ ya wʋn zẽkɛ mɛ ka paagɛ saazuum bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, ya wʋn sige mɛ ka paagɛ bug-tẽŋa."
La Azezi le yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Sɛka n selsrɩ ya yetↄga, a selsrɩ la mam yetↄga, la sɛka n zagsɛ ya, a zagsɛ la mam. La sɛka n zagsɛ mam, a zagsɛ la sɛka n tõm mam na."
La karẽnbiisi pisyopↄɩ la ayi la sẽŋɛ mɛ dee leme wa'am la sũ-yẽlga wa yetɩ: "Zuudãana, baa la kʋlkã'arsɩ sakrɩ tõma nõorɛ mɛ, ban zotɩ fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ la ı̃yã."
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yẽ la Asũtãana n ze'ele saazuum lui tẽŋa wʋ saaga n yãkɛ la.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ mam bↄ ya pãŋa mɛ tɩ ya nẽ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, la nãnsɩ, dee yãŋɛ Asũtãana la a pãŋa wuu, la sɛla sɛla ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ ya be'em.
La da ɩta-ya sũ-yẽlga kʋlkã'arsɩ n sakrɩ ya nõorɛ la ı̃yã, ɩta-ya sũ-yẽlga ya yʋ'ʋra n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄm gõŋↄ pʋam na ı̃yã."

Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa botɩ Azezi sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a yetɩ: "Mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n de saazuum la tẽŋa wã Zuudãana, mam pẽgrɩ fↄ, se'ere n soe la, fõn sʋgɛ bõn-bãna wã mɛ tɩ yɛm dõma la bãŋrɩba ka mina, dee pa'alɛ nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄm-pɩgsɩ la. Ẽe, mam Sↄ, la de la fõn boorɩ bɛla la ı̃yã."

"Mam Sↄ dɩkɛ sɛla woo ẽŋɛ la mam nu'usum. La nẽra ka mi mam n de Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la n de sɛka, sãn dagna mam Sↄ la, la nẽra mẽ ka mi mam Sↄ la n de se'em, sãn dagna mam n de a Dayʋa la, la sɛba tɩ mam wʋn botɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ na."
Azezi yele bɛla dee wẽrgɛ la a karẽnbiisi la bↄba, yele bãma mã'a yetɩ: "Yãma sɛba n yẽtɩ sɛla tɩ ya yẽtɩ wã, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
La mam yetɩ ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, la na'adõma zozo'e yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ yãma n yẽ sɛla la mɛ, la ba ka yẽ, ba yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba wõm sɛla tɩ yãma wõm na mɛ, la ba ka wõm."
Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama isge tɩ a di Azezi yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ gõŋↄ la pʋam yetɩ bẽm? Fõn karẽŋrɩ ẽ na, a yetɩ bẽm?"
Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "La yetɩ: Nõŋɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, dee nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na."
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ yele sõŋa. Ẽŋɛ bɛla tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ vↄm na."
La ẽŋa n boorɩ tɩ a bↄ a mẽŋa bʋʋrↄ la, tɩ a soke Azezi yetɩ: "Ãne n de mam tadãana?"
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽra n daan yese Zerizalɛm wɛ Zeriko, tɩ fãarba yõkɛ ẽ fã a lↄgrↄ wuu, dee wẽ ẽ tɩ a dee la a ki, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽema ayɩla dↄla so-ẽŋa tↄlla, yẽ ẽ, lↄkɛ tole dee basɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Leviti nẽra mẽ wa'am tↄlla, yẽ ẽ, bʋrgɛ tole dee basɛ ẽ.
La Samaari nẽra n mẽ daan dolɩ so-ẽŋa tↄlla yẽ ẽ, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a paagɛ a zẽ'am dɩkɛ dãam peege a nõtↄ la, ẽŋɛ kaam ı̃mı̃ vile. Yãŋa yõkɛ ẽ bã a bõŋa zuo, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ sãama yire ka bɩsɛ a yelle.
Tɩ beere wiige tɩ a dɩkɛ lig-kõba bayi bↄ nẽr-sɛka n bɩsrɩ sãama yire yelle la, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Bɩsra a yelle, ligri la sãn pↄ'ↄgɛ, mam sãn leme, mam wʋn yↄ fↄ.' "
Azezi tↄgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm dee soke ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽrba batã wã, fõn tẽ'esɛ tɩ ãne n de nẽra la tɩ fãarba yõkɛ la tadãana?"
Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama la lerge yetɩ: "Sɛka n zoe a ninbãalga sõŋɛ ẽ na." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ mẽ ka ẽŋɛ bɛla."
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi daan sẽnnɩ mɛ ka kẽ tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam. Tɩ pↄka yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Amartɩ bↄna tẽn-ẽŋa pʋam to'oge ẽ a yire.
Amartɩ tarɩ la yɩbga tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Amaari. Tɩ Amaari zẽa Zuudãana Azezi nãma bↄba sɛlsra a yetↄga.
La Amartɩ tõoma yelle n daan mõ'ogɛ a nini, tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi yetɩ: "Mam Zuudãana, mam yɩbga la n basɛ tɩ mam m yɩla mã'a tõnna la, fõn yetɩ bẽm? Yele ẽ tɩ a wa'am wa sõŋɛ ma."
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Amartɩ, Amartɩ, fõn botɩ fʋ yɛm n yↄↄra la yɛla zozo'e yelle.
La bõnↄ ayɩla mã'a n de yel-kãŋkãŋɛ. Amaari looge la bõn-sõŋↄ, la nẽra nẽra kãn tã'agɛ to'oge bõn-ẽŋa a zẽ'am."

Azezi daan boe la zẽ'a ayɩla pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ. La ẽn pʋ'ʋsɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, pa'alɛ tↄ tõma n wʋn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ se'em, wʋ Azã n pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi se'em na."
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra, ya yetɩ: 'Tõma Sↄ, botɩ fʋ yʋ'ʋrɛ yẽta pẽka, wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka,
bↄ'ↄra tↄ daarɛ woo la a dia.
Basɛ tɩ tõon-be'ero taalɛ, tɩ tõma mẽ basrɩ sɛba n ẽŋɛ tõma be'em taalɛ mɛ. Da basɛ tɩ yelle paagɛ tↄ tɩ tɩ lui.' "
Dee le yele ba yetɩ: "Tẽ'esɛ-ya bɩsɛ, yãma nẽr-sɛka sãn tara sɩrɛ, tɩ a wa'am a zẽ'am yʋ'ʋŋↄ wa sose ẽ yetɩ: 'M sɩrɛ, bↄ ma borborɩ batã,
mam sɩrɛ n ze'ele sore wa'am, tɩ mam ka tara sɛla wʋn bↄ ẽ tɩ a di.'
Tɩ a sɩrɛ la bↄna deem dee lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Da dãam mam, mam yʋ m zanõrɛ mɛ, tɩ mam la m kↄma gã, mam kãn yãŋɛ isge bↄ fↄ fõn boorɩ sɛla la.'
Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa a sãn põn kãn isge bↄ ẽ sɛla ban de sɩtↄ la ı̃yã, a wʋn isge bↄ ẽ ẽn boorɩ sɛla la mɛ, ẽn bʋlɛ ẽ na ı̃yã.
Bɛla mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ ya sose Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a wʋn bↄ ya, ya ɛ, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ, ya wẽ kʋlɩŋa, tɩ a wʋn yo'oge bↄ ya.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n sosrɩ Nawẽnnɛ, a wʋn bↄ ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n eerɩ, wʋn yẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n wẽ'erɩ kʋlɩŋa, ba wʋn yo'oge bↄ ẽ.
Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a bia wʋn sose ẽ zũfo, tɩ a dɩkɛ bõnsɛla bↄ ẽ?
Bɩɩ a sãn sose ẽ zelle, tɩ a dɩkɛ nãŋa bↄ ẽ?
Yãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma la sãn mina tɩ ya bↄ ya kↄma bõn-sõma, Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Sↄ n boe saazuum n ãn sõŋa la wʋn bↄ nẽr-sɛba n sosrɩ ẽ a Sɩa la gãnna."
La Azezi daan dige la kʋlkã'arga n tarɩ bʋraa tɩ a dɛna muko, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la daan yese, dee tɩ bʋraa la n de muko la yãŋa tã'agɛ tↄgra, tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la.
Tɩ nẽrba la basɛba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽn digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la, la de la Abelzebuli n de kʋlkã'arsɩ naba la pãŋa tɩ a tarɩ digra ba."
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba bↄↄra tɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a tõm tõon-yãlma n pa'alɛ tɩ a pãŋa la ze'etɩ la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yele ba yetɩ: "So'olʋm sɛka woo nẽrba n welge wẽrgɛ zɛbra la taaba, so'olʋm na wʋn sã'am mɛ. La so'olʋm ẽŋa yiɛ mẽ wʋn lui mɛ.
La Asũtãana sãn welge zɛbra la a mẽŋa, a so'olʋm na kãn tã'agɛ ze'ele. Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la ı̃yã tɩ mam yele bɛla.
Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la, yãma nẽrba tarɩ la ãn pãŋa digri kʋlkã'arsɩ? Bɛla, ya nẽrba la mẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka tarɩ bʋʋrↄ.
La de la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa tɩ mam tarɩ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, bɛla pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wa'am mɛ wa dita na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.
Pãŋa dãana sãn mãasʋm sõŋa la a bʋdaan-lↄgrↄ gu'ura a yire, sɛla kãn ẽŋɛ a bõntarsõm.
La nẽra n tarɩ pãŋa gãnna ẽ sãn wa'am wa zɛbɛ yãŋɛ ẽ, a wʋn fãagɛ la a zɛbrɛ lↄg-sɛba tɩ a te'ege la yiɛn, dee yãŋa vaagɛ a yire lↄgrↄ la pʋɩ.
Nẽr-sɛka n ka boe la mam, sisri mam mɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n ka lagɩm na mam lagsra, a wɩrgrɩ mɛ."

Azezi le yetɩ: "Kʋlkã'arga sãn yese dee basɛ nẽra, a sẽŋɛ la pↄgẽntɩɩsɩ pʋam ka ɛɛra zẽ'a tɩ a vo'ose, la a sãn ɛ zẽ'a koŋe, a yetɩ mɛ tɩ: 'Mam wʋn lebe la m yi-sɛka tɩ m yese dee basɛ la pʋam.'
La a sãn lebe ka yẽ tɩ a pɩɩsɛ mɛ malgɛ ãna sõŋa,
a wʋn lebe mɛ ka tarɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopↄɩ n de wẽensɩ gãnna ẽŋa mẽŋa wa'am, tɩ ba kẽ lagɩm bↄna mı̃. Bɛla, nẽr-ẽŋa toogo yãŋa wʋn gãnna a kʋrʋm toogo la mɛ."
Azezi n tↄgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ pↄka ze'ele nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka tı̃i tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Pↄg-sɛka n dↄgɛ fↄ, tɩ fʋ mõgɛ a bı̃'isum na, tarɩ zu-yẽlga."
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛba n wõnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, dee sakra ɩta lan yele se'em na, n tõn tarɩ zu-yẽlga."

Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n lagsɛ Azezi zẽ'am zo'oge, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba de la nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ. Ba eerɩ la bõn-yãlma n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, la ba kãn yẽ bõn-yãlma ayẽma, sãn dagna bõn-yãlma sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azonaasɩ la.
Bõn-sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Azonaasɩ la, pa'alɛ Niniivi dõma la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, bɛla Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ de la sɛka n pa'alɩ zamãan-ẽna dõma Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa.

Sarɩyadia daarɛ, na-pↄka la n yʋʋn yese wẽntulle gↄbga bↄba la wʋn isge mɛ zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma ba tõon-be'ero la ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, a yʋʋn ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am wa selse naba Asalomõ yɛm yetↄga la, la sɛka n gãnnɩ Asalomõ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka sɛlsra ẽ.

Sarɩyadia daarɛ, Niniivi dõma mẽ wʋn isge zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma mɛ ba tõon-be'ero la ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, Azonaasɩ n yʋʋn mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga bↄ ba la, ba yʋʋn teege yɛm mɛ basɛ tõon-be'ero. La sɛka n gãnnɩ Azonaasɩ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka teege yɛm."
"Nẽra kãn yõ fɩtla sʋgɛ, bɩɩ dɩkɛ pɩ'ɩgↄ vuge ẽ, a wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo tɩ a nẽegɛ bↄ sɛba n kẽ'erɩ la.
Fʋ nini n nẽerɩ peelem bↄ'ↄra fʋ ı̃yã wʋ fɩtla la, bɛla fʋ nini sãn ãna sõŋa, fʋ ı̃yã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ. La fʋ nini sãn ka ãna sõŋa, fʋ ı̃yã wuu boe la lika pʋam.
Bɛla ı̃yã, guuse tɩ bõn-sɛka n de peelem fʋ pʋam na, da dɛna lika.
La fʋ ı̃yã wuu sãn tara peelem sõŋa, tɩ baa bↄbrɛ ayɩla ka tara lika, fʋ ı̃yã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ wʋ fɩtla n tarɩ peelem nẽera bↄ'ↄra nẽrba se'em na."
Azezi n daan tↄgɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ Farisi nẽra ayɩla wi ẽ tɩ a wa'am ẽŋa yire tɩ ba di. Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka kẽ zı̃'ire bↄna mı̃ tɩ a di.
Tɩ Farisi nẽra la yẽ tɩ Azezi ka peege nu'usi wʋ ban ɩtɩ ba sisgo se'em na, dee yetɩ a di, tɩ la di'ige ẽ.
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Yãma Farisi dõma peerɩ ya wama la ya laasɩ pↄa mɛ, la yãma mẽŋa pʋam pɩrɛ la dẽgrↄ n de fãaga la pʋtʋʋlgↄ.
Ya de la geto! La dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ poorʋm na, n ken ẽŋɛ pʋam na?
Dɩkɛ-ya yan tarɩ sɛla la bↄ nasdõma la ya sũure wuu, tɩ sɛla woo wʋn ãna sõŋa bↄ ya.

Farisi dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma bↄ'ↄrɩ Nawẽnnɛ zẽvõorↄ buuri wuu pia pʋrɛ mɛ, baa ba sãn ãna pɩka pɩka, la ya ka ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ, la ya ka nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ. La de la bõn-bãna tɩ ya wʋn dẽŋɛ ɩta, dee yãŋa ɩta sɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ la pa'asɛ.
Farisi dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma eerɩ la zẽ'esɩ nẽŋa tɩ ya zı̃'ire wẽndeto pʋam, dee bↄↄra tɩ ba nã'asra ya da'asɩ pʋam.
Ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, ya ãn wʋ yↄↄrↄ n naagɛ la tẽŋa tɩ nẽrba nẽera ba zuto tↄlla, dee ka mina tɩ yↄↄrↄ n boe mı̃."
Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fʋ sãn tↄgra bɛla fʋ po pↄ'ↄra la tõma wuu."

Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma mẽ wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma n botɩ nẽrba la ɩta se'em na, ãn wʋ ze-tɩbsa tɩ ya zelgrɩ nẽrba la, la yãma mẽŋa ka boorɩ tɩ ya kalʋm ba la ya nu'ubiire.
Ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma mẽtɩ la yↄↄrↄ bↄ'ↄra Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la. La yãma yaabdõma n yʋʋn kʋ ba.
La yãma n mẽtɩ sɛba tɩ ya yaabdõma kʋ la yↄↄrↄ la, la pa'alɛ tɩ ya sakɛ tɩ ban yʋʋn tõm se'em na ãn sõŋa mɛ.
Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tarɩ yɛm na yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn tõm nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, la Tõntõnɩba bↄ ba, la ba wʋn kʋ basɛba, dee nãmsɛ basɛba.'
Bɛla Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sɩbgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma wʋ la de la bãma n kʋ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la halɩ dũnia pı̃'iluŋo, wa paam lɛɛlɛ wã,
lan pↄsɛ la Abɛlɩ kʋa, halɩ wa paagɛ Azakari tɩ ba kʋ kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne, la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'e-sõŋↄ tẽŋasʋka la. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ tõon-be'ero bãma wuu taalɛ boe la zamãan-ẽna nẽrba zuo.

Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma n gu'uri nẽrba tɩ ba ka bãŋra Nawẽnnɛ sɩra. Yãma mẽŋa ka sakrɩ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra la, dee mẽ gu'ura nẽr-sɛba n boorɩ tɩ ba sakɛ la."
La Azezi n ze'ele bilam fõrgɛ la, tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la Farisi dõma sũure ba isge la ẽ. Tɩ ba bↄↄra tɩ ba bẽrɛ ẽ, sↄkra ẽ sokrɩsɩ zozo'e
bↄↄra tɩ a tↄgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ.

Wakat-ẽŋa nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n lagsɛ zo'oge mikra taaba, nẽera taaba nãma, tɩ Azezi dẽŋɛ yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Guuse ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma pʋlibsum na n ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ n botɩ dãam wuu kɛlla la.
Bõn-sɛka woo n lile wʋn lilge, la bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ wʋn puke.
Bɛla, bõn-sɛka woo tɩ ya tↄgɛ lika pʋam, ba wʋn tↄgɛ ẽ na peelem pʋam tɩ nẽrba wuu wõm, la bõn-sɛka tɩ ya waasʋm deem na, ba wʋn zom na gↄsgↄ mõolɛ tɩ nẽrba wuu wõm."
"M sɩrdõma, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya da zↄta dabeem la sɛba n kʋʋrɩ ı̃yã mã'a, dee ka tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla pa'asɛ la.
Mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya lan masɛ tɩ ya zↄta sɛka. Zↄta-ya Nawẽnnɛ n tã wʋn kʋ, dee tara pãŋa wʋn kẽ'esɛ ya bug-tẽŋa la. Asɩra, zↄta-ya Nawẽnnɛ.
Ba ka koosrɩ mõom niinto banuu la lig-kõba bayi mã'a? La Nawẽnnɛ ka yı̃nni baa ayɩla yelle.
La baa yãma zuugo zomto, Nawẽnnɛ mi ba wuu kãllɛ mɛ. Bɛla ı̃yã, da zↄta-ya dabeem, tɩ yãma tarɩ yõorↄ gãnna niinto zozo'e mɛ."
"La mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n ze'ele nẽrba nẽŋam yetɩ ẽŋa de la mam nẽra, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma nẽŋam yetɩ a de la mam nẽra.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n sɩ'ɩsɛ nẽrba nẽŋam tɩ ẽŋa dagɩ mam nẽra, mam mẽ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma nẽŋam tɩ a dagɩ mam nẽra.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n tↄgɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la be'em, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ, la nẽr-sɛka woo n pↄ'ↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, Nawẽnnɛ kãn basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
Ba sãn yõgɛ ya sẽŋɛ ba wẽndeto pʋam, bɩɩ na'adõma nẽŋam, bɩɩ kɛ'ɛndõma nẽŋam tɩ ba di ya sarɩya, da fabla-ya yan wʋn lerge se'em, bɩɩ yan wʋn tↄgɛ se'em to'oge ya mẽŋa.
Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wʋn pa'alɛ ya wakat-ẽŋa yan wʋn tↄgɛ se'em."
Azezi n tↄgɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ nẽra ayɩla n boe nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la pʋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, yele m kẽema tɩ a dɩkɛ tõma sↄ n ki dee bõn-sɛba la, pʋɩ bↄ ma m bõnↄ."
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Ãne n bↄ mam nõorɛ tɩ m dɛna ya sarɩyadita, bɩɩ m pʋta ya bõntarsõm bↄ'ↄra ya?"
Dee yele nẽrba la wuu yetɩ: "Guusra-ya ya mẽŋa, da ɛɛra bõntarsõm zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ nẽra n tarɩ bõntarsõm zo'oge ı̃yã tɩ a tarɩ yõvore."
A yele bɛla, dee makɛ la makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Bʋraaga n daan boe dɛna bõntarsa, tɩ a vatↄ bõnkↄↄla mãalɛ sõŋa,
tɩ a tẽ'esɛ a pʋtẽ'erʋm yetɩ: 'Zẽ'a ka boe tɩ m wʋn sũm m bõnkↄↄla la. Bɛla ı̃yã, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?'
Yãŋa yele a mẽŋa yetɩ: 'Mam mi mam wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em. Mam wʋn wõrɛ m bã la mɛ, malgɛ mẽ bã-kãra, sũm m bõnkↄↄla, la m sɛla woo.
Dee yele m sũurum yetɩ: M tarɩ bõntarsõm zo'oge, la wʋn seke ma paagɛ yʋʋma zozo'e. Bɛla m wʋn vo'ose mɛ di dee yũ, dee ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.'
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Gergo wã, yʋ'ʋŋ-ẽna wã m wʋn to'oge fʋ vↄm na. La ãne n wʋn sↄna bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ bı̃ŋe la?' "
La Azezi le yetɩ: "La de la bɛla la nẽr-sɛka woo n lagsrɩ bõntarsõm bı̃ŋra a mẽŋa ı̃yã, dee ka tara sɛla sɛla Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am."
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bɛla ı̃yã, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya da fabla ya vↄm yelle, ya wʋn di sɛla, bɩɩ ya wʋn yɛ fu-sɛba la yelle.
Vↄm yelle gãnnɩ dia mɛ, tɩ ı̃yã yelle mẽ gãnna futo.
Bɩsɛ-ya gõorↄ, ba ka bʋtɩ, ba ka lagsrɩ bõnkↄↄla, la ba ka tarɩ bãarɛ bɩɩ dia bı̃ŋre zẽ'a, la Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ'ↄrɩ ba dia. La yãma ka tarɩ yõorↄ gãnna bõn-ẽgla zo'oge sɩra?
Ãne n boe ya pʋam n tã wʋn pa'asɛ a vↄm woglʋm fẽfẽe ẽn fablɩ la ı̃yã?
La yãma sãn ka tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ bɛla n de bõn-pɩka, bẽm ı̃yã tɩ yãma fabla bõn-sɛba n weege la yelle?
Bɩsɛ-ya mõ-puuro n ãn sõŋa se'em, ba ka tõnnɩ, ba mẽ ka wʋgrɩ futo. La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa naba Asalomõ na'am n yʋʋn tarɩ pãŋa la, a yʋʋn ka tã'agɛ yɛ fuugo n ãn sõŋa wʋ mõ-puugo ayɩla.
La Nawẽnnɛ sãn botɩ mõorↄ n boe zı̃na dee tɩ ba wʋn yõ ba bugum beere ãna sõŋa bɛla, a kãn bɩsɛ ya yelle sõŋa gãnna bɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Bẽm tɩ yãma ka bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra zo'oge?
Da basɛ-ya tɩ yan wʋn di sɛla, bɩɩ yan wʋn yũ sɛla yelle pakɛ ya.
La de la nẽr-sɛba n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ n eerɩ bõn-bãma wuu. La yãma Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mi tɩ yãma boorɩ bõn-bãma wuu mɛ.
Ɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na gãnna wuu, tɩ a wʋn bↄ ya bõn-bãma pa'asɛ."
"M nẽrba, ya ka zo'oge, la da zↄta-ya dabeem, se'ere n soe la, la paagɛ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm mɛ tɩ a yetɩ a bↄ ya a so'olʋm.

Koose-ya yãma n tarɩ sɛla la dɩkɛ ligri la bↄ nasdõma. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya eerɩ la bõntarsõm n ka sã'anɩ. Ɛ-ya bõntarsõm tɩ ba bↄna Nawẽnnɛ yire wakatɛ wuu, bilam tɩ nayigba kãn tã'agɛ zũ, tɩ bõn-mõgla mẽ kãn tã'agɛ sã'am ba.
Se'ere n soe la, ya bõntarsõm n boe zẽ'a na, ya pʋtẽ'era mẽ boe la bilam."
Azezi le yetɩ: "Mãasʋm-ya lʋ ya sagãna ya sɩɩsɩ tɩ ya wʋn tã'agɛ tõm, dee yõ ya fɩtladõma,
ãna wʋ nẽrba n gu'uri ba zuudãana n wʋn ze'ele pↄgdire kibsa wa'am, tɩ a sãn wa'am wa wi, tɩ ba yo'oge yaŋa tↄtↄ bↄ ẽ.
Tõntõn-sɛba tɩ ba zuudãana wʋn paam tɩ ba ze gu'ura ẽ, tarɩ zu-yẽlga. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra tɩ, a wʋn basɛ tɩ ba zı̃'ire, tɩ zuudãana la mẽŋa mãasʋm wa pʋɩ ba dia.
A sãn wa'am sõnsʋa, bɩɩ bewiine, wa yẽ tɩ ba ken gu'ura ẽ, ba tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ yidãana sãn mina wakat-sɛka tɩ nayiga wʋn wa zũ ẽ, a wʋn gu'ura a yire mɛ kãn basɛ tɩ nayiga la kẽ zũ ẽ.
Bɛla, yãma mẽ mãasʋm zɛ sõŋa, tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽm na wakat-sɛka tɩ yãma ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am na."
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fõn makɛ makrɛ ẽna wã la tõma mã'a bɩɩ, nẽrba wuu?"
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Ãne n de tõntõn-sõŋↄ n tarɩ yɛm? La de la ẽŋa tɩ a zuudãana wʋn yetɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle, bↄ'ↄra a tõntõnɩba dia wʋ lan masɛ, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
Zuudãana la sãn leme wa yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tõm wʋ ẽŋa n yele se'em na, tõntõnna la tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra tɩ, a zuudãana la wʋn dɩkɛ ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu bↄ ẽ mɛ tɩ a bɩsra.
La tõntõnna la sãn tẽ'esɛ yetɩ, ẽŋa zuudãana la yuuri mɛ ka kulna, yãŋa wẽ'era tõntõn-bʋraasɩ, la tõntõn-pↄgsɩ, dita, dee yũura bugra,
a zuudãana la wʋn kulum na daar-sɛka tɩ a ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am, la wakat-sɛka tɩ a ka mi, wa di'ige ẽ. La a wʋn dige ẽ mɛ botɩ a lagɩm na sɛba n ka bↄ ẽŋa sɩra la yẽ sɩbgrɛ.
Tõntõn-sɛka n mi a zuudãana n boorɩ se'em, dee ka mãasʋm bɩɩ ka tõm ẽn boorɩ se'em na, ba wʋn wẽ ẽ mɛ zozo'e.

La tõntõn-sɛka n ka mi a zuudãana n boorɩ se'em, dee ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ tɩ ba wẽ ẽ, ba wʋn wẽ ẽ na fẽe. Sɛka tɩ ba bↄ ẽ zo'oge, ba mẽ wʋn soke ẽ yɛla zozo'e yelle mɛ, la sɛka tɩ ba gu'ule ẽ zo'oge, ba mẽ wʋn soke ẽ halɩ yɛla zozo'e yelle gãnna mɛ."
"Mam wa'am tɩ m tʋʋrɛ la bugum dũnia wã zuo, la mam boorɩ nɩ mɛ zozo'e tɩ bugum na põn darɛ dita.
La dẽnɩ tɩ mam yẽ nãmsgↄ zozo'e wʋ mam mise la ko'om pʋam na, la a yelle la wʋn nãmsɛ mam mɛ halɩ tɩ la wa ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ.
Ya tẽ'esɛ tɩ mam wa'am tɩ m botɩ nẽrba nõorɛ n dɛna ayɩla dũnia zuo bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, mam yetɩ ya tɩ mam tarɩ la welgre wa'am.
La, lan pↄsɛ lɛɛlɛ wã wɛ'ɛsa, nẽrba banuu sãn bↄna yire ayɩla pʋam, nẽrba batã wʋn welge mɛ sisra nẽrba bayi la, tɩ nẽrba bayi la mẽ sisra nẽrba batã la.
La sↄ wʋn sise a dayʋa, tɩ dayʋa mẽ sise a sↄ. La ma wʋn sise a pↄyʋa, tɩ pↄyʋa mẽ sise a ma. La dayʋa pↄga wʋn sise a sɩra ma, tɩ sɩra ma mẽ sise a dayʋa pↄga."
Tɩ Azezi yele nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Ya sãn yẽ tɩ wara sobge bↄbrɛ ayẽma, ya yetɩ mɛ tↄtↄ tɩ saaga wʋn ni mɛ, tɩ a sɩrɩ ni.
La ya sãn le yẽ tɩ kʋsebgo vugri bↄbrɛ ayẽma, ya yetɩ mɛ tɩ wↄlgↄ lɛm mɛ, tɩ wↄlgↄ wʋn sɩrɩ paagɛ.
Pʋlibsum dõma wã! Yãma bɩsrɩ mɛ mina tẽŋa, la saazuum yɛla n ãn se'em. La bẽm tɩ yãma ka mina bõn-sɛba n ɩtɩ lɛɛlɛ wã võorɛ bↄkɛ?"
"Bẽm tɩ ya mẽŋa ka tẽ'esɛ bãŋɛ sɛla n masɛ tɩ ya wʋn ẽŋɛ bↄkɛ?

Fʋ sãn tara yelle la nẽra, tɩ a tarɩ fʋ wɛ'ɛsa sarɩyadia zẽ'am, mõrgɛ tɩ ya mãalɛ yelle la sore, tɩ a da dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ sarɩyadita, tɩ a tↄgɛ fʋ yetↄga la dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ gu'ura, tɩ a kẽ'esɛ fↄ yʋ'a deem.
Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ fʋ kãn yẽ sore yese yʋ'a deem na, halɩ tɩ fʋ wʋn wa yↄ fʋ sãnnɛ na wuu ba'asɛ."

La wakat-ẽŋa nẽrba basɛba n wa'am wa tↄgɛ pa'alɛ Azezi, gↄmna Apilatɩ n daan botɩ ba kʋ Galile nẽrba basɛba wakat-sɛka tɩ ba boe mı̃ kãabra bↄ'ↄra Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ ba zɩɩm yese gaam na kãabgↄ la zɩɩm.
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ Galile nẽr-bãma n daan yẽ nãmsgↄ ẽŋa la, bãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma gãnna Galile dõma basɛba la bɩɩ?
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ayɛɩ, yãma sãn ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, yãma wuu mẽ wʋn sã'am na bɛla.
La nẽrba pia la anii tɩ de-tʋgma yʋʋn lui kʋ ba Silo tẽŋa la, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ bãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma gãnna Zerizalɛm nẽrba basɛba la bɩɩ?
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ayɛɩ, yãma sãn ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, yãma wuu mẽ wʋn sã'am na bɛla."
Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ẽna wã yetɩ: "Bʋraaga n tarɩ kẽnkãŋa n sele a va'am pʋam, yãŋa wa'am tɩ a bɩsɛ a sãn tara biɛ, ka yẽ sɛla sɛla.
Tɩ a yele va'am na gu'ura yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ, yʋʋma atã n wãna tɩ mam sẽnnɩ dee ka yẽta biɛ kẽnkãŋa wã zuo. Sɛ ẽ basɛ, tɩ a yẽrɛ la zẽ'a.'
Tɩ gu'ura la lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, basɛ ẽ yʋʋn-ẽna mã'a, tɩ mam wʋn kↄ gilge a tille, ẽŋɛ bugulgo basɛ ẽ,
la yʋʋnɛ sãn kaagɛ tɩ a wↄm, la ãn sõŋa, la a sãn ken ka wↄm, fʋ yãŋa sɛ ẽ basɛ.' "
Azezi daan boe la Zifdõma wẽndeem vo'osgo daarɛ zãsna nẽrba,
tɩ pↄka ayɩla bↄna mı̃ tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ botɩ a dɛna kobgo paagɛ yʋʋma pia la anii, yũre ka tãna wʋn dↄ'ↄgɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ pↄka la, wi ẽ yetɩ: "Pↄka, fʋ yẽ yolsgo, fʋ bã'aga la basɛ fↄ."
Dee dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ pↄka la zuo, tɩ bã'aga la basɛ pↄka la bilam mẽŋa, tɩ a tã'agɛ dↄ'ↄra, yãŋa pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.

Tɩ wẽndeego la naba sũure isge la Azezi, ẽŋa n botɩ pↄka la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ la ı̃yã. Tɩ a yele nẽrba la yetɩ: "Dabsa ayoobɩ n boe tɩ ya tãna wʋn tõm. Wa'am-ya dabs-bãma pʋam wa tɩbɛ ya mẽŋa, dee da sẽnna vo'osgo daarɛ tɩbra ya mẽŋa."
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Pʋlibsum dõma wã! Yãma nẽra woo ka lorgrɩ a lↄlga, bɩɩ a bõŋa sẽnna yũula ko'om vo'osgo daarɛ mɛ bɩɩ?
Tɩ pↄg-ẽna wã n de Abraham yɩɩŋa tɩ Asũtãana lʋ ẽ yʋʋma pia la anii wã, la ka narɩ tɩ mam lorge ẽ vo'osgo daarɛ?"
La ẽŋa n yele bɛla la, tɩ yãnnɛ yõkɛ a bɛ'ɛba la wuu, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm la a tõon-yãlma sɛba wuu tɩ a ẽŋɛ la.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm wõn na bẽm? La mam wʋn dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la ẽ?
A ãn wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire tɩ nẽra bʋrɛ a va'am pʋam, tɩ a bɩ lebge tɩ-kãtɛ. Tɩ niinto sẽnna tɛ'ɛra ba tʋgrↄ a wila zuo."
La a le yetɩ: "Mam wʋn le dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm?
A ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ tɩ pↄka dɩkɛ gaam na borborɩ zom la-kãra batã wẽ, tɩ dãbɩllɛ la botɩ ba wuu uke."
Azezi daan we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm dↄla tẽn-kãra la tẽn-pɩgsɩ pʋam zãsna nẽrba.
Tɩ nẽra soke ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, nẽrba fẽe mã'a n wʋn yẽ fãarɛ bɩɩ?" Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ:
"Nargɛ-ya pãŋa doose zanõrɛ n ãn mika kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam, tɩ mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e wʋn wa ɛɛra mɛ tɩ ba kẽ, la ba kãn yãŋɛ.
La wakatɛ sãn paagɛ, yidãana wʋn isge yʋ yaŋa la mɛ, la ya sãn weege yẽŋa, ya wʋn wẽ'era mɛ kↄkↄ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, yo'oge tɩ tɩ kẽ.' La a wʋn lerge ya yetɩ: 'Mam ka mi yãma n ze'ele zẽ'a.'
La ya wʋn yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Dagɩ tõma la fõn n daan lagɩm dita, dee yũura, tɩ fʋ sẽnna tõma tẽŋam zãsna nẽrba?'
La a wʋn le lerge ya yetɩ: 'Mam ka mi yãma n ze'ele zẽ'a, fõrgɛ ya mam zẽ'am, yãma de la tõon-be'ero dõma.'
La ya wʋn ka yẽ Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba wuu, tɩ ba boe Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam, la yãma wʋn weege la yẽŋa kɛlla dee dɩkɛ ya nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.
La nẽrba wʋn yese dapↄ-bↄba, la zanõ-bↄba, la zʋʋgↄ bↄba, la gↄbga bↄba wa'am wa zı̃'ire Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam di.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ nẽrba basɛba n de poorʋm dõma wʋn lebge nẽŋam dõma, tɩ basɛba n mẽ de nẽŋam dõma wʋn wa lebge poorʋm dõma."
La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi yetɩ: "Basɛ kalam dee sẽŋɛ zẽ'a ayẽma, tɩ Naba A'erↄdɩ eerɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ a kʋ."

Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele yɛm be'ero dãana la yetɩ: 'Zı̃na la beesã, mam wʋn dige kʋlkã'arsɩ mɛ tɩ ba yese, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, la dabsa atã daarɛ tɩ mam wʋn ba'asɛ m tõoma la wuu.'
La dẽnɩ tɩ mam sẽŋɛ m sẽnnɛ na zı̃na, la beesã, la dabsa atã daarɛ, se'ere n soe la, la ka masɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ki zẽ'a ayẽma, sãn dagna Zerizalɛm pʋam.

Zerizalɛm nẽrba, Zerizalɛm nẽrba, yãma kʋʋrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, dee lↄbra sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm ba ya zẽ'am la kuga kʋʋra. Nõorɛ faa tɩ mam boorɩ tɩ m lagsɛ ya wʋ nõ-yã'aŋa n lagsrɩ a kↄma ũna a kempagsɩ pʋam se'em na, tɩ ya ka bↄↄra.
Bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ ya tẽŋa bↄ ya, tɩ a lebge daboto. Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya kãn le yẽ mam, halɩ tɩ ya wʋn wa yetɩ: 'Pẽgɛ-ya sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.' "
Vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi daan sẽŋɛ Farisi dõma naba ayɩla yire tɩ ba di. Tɩ nẽrba la n boe mı̃ na bɩsra ẽn wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em.
La bʋraaga ayɩla n boe mı̃ tɩ ı̃-fʋʋsŋↄ bã'aga tara ẽ, tɩ a zɛ Azezi nẽŋam.
Tɩ Azezi soke lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la yetɩ: "Sore boe tɩ nẽra botɩ nẽrba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, sore ka boe?"
Tɩ ba sı̃na. Tɩ Azezi botɩ bʋraaga la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, basɛ ẽ tɩ a kule.
Dee soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a dayʋa, bɩɩ a lↄlga wʋn lui lʋa pʋam vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kãn zoe tↄtↄ sẽŋɛ ka yaagɛ ẽ?"
Tɩ ba makɛ tɩ ba lerge ẽ koŋe.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ nẽr-sɛba tɩ ba wi tɩ ba wa'am wa di la n loosrɩ zẽ'e-sõma zı̃'ita, tɩ a makɛ makrɛ yele ba yetɩ:
"Nẽra sãn ẽŋɛ pↄgdire kibsa wi fo, da kãn sẽŋɛ ka zı̃'ire zẽ'e-sõŋↄ, tã tɩ a mẽ wi la nẽra n gãnnɩ fõn.
Tɩ sɛka n wi ya wuu la, da wa'am wa yele fʋ yetɩ: 'Isge, dee tɩ ẽna zı̃'ire.' Tɩ fʋ yãŋa isge sẽŋɛ ka zı̃'ire poorʋm poorʋm la yãnnɛ.
Nẽra sãn wi fo, sẽŋɛ ka zı̃'ire poorʋm, tɩ sɛka n wi fʋ la sãn wa'am yẽ fↄ, a wʋn yetɩ: 'M sɩrɛ, wa'am wa zı̃'ire nẽŋam.' Bɛla tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ nã'asgↄ nẽr-sɛba tɩ fʋ zı̃ la ba la zẽ'am.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n zẽkrɩ a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sike ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sikri a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zẽkɛ ẽ."

La Azezi yele sɛka n wi ẽ na yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ dia wʋntɛɛŋa, bɩɩ yʋ'ʋŋↄ wi nẽrba tɩ ba wa'am wa di, da wi'ira fʋ sɩrdõma, bɩɩ fʋ sↄbiisi, bɩɩ fʋ nẽrba, bɩɩ fʋ sawiiba n de bõntatba, se'ere n soe la, ba mẽ wʋn wa ẽŋɛ bɛla daar-sɛka mɛ wi fo lebse bɛla sãnnɛ.
Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ dia wi nẽrba tɩ ba wa'am di, wi nasdõma, la kↄↄrnↄ, la wↄbsɩ, la fↄↄsɩ.
Fʋ sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, fʋ wʋn tara zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ba kãn yãŋɛ ẽŋɛ lebse fo. Bɛla, wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ a yɛm na vo'oge la, fʋ wʋn yẽ yↄↄrↄ."
La nẽrba la n lagsɛ zẽa dia zẽ'a la Azezi la, ba wõm ẽn yele se'em na mɛ, tɩ nẽra ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛka woo n wʋn po di dia Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam na tarɩ zu-yẽlga."
Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ bↄ ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe, ẽŋɛ dia zozo'e, wi nẽrba zozo'e tɩ ba wa'am wa di.
Tɩ dia la wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna yetɩ, a sẽŋɛ ka yele nẽrba la tɩ ẽŋa yetɩ: 'Wa'am-ya tɩ mam mãasʋm ba'asɛ mɛ gu'ura ya.'
Tɩ ba nẽra woo yɛta lan pakɛ ẽŋa se'em, tɩ ẽŋa sↄsra sugri. Pↄspↄsɩ dãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Mam da la va'am, tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ lan ãn se'em, bɛla tɩ mam sↄsra ẽ sugri.'
Tɩ ayɩla yetɩ: 'Mam da la nii-kↄↄrsɩ pia bↄↄra tɩ m makɛ ba bayi bayi kↄ bɩsɛ, bɛla tɩ mam sↄsra ẽ sugri.'
Tɩ ayẽma mẽ yetɩ: 'Mam di la pↄg-sãana, bɛla tɩ mam kãn yãŋɛ wa'am.'

Tɩ tõntõnna la lebe ka tↄgɛ bɛla bↄ a zuudãana la. Tɩ a zuudãana la sũure yı̃ige, tɩ a yele a tõntõnna la yetɩ: 'Yese tↄtↄ sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la sorↄↄrↄ zuto ka tarɩ nasdõma, la kↄↄrnↄ, la fↄↄsɩ, la wↄbsɩ wa'am tɩ ba di.'
Tɩ tõntõnna la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ a zuudãana la n yele se'em na, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, fõn yetɩ mam ẽŋɛ se'em na, mam ẽŋɛ mɛ, la zẽ'a ken dee mɛ.'
Tɩ zuudãana la le yele a tõntõnna la yetɩ: 'Yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ sorↄ-pɩgsɩ la wuu zuo, ka mõrgɛ tarɩ nẽrba la wa'am tɩ ba kẽ tɩ mam yire pɩrɛ.'
La mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ mam dẽŋɛ yele ba tɩ ba wa'am, tɩ ba zagsɛ la, ba nẽra nẽra kãn le malɩn di mam dia la."
Azezi daan sẽnnɩ mɛ, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ dↄla ẽ, tɩ a gelge yele ba yetɩ:
"Nẽra sãn yetɩ a doose mam dee ka nõŋɛ mam gãnna a sↄ, la a ma, la a pↄga, la a kↄma, la a sↄbiisi, la a tãpa, bɩɩ a sãn ka nõŋɛ mam gãnna a mẽŋa vↄm, a kãn tã'agɛ dɛna mam karẽnbia.
La sɛka woo n ka sakɛ nãmsgↄ wʋ nẽra n zɛɛrɩ a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam, a kãn tã'agɛ dɛna mam karẽnbia.
Ya mi tɩ nẽra sãn bↄna ya pʋam bↄↄra tɩ a mẽ de-tʋgma, a wʋn dẽŋɛ zı̃'ire mɛ geele bɩsɛ, ẽn tarɩ se'em na wʋn seke tɩ a yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ, bɩɩ la kãn seke?
La sãn dagna bɛla, a sãn ẽebɛ ẽbrɛ dee ka yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ, sɛba wuu n yẽ bɛla la wʋn la ẽ mɛ
yetɩ: 'Nẽr-ẽna ẽebɛ la deego, dee ka yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ.'
Bɩɩ naba sãn wɛ'ɛsa tɩ a zɛbɛ la a na-tadãana, dẽnɩ tɩ a dẽŋɛ tẽ'esɛ bɩsɛ, ẽŋa n tarɩ nẽrba tʋspia la, a wʋn tã'agɛ zɛbɛ la na-sɛka n tarɩ nẽrba tʋspisyi, bɩɩ a kãn tã'agɛ?
La a sãn bãŋɛ tɩ a kãn tã'agɛ, naba ayẽma la n ken zãagɛ la, a wʋn dẽŋɛ tõm na a tõntõnɩba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ naba la zẽ'am ka soke ẽ bɩsɛ, bãma wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ zɛbrɛ la ba'asɛ.
Bɛla mẽ, yãma nẽr-sɛka woo n ka basrɩ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ a tarɩ la, ka tã wʋn dɛna mam karẽnbia.
Yaarʋm ãn sõŋa mɛ, la a sãn sabgɛ, ba wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne botɩ a le ãna yẽlʋm?
A ka le tara yõorↄ la tẽŋa, la a ka tã wʋn dɛna bugulgo mẽ, ba lobrɩ ẽ basra mɛ. Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
Lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma zozo'e n daan sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am tɩ ba selse a yetↄga.
Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la yõnna yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna wã to'orɩ la tõon-be'ero dõma, dee dita la ba."
Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ wã soke ba yetɩ:
"Bʋra-kãna n boe ya pʋam tara piisi kↄbga, tɩ ayɩla sãn bↄɩ, tɩ a kãn lagsɛ piisi piswɛɩ la awɛɩ la basɛ dũnsẽkam, dee sẽŋɛ ka ɛ ayẽma n bↄɩ la halɩ yãŋa yẽ ẽ?
La a sãn yẽ ẽ, a wʋn yõkɛ ẽ mɛ buke la sũ-yẽlga.
La a sãn kule yire, a wʋn wi a sɩrdõma, la a sawiiba mɛ yele ba yetɩ: 'Naagɛ-ya la mam tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, mam yẽ m pesgo la n bↄɩ la mɛ.'
Bɛla mam yetɩ ya tɩ tõon-be'ero dãana ayɩla sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, sũ-yẽlga boe Nawẽnnɛ yire pʋam la bɛla gãnna nẽr-sõma piswɛɩ la awɛɩ n ka eerɩ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
Bɩɩ, pↄg-kãna n boe wʋn tara lig-kõba pia, tɩ ayɩla sãn bↄɩ, tɩ a kãn yõ fɩtla pɩɩsɛ deego la ɛ lagfↄ la sõŋa halɩ wa yẽ ẽ?
La a sãn yẽ ẽ, a wʋn wi a sɩrdõma, la a sawiiba mɛ yele ba yetɩ: 'Naagɛ-ya la mam tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, mam yẽ m lagfↄ la n bↄɩ la mɛ.'
Bɛla mam yetɩ ya tɩ tõon-be'ero dãana ayɩla sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, sũ-yẽlga boe Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma zẽ'am na bɛla."
Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Bʋraa n daan boe tara a dayↄↄsɩ bayi.
Tɩ yɩbga la yele a sↄ yetɩ: 'M sↄ, pʋɩ fʋ bõntarsõm na bↄ mam m bõnↄ.' Tɩ a sↄ pʋɩ a bõntarsõm na bↄ ba.
Tɩ la ẽŋɛ dabsa fẽe, tɩ yɩbga la lagsɛ a bõntarsõm na wuu yese sẽŋɛ tẽŋa n zãagɛ, ka tõm tõon-yooro sã'am ẽn tarɩ sɛla la wuu.
La ẽn sã'am a bõntarsõm na wuu ba'asɛ la, kↄm kãtɛ n wa'am tẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ a ka le tara sɛla wʋn di.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la nẽra ayɩla zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ ẽ tɩ a tõnna. Tɩ nẽra la dɩkɛ ẽ botɩ a sẽŋɛ mõom ka gu'ura a kurkurdõma.
Tɩ a kↄm dõnna tɩ a bↄↄra tɩ a di kurkuri dia. Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka bↄ ẽ.
Tɩ a tẽ'esɛ a sũurum yetɩ: 'Mam sↄ tarɩ tõntõnɩba zo'oge mɛ tɩ ba dita tɩgra dee basra, dee tɩ mam bↄna kalam kiira la kↄm.'
Yãŋa yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn lebe kule la m sↄ yire ka yele ẽ yetɩ, mam tõm na Nawẽnnɛ la fõn be'em,
mam ka le masɛ tɩ ba wi mam tɩ fʋ bia. Ɩta mam wʋ fʋ tõntõnɩba la ayɩla.'
Dee isge kulla a sↄ yire. La ẽn nãn boe zãazãarɛ la, tɩ a sↄ la yẽ ẽ, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a zoe tʋ'ʋsɛ kↄkɛ ẽ, mõbgɛ ẽ.
Tɩ bia la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M sↄ, mam tõm na Nawẽnnɛ la fõn be'em. Mam ka masɛ tɩ ba le wi'ira mam tɩ fʋ bia.'
Tɩ a sↄ la yele a tõntõnɩba yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ-ya tↄtↄ ka tarɩ fu-sɛka n ãn sõŋa gãnna la wa'am wa yɛ ẽ, dee dɩkɛ nutʋa pire a nu'ubiire, dee dɩkɛ tagra pire ẽ.
La ya yõkɛ lↄl-polle n nõbɛ wa'am wa kʋ tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ dia di, dee ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.
Se'ere n soe la, mam bia wã daan wõn na a ki mɛ, dee le vo'oge. A daan bↄɩ mɛ, tɩ tɩ le yẽ ẽ.' Tɩ ba yãŋa ɩta sũ-yẽlga.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a dayↄ-kẽema la boe la va'am. La ẽn lebe kulna wa lɛm yire la, a wõm na duursi tɩ ba wẽ'erɩ wa'ara.
Tɩ a wi a sↄ tõntõnna ayɩla soke ẽ yetɩ: 'Bẽm n ẽŋɛ?'
Tɩ tõntõnna la lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Fʋ yɩbga la n wa'am, tɩ fʋ sↄ kʋ lↄl-polle n nõbɛ, ẽŋa n yẽ fʋ yɩbga la tɩ a tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm na ı̃yã.'
Tɩ kẽema la sũure yı̃ige halɩ. Tɩ a zagsɛ tɩ ẽŋa kãn kẽ yire. Tɩ a sↄ yese belem ẽ yetɩ, a wa'am wa kẽ.
Tɩ a lerge a sↄ la yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ, yʋʋma zozo'e tɩ mam tõnnɩ fʋ tõoma, dee ka zagsɛ fʋ nõorɛ baa daarɛ ayɩla, la fõn ka bↄ mam bulla baa daarɛ ayɩla tɩ m kʋ tɩ mam la m sɩrdõma ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.
La fʋ bi-ẽna wã n dɩkɛ fʋ bõntarsõm sẽŋɛ ka tõm yalsɩ tõoma sã'am ba wuu dee kulum wã, fʋ kʋ la lↄl-polle bↄ ẽ.'
Tɩ a sↄ lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'M bia, fõn boe la mam zẽ'am daarɛ woo. La mam n tarɩ sɛla wuu la de la fõn bõnↄ.
La, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, se'ere n soe la, fʋ yɩbga wã daan wõn na a ki mɛ, dee le vo'oge. A daan bↄɩ mɛ. Tɩ tɩ le yẽ ẽ.' "
Tɩ Azezi le yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bʋraaga n daan boe dɛna bõntarsa, tara tõntõnna tɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle. Tɩ ba wa'am wa yele bõntarsa la yetɩ, tõntõnna la sã'anɩ a bõntarsõm na mɛ.
Tɩ zuudãana la wi a tõntõnna la yetɩ: 'Bẽm tɩ ba tↄgra fõn yelle tɩ mam wõnna wãna? Geele pa'alɛ ma fõn ẽŋɛ mam bõntarsõm na se'em. Fʋ kãn le bɩsra mam yire yelle.'
Tɩ tõntõnna la yele a mẽŋa yetɩ: 'Mam zuudãana la yetɩ a dige mam a tõoma la pʋam mɛ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne? Kʋa? Mam ka tarɩ pãŋa wʋn kↄ. La yãnnɛ n wʋn tara mam la sosgo.
Mam mi mam wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em, tɩ a sãn wa dige ma, m tara sɩrdõma n wʋn to'oge mam ba yiɛ sõŋa.'
Tɩ a wi a zuudãana sãnditba ayɩla ayɩla, soke pↄspↄsɩ dãana la yetɩ: 'Fõn tarɩ mam zuudãana sãnnɛ la wãne?'
Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: 'Mam tarɩ a sãnnɛ na kaam dugl-kãra kↄbga.' Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'To'oge fʋ sãnnɛ gõŋↄ tↄtↄ zı̃'ire gʋlsɛ yetɩ, kaam dugl-kãra pinuu.'
Dee soke ayẽma yetɩ: 'Fõn tarɩ mam zuudãana sãnnɛ na wãne?' Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: 'Mam tarɩ a sãnnɛ na mui bↄra kↄbga.' Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'To'oge fʋ sãnnɛ gõŋↄ gʋlsɛ yetɩ pinii.'
Baa la tõntõnna wã ɩrgↄ n ka doose sore la, a zuudãana pẽgɛ ẽ mɛ, ẽn tõm na yɛm na ı̃yã. Dũni-ẽna wã dõma tarɩ la yɛm tõnna la taaba gãnna nẽr-sɛba n bãŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ peelem.
Bɛla ı̃yã, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya dɩkɛ dũnia bõntarsõm yõgɛ sɩrdõma, tɩ dũnia bõntarsõm na sãn wa ba'asɛ, ba wʋn to'oge ya tɩ ya bↄna Nawẽnnɛ yire wakatɛ n ka ba'asrɩ."
"Nẽr-sɛka woo n de sɩra dãana bõn-pɩgsɩ pʋam, mẽ de la sɩra dãana bõn-kãra pʋam. La sɛka n ka de sɩra dãana bõn-pɩgsɩ pʋam, mẽ ka de sɩra dãana bõn-kãra pʋam.
Bɛla, ya sãn ka dɛna sɩra dõma dũnia wã bõntarsõm pʋam, ãne n wʋn dɩkɛ bõntarsõm sɩra sɩra gu'ule ya?
La ya sãn ka dɛna sɩra dõma la bõn-sɛba n dagɩ ya mẽŋa bõnↄ, ãne n wʋn dɩkɛ bõnↄ bↄ ya tɩ la dɛna ya mẽŋa bõnↄ?

Tõntõnna ka tã wʋn sakɛ zuudãandõma bayi. A wʋn sise ayɩla mɛ, dee nõŋɛ ayɩla, bɩɩ a wʋn nanna ayɩla la mɛ, dee pↄ'ↄra ayɩla la. Bɛla, yãma ka tã wʋn sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Zuudãana, dee botɩ bõntarsõm mẽ dɛna ya zuudãana."
Farisi dõma n nõŋɛ ligri la n wõm bɛla la, ba la'arɩ Azezi mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma pa'alɩ ya mẽŋa nẽrba nẽŋam wʋ ya de la nẽr-sõma. La Nawẽnnɛ mi ya pʋtẽ'era n ãn se'em mɛ. Bõn-sɛka tɩ nẽrsaalba pẽgrɩ la, de la bõn-dẽgrↄ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.

Amoyisi lↄↄ, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n yʋʋn pa'alɩ nẽrba ban wʋn ãna se'em, ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Azã wa'am na. Lan pↄsɛ Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, ba mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga mɛ, tɩ nẽra woo nargra pãŋa tɩ a kẽ.
La, la de la nãana tɩ saazuum la dũnia tole gãnna tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ la bõn-pɩka ayɩla bↄɩ.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n basɛ a pↄga, dee le di pↄka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɩ la a tadãana pↄga, la sɛka woo n di pↄka tɩ a sɩra basɛ mẽ ẽŋɛ la be'em."
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "Bõntarsa n daan boe, yɛɛra futo n ba ãna sõŋa, dee tara sɛla woo daarɛ woo tɩ la seke.
Tɩ nasa ayɩla mẽ daan bↄna, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Alazaarɩ, tɩ a ı̃yã wuu tara nõtↄ. A daan ẽn gã la bõntarsa la zanõrʋm,
bↄↄra tɩ a di bõntarsa la n diti tɩ di-zõra luta la. Tɩ baasɩ sẽnna lɛɛla a nõtↄ la.
Tɩ Alazaarɩ wa ki. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire Abraham zẽ'am. Tɩ bõntarsa la mẽ wa ki, tɩ ba laagɛ ẽ.
Tɩ bõntarsa la daan bↄna bug-tẽŋa nãmsra, yãŋa gorge yẽ Abraham halɩ zẽ'a n zãagɛ, tɩ Alazaarɩ zẽa a sakʋkↄ.
Tɩ bõntarsa la wi Abraham yetɩ: 'M sↄ Abraham, zoe m ninbãalga, dee tõm Alazaarɩ tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'ubiire tẽ'egɛ ko'om mã'alɛ m zɩlɩŋa, se'ere n soe la, mam boe la bugum pʋam nãmsra.'
Tɩ Abraham yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M bia, tẽegɛ tɩ fõn daan boe dũnia zuo wakat-sɛka la, fõn daan tarɩ bõn-sõma mɛ, dee tɩ Alazaarɩ yẽta toogo. La lɛɛlɛ wã, a sũure mã'agɛ mɛ, dee tɩ fõn yãŋa nãmsra.

La bõn-sɛka n pa'asɛ, bog-ko'ogo n beŋe tõma la yãma, tɩ nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a ze'ele kalam sẽŋɛ yãma zẽ'am, a kãn tã'agɛ. La nẽra mẽ sãn bↄↄra tɩ a ze'ele yãma zẽ'am wa'am tõma zẽ'am, a kãn tã'agɛ.'
Tɩ a lerge Abraham yetɩ: 'M sↄ Abraham, la sãn dɛna bɛla, mam sosrɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ fʋ tõm Alazaarɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ mam sↄ yire,
tɩ mam tarɩ la sↄbiisi banuu, a sẽŋɛ ka kã'an ba, tɩ ba mẽ da wa'am nãmsgↄ zẽ'a wã.'
Tɩ Abraham yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Ba tarɩ Amoyisi la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n gʋlsɛ gõn-sɛba la mɛ. La masɛ tɩ ba sakɛ la gõn-bãma yetↄga.'
Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'M sↄ, ayɛɩ, nẽra sãn vo'oge lebe sẽŋɛ ba zẽ'am, ba wʋn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.'
Tɩ Abraham lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Ba sãn kãn sakɛ Amoyisi, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la nõorɛ, baa nẽra n ki sãn vo'oge lebe, ba kãn sakɛ.' "
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "La ka tã tɩ bõn-sɛba n pã'asrɩ nẽrba tɩ ba basra Nawẽnnɛ sore la ka wa'am. La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn botɩ bõn-bãma wa'am na wʋn yẽ toogo.
Ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam, n sõɩ ẽŋa n wʋn botɩ bi-pɩka ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore.
Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa. Fʋ sↄbia sãn tõm be'em, fʋ kã'an ẽ. La a sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero la, fʋ basɛ ẽ taalɛ.
La a sãn ẽŋɛ fʋ be'em nõorɛ ayopↄɩ daarɛ ayɩla, dee leme fʋ zẽ'am nõorɛ ayopↄɩ wa yetɩ: 'Mam tõm na be'em, bↄ mam sugri', dẽnɩ tɩ fʋ basɛ ẽ taalɛ."
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Botɩ tɩ bↄ fↄ sɩra zo'oge."
Tɩ Zuudãana la yele ba yetɩ: "Ya sãn bↄ mam sɩra fẽe wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire la, ya tã wʋn yele kẽnkãŋa wã tɩ a võogɛ sẽŋɛ ka sele mõgrɛ pʋam ke, la a wʋn sakɛ ya nõorɛ mɛ."
"Tẽ'esɛ-ya bɩsɛ, nẽra sãn bↄna yãma pʋam tara tõntõnna tɩ a kↄↄra, bɩɩ gu'ura a dũnsi, tɩ tõntõnna la sãn ze'ele va'am wa'am, a wʋn yele ẽ mɛ yetɩ, wa'am wa di bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ, a wʋn yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Dʋgɛ m dia, dee teege fuugo yɛ, tarɩ dia la wa'am wa bↄ ma tɩ m di. M sãn di dee yũ ba'asɛ, tɩ fʋ mẽ yãŋa di dee yũ.'
La zuudãana la n yele tõntõnna la tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em, tɩ a ẽŋɛ la, zuudãana la kãn pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn ẽŋɛ sɛla woo tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele ya tɩ ya ẽŋɛ la, ya yetɩ: 'Tõma wen dɛna la tõntõnɩba, tõma ka narɩ pʋ'ʋsgↄ, se'ere n soe la, la de la tɩ tõoma, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tɩ tõm.' "
Azezi daan boe la sore wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm dↄla Samaari la Galile tẽŋasʋka,
paagɛ tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam, tɩ kõnkↄma pia tʋ'ʋsra ẽ, ze'ele kẽnkɛrŋa
kaasra yetɩ: "Zuudãana Azezi, zoe tɩ ninbãalga."
La ẽn yẽ ba la, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya kãabgↄ kẽma la zẽ'am tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ ya ı̃yã la n ãn se'em." La ban sẽnnɩ wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ bã'asɩ la basɛ ba, tɩ ba ãna sõŋa.
La ba nẽra ayɩla n yẽ tɩ a kõnkↄm na basɛ ẽ na, tɩ a lɛbra Azezi zẽ'am dee tↄgra ke'enke'em pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ,
sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma dɩkɛ a nẽŋa võglɛ tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ. A daan de la Samaari nẽra.
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "La dagɩ bãma pia n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm? Tɩ bawɛɩ la bↄna la bɛ?
Bẽm tɩ ẽna n de sãana la mã'a n leme wa'am tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ a yel-sõnnɛ?"
Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn bↄ mam sɩra la n botɩ fʋ yẽ fãarɛ, isge sẽŋɛ."
Farisi dõma soke Azezi mɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba sʋkam. Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ sãn wa dita na'am, la ka de sɛla tɩ nẽrba tã wʋn yẽ la nini.
La nẽra kãn yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la kalam', bɩɩ 'a boe la ke'. Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ boe la ya tẽŋasʋka dita na'am."
La Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Wakatɛ sẽm mɛ tɩ ya wʋn bↄↄra tɩ ya yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la, baa la sãn dɛna daarɛ ayɩla, la ya kãn yẽ ẽ.
La nẽrba wʋn yele ya yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke', bɩɩ 'bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la kalam.' Da kãn sẽŋɛ-ya, da doose-ya ba.
Se'ere n soe la, daar-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme na, la wʋn ãna wʋ saaga n ẽn yãkɛ saazuum tɩ la nẽegɛ zẽ'a wuu se'em na.
La, lan dẽŋɛ tɩ bõn-bãma wʋn ẽŋɛ, dẽnɩ tɩ a nãmsɛ zozo'e tɩ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma zagsɛ ẽ.
Wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am na, la wʋn ãna wʋ Anoe wakatɛ tɩ la yʋʋn ãn se'em na.

Nẽrba yʋʋn diti mɛ, dee yũura, tɩ bʋraasɩ dita pↄgba, tɩ pↄgsɩ mẽ ɛlla sɩrba, tɩ la wa paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ Anoe kẽ õorŋ-kãtɛ la pʋam, dee tɩ ko'om yãŋa wa'am wa pɩrɛ zẽ'a wuu libe nẽrba wuu tɩ ba ki.
La mẽ wʋn ãna wʋ Alotɩ wakatɛ n yʋʋn ãn se'em na. Ba yʋʋn diti mɛ, dee yũura, dee da'ara, dee kↄↄsra, dee bʋta, dee mẽta,
ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ Alotɩ fõrgɛ Sodom tẽŋa la, dee tɩ bugum n diti kidibre ze'ele saazuum lui tẽŋa kʋ ba wuu.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo daarɛ la mẽ wʋn di'ige ba la bɛla.
Daar-ẽŋa, nẽr-sɛka n boe gↄsgↄ dee tɩ a lↄgrↄ bↄna deego pʋam, a da sige bↄↄra tɩ a ze'ele dɩkɛ ba zoe. La nẽr-sɛka n boe a va'am, da lebe kule.
Tẽegɛ-ya lan yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Alotɩ pↄga se'em na.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vↄm, a wʋn yẽ ẽ.
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽrba bayi sãn gã sõŋↄ ayɩla pʋam yʋ'ʋŋↄ, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
La pↄgsɩ bayi sãn bↄna nẽerʋm nẽena, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
((Bʋraasɩ bayi sãn bↄna va'am, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.))"
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la soke Azezi yetɩ: "Zuudãana, bõn-ẽna wʋn ẽŋɛ la bɛ?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ bõn-kɩ'ɩsɩ boe la, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zõa lagsrɩ taaba."
Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba sↄsra Nawẽnnɛ wakatɛ wuu da basɛ,
yele ba yetɩ: "Sarɩyadita n daan boe tẽŋa ayɩla ka zↄta Nawẽnnɛ, dee ka nanna nẽrba.
Tɩ pↄkõorɛ mẽ bↄna tẽŋa la pʋam sẽnna a zẽ'am wakatɛ wuu yɛta ẽ tɩ: 'Sõŋɛ ma tɩ m yẽ bʋʋrↄ m bɛ zẽ'am.'

La pↄkõorɛ la sẽŋɛ ka sose ẽ na nõor-faa, tɩ sarɩyadita la ka sõŋɛ ẽ. La pↄkõorɛ la ẽn ken sẽnna sↄsra ẽ na, sarɩyadita la wa yele a pʋtẽ'erʋm mɛ yetɩ: 'Baa mam ka zotɩ Nawẽnnɛ, dee ka nanna nẽrba la,
pↄkõ-ẽna n sẽnnɩ dãana mam se'em wã, mam wʋn isge mɛ sõŋɛ ẽ. La sãn dagna bɛla, a wʋn sẽnna mɛ nãmsra mam, a kãn basɛ.' "
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi le yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ-ya sarɩyadita la n de nẽr-be'ego la n yele se'em.
La sãn dɛna bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ kãn sõŋɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ a looge la n sosrɩ ẽ wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ la, bↄ ba bʋʋrↄ gãnna bɛla? A wʋn yuuge mɛ dee sõŋɛ ba bɩɩ?
Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ a wʋn wa sõŋɛ ba mɛ tↄtↄ. La Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sãn wa leme dũnia zuo, a wʋn yẽ nẽrba n bↄ ẽ sɩra mɛ bɩɩ?"
Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ayẽma bↄ nẽr-sɛba n tẽ'esrɩ tɩ bãma de la nẽr-sõma nẽ'esra nẽrba basɛba la, yetɩ:
"Bʋraasɩ bayi n sẽŋɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na tɩ ba ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, ayɩla de la Farisi nẽra, tɩ ayẽma dɛna lampo-tↄ'ↄsa.

Tɩ Farisi nẽra la zɛ saazuo pʋ'ʋsra a sũurum yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ, mam pʋ'ʋsrɩ fʋ, mam n ka wõn na nẽrba basɛba la n ãn se'em na, n de nayigba, bɩɩ nẽr-be'ero, bɩɩ nẽrba n tõnnɩ yalsɩ, la mam n ka wõn na lampo-tↄ'ↄs-ẽna wã la ı̃yã.
Dabsa ayopↄɩ woo pʋam, mam lʋtɩ nõorɛ la bʋyi, la bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ mam yẽtɩ la, pia pʋam woo mam loorɩ ayɩla bↄ'ↄra fõn mɛ.'
La lampo-tↄ'ↄsa la ze'ele la kẽnkɛrŋa põn ka gorge a nẽŋa saazuum, dee wẽ nupʋ'ʋgↄ yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ, zoe m ninbãalga, mam de la tõon-be'ero dãana.' "

Azezi yele bɛla dee yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ bʋra-ẽna wã n kule la, a yelle masɛ mɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, dee tɩ Farisi nẽra la yelle ka masɛ. Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n zẽkrɩ a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sike ẽ mɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n sikri a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zẽkɛ ẽ."
Nẽrba basɛba n daan tarɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto. La a karẽnbiisi la n yẽ bɛla la, ba zɛbɛ nẽrba la mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya kↄma la tɩ ba wa'am mam zẽ'am, da gu'ura-ya ba, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄma wã bõnↄ.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n ka sakɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ sↄna ẽ wʋ bia la, a kãn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
Zifdõma nẽrzuo ayɩla n daan soke Azezi yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fõn de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ?"
